91a3: sman tsa re N+ya dang khu ba dang / dngul chu rnams lus la blugs na phas kyi dpung 'joms par 'gyur ro// 'ad na nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las pas dpung 'joms pa'i le'u ste/ ba'i btsum lnga pa'o// // gzha
91a4: yang lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang dang gang la sngags dang sman gyi nus pa 'grub par 'gyur gsungs shig nyen par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma thams cad padang /
91a5: ba yin te/ 'on kyang dus tshod la ltos par rigs pas de'i phyir dus tshad brjod par bya'o// nyi ma ni lnga pa lalaM// zla ba ni gnyis pa la'o// gza' rnams kyi gtso bo ni bdun pa la'o// sngags pa ri ba'i pa la'o// ga
91a6: lhag ni gsum pa la'o/ / / mig dmar ni drug pa la'o// spen pa ni gcig pa la te/ rang rang gi dus chod de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gzung ba dang / dor ba'i le'u ste/
91a7: bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid can gyis rmi lam brtags la sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i dus chod dang rab tu ldan par bya ba'i phyir gza' dang / skar ma dang / tshes grangs
91a8: go riyis brjod par bya ste/ nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'am/ brgyad ngam/ bcu'am/ tshes gcig rnams kyi sa ri dang / chu stod dang / ma bzhi dang / skag dang / mchu dang / nag pa dang / tha mar dang / bra nye dang / smin
91b1: drug rnams dang rab tu ldan par bya'o/ / 'di ni nag po chen po'i chud kyi rgal pa las skar ma'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / gzhan yang ni mi ched pa'i dus su mkhas pas d+hA pa'i rtsa gnyis panan par dran
91b2: shin tu dga' ba lasags pa la nye bar gnas nas shes bya thams cad lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du mnan 'gro ba rnams kyi bde bathe tshom med par thob pa ri yul rnams ye shes kyi mes bsregs nas rgyu ma spang ba'o/ /
91b3: 'ongs dus na'ang 'gro ba rnams kyis shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa bsam du med pa'i 'ong bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro// nal 'byor 'dis 'o ma 'thungs na lnga ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro// rlung phyir 'don cing
91b4: dag par byas na dge ba bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'di na nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dge ba bsam pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi cho ga'i rim
91b5: ya bshad du gsol pa/ gang gis gang sbar la sbyin bsreg bya/ snying rje dang ldan pas sems can thams cad bde ba la ji ltar dgod/ dad par dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas nas sbyin bsreg bya'o//
91b6: sbyar ba ni rtag pa bstan na bde ba'i rang bzhin ye shes goH/ skad cig de la lus can rnams kyis ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lam gya cho ga'i ris pa la le'u ste/ bzhi bcu
91b7: rtse dgu 'o/ / gzhan yang a thar pa sha ba ri'i sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// oM sarba man tra ni dA nik+She me ra~M hA k+ShaHhaHzhes pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phyogs gcig klags pa tsam gyis sgrub po rnams kyi sdig
91b8: pa thams cad chags med par zad par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las a thar pa sha wa ri'i sngags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// / ldang 'bul gyi gtsug lag/
92a1: khang chen po nga sar mo cher pa rgyal khams pas zhes pa'i don du/ paN+Da Dita chen pos man ta shIng // bu chen gyi lo tsA bar dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
92a2: ye d+hamA he dra praHthA lan thug ta rgya ba tang / 1u0f7fman t+ta oM hrI ba d+hIsahA sa6/ 5 u0f7f5/ bsgramags cadag/ !// rgya ga ma dang / ya thal ba rna m
92a3: a tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas lnga'i cod par can// sa gsum kun
92a4: gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ / dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o// gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa// byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa yin// sangs rgyas
92a5: rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong min te/ sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rin chen tig dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste// lha de rnams kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin// dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'
92a6: rang bzhin no/ / dang po'i chos las de rnams 'byung ba ste// mkha' dang lhan cig sems can khams rnams kyang // gzhug rnams su ni bstan bcos tshad mar byas// gdod nas dag pa'i go 'phang mkha'
92a7: mnyam mtshungs/ / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang yang ldan// gang zhig chos de nyid kyi rang bzhin can// sa gsum po yi chos ni 'byung 'gyur ba// rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems da
92a8: la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i/ / bsod nams kyang ni mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal bas// chos kyi bdag nyid chen pos 'thob par 'gyur// sems can thams cad yongs su
92b1: bsgom par yang / / bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no// dngos kun rdo rje sems dpar dag byas pa'i// thar pa chos kyi rang bzhin bya ba ste// chos 'di 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'jig rten pas ni rang
92b2: bzhin gzhan du byas/ / 'di ni skra dang gsung dang thugs dag ni// ches 'di yi ni dang po 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor gnas ni lha me skal byed ma// der ni dang por chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// deng ni sngags
92b3: rnams rdo rje gcig dngos bsgom/ / chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dngos dmigs sam// ral pa'ither tshugs kyis kyang rab brgyan cing // sku mdog kyang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dag bste
92b4: gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni bsgom par bya/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par// yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya// yi ge'i gzugs ni yongs su gyur pa las// rdo rje rang bzhin nyid du bas
92b5: par bya/ / mchu yi mtha' ni sngags pas bsgom bya ba// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin te/ gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs par bya ba'o// 'di ni sems nyid yongs su
92b6: grub pa ste/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig bsgoms pa 'di yis sgom byed pa// sems kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni lha mo ba'i rnams ro gcig pa'o// ngo bo glus ni mkha'
92b7: dang mnyam las bsgom/ / de lta'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin te// lha mo thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong bar// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can// ral 'byor gnas dang
92b8: rol pa ste/ / thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor bcas// bkod pa dag dang ldan par gnas// mkhas bcas dngos las byung de la// rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar// gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o// bzhi gyi
93a1: ngo bo lha mo bzhi/ / dbus su nges par gnas pa ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis// sa gsam la ni khyab pa'o// lha'i der ni kha bzhi pa'i// lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/
93a2: rnam 'phrul thams cad 'di yi'o// ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams// skye bar 'gyur ba lan nyid de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul ni// sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur// de las gang byung lha kun kyang /
93a3: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin// sems can rnams ni chos kyi ngo bor lta// sa gsum thams cad gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid// rol pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs shing // de yis rnal 'byor dbang
93a4: pra kra ma kun mthong / / lha'i dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// // rtag tu mchog ldan khyed kyi ni// dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi// mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni// du mchis bdag cag zhu bar 'tshal// de la glu
93a5: bzhi gsungs pa ste/ / stong dang dbyer med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang ma// zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog du mnyam byed ma// gang phyir sgyu ma'i mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam// mkha' mnyam
93a6: thams cad rol pa ni ba med pa'o/ / ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ru d+ha// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun tu rol ba ste// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang // lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang
93a7: mtshungs/ / byas pa'i sngang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o// gang shig chos rnams snang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// der ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste// rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod
93a8: yon gyi/ / bde bami zad da tshogs dang mnyam grol mdzad pa'o// rnal 'byor gnas ni dunga'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni// du ma'i gzugs 'di deng ni rdo rje dang mnyam ning / nyid dang 'dra ba'i sems dpa' rnams ni smras
93b1: mdzad pa'i/ / rdo rje dbyings dang lhan cig mchog stsol mdzad// rang bdag mkhar mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni// gang zhig rtse gcig sems kyis 'di nyan cing // brjod bcas sems kyi glu 'di 'dzin pa'o// glu 'diram mkha'
93b2: dang ni mnyam pa ste/ / der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sa dbyed cing // rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir na rgyud kyang len par 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje gzhan rang bzhin// sngags
93b3: pas thags chung dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing / / chos kyi dkyil 'khor rabs gnas pad mchog der bsgom pa// dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni hU~M gi dbye ba can// gzugs rnams thams cad snga ma'i re bar
93b4: nges pa bang / / thugs kyi dbar gcig bas ma rdo rje theg pa'i// sams rnama'a' mnyamasems kyi theg pa rang bzhin meng// gti ka'i rang bzhin yar ni las canas yin te// de ning rjel ni med pa ye//
93b5: sems dpa' khyad ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te// 'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sang mdzad pa// kye lags rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i dngos// lha mo
93b6: bzhis spus rdo rje kun tu spangs pa ste/ / nang gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang // zugs kyang bar nyid kyis der ra tu gnas// thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni rnam par 'byung ba'o// nam mapa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdoHsmrab
93b7: zhing / / spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te// sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro// sems ni 'grog par gyur pa na// kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong // yang dang yang du sngags bsdus pas// gcig pa'i
93b8: rnam par bya ba'o/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du// chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o// gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas/
94a1: pa yi dngos po ste// de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs// bram ze dang ni khyim bdag gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing // rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i go 'angang de la len pa'i/
94a2: rang bzhin no// rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i da bor nges mthong ste/ de dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas// de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni// lha mo thams ca
94a3: der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ / gtso bo dang babs mdzes pa gcig pu 'byung rgyur khyad// mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu ste// rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid// der ni zhe sdang rang ba'i
94a4: dag ni zhig pa ste/ / yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin// gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe// lha'i g.yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par blta/
94a5: lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdor sems de bsgom bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang phyi dang ni// ba glang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams// dam tshig de
94a6: nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te/ / mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyis rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i// dam tshig 'di ni lha mo bzhi pos gsungs pa'o// rnal 'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing /
94a7: sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur to// dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi bam gsungs snying po ste// 'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing /
94a8: de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dad pa bya/ lha'adi nam sdang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid// rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te// skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro// gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje
94b1: sapas te srur mthong ba/ / rdo rje'i theg par 'dod nams lha mos 'di sang gsungs// bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs// 'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa de rje'i gsang sngags te// den sapas
94b2: gcig pa yis rdo rje ram bsgom pa/ / rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do// rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom// ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du// chos rnams gcig pa'i rang ba'i
94b3: nyid du bstan/ / sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus bsgom mir// lha mos skal ba byed pa'i dngos po ste// da ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas/
94b4: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya// dngos pa'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste// sems ri nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can// snga ma ci bzhin sems
94b5: ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/ / ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste// dngos po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te// sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par// sems
94b6: las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste/ / rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bkred par bya ba'o// ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i ru// 'di 'dra'i sems ni nA ra ba'i ngo bor sgrub// de ltar bstan du
94b7: med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste// de la rdo rje'i tshun dam lha'i rang bzhin can// thugs kyi nga bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya// chos
94b8: ngang dge 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste/ / de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te// zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngas po'i lus ni bsnur bar bya// bza' ba dang bcas pa dang ma la stan la sogs
95a1: de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin/ / gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i rang bzhi do// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum mar do rje ngo ba pang // chos rnams thams cad
95a2: po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ / rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs// de'i rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur// sna ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis// rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste/
95a3: sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med// sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o// de lta'i ngo bor thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags pa khyed ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste// thugs dang sgo dang slar yang bsdus byab// gsum
95a4: car yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/ / sems ni ri rab hA dang mnyam byas te// dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed// sems du 'gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag/ der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya/
95a5: bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' der ni skas g.yos mdzad// slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te// de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no// de la
95a6: rdo rje sems dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir/ / de'i phyir spro ba'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs// sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro// brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa// lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin// nges
95a7: par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos/ / thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan// de lta'i chos ni sgom pa yi// dngos po rdo rje'i ring bzhin no// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya// gang yang dri ma cis kyang
95a8: gos pa min/ / kye rnal 'byor pa/ bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te/ rdo rje bskyed par bsgom pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pa'o// lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/
95b1: rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa skyed mdzad pa'o// rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pas sems dang ni/ yi ge hUM gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur// brla dang rkang ba dag tu rnam rtog pa'i// tshangs pa yid la byab ma yin no//
95b2: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor la 'dun no// rdo rje'i 'ad bar gyes na yang dag bcang ba// sngags pas rnam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha// bye ba steng phrag dgani s+ho b+ha ste// gcig pa'i da bor gyur pa'i rdo rji /
95b3: srang yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin// byang chub zag pa sems kyi rang bzhin te// byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin // gnyig rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste// sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang ba'
95b4: ro/ / rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po tak+Sha ka gan dang / lo tsAb pang 'or dge slong byang chub
95b5: shes rab kyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ 6// rgya ga skad du/ sarbata thA ga ta kA ya thAka tsi ta ta ra ha s+yo gu h+yas sAdza mas hAkal pa rAng // bod skad du/ de bzhin
95b6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
95b7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
95b8: phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sem
96a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
96a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96a3: po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje
96a4: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a5: dpa' chen po rig bya rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis
96a6: lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam
96a7: par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha' khams thams cad
96a8: d ang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad shin du yongs su gang bar snang bar
96b1: gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs/
96b2: pa thams cad kyi bkod pa de dag nyid kyi skul zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po yongs
96b3: su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to/ / de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par
96b4: ro/ / la la mA ma kI'i rnam par ro// la la gos dkar mo'i rnam par ro// la la dam tshig sgrol ma'i rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to// la la gzugs kyi ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la sgra'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/
96b5: la la dri'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ro'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la reg bya'i ngo bo'i rnam pas yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
96b6: btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gru ba'i rdul med pa dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ / gsal ba de'i ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin ni kun du bgram// me stag
96b7: 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de bzhin
96b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag nyid bzhag par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
97a1: 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la bzhugs so// de
97a2: nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
97a3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i
97a4: dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to/ / de nas bcom
97a5: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms ber zhugs nas/ rig pa
97a6: chen po skyes bu'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ / byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de
97a7: bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi skyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
97a8: chen po'i thugs kha nas mngon par byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o haM sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni rab tu lu ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsapa/ rab tu mi rtog
97b1: gan med pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'chod pa smos pa'i dam
97b2: tshig de kho na nyid kyi rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje snying po btus pa
97b3: yi/ / de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom
97b4: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so/ / 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/
97b5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das
97b6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs
97b7: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje di mtshig
97b8: 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi
98a1: phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ma can kyis gso ba btab pa de
98a2: mkhyen nas/ ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i de snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // badz+ra d+hiH/ de nas 'di
98a3: p hyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen po sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis nag po dkar po dmar po'i rnam pas de
98a4: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
98a5: par zhugs te gti mug gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / dzi na dzika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
98a6: t hugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis dkar po nag po dmar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs
98a7: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi stong ba'i snying
98a8: 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rin chen tog gi phyag rgya chen po
98b1: byur ba rnamam pa mchagag gnas kyis sung dponag po ga ba rnam pas dpa na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug sung shags rjegapas kyigs sa pa zlas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ban gshegs
98b2: thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sngags mchog go snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / A
98b3: la/ / de nas 'di byung mthag tabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skra gsung thugs kyi dag pa'i skyes pa cid 'jig rten dbang thugag rig pa'i bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya dpo sbyor ba tshig gan
98b4: kyis dmar po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod mchog gi ngam tshig 'phru
98b5: brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / pradz+nyA d+h+r-ig/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de
98b6: b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po sbyar ba mchog gi gnas kyis ldang la dag po dkar po'i name sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung bus
98b7: rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ / zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs ni lnga po 'di rnams nyid// 'dod dang thar parabasgrub pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
98b8: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin parjes su chags pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs napa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo / / dweSha ti/ de nas
99a1: 'di pUng pa thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ / de nas bcod
99a2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /
99a3: mo ha ra ti// de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te shar gyi grwang
99a4: bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod
99a5: chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / rA ga ra ti// de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid
99a6: bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te rlung gi grang bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin
99a7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / badz+rar ti// de nas 'di byungs thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
99a8: thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi zhags 'dzin par gyur te byang gi grwar bzhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
99b1: mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / ya mAn ta krita// de
99b2: nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ /
99b3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob
99b4: pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / pradz+nyA na ta krita// de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid
99b5: rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
99b6: zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pad mAn ta kri ta// de nas de phyung
99b7: pa thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom
99b8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug sung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par shugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa khro ba chen po
100a1: 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rdo las byung ngo / / big+h+nAs k+Shi/ de nas de byang sa thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdu gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i sa bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs
100a2: pa thams cad kyi skra gsung thugs brnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyes par byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa'
100a3: rnams so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
100a4: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
100a5: snying po sku gsung thugs mchog ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
100a6: cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang
100a7: chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khyed kyis sems lus kyi rnam pa dang lus sems kyi rnam pa dang / sems tshig tu brjod pas skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
100a8: po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa brjodado/ / e mo'o te kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/
100b1: skye ba med pa sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par
100b2: rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med la sgom pa med// bsgom pa bsgom pa ma yin nyid// de ltar dngos po dngos
100b3: med de/ / bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de
100b4: bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po thams cad rnam bral phung po
100b5: khams/ / skye mched gzung ba 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med mnyam nyid kyis rang gi sems// gdod nas ma skyes stong nyid rang bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang
100b6: mdzad kyis gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems/
100b7: 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ma bskyod
100b8: pas gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
101a1: 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// chos bdag med las kun tu byung // byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de
101a2: bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che dpag tu med pas ye shes 'od zer sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
101a3: chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de bsgom pa'ang med// nam mkha' gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// 'dis ni dngos po rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
101a4: gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
101a5: la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di brtan/
101a6: pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
101a7: cad kyi sku rang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur// rmad du byung bar gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// chos bshad
101a8: pa ni ngo mtshar che/ / yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi bdag med yang dag byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med//
101b1: byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs
101b2: pa'i dag/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang
101b3: ba 'dus pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa
101b4: thams cad 'phro ba sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ / oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pra A ta ma ko haM/ nam mkha'
101b5: khams kyi dbus gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer ldani kun tu khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste/
101b6: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// bsgom par byas nas bsdus pa yis// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che//
101b7: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya yang na bsgom par bya// bsdus pa gnyis med sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog rab dang // rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che//
101b8: tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // don grub phyag rgya chen po rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par
102a1: brtsigs gsal 'jigs su rung / / shel dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thor tshug cod pan gyis rgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser
102a2: 'od 'dra/ / sangs rgyas sprin ni kun tu 'khrigs// rtse mo dgu pa'i rdo rje che// de yi phyag du rnam par bsgom// sa ra ka ta'i 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'ab rabs rnam par brgyad// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin
102a3: chen bsnams par bsgom/ / pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'od 'bar 'chang // rab 'bar phyag na pad ma bsnams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs
102a4: don yod rdo rje can/ / zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du ni bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings/
102a5: kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni
102a6: 'bru tshang tsam/ / sna'i rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur na spro// brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od// rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya//
102a7: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen ches// pad ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/
102a8: gsal bar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal// pad ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal// rin chen
102b1: brtson pas bsgom par bya/ / sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rab mchog 'di rnams nyid// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba//
102b2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang che gas ba 'dus pa las rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
102b3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba
102b4: btab po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs//
102b5: mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba// ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod mdzad// kun tu bzang po gsung
102b6: gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dag ni bshad du gsol// de nas
102b7: stor pa rdo rje 'dzin/ / 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso// 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
102b8: tsad kyi/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' rab tu bshad// de nas de phyir thugs dkyil 'khor// mchog thugs rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi//
103a1: dkyil 'khor yang dag rab bshad bya// lus dngang ga sems bsgoms pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// thig skur gas dpra legs bkal ba// tshad ma bzang po mdzes pa yis// thugs
103a2: kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ / khru ni bcu gnyis tshang du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni gru bzhi dang // sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/
103a3: de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// shar du 'khor lo chen po ni// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par
103a4: brgyan/ / lho ru rin chen chen po ni// 'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs// nub tu pad ma chen po ni// pad ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// byang du ral gri chen po ni// 'od zer 'bar ba rab 'khrigs bri// dbus su sprin ni zhi ba'i
103a5: 'od/ / spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru bri// mA ma ki'i rigs byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho ru'o// pad ma kha bye sdong bur bcas// nub tu kun du bri bar bya// byad du ud pa la mdzes pa ni// mthing ka sprin dang 'dra ba bri// tho ba
103a6: kun nas 'od mdzes 'bar/ / shar gyi sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// dbyug pa lho ru kun du bri// pad ma ral gri 'bar 'od byed// nub tu kun du bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang du
103a7: rdo rje bri bar bya/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba//
103a8: lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas// dri dang me tog brgyan byas te// de dbus su ni 'dod pa bya// yon tan ske rigs mA ma kIr// shes rab can gyis de byin brlabs// zhi ba spro bya sangs rgyas gnas// na mkha'i
103b1: dbyings ni rab tu brgyan/ / bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
103b2: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi
103b3: sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ / rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las byung //
103b4: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'khrugs// theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med// rab mchog dngos grub sgrub par byed// gdol pa smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen
103b5: bla na med pa yi/ / theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // de rnams kun kyang theg pa che// mchog gi sgrub pa 'dir 'grub 'gyur// slob
103b6: dpon smod pa po gzhan dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yod mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can gang // brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi ner la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod dga' gang // bshad/
103b7: gci zas su za ba ste// de rnams sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la// sgrub po gang gis 'dod byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos su ni// dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i
103b8: yum dgal/ / mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te// de ni blo can rnam mi rtog/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub me sa da' sems dpa' chen po
104a1: nams rlom nar du gra bang du zla bang byung / / bcom can 'das na gagags pathams pa kyi bdag sa slang du banan gshegs thams pa kyil bang rgyanang du das chu ga
104a2: pa gsung zhes gsol to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gas na nas/
104a3: chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams mthong de sadam smras cig/ chos nyid dag 'di sangs rgyas ni// snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// snying po chos kyi don byung ba// 'a
104a4: dag byang chub spyod pa'i gnas/ / de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi gang ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra po snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing skragal
104a5: brgyal bar gyu / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar byung pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
104a6: gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
104a7: k yi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom pa zhug so stobs par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rje
104a8: rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur chad
104b1: rgyazapa/ dbyas pas khyab pa gyung nas tshas rnams kyi mas kyi dbyangs 'di na ces gsungs so// em chos mam 'chos// ma sa kyi don byung ba// chos da dag pa bdag pa ga/
104b2: po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas/ rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje sbru la phyag 'tshal 'dung // thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso//
104b3: dus gsum dag gi lam du 'byung // dam mkha' chen por khams gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dung// nam mkha'i sbrul sa yang dag byung // nam mkha' la pa la gnas pa po// dam mkha'i thug
104b4: chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dad gdu dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las kun tu spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
104b5: deras de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs byin gyis rlab pa'i sngags 'di
104b6: gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsi ta ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
104b7: stoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlab pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bar+d+ha swA b+hA ba Ad mako ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che dpag tu med pas mnyam pa
104b8: nying po gnyis pa'i rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra sa thA ba ud pa ko ha~M// rdo rje gsum po bzhin
105a1: gshegs pa'i gsang / / gnas dang gnas ni rnam par bsgom pa ste// de dag nyid mchog rab kyi sngags kyi ni// mtshan nyid mtshan ma bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
105a2: gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis ye shes sgro ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ang ma ko haM// de nas
105a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas rdo rje don yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'dri gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba ud
105a4: mako haM/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
105a5: thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin
105a6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsad chen 'di gsungs so/ / sngags dmigs pa yi lus kyis ni// bdag dang yid la bskul byas pas// bsgrub bya rab mchog dngos grub dang // yid ni yang dag dga' mdzes
105a7: pa/ / sems kyi dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom// rnam gsum sbyor ba nam mkha' dang // mnyam nyid gnas ni bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs pa'i//
105a8: bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub med cing bskos pa'ang med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di// rnam par dpyad nas bsdu ba yis// byang chub sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin// sngags
105b1: kyis brtags pa bsgom par bya/ / de nas dngal ldan rje rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun ma khyen gyis// bsgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
105b2: granam par/ / zla ba'i dkyipa khor sgom par bya// sengs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phra mo'i spyir bkun tu brtsam// sna'i che mong yus dag bsam// yas dkar sna nga mi rgyug/ ye shes pa
105b3: ni nyams dga' ba/ / gsang ba ye shes brtags pa bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku'i gnas bsgoms te// de'i steng du gnas dgong //
105b4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul gyi sbyor ba la// de nas pad ma rdo rje bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen
105b5: dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba sngo// 'khor
105b6: ngag khyad par dag tu s+ho/ / mr-ing dngal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga ba khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tshang nan tan gyis// sna'i rtse mor rnam par bsas// tsan ka yi 'bru tshad kyi// 'dab ma brgyad pa ges rab cas/
105b7: sA yi rtse mor 'di shes te// byang chub gzhol bas bsgom par bya// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub
105b8: 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni// bsrubs der ni spo bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan ma yi// chos kyi gnas ni rab tu dbyung // de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // de nyid de na kun ston pa pos// sbyong ba
106a1: kun mchog legs dag pa/ / gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ro ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom// gsang ba'i de nyid mchod ci ni// legs pathong nas kyang bsgom par bya/
106a2: zas su gshang gci bya ba'i phyir// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pas bya// bla med de nyid 'grub pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa'o// sha yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir// sha chen po ni rab tu brtag/ gsang ba'i sku dang
106a3: gsung dang thugs/ / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// de bzhin dam pa khyi'i sha/ zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya// gzhan zas bza' bar yang mi bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par
106a4: 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' blo can yang // 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten du// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// stobs ldan gtso bo gzi
106a5: brjid can/ / mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskal med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags
106a6: kyi gsang ba 'di/ / lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
106a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa mchog rdzog pa par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa thams
106a8: cad longs spyod pa/ / bsten pas ji ltar 'dod pa las// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// nges par sangs rgyas myur thob 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten bya zhing // rang gi lha yi sbyor
106b1: ba yis/ / bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// dka' thub nges par mi bzad pas// bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pas// bsten na myur du grub par 'gyur// slongs mo za zhing mi
106b2: bzlas te/ / bslangs la dga' bar yang mi bya// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag dbyer med bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// bder gnas thob na byang chub 'thob// gnan du dus
106b3: min 'chi ba dang / / dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas// chos dang mi 'gyur mchog brnyes rnams// 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so//
106b4: chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// 'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod pa'i
106b5: bdag nyid can mchod bya/ / de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/
106b6: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas nas/ sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung
106b7: gnas gtso/ / rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas don yod rdo rje 'dzin// reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul
106b8: bar bya/ / de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi skyod pa yi tshul brnyes rnams// gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba snying po btus pa'o//
107a1: gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha rnams nyid du rtag tu bsgom// yang na de la rigs kyi ni// dbye ba rnam par bsgom pas bsgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran
107a2: sgom pa/ / lus dang ngag dang sems ni bsgom// rdo rje rjes su dran bsgom pa// rigs ni rjes dran sbyor ba las// khro ba rjes su dran sgom pa// dam tshig rjes dran sbyor ba las// bsgoms na byang chub thob par
107a3: 'gyur/ / bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas// byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo che/
107a4: spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang // phaT kyang rnam par brtag par bya// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa'i/
107a5: rdo rje pang mo bsgom par bya// de ni 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i
107a6: ltar bsgo bzhen/ / b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// ba spu'i bug rtse bar nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen//
107a7: b+hu gang ling ga rab bzhag nas// rdo rje chos ni rab bsgom bya// ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar gnas// mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen// b+hag ling ga ba bzhag nas/
107a8: sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// ba spu'i bug rtse bar nas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom//
107b1: ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse bar nas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams s+ho// de la khro ba rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom// baspu'i bu ga rtse bar
107b2: nas/ / mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen// rang gi rdo rje padam ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems
107b3: dpa' mchod/ / de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pa ni chen pos dbyung // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya//
107b4: de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang zhig/ phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyus// sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis// bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar
107b5: bsgom zhen/ / rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang zhig/ nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhen// kun tu
107b6: bzang po'i thugs gang zhig/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na// sems can kun gyi sems
107b7: gang yin/ / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra zhing // mkha' dang mtshungs par dpa' bo rnams// de la sngags kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rjes su dran pa ji ltar/
107b8: bsgom zhen// sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin// gsung gi sku ni rnam bsgom pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sku// rtag tu sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgo bzhen// dam tshig
108a1: khu tshur cho ga bzhin/ / 'bras bu 'dod pas bdud bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs gas bya// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran
108a2: pa ji ltar bsgom zhen/ / thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// skye ba med cing zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba med// de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom
108a3: zhe na/ / rang bzhin 'od gsal de nas ni// nam mkha' mtshan med mi 'gyur nges// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchod pa rjes su dran pa
108a4: ltar bsgom zhe na/ / bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed nas// rigs kyi sbyor ba'i rab dbye bas// rang gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin
108a5: pa'i thugs dag dang / / chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub// dman skyes gang gzhan bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms
108a6: pas/ / bzlas pas de la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
108a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dam pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol
108a8: ba btab bo/ / rdo rje rgyal po theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pas rnam spyod pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg pa rab
108b1: ston pa/ / nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal gzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam 'jug mdzad// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi
108b2: mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ / byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
108b3: thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed gnas// sku dang gsung dang
108b4: thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung yangs pa'i mig can ni// gzugs dang la datshos brgyan rnyed nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzung // byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/
108b5: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal ba nyid skyes zhi ba zhi pa'i gnas// bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa yang // rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus gang spyi gtsug mtha'
108b6: dbus su/ / cho ga shes pas rkang pa'i bar du yang // lte ba ro smod gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod pa rab tu bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya//
108b7: bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom// mkhas pas zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin// snying khar gang zhig 'dod pa ni// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin// 'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/
108b8: ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas su gyur par rnam par bsam// rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ud pa la dag dang // pad ma rnam pa lnga shes bya//
109a1: dza nyin pa gsupa shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dngul bar bya// me tog kang ni kar dang // brlag dang m+b+ha Nig/ me tog kA dbir yang // bsams nas mchod po rab tu brtag/ dpag cang brgya 'i
109a2: khyod tsam du/ / 'khor lo 'dakyila'a'ang bsgom bya zhing // rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pa marjod dang// ral gri ung dang la mkhas pas skum// dpag cang
109a3: bye ba'i khyer tsam pa/ / zla ba'i shin tu mdzes pa yo// mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams gnas ni mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis bsgom par bya/
109a4: 'dre ba'i yor tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchong ba dam lngamachog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams sa nyes
109a5: par bya/ / rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs la sogs brgyan// bsgrub cing rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// rin chen bdun gyis yongs bkang ba'i//
109a6: 'di rnam par mkhas pas ni// ye shes 'dod pas dngos grub 'dod// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag pa'i phyag rgyar mnyam bzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus ngag tu// 'dod chags blo can
109a7: sangs rgyas la/ / reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// rang lus de bzhin gshegs rang bzhin// bshad pa gcibs bla ma po dbazhin
109a8: bzang yid du 'ong ba yi/ / na chung skal ba'i mchog ldan pa// byin gyi brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig yangs khu ba blangs nas ni// brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pas bza'/
109b1: 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // rdzal+la rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rang gsung dang thug
109b2: kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshad gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/
109b3: kun don dbang phyug dam pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod pa// rdo rje gsum mi byed dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas theg pa can la gas // nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad // nam mkha' dbyings
109b4: kyi dbus gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rab bsgoms nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus
109b5: gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ / bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mtshig de bsgoms na ni// thugs
109b6: kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la
109b7: zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho nar shes par bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// mi shes thar pa ro bsgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub
109b8: pa yi/ / yang dag da tshig bka' stsal to// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par
110a1: bsgom/ / rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su// rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par bsgom// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yis// nor gyi rtsa
110a2: mchos rab gang 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi srab rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu rnams su 'gyur// 'di ni rigs rgya mtsho thams cad las gti mug gi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig tu shes par bya'o// de nas
110a3: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ / 'dod chags thar par ba sgrub pa// gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par
110a4: bya/ / 'od dpag med ni rab sgoms te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad ni// dgang zhing de ru thams cad ni// btsun mo'i rnam pa'i sbyor bar bsgom// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog
110a5: go/ dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgrub pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste// sngags
110a6: pas bsgom par bya ba nyid do/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don bsgrub pa// ye shes las byung bdag med pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs
110a7: rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje don yod rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// brdzun gyi ngag ni rdo rje'i gnas// thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// rgyal ba'i gnas ni thaH/
110a8: cad dang // rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub byed par bshad// 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs/
110b1: ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid de// don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje gsum mi byed rgyal gnas// dngos grub rdo rje rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkhri
110b2: dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rin chen tog tu rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang pa// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa yis// bstan na ye shes thob par
110b3: 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa
110b4: sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung bar gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten gyi khams
110b5: thams cad las 'das pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu rmad du byung ba'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsungs//
110b6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
110b7: rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes 'di lta bu ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di
110b8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni mchog gi spyod pa'o/ / gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams
111a1: cad ni nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/ / de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas// gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la
111a2: mi gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// 'di lta bu'i don gyi dbang mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsas pa mkhyen nas chos 'chang bar mdza
111a3: rigs kyi bu de lta bu nyid kyis nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan
111a4: dang me'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba rab tu 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de yang gadzub shing la mi gnas/ gtsu bstan la mi gnas/ me'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so//
111a5: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje dam tshig rjes su rig par bya ste/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pas zhes pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad
111a6: du byung bar gyur pas ngama'i mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa la// kun rdzob yang ni bshad
111a7: pamadzar/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
111a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang 'dus te// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba de
111b1: na gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di ska ces gsol to/ / de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngangos grub chen po'i rdul gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das
111b2: sa bshad du gsol/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtshog tso// 'bar ba gtum po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams bsgom/
111b3: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa// mnyam nyid kar yang mi gnas pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol tu phyin pa sngags
111b4: kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyor
111b5: pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa du ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i gar gyi rol pa ston par mdzad de// phyogs
111b6: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol pa dgyes pa/ yongs su spyod pa yod kyang de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho steng
111b7: de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na/ kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos thos pas so// de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa chen po de rnams kyi smar ras kyis btsa'
111b8: ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu gas ba/
112a1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sra gsung thugs kyi dam tshig/
112a2: gas pa/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las chag gis ma nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// a na aHswAr+tha/ de nas 'di nig sungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/
112a3: rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes sa dran// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so// nam mkhar dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i
112a4: dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// drangs par de yis rnam
112a5: par bsgom/ / de ma thag nyid der 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor dang rdo rjes// skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur// 'di de sangs
112a6: rgyas thams cad kyi/ / snying po rdo rje bsdus pa'o// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// gnas bzhin mas su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum rnam pa'i spong ba yis// kha dog gsam gyis rab tu bsgom// bcom ldan
112a7: 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis da skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de la 'di ni mchog rdo rje'i gsang ba'o// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi thugs kha'i yi// dgas chad phra mo nam bskom bya// de yi dbus su chung bar ni// yi ge mchog gi tshig
112a8: bsam so/ / skyong pa rdo rje chen por// rtse mo lnga pa rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis thugs ni gzir bya ste// lha yang rab tu bskul par bya// 'dir rdo rje thams cad
112b1: sangs rgyas byang chub rab srub pa'o/ / rdo rje lpags kyu rnam bsgom pa// rdo rje pad po'i rigs la sogs// thugs ni bskul bar rab bshad pa// 'di de rol mo 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yi ni tshul bachog 'di// zhag bdun par
112b2: byas na ni/ / gsang chen sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rdo rje can grub 'gyur// 'jigs shing yid ni skrag gyur nas// mchog stsol pa ni rnam par gzigs// yid ni mgub sa dga' ba yi// dngos grub rgya chen ster
112b3: bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog 'dzin rnams// gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'das na// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje gsum mchog stor ba po//
112b4: 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyid kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di de sangs
112b5: rgyas thams cad kyi/ / sngags kyi dam tshig sgrub pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing // chags shing chags pa'i stabs blta// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/
112b6: de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid skyes// thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad ni// ji snyed bud med brjod pa kAr// phyag rgya chen po'i sngon sbyor
112b7: bas/ de dag thams cad nye bar snad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// rdorje
112b8: gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe des 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa
113a1: thams cad kyi thugs bkul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u me bcu pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das su gsung thugs rdo rje ba'i dgashegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje skyes pa mchog
113a2: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rig pa skyes bu mchog gi le'u 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po nam bsgom pa/
113a3: byang chub thams cad 'thob pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// oM yig ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o// AHyig byang chub sprul pa'i bdag/ rdo rje gsung ni thob byed pa'o// hUM yig sku gsung thugs yin te//
113a4: rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed 'thob// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// rdo rje kur skyes dkyil
113a5: 'khor bsam/ / de ru yi ge b+hu bsam ste// rdo rje sman ni 'phro skyed pa'o// de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o// b+h+rUM/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge hUM ni rab tu bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
113a6: par/ yi ge oM re rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge a ni rab tu bsgom// yi ge b+hu gi gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum byung ba sgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gsum gyig par
113a7: bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM yig sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ oM/ AHyig sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// AHhUM yig ye shes
113a8: 'jings ni thugs/ hUM/ 'di ni byang chub tshul mchog yin// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'thung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes
113b1: ba nyid/ sngags dang rig pa zhes bsgrags pa// bskyed pa la sogs dam rig dag/ rdo rje gsum mi phyed bsgoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyasku gsung thugs dam tshig de kho nyid ye shes rdo rje byir gyis
113b2: rlob pa'i chu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rnam par dbyen zhing nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu brtsam// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs 'grub// phyogs gcig gis ni the tshom med// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas
113b3: pa/ gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ge e ni thugs kar dgod// 'od zer lnga pa sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad mchog sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas kyi ni na// rdo rje
113b4: rnam sdang rgya mtshor 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje gsum gyi kal pa ni// ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas// phyogs tsam gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces
113b5: bka' stsal to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas pa'i// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed/ AH
113b6: yig ngag gi lam la dgod/ / kha dog lnga pa rdo rje che// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgom pas// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang
113b7: brdungs par 'gyur/ / rdo rje gsum gyi gal ba ni// ye shes la ldan basbyin cing gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdurnga'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal te// de ba'i gshegs pa thams cad gsung rje dam chis
113b8: 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rab sngags skyes bubaskyed nas naM// thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge hAM// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// kha dag lnga parnam
114a1: bsgom bya/ / rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje thugs las byung // ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// rdo rje gsum gyi kal pa ni// ye shes lnga ldan bstan gnas shing //
114a2: com ldan 'das da thugs gsung ba sa de sar ces bka' sal to// debazhin gshegs pa thams cad snga gsung thugs dam tshig 'dzinas bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbas sa ni// ngo chen po nos
114a3: par bya/ lus rnams kun la yi ge khaM// rdo rje ye shes mkha' ma/ ma 'gyur// khaM sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // kal pa gsum ni dam tshig gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs
114a4: mi 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus las ni//
114a5: rang sngags skyes bu rab bsgoms la// snying kar rdo rje haM zhes pa/ gzhag ste 'od zer rnam par bsgom// 'jam dpal dam tshig rdzogs longs spyod// su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid du/
114a6: sa bcu dag la gnas de 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam tshig zla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od zer rab 'bar yi ge th+liM// mtshon mchog rdo rje'i
114a7: dbus su ni/ / bsgoms na rdo rje'i sku mnyam 'gyur/ hUM/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mngon shes lnga dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog
114a8: 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ / sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la// ye shes a
114b1: yig bsgom par bya/ / oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa'i sa 'dra dang // gsung dang thugs/
114b2: mchog rtag tu 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa 'od ma tshig mngon par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings
