114b3: kyi bas gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha' rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM yig bsgom par bya// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgobs pas// rdo rje gsum gyi tog 'drang
114b4: 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// spa dang gsung thugs rdorje las// rin chen tog gi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes gas ba mnyam gnas 'gyur//
114b5: rin po chad mtshig langs spyod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM yig bsgom
114b6: par bya/ / o/ rde rje dmachog gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang rag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen lam ni
114b7: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'ong dpag med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas
114b8: dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / rdo rje u dpal rab bsgoms nas// dam tshig oM yig rab tu bsgol// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje don yod gsum 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje
115a1: yis/ rdorje don yod 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes ma'o// sems can kan don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rjerjo don yod pas de sad ces bka' stsal to// dod yod pa'i das cig 'ju
115a2: ba 'od zer ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// rdo rje sdang mdzad rab bsgoms la// sku gsum aM yig rab
115a3: sdom/ oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// nam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yis// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed
115a4: 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ri bo rnam par dben pa dang / chu klung 'bab pa
115a5: rnams dang ni/ / dur khrod la sogs rnams su yang // bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bya// mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil gnas bsal// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// gnas su sangs rgyas
115a6: mchog rnams bsgom/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po dam tshig rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon
115a7: shes 'dra bar 'gyur/ / me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga ni stor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil gan sa par// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra/
115a8: bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gan pa'i/ rang gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams la// sngags la rnam par shes pa
115b1: bskur/ / de'i sa pas 'bog pa'i rdo rjeng chung // gang che skye bar gyur pa de// sangs rgyas kur gyi mchog sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor ba dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom//
115b2: king khar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas// sems ni thig ler gyur par gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas ni/ tshe dpag med par rab tu bsgom// snying khar yig AHbsams te// ji rje thig ler gtogs pa gzhag/ 'di
115b3: de dam tshig mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed bsgom// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par// bsgom bya gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/
115b4: lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni kal bar gnas// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par// bsgom bya chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni// lus ngag sems la yi ge AH// bsams na de ni kal bar gnas// nam
115b5: mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/ / bsgom bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni// lus ngag sems la yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni kal bar gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
115b6: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor 'di gang nas bzung ste// klog gam yang na sems kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba
115b7: 'dras pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pas// dam tshig
115b8: rdo rje gsum de nyid/ / rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs
116a1: mchog/ me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan// ri bo skye bos dben pa ru// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub// ma/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// 'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom// lus dang ngag sems
116a2: la spro ba/ / 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgyar ni rgya che ba// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od des ni// snang 'gyur dag pa'i bdag nyid de// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nam yang mthong bar mi nus
116a3: so/ / 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig mi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lugs gsum dang ni ldan byas nas// khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya//
116a4: sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de ru rab tu bsgom// de ni de ma thag nyid du// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'od 'drar 'gyur// rang gi sngags las 'khor lo ni// 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams
116a5: cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/ / bsgoms na sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur// ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra// 'di ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig
116a6: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ pra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i//
116a7: de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang
116a8: sngags rdo rjes bsams nas su/ / chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin pa// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ phra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag
116b1: nyid 'jog par byed/ / pad mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gsum gyi kal ba'i dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga ldan bstan cing gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rnam gsum bsnyen bkar byar
116b2: 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od/ / rang gi sngags la ral gri bsgom// mig yangs lag na thogs nas ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum chen pos mchod bya dang // tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa// stong
116b3: gsum na ni gcig pu dpal/ / gsang ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdorje rnams// sems kyis gang zhig 'dod pa ni// rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung // de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// ral gri thams cad dam pa
116b4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / oM yig ri lu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad du ni bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya// de ni de ma thag nyid du// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar
116b5: bar 'di 'dra' pa/ / 'angs bachu bo'i gser kyi mdog/ ma yig ra sra can kale// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang she sa/ yi gzugs// bsams te bar bsgom par bya// de ni de mthag nyid du// byang chub la
116b6: 'od 'drar 'gyur/ / nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ hUM mig ri lu tsan ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya// den
116b7: de ma thag nyid du/ / rdo rje'i mi dang 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bskos// lag tu 'khor lo
116b8: bsgoms na/ / yang mar rig 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'khor ma chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// sangs rgyas sun basbyor bas// ye shes mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// yeshes rje rje dag gi bya// mapa dbyangs rdo rje'i dadras pas
117a1: bar/ / ye shes pa skyong rab bsgobs te// lag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgrubs te// rdo rje'i skar ni rab sbyor bas// rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'ang/
117a2: ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin cher dbus gnas par// rin chen rdo rje rab tu bsgom// lag tu rin te rab bsgobs na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin chen chen po'i rigs bsgobs nas// ra
117a3: chen sur ni rab sbyor bas/ / rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// lag tu pad mo rab bsgoms na// pang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa
117a4: 'gyur/ pad mo chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas/ chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor bas// pad po'i mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// don yod ye shes rab tu bsgo ba/
117a5: lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms ra// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// dam tshig skur ni rab sbyor bas// dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje ngag gis bya// rtse gsum ye she
117a6: ljags kyu sogs/ / rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// lam
117a7: bya ba'i mngo'am shing gcag drung / / patshar mo gcig dang zha gnas su// rdo rje dgug par khyad par gyis// sgrub pa pos na rtag tu bsgrub// stong gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// rdo rje car gsum sbyor bsams nas// su rang ga
117a8: thugs lcags kyu raM/ / sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa// rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyad// nam mkha
117b1: dbyings kyi dam tshig rdo rje dgug pa'o/ / rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rdo rje pad ma la sogs pas// dam tshig dgug pa'i mchog ni bya// khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o//
117b2: dam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas su ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs re// skye ba la sogs rab tu bsgom// 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// den gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa kur gyi
117b3: mchog ldan pa'i/ / rdo rje sku ni rnam bsgom zhing // lce yi rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom// rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skar ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// /
117b4: rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab bsgrub 'ang // de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i
117b5: dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po'i dam tshig sha yis
117b6: ni/ / mngon shes lnga nyid thob par bya// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba'i bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ba glang sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i
117b7: mchog tu 'gyur/ / sha rnams thams cad ma rnyed na// thams cad bsams pas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi// su gsung thugs
117b8: ni rdo rje cad/ / snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyad rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig tshul gyi mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i
118a1: mchog/ dam tshig thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lce ni dam tshig rdo rje mchog/ hUM yig rdo rje can bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyong ba yis// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur 'di
118a2: ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste/ / AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog/
118a3: gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor po'i dam tshig grub pa mchog
118a4: sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam par 'gyur/ / gang gA'i bye snyed thams cad du// kun nas grub pa rnam par spyod// thams cad dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// thams cad dam tshig grub mchog ni//
118a5: rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong gsum gcig pus snang byed pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrog pa dang // lha mchog bu mo dag la spyod// gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// de
118a6: gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa/ / rang lag skya ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa// na be'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// mngon shes khyu mchog gis zas
118a7: 'gyur/ / gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi// sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can// rol mo ltar byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// 'khor bar gnas par 'byung ba yi//
118a8: sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran// gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sku// sangs rgyas sprin la sogs brgyan pas// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// rdzu 'phrul mchog gi rdo rjes 'gengs//
118b1: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni rdo rje'i spyan dang // rdo rje'i snyan dang rdo rje'i thugs dang rdo rje'i gnas dang rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes don
118b2: grub cing / sangs rgyas su dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'i su dang gsung dang thugs// 'jig rten khams kun rnam par bgrod// bsnyen par mchig sbyor ba dang /
118b3: nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang // sgrub pa'i don du dam tshig dang // sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// shes byas rdo rje'i bye brag gis// de nas las rnams sgrub par bya// bsnyen pa ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/ nye bar
118b4: sgrub pa grub mchog la/ / rdo rje'i skye mched rnam dpyod pa// sgrub pa skul ba rab brjod pa// sngags dang bdag po rnam sgom pa// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// rabargyan la ni bdag po bsam// ya
118b5: rdo rjes grub par 'gyur/ / bsnyen pa ye shes bdud rtsis bya// thams cad du ni rtag tu nyid// 'di gang sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags dang de nyid don sgrub pa'o// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu skye bos dben par nga/
118b6: ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen par bya// rdo rje sku gsum
118b7: mnyam de yis/ / bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// thun bzhi rnams dang rab sbyor bas// gnas lngar blo dang ldan pa yis// oM kyi yi ge bsgoms na ni// ye shes rdo rjes sdom pa bstan// zhag bdun dang na zla phyed dang //
118b8: zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab dbye bas// da yis rgyas par rab tu bstan// phyogs kyi nang las dngos grub gsungs// gsang
119a1: mchog las bung rnams kyis/ / de la 'di ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas su 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdordzag sum dang mi byed do sa// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas dang // A ma /
119a2: mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang mi byed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas dang // sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// de la 'di ni srub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo//
119a3: chos nyid gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas dang // gsung gis rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang ma
119a4: byed dngos/ / bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng // gsung gis rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo// rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin
119a5: gyis brlab gnas deng / / thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng // thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol//
119a6: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung // gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'da' na// tshal bar 'gas 'di gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gas
119a7: chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba dam tshig sgrub pa mchog nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog/
119a8: 'dzin dang // sems can kun don yang dag 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston po che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs//
119b1: e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang // me ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog/ me ma'o chos kyi tshul re'i// e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan// ma skyes pa'i yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag la/ ye she
119b2: 'byung bar rab tu gsungs/ / yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsung mi byed dkyil 'khor ni// sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsu pa bsgoms pas// bzlas pa rdo rjes
119b3: sbyor ba yis/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs mtshan nyid// sngags kyi bzlas pa da nga gsungs// ye shes rgya mtshogs na pa dang // sku gsung thugs
119b4: kyi rdo rje can/ / sangs rgyas dus gsum byung ba rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdorje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes byub
119b5: byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos/ / rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kun don gyi bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum mtshan nyid// dbye ba gsum gyi rdo rje'i mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum brjod bya// sku gsung thugs kyi
119b6: gnas rnams su/ / spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes
119b7: byas ni/ dza rje gsum gyi thugs 'dang 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi su gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rjerjes rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// yang na bye ba rnam
119b8: gsum gyis/ / so so so sor spro bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro bya zhing // rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i// sangs rgyas ba
120a1: rnams ni kun gyi yin/ / sku yi rdo rdo rdzogs byang chub// dngos dang dngos med dam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar gsungs// de ni su yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dmachig rdzogs byang chub// sla dang sbra min nas
120a2: dpyad pa/ / gsung gi rdo rje zhes gsungs te// de ni gsang gi bzlas par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa// zugs kyi rdo rje zhes gsungs te// de nathugs kyi bzlas par bshad// dor gyi rjes
120a3: rtogs bzlas pa ni/ / ngo bo nyid zung bzang po yis// ngas gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyang pa// de ni rin ched bzlas par bshad// sangs rgyas 'di las thams cad nga // sru yi sprin rnams spro ba ni// bzhud cing byod pa rje'i 'don// don don
120a4: yod bzlas par bshad/ / khro ba'i dam tshig shes pa yis// rang gi rdo rjes bsgrags dkyil 'khor// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis mos gyur ma// sems can kun la phan dag
120a5: med/ / sems can gti mug gnas la 'jog/ de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa// sems can 'dod chags mtshoganas bzhag/ de ni 'dod chags bzlas pa
120a6: bshad/ / zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems// lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa// sems can zhe sdang gnas la ga zhag/ de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad// dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid// dam tshig rdo rje can dbum// dkang ngam tshig rdo rje yi//
120a7: ma ning bzlas pa zhes bshad do// 'dod chags de nyid dor bskos pa// rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni// sems can kun la bar 'dod pa'i// 'dod chags las skyes byang chub mdzad// rig pa chen po spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i ngo
120a8: brtson pa/ / 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub// gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster// khro ba zhe sdang gnas las
120b1: skyes/ / rtag tugasod la bcon pa rnams// gsod pa'i don gyis sgrub pa po// mchog gi chos can gyis 'grub 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa chen po'adam tshig gis de skad ces bka' phrul to// ye shes 'khor lo coran gyid//
120b2: kha'i dbus su 'khor lo bsgos// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// dbus su 'khor lo'i don bsgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can gyis ni// snying kha'i dbus su rdo rje bsgom// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rnga rje'i sngags
120b3: don bsgom par bya/ / rin chen ye shes can gyi ni// snying kha'i dbus su rin chen bsgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad ma ye shes can gyi ni// snying kha'i dbus su pa ma bsgom//
120b4: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// pad ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can gyi ni// snying kha'i dbus su ral gri bsgom// dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom pa ga/ dkyil
120b5: 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su/ / sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// spros na byang chub thob par 'gyur// sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje'i bye
120b6: brag gis/ / spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya// lus ni sku'i ngo bo nyid// sems ni thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// ngag ni gsung gi rang bzhin gyis// mchod na mchod pa'i gnas thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo'i yis// rdo rje lnga ni bsgom par
120b7: bya/ / sku gsum rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rang gi bdag po'i gzugs bsams nas// rang gi sngags kyi rdo rje'i gzugs// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag ni// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la// snying khar sngags kyi don bsgom pa// rdo rje rnam
120b8: pa bzhi'i las/ / bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mchog tu rtag pa gsang chen no// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad mo rdo rje car// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro ba mngon
121a1: gyung pa/ / 'di na thams cad kye// gsang bas gsus la sa byung bas// sprul pa sngags dmas thams ca dang/ ba sa mas pa ba/ yang las ca dang / yab ga 'brang ba// 'a
121a2: sems can gzha rnams la'ang / / ba tu bskul ba 'di byora'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po lakhong lo rdo rjes de gad ces bka' rdzam to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sa dad dam gas
121a3: la/ dgra bos bsad par rabs pas nas su// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// dam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// rdo rje rje lnga zhal bzhi pa// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgob// dus gsum
121a4: dam tshig las byung ba'i/ / sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lag pa g.yas par 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdus
121a5: gong bu'i tshul gyis su/ / de dag rang gi lus la gzhug/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro ba rab tu bya// khros pa 'khrugs pa'i khro bo bas pa// mi sdug rab gsal 'jigs su rung // mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog
121a6: 'dzin pa/ / gsang ba'i don gyi mchog sems pa// bdug pa chen po bsod par byed// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol bas// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// dngos grub ster
121a7: 'gyur rmongs bdag nyid/ / 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// 'di ni nyin zhag bdun bya ste// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi 'grub po// rdo rje dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gan
121a8: pa/ / 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// rdo rje me stag 'gro ba can// de'i phyag na bsnams
121b1: bar bsgoms/ / pogs bcu nas blang sems cadan rnams// rdo rje'i sku yi khyab par gyis// 'od zer tshal gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la bzung // rdo rje thams cad sngo ba ni// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya/
121b2: sra bsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'arang // bka' 'khor lo rab sbyong bas// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo kun nas 'bar gzugs kyis// sra gsum
121b3: las byung dgos par bgyi/ / dge bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi 'tshal// 'khor lo'i dam cheg ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam// gshen rjeg she
121b4: 'khor la / / rang shi rdo rje rab tu brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams// sugasu pa dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa// slar yang sangs rgyas gshin rjegashed// rnam pa 'dra bar spro bar bya// sems can dus
121b5: gsum la bzhugs pa/ / bdag sems can dang dgra bo rnams// thos pas thams cad gsod par bsgob// 'dir rdo rdzo ga/ 'a dkyil 'khor// dam tshig thams cad las byung ba sku gsum ye shes di rje zhes bya ba 'di 'dzin
121b6: sagasung grags kyi tha ma/ / sngags den kyi lan tan nam// yang dag nag tor dam rdzog gas// ga 'i bar ma ltar bya// sngags pa bsung byar la shes // de ca kyis b+hab ste// 'dod ma
121b7: da/ / byang chub bsang ba did nus kyi// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rjes den ces paka' stsal te// dmam pa rje dbus gnas par// rnam par yang mdzad ma mchog las// blang sngags pa
121b8: dang tshig chis/ / bsams nas gdon da rab tu btag/ mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgol// rang sngags yi ge gnas ye shes// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sla ya
122a1: sangs rgyas sems tsam du/ / bsgoms pa rnams ni rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas nas su// sku gsum la ni de dag gzung // bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i sngags rir
122a2: po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcag par bya// rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// spyi bo'i steng
122a3: du rkang pa bsgos/ / bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chu ster kar pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbus su dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni// bsams te khro bo'i rigs bzhag la// las kyi
122a4: rdo rje gnas gnon pa/ / da yi spyi bor bsgom par bya// mu stegs thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// khro bo'i gzugs gsum rdo rje mchog/ ge sar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba// thams
122a5: cad ri yi rgyal po ltar/ / spyi bor bsams nas rab tu bsgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed de// ma dbang la 'dir the tshom med// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las byung bas de skad
122a6: ces bka' stsal to/ / dbang thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig la// bsam gtan 'di ni rab tu brtag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang gal te bgrod// gsal bar 'gyur 'di gdor mi za// bcom ldan 'das
122a7: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces gsungs te/ / yi ge hA las phur bu yi// tshad ni rtse mo lnga pa ste// rdo rje phur bur byas bsgoms la// snying khar de yis 'di rab bsgom// sangs rgyas dpung ni khros pa yang // 'jig par
122a8: 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ / dgra rmongs pa gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong khyer ram ni yang na grong // ljongs su yang ni ra sbyar bya// nang kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang // 'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// bar snang la gnas
122b1: rdo rje ni/ / rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsgom// bskal pa sreg pa ltar bsams la// slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// spro ba dag kyang slar bya'o// rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms ras kyang // dbang sna /
122b2: pa ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin ba'i rdo rje rab sdang byed// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// dar ni sangs rgyas chos chen dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i sman
122b3: spro bya/ / bskal pa grangs med gsum yang gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// skyor med sku yi gsang ba'o// nad thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
122b4: 'dzin to/ / bsam gtan las byung dam bcas pa// gnas gang du ni brtsam par bya// 'di yis bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bur rab bsgoms la//
122b5: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mchog rnams la// me stag 'bar ba 'dra bas gdag/ ces kyang gsungs so// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// zhi ba'i dkyil
122b6: 'khor dam pa bsam/ / rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas// rang gi thugs khar don gnyer gzhag/ mkha' dbyings spyan gyi mchog rnams kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom// bsdus nas 'od kyi gong
122b7: ba yis/ / nad pa la ni phab nas su// spu khung rtse bar nas sangs rgyas// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyi spro// sangs rgyas sprin rnams de'i tshe// de la dbang bskur rab tu grol// dam tshig rdo rje dang pa yis// skad cig gis
122b8: dpal ldan 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsam mo// thugs
123a1: khar don gnyer gzhag par bya/ / mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo zhes byas rab tu dgang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od// 'od kyi gong bu bsdu bar bya// 'di dag 'dod pa'i lus dang ngag
123a2: sems kyi gnas la dbab par bya/ / sA lung rtse bar nas rin rer// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis s+ho// chos kyi sprin ni bsgom bya zhing // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bas pa gtan 'di yas ra// dag dka' ba yang ba
123a3: 'gengs/ / de ri yid bzhin nor dpal ldan// swA pa'i rdo rje rab snang ba'o// chos kyi sprin gyi dam rig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rang mtha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje zla lam dkyil 'khor bsam// rdo rje dpa
123a4: mkha' chos mdun gzugs/ / thugs khang 'dod pa bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang // 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// gzi brjid de la dbab par bya//
123a5: de ni de ma thag nyid du// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon// 'jam dpal dang ni mnyam zhing gsal// gnas las byed par de 'gyur ro// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can dbang bskur// dga' ston chen po stsol bar mdzad/ mthong
123a6: ba nyid kyis byung ba yi/ / 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nam mkha' rdo rjer srin po ni// drag cing khrol rab btum dang // skra dang sna tshogs bya rog
123a7: dang / bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// dgra bo rnams ni rtag par bsgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// chu ma rus bcur khrag la sogra/
123a8: kun gyis drangs par rnam par bsgom// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas gnan// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang // gal te 'di ltar rab bsgom na// zla phyed nang du rdzogs pa
123b1: la/ 'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// rdo rje sprin dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ga'i chu sgong mdog 'dra bas pa// dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thong tshugs dbu rgyar dag
123b2: gis brgyan/ / rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam// dmar po nag
123b3: po dkar po'i zhal/ / thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can// bsgoms na nges par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom// rdo rje phyag drug bzang po ni// mtshon chas
123b4: rogs bsdams par bsgom/ / sems can kun la phan bzhed ma// spyan ma zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po dmar po che// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgom// mkha' sgras sbyar ni rgyal po che// dri ma med cing
123b5: zhal gsum pa/ / gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rtag tu bsgom// gsung rdo rje spyan rgyal mo che// dmar gnag dkar po'i rnam pa yi// zhal gsum pa ni myur du 'grub// kha dog mdzes par
123b6: rab tu bsgom/ / rig ma rdo rje ung pal bsdams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs// ser nag dkar ba'i rnam pa ni// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po gshin rje gsheng // zhal gsum drag po'i 'od
123b7: bzang ba/ rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu bzlos// gzhan gyis mi thub khro ba che// drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin pa// zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro bar rnam par bsam// khro bo
123b8: po rta 'grin no/ / bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum bdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyar ba can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje bdud rtsi khri bo che// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/ drag po rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra/ 'jigs pa
124a1: dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ / 'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che// zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i ma // Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab tu bsgo ba// stobs po chen da dza/
124a2: rten gsum gyi mun sel ba// bdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// zhal gsum pa ni rtag tu bsgom// khro bo chen po dbyug sngon can// khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba// 'bar
124a3: ba non po can du bsgom/ / rdo rje mi g.yo khri be te// rdo rje las byung zur gyi sa lta// zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsdams// brtul zhug sa can gyis zhal gsum bsgom// gtsug gtor chen po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu
124a4: 'pho/ / zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'khor lo can// bsam gtan 'od bzang bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro sku// bsam gtan
124a5: dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyi// so so so sor bsgom par bya// sngags rnams kyi ni ting nge 'dzin// dpag tu
124a6: med pa bshad pa yin/ / khro bo dag ni re re yang // nam mkha'i stong pas shin du 'phags// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mas sa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//
124a7: dam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zla ba bzhin zhi ba// 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od// me long lta bur yang dag byung // khams gsum dag ni rgyan mung pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams
124a8: na byang chub de yis mthong / / bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgom pa// de yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes
124b1: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam// khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra//
124b2: 'bar ba sna chog pa mnyam pa'i 'od// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje nyid ni myur du 'thob// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba// 'dis
124b3: ri rje bdag nyid / / sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// ci'ang nyid la thob par 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'adzirje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' dzadza'i dbus gnas par / ches
124b4: kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin ni 'khor
124b5: lo che/ / rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom// 'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba// ye shes rgya mtshos rnam brgyan pas// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dam
124b6: tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan ma mchog ni rnam par bsgom// zhal mdzes
124b7: spyan ni rab tu yangs/ / sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyad// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bud med rgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa// khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ye shes dngos grub thams cad byed/
124b8: 'khor lo'i yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'od mchog bas pa/
125a1: u0f7f// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgobs nas// nam mkha' rdo rje mchog rab bsgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// mung pa la mthing ka'i mdog 'drab// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// nam
125a2: mkha' dam tshig mchog rab bsgom/ / phyag na u pa la sngo dmar bsnams// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // nam mkha' yum rin po che
125a3: 'od kyi sprin rdo rje rim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgom lnga// rdo rje chos ma rab tu sgom/
125a4: zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// pad ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra ba// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
125a5: brgyan rnams kun gyis btsun pa ste// phyag na myad dpal dmar mdzes bsdums// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang // chos
125a6: kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun du ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab
125a7: bsgoms la/ / sgrol ma mchog gi bsgom par bya// zhal bzangs spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med rgyu mas rab tu myos// rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung
125a8: sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa/ / ud pal ljang ser dmar ba'i mdangs// phyag na bsnams pa rab tu bsgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par
125b1: nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mtsha
125b2: ba rnam par gtsigs/ / phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom// dbu rgyan snang mdzad bzhugs bsgoms na// rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur// 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig yin// gshin rje gshed
125b3: spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gzhan gyis mi thub rab tu bsgom// bar
125b4: ba 'od zer mang po can/ / sbrul gyis brgyan cing ske rags can// zhal ni rnam par gtsigs shing bgrang// kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom// mi skyong dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rdo rje can dag dgyes// 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can
125b5: thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig go/ / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/
125b6: rdo rje na mgrin rab tu bsgom// khra bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/ thams cad drin rnam par 'gro// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmang po rnam par bsam// rdzogs sangs dpag medang bu rgyan la// bsgoms na rde
125b7: can dag mnyes/ / 'di na rdo rje ye shes can// thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig yin// ta skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ sangs
125b8: rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi rab bsgom pa// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje smani ni kun du 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas gnag po dang // mche ba rnon po rab tu bsgom// mi skyong dam tshig dbu rgyan la//
126a1: bsgoms na rdo rje can gnyis 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar bka' ba'i dam tshig go/ bdud rtsi'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil
126a2: 'khor dam pa bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab bsgom bya// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'od
126a3: bzang bsgom par bya/ / mi skyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyes par rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge'
126a4: nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor//
126a5: khro zhing drag po zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs can bsgom par bya// mi skyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje gsum gyi stobs
126a6: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ sas rgyas gzugs ni babaskom la// rdo sngon po rnam par bsgom khro bo jigs pa'i lugs can// jigs pa'i dag kyang jigs par byed bzugs ni bdog na sa / ga pe'i
126a7: mtsho skyed par byed/ / 'bar ba 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje dbyug thogs bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu brgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'dedi ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dmachis go//
126a8: rdorje dbyug pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// me g.yo mchog ni rnam par rga
126b1: khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lta/ / ral gri zhags pa bsdams pa 'khrug/ 'bar ba 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can bsgom bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgo bas na mnyer bar rab tu 'phel// 'di ni
126b2: thams cad khro bo yi/ / 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yin// rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi gnas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas
126b3: gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ / rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu 'byung // mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor// gtsug tor 'khor lo dam tshig ni// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom// mi skyod
126b4: dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ / bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i
126b5: dbus gnas par/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje su ma b+ha rab tu bsgom// me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku// rdo rje sprin ni rab tu 'phro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// bsgoms
126b6: na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / mi spyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyer bar rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje dam tshigasum b+ha rab tu byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog
126b7: pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/ / sangs rgyas 'khor lo sten pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus
126b8: pa las/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don bsgom pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
127a1: bdag po de rje 'dzin pa chen pos zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la stobs par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi bcur lo 'di nyid kyis gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sor
127a2: s+phu ru dz+wal teSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ / de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// phun sum tshogs kun yid bzhad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su drar// sangs rgyas rnams kyi'i
127a3: skyed ma/ / las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing // rdo rje dam tshig skul mdzad ma// shi ba sos par byed par gsungs// rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dpa tshig khro bo rdo rjes
127a4: dngo po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM shang ker shar te ke re/ g+ha Ta
127a5: g+hu Ta Ta/ g+hu Ta Ti ni gU Ta Ti ni/ g+hu ta ya g+hA ta ya/ gU Ta ti ri swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed pa// rdo rje can mnyes spyan gdangs nas// rdo rje thugs ni rjes su drar// srung ba'i rdo rje sbyar ba la//
127a6: rtag tu las ni rab bsgrub pa// rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyen la// rtag tu stobs ni byed pa bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dab tshig gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
127a7: chos kyi dam tshig gi sku'i btsur mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ka Te ba ke Te nr-i ka Te ka Tad ka Te swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams// rdo rje chos ni rjes
127a8: su dran/ / mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur pas// rtag tu chos rgyas stobs dang ldan// rtag tu mngod po che mdzad pa// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// zlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa
127b1: reg kur ras 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa' bcur mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a tA re tung tA re tu re swAd// de ras 'di gsung nga
127b2: tsam byas/ / sangs rgyas kur bdag re skyes mnyes// de rje'i su ni rjes su dran// bas pa gtar ye shes thob gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde cher dang // sems can khams na kun ras su// gang cag gis ri brang ba'i dadu/
127b3: thams cad g.yo med dbang byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su gsung thugs rdo rje de ba'in gshegs pas dram med pa'i 'od zer bya sbyar
127b4: rdorjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir la stobs par zhugs ras/ rordeg shar rdegashed po chen po de rje khro bo 'di nyid kyis gsung zugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // namaHsa man ta ya ga cita tabarda rdza/ o ba la 'aca' ce/ sarba du
127b5: mad+ha pa ka/ a sa ma lal par thab gtas/ t+ya prAl/ Na t+yang byung / sha6/ / / 'a brams pa / 5931/ t+ta Anan/ sarba ba tatha sa ka pa/ Ar+tha
127b6: kebA g+h+ra rba man bas na/ kA ra Sharu/ sarba ka da ni/ rI de d+ha sa na ma rjo / ba na bar murban/ a ka da ya/ A ga pa ya/ sarba thA dan/ sabs ze/ de ma tha ni maH/ sarba d+hawAn/ pra be sha ya pra ba~M sha ya/ kha

127b8: ra jug/ sa/ ga ma / ma #// de pa nga/ sas // nga rgya ga na / sa ga// ma
128a1: tho pa ma chag lags pa/ / gzugs pangs yi la d+ha ba la// da mas banan pa'i dalags nas// sngags 'di rjes sung na pa bya// mA ma kI'i ma sman yang rgya/ rje chen po rigs mthon po// kha chags mapa/
128a2: brjodan ni// de mthag tungs par 'gugs// bcom ldan 'das thugs dza rjesang skad ces gsungs sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dam tshig 'od zeng mthag po mchog ces bya ba'i tsho
128a3: 'dzin la stoms par zhugs nas/ / bdud rtsi'i'adam tshig gi dziHkhro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung shugs rdo rje las srung ngo // na maHsa man ta k+Sha ya thA ga tsi tata badz+ranAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ mdA ShA tA ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a sa/ su sha la/
128a4: ba thab sha A5/ oM sa saHk+sha/ Na le/ khaSha / ti/ Ni)/ bstsu d+ha/ natan/ t+ta/ gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/ ba kro ma bi Sh+T+ri dz+wa la~M/ sarba'i ma ma gan/ mduganapa te/ dI ba man kar sa An+ta/ denas
128a5: ni gsungs tsam gyis/ / sangs rgyas kun ni grags chen po// rgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran// sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba la// rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams ni// tshogs sangs rgyas dbang dag kyang //
128a6: rang nyid kyis ni spod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa
128a7: 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo / / na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka tsi ta ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hU~Mdzin ri ten+da hU~M ha~M hU~M phaT phaT swAt+ma// de nas 'di ni gsangs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun// 'jigs shing kun du
128a8: skrag gyur pas/ / byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// srin po ma rungs gtum po dang // 'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa la// rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar bas// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
128b1: ya sa ga med pa 'an dzanapa sa nga can pa gams pa gas nas/ pa ba thapa ga sug sa shag rnalas kyang ga/ nam sa man su/ dz+ra
128b2: la/ par la/ sarba bi Sha g+hat+taka/ dz+wal te ba thA ling ga/ atataT+Ta dAs/ nA ne/ ke sha ra sa rba to ba tsa kro ra/ badz+ra wA ra/ nir m+b+ha tan/ tsa li ta ba pra d+ha ta la ni shAs ma tota k+Shi ba ta d+hA tI d+ha ra/ TI Sha Sha aHTaTaT dIs a
128b3: mi ta ba la pa rA kA ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta b+hU ta ga Na/ a d+hA Shi ta/ bud+hA pra d+he/ ha ya gI ba/ khAdra khAd/ pa ra man tAn/ tshin+da tshin+na/ sid+d+hi mi me A d+hi sha/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ sarba dz+ra ra bi shA tsar+tha/ sarbagra he la.a pra ti ha to b+ha bA/ badz+ra Sh+Ta
128b4: kir tsa rA ya si/ i dan duSh+Ta gra ha ne/ duSh+Ta sarba ma bA/ d+hun drA na/ ma tha ma thA/ mar dmar da/ bA Ta ya/ bA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+ta/ bud+d+ha d+harma sa g+ha a mu dz+nyA ta karma ku ru shi g+hAn ha ya grI bI ya phaT/ badz+ra ya baT/ badz+ra
128b5: gA tA ya phaT/ badz+ran trA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+TA ya phaT/ badz+ra khA rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khur ni ra g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ ba ra man tra bi nA sha nA ya~M phaT/ sarba trai lo kya bA ya sha rI ya phaT/ marba karba su a pra te tap+tA ya phaT/ badz+ra kul
128b6: san tI ma nA ya phaT/ hrI haM hU~M phaT paT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje mchog skyes rnams// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar gyur// ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran// mkha'i dbyings drug gipa yongs gang
128b7: gcib la du lara'ang/ / khro ba'i rgyal pa 'i skal ba yis// drag nams thams cad mang par byed// de nas pa ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon miza bar ba bas gdon mi zab dam tshig 'byung ba'i tog rishes
128b8: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka tsi ta ta badz+ra Na/ oM a hi e hi b+ha ga bAr/ nI la badz+rad Na Da/ tra rung
129a1: ru/ hra lu hu lu/ ha hA/ grwa lu gu la/ gul pa ya/ gul pa ya/ kram tha ma/ brag 'ad ba yu be ge na/ b+hu tA da shI g+han/ da hadaH/ dar dang / ba ha bta/ baT pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ rA ta ya bA ta ya/ mnamarga
129a2: TA ba ya mo TA ba ya/ sarba karma Ni/ tsin+ta tshin+na/ ba k+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ a s+thi me dam a s+ya/ ru d+hir mad dza med/ ba shA mad dza/ ru d+hi pra ya e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba big+h+nA ni/ sarba bi d+hA ni/ sarba man tA di/ sarba pA la karmA ni kr-i
129a3: tri ma Ni ShA dI ni/ sarba gra hA ra/ ha ra ha na/ b+han dza b+had dzaM/ ma ra da mar da/ e dam me kAr+ya ma sA d+ha ya/ hU~M ni lA ya ni lA ya/ nI la badz+ra daN DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ bag+ne na bi rA ya ka/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ riTI ta can DA y
129a4: a sarba shatr-id+hayA na paiya/ rin+d+ra tshin+ta/ pa ra bi d+ha rA ma/ ts+tshe da ka hUM bid+h+wa nA ma shiSh+Ti ka/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra badz+ra d+ha ra ba tsanItsa/ ma ra mA ni ni kr-inata/ hUM han ha ne/ da had ha/ pa tsa patsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/
129a5: phaT phaT hUM hUM kr-i ra ra tA ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA pa kA ya/ tan han badz+ra daN De na swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas// sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran//
129a6: grags chen khro bo'i rgyal po 'di// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// bdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas kun nas sprin
129a7: gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi su gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // da maHsa man ta kA ya thA ga tsi ta ta badz+rA tAM/ oM hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT phaT// d+ha gra shUl bA ni hU~M
129a8: phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+ya te nir nA da hUM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba la ya swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// stobs po che yi klu rnams kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab sgog nas// sugasu pa rdo rje rjes su dran/
129b1: bzlas pa tsam dang sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// than pa byung ba'i dus su yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
129b2: la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Dazhi'i rgyal po chen po khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ tsakahUM dzaHde nas 'di ni gsungs tsam
129b3: gyis/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag che skyes rnams// 'jigs shing rdo rje sku gsum ni// rjes dran dam tshig ldan gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rkang pa g.yas pas ling ga mnan// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags bzlas pas/
129b4: sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
129b5: las phyung ngo / / ra maHsa man ta kA ya bAg tsi ta ta badz+rA tAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN Da/ na Ta na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ san+na san+ta/ tan+ta tan+ta/ ha na han/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badz+ra hAs ku ru/ ha sa has/
129b6: mar mar rnga ma ra ma raT/ gar+b+ha gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ bar+N+Na ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ mahA mnat+pa/ pA la ka/ d+hune drAn/ tiNaM tarti/ 'ad 'ang / biD+ga ran/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TAn/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba na ku ru k+Sha
129b7: ru/ kar ka ri/ ma hA bi Sha Na badz+ra/ s+phoT ya kroT ya/ hUM hU~M hU~M tri ba lI ta rang ga nar ta ka/ a~M a a/ hatsA hA/ a tsa la tsiT/ s+pho Ta ya s+phaT ya/ d+hU sum sa man te ka tA Ta ma hA ba la shA ta ya/ pa ra man tAn/ A A/ hA
129b8: maM shud d+ha tu loka/ tuShu tu badz+rI/ na mo s+yA a pra ti ha ta ba la~M b+h+rUMHdz+wa la ya/ tAT a sa han ma u0f7fswA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsangs tsam gyis// lha kun 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas// rdo rje sman
130a1: 2/ / rjes su ngan// khro ba tshon mo'i sngag pa 'di yis// lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas// kha sbyar lus kyis 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam cig rnam par 'phrul pa rdo
130a2: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig khro ba chen po gnod mdzes 'od nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mo sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ra hUM/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na hA/ grih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU/
130a3: A na ya ho b+ha ka bAn bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// skra gshig gos dang bral bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis min na// de bzhin
130a4: gshegs kun bdag po ni/ / rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// bcings na bu mo dgug pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam
130a5: tshig chen po rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam sgom pa// zhags pa rdo rje skyob
130a6: 'dzin/ / sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas gsung sku'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo chen po sbyor ba las// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po// rtag tu nges par khugs par 'gyur// 'khor lo pad mo rdo rje res// mi hed rdo/
130a7: gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje skyo ba'i dbye ba yis// sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/ rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhib// ma'i bu mo mchog rnams kyi// snying khar rdo rje rtso
130a8: sbyar/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sha tsi der ni gnas par bsam// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis// lan
130b1: grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni/ / nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu gzugs po che// 'bar ba rnon po 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms la// nam mkha'i pad po dgug pa'i mchog/ khro bo rdo rje'i
130b2: dam tshig dang / / rdo rjes 'og gnas pa la// shUl rdo rje sgo zhags pas// lA min bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/ gtsug gam rdo rgyas dag kyang rung // rdo rje mo ba'i sbyor ba yis// zla za yis zin pa'i che// khar bcug la na
130b3: par bya/ / tshangs dbang drag po la sogs lha// rang gi ming rnams bris na ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// 'jam bI rdo rje rab tu bsgob// khro batshom
130b4: po gshin rje gshed/ rdo rje lugs kyu rnam par bsam// bskal pa sreg pa'i 'khor lo cha// bsgoms nas gnod srin mo dang srung // byag rgya'i dbye bas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dbye bas thams cad du// dkrug pa'i rab tu sbyor
130b5: ba gsungs/ / gzhan du byas na 'jog par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang dang yang du bskal bar bya// de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal po mchog tu rtag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'
130b6: kun tu rnam par 'phral ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje ral pa gcig ma dam tshig chen po'i gsung rdo rje'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM shU li ni swAH/
130b7: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams// tshig par gyur cing gos dang bral// sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran// sngags kyi rig pa 'di yis ni// klu rnams thams cad 'gugos par 'gyur// zla
130b8: bu mo mig bzangs dag/ bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer can 'di
131a1: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / mos rba mA ya nA ga ne/ trA sa ni trAs/ tras ya trAs ya/ ber Ta~M b+ha~Mk+ShaT+Ta ta Te/ bai ra khi ra Ti/ shwa shwe ta/ dza Ton swA t+ma/ de ras 'di na gsungs tsam gyis// ri 'dzin
131a2: bdag car skyes makun/ / 'dir zhing 'jigs par gyur pas // ye shes rdo rje rjes su dred// rig pa 'dzid pa'i bu mo mchog/ gsar gyi sna ma g.yo ba rnams// sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ri// dam tshig mareg gis dgug par bya/
131a3: 'gog pa rdo rje rgyal po ni// yongs su rdzogs pas mdzes mchog gas// ye shes rdo rje gsu pa las byung // kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs// yang na khro bo thams cad ni// dben pa'i gnas dang chen po ru// sngags pas
131a4: 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ / las rnams thams cad byed par bshad// rdo rje slob dpon smod par gzhan// theg pa chen mchog smod pa dag/ rab tu 'bad pas bsad par bya// yang na gnas nas spo bar bya// 'di yis byang chub
131a5: mchog gi de/ / sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems bsod pa ni/ cho ga
131a6: bzhin du bsgom bya ba/ / gdug sems can gyi dgra rnams ni// khrag dang chu yis gsher ba 'am// bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// bgos nas ling ga rkang pas mnan// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// brgya rtsa
131a7: brgyad ni yongs pa da/ / sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ yang gsungs pa/ chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas// khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis// ling ga rkang pas gdad na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/
131a8: bshad gcis gsher ra gas// ngan pa rul pa'i dri mnam pa// bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na// skad cig gis skams 'chi bar 'gyur// thal ba'i snyoms gsher ba'i gos// bgos nas khro bas 'khrugs
131b1: bzhin du/ / brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na di// rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur// yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de skra bshig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul can brtsigs shing bskur// ling ga rkang pas mnan na ri/
131b2: rab ma pa'i dbyangs kyang 'dzag par 'gyur// pa mo'i gnas sapa drur khrod dam// khang stong dang na bzhi pado dang / mtshad ma gcig dang shing gcig drung // mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya// ma rus las byas phur bu ni/ sor
131b3: brgyad pa yi rang dag la/ / brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra yi sgo khar sbas na ni// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog snad pa// shes dang mi shes rnab spangs pa// thab phyed nang rdzogs pa yis// nyams sam yang na 'chi bar
131b4: 'gyur/ / yang na thod pa gang ba dag/ khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal// der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te// rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya// dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu// sbas na nges par spong bar 'gyur// tA la'i lo pa 'am/
131b5: gzhan dag la/ khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra yi khyim ma pasgo dag tu// sbas na skams shing 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rgyu'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan
131b6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis lus dang ngag dang yid phur bus gdab bI
131b7: rmugs rdo rje 'di cid kyi sku gsung zugs rdo rje las byung / / oM rbaH/ g+hAHya thA k+Sha5/ sarbad+haSh+ThanA pa Tas/ kA la ya kI la 5/ sarbapA pa pa paH/ tA trA trA badzAkA la/ badz+ra d+ha re sa dzAb ya te/ kA ya hA//
131b8: kI la ya hU hUM hUM phaT phaT// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mkha' rdo thugs drad gyur// mi rus las byas phung bu'am// yang na sa ldeng mchog
132a1: las skyes/ / lcags las byas pa'i phung bdag/ dza rje su gsum 'jig par byed // de na sems dpa' mnyam gzhag la// 'o gro 'jug cing mdangs bapa gag/ da kun gsung
132a2: tha'i/ / gzugs ni bsams nas sbyar bar bya// rnam par snang mad phyag rgya na// yangan 'dod chags de dzi can// gshin rjeg shed kyi phyag rgya ma// bsams na rdo rjegasum phu du// rdo nga bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// gahA/
132a3: pa'i khrab char gcad pa// rdo rje'i sbyang bas bya ba yin// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po'i yang // snying kha nas ni rkang pa'i bar// rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom// de nyid dgod du dam tshig bya// phung bu'i rnam par 'phrul ba 'di//
132a4: bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kyis kyang nges par 'debs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// pur bus btab na myung du 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzang chen po'i su rnam par 'phrul
132a5: pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dmachog tsham dam gyi rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM tshan+da tshin/ han tan/ dahadaH/ dI ba tab
132a6: hUM phaT/ phan tshun bkri ba'i tshul dang ni// mthe bong bzhi ni rab tu bsdam// rnam par snang mdzad gnas mnan te// rdo rje phur bunges par gdab// btab ma thag tu sems dpa'i tshe// rdo rjes gsum las byung ba// dam
132a7: tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ / nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung
132a8: gi dam tshig tsham dam gyi rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / oM hriHb+ha ra b+hu baHye shes pad mo kha phye pa// rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas mnan te// rdo rje
132b1: pur bu nges par gdab/ / btab ma thag tu rdo rje che// sku gsum dri med las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos
132b2: sems rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham dam gyi phur bu gdab pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra rA dza hUM
132b3: mo lnga par bcings nas ni/ / 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par bsgom// sems kyi rdo rje'i gnas gnan te// rdo rje pur bu nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // dam tshig mchog
132b4: gis ldang bar 'gyur/ / nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga yang dag byas tsam gyis// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par// pur bus 'debs 'dir gdon mi za/
132b5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pur bus chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas su gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka
132b6: sbal to/ / e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa// a ma' chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// pur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
132b7: grags can po/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// pur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyis// pur gdab de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs las mchog sbyin pa// sngags kyi de
132b8: nyid bsdus pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsad pa 'dus pa las sku dang g.yung dang thugs rmad du byung ba sngags 'gugs pa rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes
133a1: bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzir// thams cad dam mkha' ma 'gyur che// thams cad dbang skar kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sde sha can gyi bdag nyid
133a2: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ / dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// gru bzhi pa ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor bya'o de ru ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms
133a3: pa yis/ / mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag/ bzhin yang mdzes la rab tu bzang // rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// pang bar bzhag nas rnam par bsgom// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas
133a4: gzugs ri rnam par bsgom/ / sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// rnam par snang mdzad sku cheran po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ sangs
133a5: rgyas kyini 'od 'drar 'gyur/ / bco bslag mkhan ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ud pal mthing ka'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// byas nas las ni brtsam par bya/
133a6: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// chos rnams kun 'dzin rgyal po mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa// rdo rje chos
133a7: de rjem sgom pas/ / gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig gi bkrus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// de ni rdo rje chos bdag nyid// sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin/ kun
133a8: mchog dbang phyug das pa'o/ / bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmang rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag nyid 'di ni// gsang ba thob par byed pa bsgrub// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skye
133b1: ranges shar ba'i dus su ni/ / bsgom pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyar rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyad// bsgoms na rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur//
133b2: 'di ni de/ gsung mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos
133b3: grub thams cad kyi/ / dam chog shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gal te rdo rje can grub 'dod// bshad gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' bka' ba'o// bshang gci dam tshig las
133b4: sogs pas/ / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'ang/
133b5: dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun du skrag par byed pa'i khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hrI ba Sh+Ti u0f7f bi kri tA/
133b6: nan sarba sha dz+nyA nA sha ya// stam b+ha ya/ hA hAM phaT phaT swA hA/ dug ri khrag dang kun du sbyar// lan tshwa rke tshe de bzhin te// tsher ma'i me las khros pas bsreg/ bu mo'i ming gi tshig dang ces// nyi ma gung ram na ma phyed na//
133b7: 'di ni rnam pa kun du shas// shes rab can gyi gri gsum du// stong phrag brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg/ bu mo dag gi dor gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya// bskal pa gsum dang grangs med ni// des ni rtag tu gnor par
133b8: 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang ni chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' ma gzhan yang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ri// de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// bcu bzhi 'am yang na tshes brgyad la// dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga pa'i
134a1: du sngags btab na/ / de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur 'di gdod mi za// thob
134a2: bsam gtad sbyor ba yis/ / de ltar byas na nges par ltung // hUM yig rab tu 'bar dang bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te// rdo rgyus sol pa la sog/
134a3: pas// skyes pa 'am bud med gzugs bris la// lag par sta re bsams nas su// 'grin pa bcad par rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// 'di yis snang
134a4: bar 'gyur pa 'am/ / shi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar che// me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje rnam bsgoms la// chu rngams gnon pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba
134a5: rlung la sogs pa byung na ni/ / mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// bdug pa'i dgra ni rjes dran bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang // sprul par gang zhig gyur pa ni// mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan
134a6: du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo bdug pa gzhan dag kyang // sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang
134a7: ba'i snying po'o/ / phaT/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa'i yis gnas bzhi ru// btsun mo rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyar rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs
134a8: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa/ / pad mo rab tu rgyas byas nas// sngags 'di rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM/ 'od zer lnga 'od rab 'bar ba// rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom/ rang lus ngag sems rdo rje laM// phab/
134b1: dbyang chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rngam par sngar mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
134b2: 'dzin to/ / bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed ra cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag nyid du// 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi
134b3: sngar bdag po dpal dang ldan/ / 'dzam bu'i gser gyi padangs 'drar 'gyur// bshad pa 'am yang na bza' ba 'am// sha yang cho ga bzhin du ni// mngon par sngags nas gzhug par bya// zos na mkhas rnams kyis
134b4: mi mthong / / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal te// bshad pa cho ga bzhir blangs nas// kham zor sbyar mar bzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // khyi
134b5: yi sha dang rta sha dang / / sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas kha sbyar sbyor ba yis// zos na de yis mi mthong ngo // bshang dang lhan cig ldan pa yis// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba
134b6: yis/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha ched dang ni sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags
134b7: gsung kyi/ / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // bzang sha dang snang ba yi// ro mu lcags gsam kyis bkris pa// dbang po gnyis 'byong ba yis// sangs rgyas par
134b8: gyis ri mthong ngo / / dpa las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyis ri lu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ga bur tsan dan sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum
135a1: gyis bkris pa/ / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // 'gi wang a ga ru sbyar ba'i// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs
135a2: po cher 'gyur ro/ / ga bur gur kum sbyar ba yi// ri lu lugs gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje can rnams gang yang rung // phyag rgya chen
135a3: por byin brlab na/ / de 'drar 'gyur de dpal dang ldan// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa dpal dang ldan// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar
135a4: 'gyur/ / 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad
135a5: ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/ sems 'brul yid la dbang po dag/ ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o 'dir ba ngo mtshar che// e ma 'ogasang gnas mi gyur pa//
135a6: me ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed po byed po mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje tshes chen pos// rnga rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
135a7: 'dzin nams mnyes par bya/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo mun dang gzugs sogs kyis// gtsug tor mnyes par byed par dran// khro ba rnams la'ang de mchog ste//
135a8: sangs rgyas rdo rje pa // sa pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog rnams// rin chen tog ni rnam par bsgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la/
135b1: gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom// sngag rnams tham cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya// thams cad
135b2: sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la/ / spyi bo ru ni bskul ba shis// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsam gtan 'khor lo 'di yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam
135b3: tshig chen po sgrub byed pa/ / sgrub po rnams la phan pa gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo tshes rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal te// ri rtse nyams ni
135b4: dga' ba dang / / nags tshal rab tu dben par yang // bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba// sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags dang bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las
135b5: kyi bka' bzhin du/ / las rnams sna tshogs byang bar 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go// dbab pa'i cho ga thams
135b6: cad ni/ / byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub// bskul dang rengs pa lha chen po// 'phags pa'i sa ni bzhi po dag/ rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma 'am// khye'u
135b7: lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ / mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag/ cho ga thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bslab par bya// rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni// khams
135b8: gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur/ / de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'di rnams so// hUM hAHAHdz+nye/ nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang / rdo rje sems dpa'
136a1: rang nyid kyang / / 'bab par 'gyur ro cho ga yis// hUM yig rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ hAHyig sku yi rdo rje can// AHyig chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni sngags tshig rten pa'o// yi ge dz+nye yis bskul ba/
136a2: bshad// 'khor ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad// khwa gang tsam ma mkhru bo 'am// ji srid khru brgyad lnga tsam du// rdo rje rgyal po rab bskul na// jigs shing sregs
136a3: 'bar bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin thams cad sngar ji ltar// 'di ni gsang bzob byed pa'o// de ras rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di sang bka'
136a4: stsal to/ / rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs brtan pas bya ba 'di// sbyor ba gzhan min pa yis bya// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o// dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las// sgra yi gzugs brnyan
136a5: byas nas ni/ / sgra bshig gcer bur byung ba yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed// dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas kyang // 'chi
136a6: bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ / dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la// ba lang sha dang rta sha yi// khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen po yis 'jig pa ni// thams cad rdo rje las
136a7: zung dran/ / 'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi// 'jigs pa shin tu mi zad dran// chos mchog can gyi bshad gci yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsreg/ sangs rgyas
136a8: dag kyang nges par 'jig ces gsungs so/ / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// dug las byung ba'i tshe ma ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dgang zhing skul ba'i
136b1: tshig dang bcas/ / sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig ces gsungs so// ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang // dug dang d+ha du ra dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad gsang ba la// 'di dag rab mchog gyur par bshad// sol khrus
136b2: gsher ba'i gos dag ni/ / gyon te sems ni khros nas su// ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni// srin pos 'dzin par gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis// gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa'
136b3: drag po yang / / mAng ba dag tu 'dzin par 'gyur// ske tshe dang ni yang dag ldan// bshang gci dag gis rdzogs pa yi// ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni// tsha ba chen pos 'dzin par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thama?/
136b4: cad kyi dmatshig chen po rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o// na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ga tsita ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA
136b5: ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an ta kA rA ya hUM phaT/ sbyin bsreg slar yang bsam gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis ni// bsod pa yi ni mchog 'di bya// rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/
136b6: rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// sta ri tho ba phyag na bsnams// bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu brtag/ de la 'di ni drag po chen po bro bo'i dam tshig go/ mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
136b7: yongs su gang bar rab bsgoms la// gdug pa de yis bsad par ni// bsams nas de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems
