136b8: dpas bsad na ni/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra bo rnams// skrag cing 'jigs pas bsgrags par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur 'di gdon mi za// srin
137a1: po khro bas tshogs pa/ / gtum zhing khro bo bzad pas// skrag par gyur bar bsams das ni// dzadza 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'di// ga pa ldang nga bya rgod dang // mchu ri ba dang tharnams kyis// thos par bsams
137a2: na de yis mi/ / sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sbrul na ga rab tu 'a ba di// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa// drug gi mchog srid ma tshig ni// dpral bar bsams na 'di kyang 'phags// sgra la des zos par
137a3: gyur pa yis/ / sgrub bya dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// yams sam nye bar 'tshe ba rnams// 'jigs pa dgra la dbab pa'i mchog/ 'di ni skul ba'i mchog yin no// tho ba rab tu
137a4: drag po yis/ / brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dgra yi srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi sta re sogs// gsheg cing btub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog
137a5: sbyin pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi// srung ba la sogs dang po sngags// lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod byed mchog gi mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// phung po rdo rjes dkyil 'a
137a6: du/ / sems can ji snyed gnas pa la// bas bdag nyid gtogs bsams da ni// 'di ltas mnyes 'gyur gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar
137a7: 'gyur/ / rdo rje thugs kyi bka' ji bzhin// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po// thams cad dbang skur
137a8: rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa'o// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// rgyal ba rnams kyis skye ba bstan// de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje
137b1: gsang ba'o/ / sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag pa 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro// lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng ba can// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bri// de la 'di ni klu khro bo skul pa'i snying po'o// 2/ kha yi nang du de bsam zhing /
137b2: drug ni ha la hral 'dra// sreg pa me yi 'a dog dang // bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon miza// de la 'di ni drug thams cad dkrug pa'i snying po'o// hrIHrnam pa sna tshogs las byung drug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun/ de l+ri
137b3: byir bar bsgoms nas ni/ / bab par gyur par rnam par bsam// daM ni de mthag nyid du// dug gi rgya mtsho memi bzad 'gyur// reg ma thag tu 'gro bkyun// 'jig pa 'di la bye tshom med// sdig pa srel ba la sogs dang / sprul
137b4: rnams sna tshogs pa dag la'ang / / cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya// sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o// oM/ lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi drug/ nam mkha'
137b5: rdorje'i dkyil 'khor du/ / ye shes rdo rjes bkug nas 'jug/ bcom ldan 'das drug gi dmatshig chen po rdo rjes de gad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni drug gas pa'i dam tshig rdo rje'i snying pol// / snying po 'didi rje ma/
137b6: dog dkar por rnam par bsgob// 'od kyi sprin ni cher 'bar ba// zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de ma thag tu sdud pas ldang // lan gnyis lar gsum rab bsgoms nas// skyugs pa pa//
137b7: tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i' khams kun gang ba yang // sad cig gis ni drug med byed// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni TI ba'i drug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o// AH'bras dang po la mgo 'brum bu dang /
137b8: gang gzhan nang du bshad pa rnam// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// da ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// dbong can can dri med pa// de yid bus na 'dug pasam pa// 'od zer ldan po
138a1: rdzogs pa'o/ / sdung pa na ni dam tshig gdag/ skal ba na rI dkar po 'dra// bsam gtan gnas 'di gsang ba ste// gsang chen ye shes dri ma med// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nang rnams gso ba'i rdo rje'i snying po
138a2: sngags kyi yi ge'i rig rngams te/ dzi na dzi ka/ A ro lig/ badz+ra d+hi ka/ yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thob par 'gyur// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// nad kyi dam tshig skul ba yis// dam tshig sme
138a3: rnam pa 'am/ / yang ra byed ni blang ba'ang rung // rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas bsgoms la// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig
138a4: rnams/ / des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu sgrol// 'di skad ces
138a5: kyang bka' stsal to/ / rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprini chen po// nad las thar par bsgom par bya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems
138a6: dpa' blo ldan rnams/ / khros pa de la bsam par bya// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa'i don// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las skyes su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis
138a7: 'jig par 'gyur/ / yang na rang gi sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nang rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin du 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po//
138a8: 'dod pa thar pa rdo rje chas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ni// ngo bo nyid kyi ma skyes shing // rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs// bsam gtan bzlas pa'i
138b1: don brtson pa'i/ / sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong // de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa/
138b2: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas longs spyor rdzogs pa yi// skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong // sems can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod par byed pa de yis mthong // rang gzugs ye shes
138b3: 'od panyam/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pas kyis// nges par mchod pa byed par mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba
138b4: grags pa che/ / rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong bar 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams
138b5: cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ / lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// de ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs pa nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes
138b6: par gyur nas kyang / / chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur//
138b7: kun dga' skyed tshal sna tshogs pa// lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyad// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon
138b8: rwa dbang bskur mthong / / rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byed par nges mthong ngo // zhes kyang gsungs so// rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'o// rmi lam dri ma med mthong nges// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/
139a1: skyes pa zla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol 'khyi'i sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje thos mthong na// zo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'din rmi laman
139a2: par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o/ / rang sems sems ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab gnas pa// namakha' rdo rje sems gnas 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
139a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ / rmad du byung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
139a4: 'di ci zhig lags/ / ngo bo nyid med chos rnams la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// e ma'ong 'tshar yang dag byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
139a5: gsung thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/
139a6: mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// nam mkha' der ni chos thams cad du gtogs la// thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmil ma dang // rmi lam
139a7: las byung bar rjes su rig par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang nam mkha' ni brtag tu med pa// bltar med pa thogs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
139a8: gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad dang // rdo rje'i gnas
139b1: kyi dam tshig ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
139b2: med do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams su gnas te// nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs
139b3: kyi khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na yang gnas pa ma yin te// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o// gang la skye ba med pa de ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so//
139b4: de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs
139b5: pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rnam pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas sems la mi gnas so// chos gang yang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye
139b6: ba med de 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ / kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam gyi gan/
139b7: mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// ming yang bdag gi rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ khams kyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las byung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan
139b8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams dang / / sems cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mi
140a1: lam la bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rig par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ni ni ba che thamams kyi gcopo yon tan thams
140a2: cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang gsol pa gtab pa de dag thams
140a3: cad bsams pa tsam nyid kyis 'byor par byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
140a4: thams cad chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu bgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas// de bzhin
140a5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
140a6: chos rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis
140a7: la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub kun nas btus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos
140a8: grub de dag gang gnas pa lags/ / gang nas byung ba lags// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ de bzhin
140b1: gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub ni sngags thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
140b2: la mi gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems
140b3: rdo rje la gnas so/ / lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas// sems ni lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas
140b4: ngag ni sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
140b5: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas so// /
140b6: rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol pa// sems gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa nam mkha' la gnas so// gsol pa nam mkha' gang la gnas
140b7: bka' stsal pa gang la yang mi gnas so/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo 'tshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar
140b8: 'khod par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sems can thams cad kying mtshig gi snying po rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //
141a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
141a2: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i bkod pas mchod pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje
141a3: thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams ca nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //
141a4: de nas de phyir sku'i dkyil 'khor// mchog thugs dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni bcu drug chad du bya// gru ba'i lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs
141a5: rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ / sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de'i nang du 'khor lo ni// cho ga rdo rjes bri bar bya// sngags rnams kyi ni gsang ba mchog/ dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas bya'o// mi
141a6: bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri/ / sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya// khro bo dang po rnams skor bri// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgom pa'i// mchod pa sngags shes
141a7: pa yis bya/ / 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshad dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sku yi rdo rje can// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig go// 'di ni
141a8: dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das paganado de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ji thams cad kyi mtshig gi sprin kod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa shA das/
141b1: nas gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas de phyir gsung dkyil 'khor// mchog thugs dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par
141b2: rab tu bshad par bya/ / khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab po// nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas// rdo rje gsung gi yon tan skyed// rgyal po
141b3: chen po rdo rje chos/ / rig pa'i dbang po 'jug par bya// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// kun du zlum po bri bar bya// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga brtson pas bri bar bya// tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su
141b4: dgod par bya/ / rdo rje'i gnas ni nyams dga' nyid// de dag thams cad yongs su brtag/ yongs su gsal bar cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// de ltas rdo rje can
141b5: mnyes 'gyur/ / bshang gci'i khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i
141b6: dkyil 'khor ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas sprin gyi bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen 'di
141b7: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin
141b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas shes pa'i gsang chen rab tu gsang ba'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khor lo 'byung
142a1: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
142a2: gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gi yi ge'i gnas rnams te/ oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang // tshon rtsi rnams kyang dgye pa dag/ sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste// byas rabyang chub dad par dka'// debs dam tshig cho ga
142a3: shes/ / sngags kyi lha rnams bcug nas su// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par rtag/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang // spyan ma yang ni gzhug par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid
142a4: 'o/ / rdo rje'i sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos ma 'jug par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mchog tu rtag pa'i gsang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma kI yang 'jug
142a5: par bya/ / 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mchog tu rmad byung gsang chen no// de ltar byas pas drang du rang // rab dang yid dbang rnams byon nas// rab tu dgyes par gyur pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni 'dri bar
142a6: byed/ 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags grub pa yi bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung che// khro bo'i rgyal po yis sangs rgyas// thams cad bkug nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum dang gnas dag la// dam tshig
142a7: mchod pa dus gsum pa/ / rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rmad byung chen po'i gtor ma babul// bshad gaH
142a8: sha dang 'bru mar dang / / lnga pa sems las byung ba dang // khu ba dag gi sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o//
142b1: big gdab pa'i cho ga 'di// rang nying gang che snang pa na// rnam par sang mdzad rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsam// yang na rdo rje bdud cir grags// slobs rdorje 'od po chang / bsgom bya las
142b2: kyi go 'phang ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bsten pa'o// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni// rdo rje'i thig skud gshegs rnams dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu spang byung ba'o//
142b3: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye brag gis// tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par dgyed// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang chen byang chub dam pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom par bya// mchog
142b4: giswA/ gsung thugs dam tshig/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar byas na nye mi 'gyur// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing sgeg nas byin rlob mdzad// rdo rje bar/
142b5: pa rnams dgod pa// sngags rgyud bdag pos shes byas pas// rdo rje sems pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun 'bras 'dod pa yi/ sngags shes pas ni sbyin bsreg bya// bshad
142b6: gci 'bru mar sha la sogs/ / bsreg rdzas dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'khor lo// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin bsreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di
142b7: skad kyang gsungs so/ / dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// brgya rtsa brgyad ni sbyin bsreg bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// slob pa
142b8: rdo rje gsum las byung / / AHyig lus dang ngag sems la// bsgoms nas rdo rjes 'dzin par byed// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu/
143a1: byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu stsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i rdo rje'i tshig go// AHkha~M bI ra hUM/ 'di ni dam rig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi snying po'i
143a2: sngags kyi rgyal po'o/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang chen no// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom// rdo rje'i blo yi sil snyad dang
143a3: dri sogs dam tshig sprin tshogs bsgom/ / 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni// yungs dkar brtul zhugs can gyi brdeg/ de la de yi chen ni// rang nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// yang ni
143a4: rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas bsgom// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar mkhas pas bsgom par bya// rtag tu slob ma blo brtan pa// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam/
143a5: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje cad// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang chen te/ slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig smra bar bya ba'o// dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni/
143a6: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// rdo rje gsang ba gsum 'byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga gsang chen no// byang chub
143a7: rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ / mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i deng bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab dga'i sems kyis sbyin par bya// lha yi gzugs
143a8: kyi sbyor ba yis/ / snying kha ba dag po gzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan pa// de la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyod kyis srog
143b1: chags gsad par bya/ / brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang khyod kyis blang // pha rol bud ped bsten par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'dod dag gis// sems can thams cad rab bskul bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas
143b2: thams cad kyi/ / dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// zhes kyang gsungs so// sngags kyi skul ba smras pa yis// de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin ni// byin nas gsang ba yang dag brtsa pa/
143b3: khra ba'am yang na bshad pa'ang rung // mngon par sngags nas cho ga bzhin// rdo rje'i blos ni zar gzhug bya// 'di ltas dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsapa// sngags
143b4: kyi 'khor los bud med gzugs/ / sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sngags thams cad mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ sha chen dag kyang bza' bar
143b5: sngags rnams kur la dpral bar bya/ / de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas kyis kyang // sngags
143b6: rnams kun gyi yi ge oM/ / bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ste// dam tshig chen po sgrub pa'o//
143b7: rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rang nyid kyang // mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag ni// rdo rje sku yi bka' ji bzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni thams cad 'gras
143b8: bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams/ / cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham por sbyar mar gzhag nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khor// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// de la 'di ni gsang ba thams
144a1: cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go/ / hrIHyig 'bar ba 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams// yong su
144a2: gang bar dam par bsgom/ / de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags la dbab par bya// de la 'di ni su dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas so// AHkha d+hIHphyag na
144a3: gzugs chen po/ / phyag na pad mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhag go/ de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang bI gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
144a4: mi skyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i rdo rje re// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te// thams cad 'od chen sdug bsngal ni// chen pos snying pos bskul bar bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba'o//
144a5: oMH/ mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che// lcags sgra sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin du bskul// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// de skad ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba dang ri dag dang / chu gling
144a6: rnam pa sna tshogs su/ / zla phyed rang dang rdzogs pa yis// nges par sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// 'khor gyi tshogs rnams de dag ni// byang chub rdo rje can grub
144a7: 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje gzhad pa chen pas/
144a8: de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mdag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rdo rje gsang chen no// rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches// mdag gzhug pa rnams/
144b1: rtag tu bskul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas rnam pa bzhi ste// dam tshig bskul ba dang dam tshig gtong ba dang / dam tshig bod pa dang dam tshig 'ching ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag
144b2: pa ni/ chos rnams thams cad rnam spangs pa// gong bu'i tshul gyi rdo rje ri// smad byung gzugs can byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka'
144b3: stsal to/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsas so// 'jam pa'i rdo rje stobs po che// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/
144b4: mnga' lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// dbu rgyan rtse mor yang dag spro// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bo dbab par bya// byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// sngags shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya// bsam gtan
144b5: 'di ni gsang ba yi/ / skul ba dag gis phyogs gcig bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyi rab tu gsang // rdo rje'i don gyi blo yis gsungs// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i// hUM yig sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog/
144b6: bsam bya rdo rje'i sngags sogs kyis// rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgom// mig gnas yi ge oM bsams nas// 'di dag tshogs bstan par bya// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsung rdo rje can rnams mtho/
144b7: bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs ches// sbyor ba 'di ni ram bsams na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// do rnams thams cad 'byor
144b8: bsams la/ / yi ge ba mkhar gnas pa bsgom// oM yig lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas// yid bzhin nor bu rnam brgyan pa// zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel// ye shes rdo rje rab bskul ba'o//
145a1: bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshagapa dpa' chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje sgom pa'i tshig gi
145a2: mchog rdo rje gsung las byung ngo / / bIHnam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thams cad
145a3: yongs rdzogs pa/ / ser po rdo rje rnam par 'gying// zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya// dpa' bo rdo rje'i rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
145a4: 'chang kun nas nges par bsgrags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / tsuM/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i
145a5: dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / cho ga ngag gis sangs rgyas sprin/ rdo rje gsum mchog grags chen ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis ltung // skul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ kha dog
145a6: dkar mor rab tu bsgom/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsams la sngags kyi gnas dgod do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
145a7: pas bsam pa thams cad rdo rje'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / dza/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ sa
145a8: rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsgoms pas dbab par bya// dzaM b+ha la ni nor bsgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa// thor
145b1: tshugs rabu rgyan rdo rje can/ / sangs rgyas ldan cog yis// gnas la dag tu bsgom par bya// de yi rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ru// bsam gtan gnas la bdug pas dbul// rdo rje sems dpa' cog yis// de dab rgyan rnam par
145b2: bsam/ / de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang // gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen mnyes// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
145b3: pas 'dod pa nye bar spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / !/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// /
145b4: bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab/ gzugs
145b5: ni gcig tu bsam par bya/ / rdo rje gsum las bye brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsam par bya// 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo bsgom// snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba
145b6: brtsam par bya/ / gnod sbyin mo thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas pa bsgom pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sngags thams cad dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul
145b7: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phra mo'i dngos grub 'dinyid kyi su gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po// 'jam du
145b8: chu'i gser 'od 'dra/ / dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs kun grub ni// gtse bo rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal mo grub pa che// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad
146a1: kyi gzugs sngags kyi dngos grub rnams so/ / sngags kyi dngos grub yid 'ong ba'i// mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyi dga' bar 'gyur//
146a2: gtsug tor thams cad grub pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang rab bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i
146a3: rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag
146a4: par len pa'i spyod pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems dmigs pa ni// rang gzugs nyid kyi de bya ste// de ltas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sku dang
146a5: gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/ / gzugs ni thor tshugs dbu brgyan 'chang // chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// sngags kyi sdom pas kun du bsdam// lo grangs ba
146a6: drug lon pa ni/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing // rdo rje mtshan ma yis ni bya// phyag rgya sngags
146a7: kyi cho ga shes/ / sngags dang rgyud ni legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen pos thun bzhir ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong
146a8: burtsa ba 'bras bu rnams/ / bza' dang bcas pa thams cad spyad// 'di yi myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis de dag kun// gdon mi za bar 'dir thob 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan
146b1: gyi nor bcu zhing / / gsang ba'ang slad du byung ba che// 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsnam// 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu yum// yon tan lug brgyad lA ma gang / gsung
146b2: gi rdo rje mchog thugs kyis/ / 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// rang gi phyag rgya 'am sems kyis bsam// bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen yang // mnyes par 'gyur 'dir
146b3: gdon mi za/ / sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms tshol// kha zas bzang po ltar bdag/ 'jigs shing sgra gnas ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje gsum bdag nyid 'das na// 'jig cing rdo rje'i
146b4: yi ger 'gyur/ / lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha ma yin mo mi mo 'ang rung // rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i de nyid
146b5: tshul chen te/ / rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rang 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes
146b6: de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
146b7: zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
146b8: bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ / mi skyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par
147a1: snang mdzad dag pa che/ / rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal ros rnams ni// ston mdzad rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dag pa
147a2: gos pa med/ / gsang ba gsungs shig khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje can// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs
147a3: sangs rgyas/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs
147a4: spyod bstod na ni/ / de yang sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtsi bas// rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas dag pa// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams
147a5: cad kyi/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge re// rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam
147a6: tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sangs rgyas ye shes mtsho 'od kyis// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bya ste// sha chen rtag tu bza' bya'o// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
147a7: pa'i bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyis gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste// gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches// bshang gci rtag tu bza' ba nyid// 'din
147a8: gsang barmad byung ba'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i dmacheg 'di nyid kyi sdugasung zugs rje
147b1: las phyung ngo / / rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung byas// khrag dang khu ba sbyar bdag/ brtul zhugs brtan pas rtag tu bzar// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dam tshig dani zangad thung // sa
147b2: rgyas kun gyi rtag pa ni/ / rdo rje 'dzin phyir yang dag bsrung // gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// nga yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
147b3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / ston pa lus kyis de rnams ni// rdo rje skul rab tu gnas// sems can 'jug pa'i ngang tshul
147b4: te/ / mchog tu rtag pa'i dam tshig go// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam/
147b5: byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig de ni rmad byung che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
147b6: las byung ngo / / gti mug lam gyi las gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos drag
147b7: 'dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / khams gsum par ni gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung kun// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
147b8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sems can skyes pa ji snyed pa// sku gsum dbyer med la gnas rnams// bsam gtan rdo rjes gsang
148a1: par bya/ / rdo rje mkha' khams bdag nyid kyang // de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gi rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yaM
148a2: rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur/ / gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdage pos gnod spyir mo thams cad kyi dam tshig
148a3: 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sha dang khrag ni za ba dang // rtag tu bud med 'dod mchog gzhol// rdo rje chen po 'di rnams kyi// dam tshig bsten dkas mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
148a4: pa thams cad kyi bdag pos klu'i dbang po'i rgyal mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / bra ma dang ni 'o ma 'thung // 'dod dang dri sa rtag tu 'bad// dam tshig 'di rnams kyis bsgrub bya//
148a5: gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phye 'o// khro zhing nga rgyal khur gyis non// spos dang
148a6: me tog spong ba skyes/ / dam tshig rdo rjes 'og tu// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed de// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
148a7: las phyung ngo / / thod rus gdug pa 'bru mar dang // zhag gas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig 'di// bdag byed rdo rje don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
148a8: bas rdornam pa' 'gre ma thams cad kyi pa tshig 'ang nyid kyi su gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / nga pagaci ba khrag bza' 'ang // chad la sogs pa rtag tu btung// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor bas gnas kyi mtshan
148b1: nyid kyis bas / / ngo bo nyid kyi kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod // dam tshig ma lus dngos grub kun// phan par 'dod pas byung bar bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes
148b2: su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas phyagar rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lus kyi rnam gsum thams
148b3: cad ni/ / rdo rje yang dag byung bar bya// sems can khams ni rngam kun tu// rtag tu sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ngag gi dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung
148b4: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / ngag gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor du// ngag gi grub gnas nyams dga' 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
148b5: pos sems rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las blang ngo / / yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// brtan pa rdo rje'i blo yis bsgom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das
148b6: kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas
148b7: byang chub sems dpa' dang / / rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// phyag 'tshal na ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa
148b8: thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / kun tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan
149a1: shab/ / sngags bzlos pas bsgom bya// de nas phyag dang dzad bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags rdo rje thams cad kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung bugs rdo rnga las phyung ngo // sems can khams rnams
149a2: bsdus nas ni/ / bsam gtan rngarjes bskul bar bya// rnga rje gsum phyag mchog gi mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje 'byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gis bsnyen pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / nye bar
149a3: sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // rdo rje bshad gcig nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o//
149a4: re res phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje thams cad mi snang ba'i da tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // thung bzhi po ni gang shig mchog/ rdo rje mon nyin spyad// slar yang rdzas
149a5: kyang rtag tu dbrog/ rdo rje rdzogs byed dam tshig go// de nas byagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dmatshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // gsung thugs kyi
149a6: rdo rje rnams/ / dbu rgyan gyi ni bsam gtan bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig kun// khros pa rnams kyi rgyal mi nus// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'chang las dang po pa
149a7: thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las pang ngo / / khazas la ni sgra'i rdorje// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya// mdo 'don chaga'i bya ba la// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes dgad ces
149a8: bka' stsal to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ de nas
149b1: yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin ga/ gas thams cadapa phyag 'tsha la nas
149b2: 'di skad kyis gsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang dag pa 'di ci'i sring du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gyi kyil la
149b3: nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' da gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
149b4: kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i gnas la gang ngo bo nyid med par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas rnam par dpyad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /
149b5: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sku yi yi ge ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' rdo rje'i rtog par byung // log par bzung bas
149b6: bzung ba yin/ / de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
149b7: pa thams cad gsang rdo rje'i tshigs lag bkun 'byung bas mi rtag tu gsol/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi bo nyid spyad pa gshegs pa dang dran pa ning bzhin gshegs
149b8: thams cad kyi bdag po 'di yin no/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i byang chub chen po sems dpa' mngon par shes pa chen po ye shes thob pa rnams chas thams cad kyis na bya man pashes par ni ltam du/
150a1: yongs su rtog par byed de// ci rdo rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rdo rje kho na nyid mngon par mkhyen nas gsang ba'i yi ge 'chang ngam snyam pa yang mchis so// de nas bcom
150a2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / re shig byang chub chen po sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung
150a3: thugs kyi gsang ba'i yi ge rnyed pa dad kyis kyang sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba// skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so rigs kyi bu dag
150a4: sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yod ye sems can 'di dag ni sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid nye bar bzung
150a5: nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje ye shes thob pa'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces
150a6: bka' stsal to/ / rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings ni ma lus gnas// rtog pa rdo rje yang dag byung // smra byA smra byA yang ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan
150a7: 'das de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos
150a8: grub gang nas yang dag par 'byung / / gang du gnas gang du med par 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// bcom ldan 'das rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs
150b1: kyi klung la rdo rje rab tu gnas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag kyang ngo // de ba'i na gshegs pa thams cad kyis
150b2: slaragasungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang khams gsum pa thams cad gang na gnas// ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom
150b3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bcom
150b4: ldan 'das nam mkha' gang na gnas/ / rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ gang na yang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas/
150b5: dbyangs 'di dag brjod do// em 'ja sa rdoH/ e ma'o rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru swa ni rnam sgom pa// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// rdo rje gsum mchog
150b6: mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum mchog dbang phyug gis// dngos grub dag ni thams cad kyi// rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa gsungs// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
150b7: bu'i rdornga rab bsoms nas/ skye bor dza rje rab tu bsgo ba// zhal gsum sku gsum yang dag byung // rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pasams na// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi/
150b8: bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnam par bsgom pa ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las
151a1: zung rgyal mo che/ / mnyes par byang ba rnam par bsam// 'di ltas mnyes 'gyur khyu mchog ni// rdo rdo sku gsum mngon pa rnams// gang shig la la 'di slob pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams
151a2: chen pos ni zhag bdun gyis/ / sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs rdo rje smras pa'i gsang chen gsang ba nyid
151a3: kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen po'i don rtog pa// kun mtshan nyid kyi cho ga bzhin// sgoms na sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
151a4: thams cad kyi bdag pos yang sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags rnams
151a5: kun gyi dam tshig 'di/ / rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da'o// de nas yang byag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bshang gci khu ba
151a6: khrag rnams ni/ / spang ba nyid du yod mi bya// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig
151a7: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad// gsung gi rdo rje ma spang ngo // de nas yang phyag na rdo de bzhin gshegs
151a8: pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa'i// dam tshig ji snyed yod bkur// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu bya thugs rdo rje ma
151b1: bamam ldan 'das rdu rdzagasum gyi gzhan das cas bka' stsal ka/ danas yang byagan tha bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kya bdag pas bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyigs ga
151b2: gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas sngar ni bar du bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched rnams nyid ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshig
151b3: pas thams cad kyi bdag pos/ / khams gsum bsags pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// tshu khams mA ma kI zhes bya// dkar dang sgrol ma 'os bya ba// me dang drung du ra
151b4: tu bsgrags/ / mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dam tshig ni// de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas
151b5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs
151b6: nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
151b7: la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs
151b8: pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar lta bar bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chubase mas dpa' tham
152a1: cad kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nyid du blta bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu ji snyed mdor sbas te bstan na
152a2: ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams bzhugs pa dang 'tsho ba dang skyor ba de rnams thams cad kyang dus gsum du byon nas/ rdo rje slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa
152a3: thams cad kyi mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di skad du yang 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pa'o// bdag
152a4: cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o/ / bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji
152a5: s nyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de bas kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du
152a6: 'phags so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa skyes pa gnas par gyur pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i
152a7: bar du'o/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi skyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang / de bzhin
152a8: gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
152b1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus
152b2: gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes yang dag par byung ba de rnams kyang byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon la mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
152b3: sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis
152b4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
152b5: cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang ngag dang sam
152b6: rdo rje gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur nas cang mi smra bar gnas
152b7: par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod
152b8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po nyon cig/ de nas yang
153a1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bsha
153a2: du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// nam ma'i byis kyi dbus gnas bsam// gru bzhi lum pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rdo rje dkyil 'a
153a3: bsam gtan gyis/ / 'khor lo can kun gdan du bya// mchod pa cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying khar rab bsgoms nas// dbang skur ba ni yang dag spyad// mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad
153a4: kyis/ / yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// thams cad dbang bskur gnas gsum gyis// cho ga bzhin du dbab par bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad la// phan bzhed byang chub thob 'gyur zhing // dngos grub thams
153a5: da pang blang che/ / sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba bas pa gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje bzhin
153a6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba nyid kyis gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / hUM hrIHkhaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil
153a7: 'khor ri/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam// skra dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug kud te khros// mung bal sdod pa'o kha dog 'dre// phyag pa'i pa ni chog yis/
153a8: phyag na thod pa bsdams par bsgom// lnga yi 'od zer rab gsal ba'o// rang gi brtul zhugs can gyis sgom// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// khrag drang pa'i mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rjed dam cheg dang // bur ba drags
153b1: mchog dag gis/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas gzir bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos slar yang rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
153b2: rdo rje las phyung ngo / / bza' ba 'am btung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang zab// bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su dag/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po
153b3: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / nyer spyod lnga yi mchod mchog gis// mchod bya de dag kyang mchod bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi
153b4: dam tig shin du 'da' dka' ba'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
153b5: las phyung ngo / / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rang gi/ du ba sogs bzung bas// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod bya// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
153b6: pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sems cad khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// ma rnams dab tshig 'dzin pa ni// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje
153b7: spyad/ sngob pa 'di ni pad blang che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo // lus dang ngag sems longs
153b8: spyod rdzogs/ / gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya// min na thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad
154a1: sgrub pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa nyid kyis gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / mthog tsam gyi lags pa ra// mgo bar dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// oM yig dbus su gnas bsams nas/ bdung
154a2: ci lnga po dbab par bya/ / rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni gzican 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par// 'gyur ba 'dir ni the tshom med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
154a3: bdag pos sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / mchod rten ngag gi las mi bya// glegs par klag para'ang mi bya zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yo /
154a4: rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad gsal ba gnon pa 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM 'od zer
154a5: dkar 'bar phreng ba can/ / 'khor lo'i dbus su chung bar bzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa yis// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis// sa bon 'di ni gsang gsum byung // de nas slar yang
154a6: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha bad+ha/ hanaH
154a7: na ha ha a mr-i te rU phaT/ / grog sogs la 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par// hUM yig dbus su gzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// yang dag ba rgyan te rta/
154a8: tu bzhag/ 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje an dza na'i gnas nyid kyi sku gsung
154b1: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje an dza na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// mar khu chen po dang khrag dang bshad pa dang pad ma'i skud pa dang
154b2: ar ga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la/ mar ro'i bcu bzhi'i rnam phyed na rdo rje an dza na mkhas pas dbab par bya'o// sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro zhes bcom
154b3: ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
154b4: gsang ba'i yi ge du rtogs pa dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' med pa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'dur/ / / de nas de bzhin gshes
154b5: pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum rtogs pa dang ldanan
154b6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags
154b7: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje sku gsum po 'di dag go// de
154b8: nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas phyag da rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
155a1: bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi
155a2: lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bsgral pa 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
155a3: mar me mdzad kyang 'das nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don sa bshad pa ni de'i
155a4: tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
155a5: rdzogs par byed do/ / gang zhig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag tu med pa rnyed kyi bskal pabar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par
155a6: dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas
155a7: rab tu ngus so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du shig/ sdug bsngal gsum
155a8: sa sked cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi dri bar bgyi// ji
155b1: lha sdug bsngal gsum mi skyed par bgyi/ / de'i rgyu ci'i phyi zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge'i skal pa ma mchis te/ tha na ming thos pa'i bskal ba yangs mangs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
155b2: thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyed rnams kyis mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
155b3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rigs kyi bu gang gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge 'di dag yang dag par ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// de'i rgyu ci'i phyir/ gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge
155b4: rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
155b5: gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
155b6: bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/ / sems cad khams ni gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la ba skyob du gsol// mgon pos gal te de
155b7: raring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ / sems can yab gnyen mchog chen bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi thugs kyi btsun mo sA la kIs bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/
155b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo rje 'dod pa dga' ba mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ rdo rje'i sku khyod bka'i 'khor lo sems can mang por phan// sangs
156a1: rgyas rnams dor byang chub mchog don phan pa rjes ston pa/ / mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// chags pas 'dod chags dam tshig bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ de nas
156a2: ' jig rten dbang phyug gi btsun mo sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyad gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par
156a3: bstod pa/ / khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag ni dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ rab dga'i
156a4: spyod pa kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdas
156a5: po rdo rje 'chang chen po la bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do/ / khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid rjes su thugs rtse ba/ mgon pos
156a6: gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ / yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod
156a7: pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings
156a8: 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dam tshig gis yongs su gang ste/ / bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sarba
156b1: c ad mu gsum yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis yang dag par reg pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur te rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
156b2: na du gyur to/ / de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun nas mang po kun tu bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
156b3: thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam// de nas
156b4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang /
156b5: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par
156b6: byung nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang gi phyir 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
156b7: 'das ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'dra
156b8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma gsung shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi thung ba ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/ 'dra
157a1: shes kyi phung po ma yin/ 'du byed kyi phung po pa yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin// khams pa yin/ skye mched ma yin/ deba' du 'ad pags ma yin na snang ma yid gti mug
157a2: yin/ ros ma yin chos ma yin pa ma yin do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
157a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhidan gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
157a4: gsang ba 'ang sgom par gyis shig/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcun gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bskal pa yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
157a5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig/ khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams
157a6: cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
157a7: de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas
157a8: shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dag rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin
157b1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs
157b2: pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las
157b3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabasas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang
157b4: ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtag pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrid d+hA ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis pa Na Di ta u0f7f
157b5: mardo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas chag lo tsha ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas zhus shing dag par bcos te gtan lo phab pa/ / de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub/
157b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kying nye ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong
157b7: shi shos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngas pa dag/ rdo rje gsum gyis
157b8: kun du ni/ rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung / sangs rgyas rdo rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar cha//
158a1: so ngas/ e pa'o 'khor bdag gi rgyud// e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad
158a2: bka' stsal to/ / chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
158a3: dag thams cad la gsang ba dang / phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di yini// rgyud kyi
158a4: mchog gi mchog gyur pa/ / gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud// sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang // sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsung pas gang bshad pa// mgon pos khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas de
158a5: bzhin gshegs de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud cig de// de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon
158a6: tan 'byung gnas leg so legs/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi som nyid zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi// 'dus pa zhes
158a7: ni gang la brjod/ / rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang chen zhes ni gang la bgyi// dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes
158a8: gang la bgyi/ / de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu tsaM// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces tsi la bgyi// de bzhin dzin dzika ni gang // de la ra ta nad+hi ki ni gang // de bzhin A ro li ka ni ci// pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags// po
158b1: shes ni gang la bgyi/ / dwe Sha zhes bya 'dir gang lags// rA ga zhes ni ci la bgyi// badz+ra sngags ni gang la bgyi// ra ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags// ya man ta krita don ni gang // de bzhin pra dzAn
158b2: takrita ci/ / par pUn ta kri ta ping ci lha// de bzhin big+h+nAR+sha krita tsi// kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang // 'drir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos 'byung ba ni ji lta
158b3: bsgom/ / de bzhin sdom pa ji lta bu// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can don mdzad ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags// mchod rten zhes ni
158b4: gang la bshad/ / ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad// mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji
158b5: ltar skal/ / de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu// de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du// de bzhin thabs
158b6: byung ji lta bu/ / rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
158b7: sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i
158b8: bdag nyid rab dga' nas/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
159a1: stsal te/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// gzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
159a2: cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bde bar gsheg pa legs leg so zhes gsol nas// rang rang gi lus dang
159a3: ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs thugs rje chen
159a4: po la dmigs par byin gyis rlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal ba/ / sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs
159a5: rgyas thams cad ces bya ba/ / tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang // bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu
159a6: drug pa/ / brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa// slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni// dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang / bcu ba dang ni bcu bzhi pa// drag spyong rjes su chags pa dang /
159a7: nyebar bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang // bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las// tshar gcod par 'dos
159a8: spyod pa ga/ dul dang gdul dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o// skyed pa'i rim dang 'brel pa yi// bsnyen pa rdo rje'i cho ga bzhi// thun mong dngos grub 'brel ba yin// mchog tu byung pa bzhung nyid do//
159b1: dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel ba yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni// slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che// sangs
159b2: rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ / ston pas yongs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni
159b3: rgyun zhes bya bar grags/ / rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur de// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba// rnam pa rang bzhin rgyu yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// gzhi ni thabs shes bya ba ste/
159b4: gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang // ngo bo nyid cig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa// de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad
