159b5: lhag ma'i lha ni gsang chen to/ / dam pa rigs ni rnam pa brgya// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso// stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// byang chub sems shes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/
159b6: mi phyed dbye ba'i ngo bo nyid// rig dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin ces grags pa ste// badz+ra d+h+r-ig ni rnam shes yin// yod
159b7: dang med dang dbus las 'das/ / 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung // sems can kun gyi lus yin te// skye las rgyal ba dzi na dzig/ don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba po yis
159b8: des tshor bas/ / tshor ba rang na d+h+r-ig tu 'dod// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A ro lig ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin
160a1: byed pa/ / gang yin de ni shes rab ste// 'du byed sems dpa' 'dzin pas na// pradrA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad// rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de// mi 'jig skye ba med gang yin//
160a2: mgod pa de yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na// rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad// bdag tu rlom pa'i ngo bo pas// tshor ba
160a3: dregs pa yin par bshad/ / dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can// 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa
160a4: kun 'byung thams cad du/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yi// mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la//
160a5: rgyal byed pa rmongs shes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer pa ni/ zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin// ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/ bud med
160a6: mchog phun sum tshogs/ / gti mug zhe sdar 'dod chags dang // rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do// mi 'jigs bdag nyid chos rnams ni//
160a7: ma skyes pa yang pony-i// dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste// de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste// drin rgyal ba shes
160a8: mthar byed/ / brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med// chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dgra/
160b1: rdokun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa// brjod du med dang rtog bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// gti mug gti mug longs
160b2: stong pas/ / gti mug zad phyir gshin rje bshed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste// des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur// nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed do// des na nyon
160b3: pongs mthar byed 'gyur/ / 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas// 'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed// des na chags pa mthar byed de// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed gyur// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang //
160b4: de bzhin las ni thams cad zad// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad// nyon mongs rdo rje'i sgri ba dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/
160b5: las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// bzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin me g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun du 'byung // 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/ khro bo'i rgyal
160b6: dbang por rnam par grags/ / dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshad do// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po zhes bshad
160b7: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ / bdag nyid chen po kun du 'byung // thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags las sbyor ba des
160b8: byas la/ / thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pa seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// de bzhin mi bzang yod ma min//
161a1: smra bar mi bya cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yas// rtag pa nyid du mnyam pa ga jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kAr tu spyod pa zhes bshad do//
161a2: dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid// yid de man zhes bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnal grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyis
161a3: bsrungs pa ni/ / sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do// rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid// snying po yid kyi rnam bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis// zlos par byed cing spro zhing bsdu// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/
161a4: ye shes sa bon dag gis sngo// byang chub bdag medang sa bon gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med bzung // sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro// dus gsum sa ben dag gis zla// bzlas par smra bar grags pas na/
161a5: ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshar la// sngags kan 'bod pa zhes bsha dang // de nyid skul bar smra ba'o// ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa// ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang skur dang // de bzhin kun dum tsho//
161a6: pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin brlab sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya// dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// snying po phyag rgya sngags
161a7: tsam dang / / rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab pa'o// 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cang // rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// bsgom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye bar 'byung mo'i gyur// longs spong bzhi dang
161a8: dag ldan/ / rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// grwa gsum du ni rnam par bsgom// kun nas ser po'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par bsgom// rtsibs kun la ni khro bo brgya// ye me
161b1: bdag nyid bcu las byung / / 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing // mchog tu mdzes pas bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin smos pas// mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin drim
161b2: med zhig/ / bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas spyar na rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa// rim pa gnyis la yang dag bden// bskyed pa'i ni rim nying dang // de bzhi rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'o// ska pa dang na
161b3: dan par dang / / dam tshig de bzhir sdom pa rnams// sngar ni kun rgyas par ni// rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs//
161b4: rtag tu snang la sba bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang chernam pa med// kun 'gro yi ge gas ma/
161b5: bdag nyid// bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // spong nga rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/ sa gsam du ni bskyed par bya// gsang ba dag pa rgyas btab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor phra/
161b6: zhe sdang 'khor lo skyeng nas su// rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis pas// de ni spobs rtogs byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lha'i sbyor bas goms byas ra// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag
161b7: da 'grung/ khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// gsang dang de bzhin gsob pa// mang cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du nus par 'tsham med// gauti mug stong ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'al lo bskad nam
161b8: rgyan la sogs pa gang ca'ang dra / nga dag thams cad cag cu bkra/ gnyi mug sems kyi rgyamatsha ba sgom// na chen tha kyis btu gang // gnyisag la khar macan pa gyis / spyan pa char na bdul bas// rdzas rnams
162a1: thams cad ma lus par/ / rab tu ga dang brog pa nyid// sams kyang rdzo brtan pa yas// ska cag tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor bas// 'dod dgas 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/
162a2: so thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod// dga' sdug bde bas rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtsed pos rnam par 'phral// de nas 'khor lo can kun la// lha mo rab tu dbral bar bya// khamam gsum dag tuH/
162a3: yaM lha dang lha min chung ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyad na// sa yi bu mo smos ci gos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang // las mchog ge ni tshigs rnams pag/ nyams su zad cing byin rlob pa// grub pa'i bsod
162a4: pa gzhan yin no/ / b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes kya pa dang / byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/
162a5: sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o// des ni rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// lcags kyu dbyig to rtsa gsum dang // ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod// 'dod rgyal na byig sngon stobs mi g.yo/
162a6: ste tu 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa// me long bi bang dung dang ni// de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs
162a7: ras/ chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab po// de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu
162a8: dad nam mkha'i khams/ / me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad// ye shes
162b1: sems dpa' gang reg pa/ / ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas shes bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi nyid ni// sa dbang ma pa bskul bar bshad// phyogs btsu
162b2: rte khams rnams sa/ / 'od zer babyed pa gtong ba'o// rdornga can kun spyan 'dren pas// rje ca kan su drang ba'o// rdo can gyi gnas de yo// 'od zang gros de rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong ba'i tshul sa su// bcings pa batshangasan/
162b3: par bshad// sa gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// dbang bas dbye ba rnab gsum du// rbA da 'di la na rab tu brtag/ lu
162b4: pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/ / gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin do// mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung // me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba/
162b5: dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la spya ni// na ba mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad ma'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag
162b6: thams cad snying khar bsdu/ / rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su// slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yaM go 'phang mchog/ las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang // gsang sngags thams
162b7: cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / mchog tu dang cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang bsgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yod rnams rab tu phul nas ni//
162b8: blams de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la srin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug blun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sngang
163a1: @#/ / bi'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bsrung na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags pas 'dod chags bdag nyid stong// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag
163a2: ldan/ / 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bsrung ni// 'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor// rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur//
163a3: rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni// rdo rje can gyi slob mas thang // lag par lag pas gzhag nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams spang byas la// slob ma'i mgo bar lag gzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo// thabs gzhan gyis ni
163a4: 'tshang mi rgya/ / de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin// chos kun gnyis su med pa la// dngos po gnyis su brtags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral bar// rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i btul zhugs
163a5: bla med pa'o/ / rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// thal mar lus kyi chos la ni// dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni// ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas// bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// sbyar dang de/
163a6: bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar byed dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni// bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// AHlas byung ba'i pad ma ni// de yi 'og tu
163a7: bsgom par bya/ / oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje'i pad ma mnyam sbyor ba// 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya// shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing // ye shes nyi ma gas par gyur// phyogs
163a8: bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ / mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang // bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// sgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum
163b1: sa bon las bskyed bya/ / bzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal ba zhes bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin// thabs ni rnam pa
163b2: bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor chud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par sngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste// tsA bar bsgrub pa gnyis pa yin// sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa ste// sgrub pa chen po
163b3: bzhi pa'o/ / thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yin no// dang po stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa ba ni brtsas pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs
163b4: ste/ / bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o// rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis// tha mal sgrub la bsnyen pa bya// mchog gi ye shes bdud rtsi nyid// sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yi// bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni// byas pas bsgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan
163b5: du bsgrubs par gyur na ni/ / dngos grub mchog ni 'byung mi 'gyur// so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad// dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang //
163b6: rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis// brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad do// bsam gtan de ni rna
163b7: lngar 'gyur/ / rtog dang spyod dang dga' ba dang // de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste// lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du// rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum
163b8: 'byung rtog pa ste/ / de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde ba bsdus pa bzhi pa'o// shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang sems lnga par shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kur
164a1: la rab tu gnas/ / ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong ba'i gzugs kyi phyung nas ni// sna yi rtse mo rab tu brtag/ rid chen kha dog snga lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad/
164a2: rang gas snyeng khar bsams nas ni// srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ rang dbang rin re dgag pa yi// bzung ba 'dzad pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur// mtshan par nyer 'dzin 'thung bar 'gyur// mtshan
164a3: ma'i khams de rnam pa lngar/ / byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin// sAg rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o// sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu
164a4: sdang ba lnga pa'o/ / brtan gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de// so sor snang ba de la skye// thabs dang shes rab snyoms/
164a5: 'jug pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbus su gzugs ni rnam par bskos// yud kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas// so sor spyad la skams
164a6: 'jug na/ / sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob// bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs// rtag tu
164a7: 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khar 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis na// sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// skang por
164a8: ni thugs kha ru/ / zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos byas te// sngags kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya// cho ga yang dag sbyor rnam
164b1: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas ste/ / sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni// bsgo ba pa nye bar bsgrub pa'o// ji srid mthong ba de srid du// rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu bsgom// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// thams cad du ni rtag tu bya//
164b2: te zla ba drug gis ri// rje sang gsungs pa ma mthong na// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing // gang tshe bya ba ma grub na// drag shul spyod/
164b3: sasgrubapa la de re de yi ye shes ni// 'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung // rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje pur bus phur bu gdab// de nas dbang du bya ba dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis//
164b4: shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu// lha mo dgu ni spros nas sa// bslab par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag brgya bzhi'i// dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su gnas byas la// 'khor lo can
164b5: kun bsdu bar bya/ / thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya// bskul ba'i glu dbyangs gzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems// ye shes lta bur lus
164b6: bsgom mo/ / dregs pas kha dog rnam par dbye// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// gzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin// sngags kyi chos ni byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor
164b7: los sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po longs spyod pa'i// rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags// de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces par bshad// bsam gtan
164b8: rdo rje thams cad la/ / dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i
165a1: skyes bu rdo rje can/ / bdag dang 'dra ba dkyil 'khor bskyed// bsgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che'i// stong ba nyid kyi gzugs su dmags// nye bar sgrub pa'i ngas su ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
165a2: gzugs kyi pa ra/ sngags pa tshag shes pa sas// smra pa rtswa stongs te// bsgru po dris pa ni// tso posangs rgyas bdag pa gro// de // ma gagags // de ste napa
165a3: shes byas ma/ / dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni// sangs rgyas stob pa rnams kyis kyang // dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor// gang yin
165a4: nibasten par bshad/ / rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba// nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM dang phaT ldan pa// bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad pa// ngo bo nyid ni zhibi ba// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
165a5: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung // de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do// las dang rjes mthun gang gang gis// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs// dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas// dam tshig mi
165a6: zad bsgo bar bya/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya// de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni// cho ga ji skad gsungs las byung // las dang gang gang rjes 'thun pas// rang gi 'khor lo bka' yang bsgo// bsgrub
165a7: bya'i lus gang yin pa la 'ang / / dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// da'i lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya// de nas nga rnams des bcom nas// zung bar gyur pa rnam par bskor/ dngos po kun gyis
165a8: rnam bsgoms nas/ / dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni// de ni rang gi 'khor lor bzhug/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes rnams kyis// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma gan
165b1: par bya/ de nas bka' ba ros tho ba ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis bkod/ rnams// sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsrub byagasang daphyir gtang bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcing zhing brdeg pa dang // de nas ga
165b2: shing skrag gyur ba/ / sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la pab nas// sngags pas dza nga dag gis ni// sa bo mgrin pa snying kha ru// phur bu'i sngags kyi phur bu gang ga/ yams
165b3: dang nye bar 'tsho ba stan/ / sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni pab nas su// de rnams kyi ni pur bus gang ba// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skang gsungs pa bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi spyod
165b4: la sogs/ / las kyi dbyabs sbyor bar bya// mtshan ma mtshan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg gam// bsgom pas bdug pa'i sems can gyis// zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/ zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis
165b5: bya/ / rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la tshogs pa'i yid du bya// khro la gtum pas rab tu bsgrub ces pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' se
165b6: dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tshom thams cad bcad pa mdzad nas/ / the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs par rang gi sku dang gsung dang thug
165b7: kyis dmigs nas cang me gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do//
165b8: thams cad su khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'drad// thams cad thugs khyed phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rje 'i// mu gsung thugs ni bo 'gyur/
166a1: bas/ sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam// bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang// sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos 'gyur 'bru
166a2: bya gang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnabs pa legs so gas so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// bdag nyid chen po legs so legs/
166a3: gsung dbyangs chen po legs so legs// mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// skyed dang bdud par mdzad pa po// des
166a4: na de yi sdig mi 'gyur/ / bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin no// gang la sdig dang bsod nams med// de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi slu ba yis// lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur/
166a5: zhing byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'// sngon ni mi zad las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni// skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi// dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che// byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub bya 'di// ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pa/
166a6: sems can rnams la sbyor ba des// mchog tu phan btags shes par bya// tshad gcod pa dang rjes bzung las// bdag nyid chen po de yis bya// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// de nas
166a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas/ dga' zhing rab tu dga' la/ mgu pa'i yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ mgon po chen po
166a8: legs so legs/ / thub pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po legra so legs// thugs rje chen po legs so legs// e ma'o kun du bzang po yi// thugs rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa'i mi bzad las kyis kyang //
166b1: sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa tham
166b2: cad kyis dbang bsrung ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'dzags par mi bya zhing / skrag par mi bya/ dang bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhes byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs// sngags kyi rgyun ni sa
166b3: pa dag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin cig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo rje'i
166b4: thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang / / zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can// de la lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes
166b5: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug/ sa chu me dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang // rig pa'i
166b6: sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar/ / rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su
166b7: rjes gtogs chos/ / rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di bsgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral/ gas
166b8: ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba brtag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di skom shing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen pos blo sgrub mi 'grur
167a1: sgrub dbang po/ / byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig thun bzhi'i dzi rje dag ni sbub byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman grub cing // bla ma'i drin gyis 'drin ma nor la ma rtogs pa// byang
167a2: chub rdo rje 'drar ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ / gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems dpa' dang // mchod pa byed pa dang ni 'bri'am 'drir 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag
167a3: phyag 'tshal/ / gang du ni sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i// bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal//
167a4: gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang // legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par zos pa dang // dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba
167a5: 'dis/ / 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la// mgon po de dag rjes yi rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis// rgyud 'di
167a6: legs par gsungs pa yin/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpar de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te// sku dang gsung
167a7: dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las/
167a8: gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsAr+ya shrad d+hA kar war+g+ha dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bskur te gtan la/
167b1: phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma la/ a b+hi dA na ma hA yo ga tan tra sarba tan tra hA da ya ra ha s+ya bi ta ka ma i ti/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam
167b2: phye ba zhes bya ba/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'a
167b3: lo/ / 'di skang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas/
167b4: bzhugs te/ dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtogs pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa// gnyis su/
167b5: med pa'i bde ba chen po nyam su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad ma dgyes pa/ chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa// rdo rje 'chad chen/
167b6: po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang // byang chub sems dpa'
167b7: sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang /
167b8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang // de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i
168a1: rigs dang 'brel ba byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
168a2: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'
168a3: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems
168a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang khyad
168a5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
168a6: spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168a7: rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168a8: dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhan cig/
168b1: skyes pa'i rje dang / gzhan yang dngag tu ma pa'i zag pas lag par thal bar byang chub mams dpa' sams dang can pa rnams dpas gcag tu bgrags pa/ ma ldan ma la la mdun
168b2: ru skor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar byin// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
168b3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs nas/ de nas sdong du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
168b4: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po skye te bzhugs so// 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnamam la reg pas mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan
168b5: ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang bde ba dang mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas rgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang de'i dus su bcom
168b6: ldan 'das kyi mdzod spar 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur te/ bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar phyung bar gyur pa des rgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid
168b7: rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnas so/ / slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyid kyis bde ba chen po de nyid nyams
168b8: sa myong ba nyid kyi thugs kha'i lte ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas de rnams chu'i gting nas 'thon pa lta bur dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i
169a1: 'phrul mthong nas shin tu mig gdangs te bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par 'dod do/ / bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas kyis// bcom ldan mchog tu los gyi
169a2: ngag gi las kyi spyod yul 'das/ / bcom ldan nyid kyis dgyes nyams ltar// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde// se ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi// ro bsten thugs rje cher po skye// bcom ldan sems can thams cad kyi// sems
169a3: can don kun gsal bar mdzad/ / de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa// phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba// bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes// 'ching ba thams cad gcor mdzad kyi// bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing // 'gro ba skal bzang rje
169a4: par mdzad/ / e ma'i rdo rje theg pa bde// rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba stsol// e ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas pa// rang byung go 'phang sgrub pa po// e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos// dmigs pa med pa ston par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen gtso/
169a5: gsang ba'i dbang po shin tu gsang // e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa// e ma spros pa rnams spangs shing // bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa// theg pa'i sgron mas snang bar mdzad// mgon po bdag cag khyed drin gyis// rdo rje sems
169a6: dpa'i go 'phang thob/ / mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs// khyed kyis yang dag lam la bgod// mgon pos bdag cag mun par 'thoms// ye shes snang ba thob par mdzad// dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma skye// phyag rgya chen po'i don
169a7: ston mdzad/ / bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid// phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'// dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud// ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'dra/
169a8: la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ rdo rje'i 'phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed pa'i
169b1: gsung nyan par 'dod nas pa spu ldang ba dang dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams
169b2: de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig pa 'byung ste/ / sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan
169b3: pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang gi rig ma la 'khyud te/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas/ slar yang de dag
169b4: de lta bu'i gzugs nyid du mthong ste/ ngo 'tshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur mthong ba nyid kyis ci yang mi smra bar gyur pas de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma
169b5: yang dag par bskul te/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor dor nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las rdo rje btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las/
169b6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to// phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// kha cig
169b7: ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis so/ / kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so// ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bir gyi
169b8: gzugs kyis so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis dbyangs cig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni// e ma'i rdo rje rigs chen po//
170a1: rdo rje phreng ba'i don ston mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston mdzad ces lan gsum brjod nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig
170a2: thang cig yud tsam de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag mthong nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan ye shes rdor dbang phyug
170a3: gsang ba'i pad ma'i nang bzhugs pa/ / dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor dbang // thugs rjes bdag gis rig gson cig/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems da
170a4: che/ 'di dag lus kyi phyag 'tshal 'khod// snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams// brtson 'grus chung zhing bsod nams chung // lta ba ngan pa mang po dang // tshe thung ba yi sems can rnams// go 'phang mchog ni
170a5: thob cing 'u/ / rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang // ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams// 'khor ba las ni pha rol du// gang gis myur du thar bar 'gyur// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs// 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod
170a6: drin gyis/ / de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi// rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis// rdo rje phreng ba mngon rtogs pa// cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyis// rdzogs
170a7: pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol// dpal ldan 'dus par brda tsam gang // rnal 'byor bla na med chung ngu// thub pa chen pos chos phung po// brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong ngo // de skad smras nas mdun
170a8: 'dug ste/ / lus kyi phyag ni byas nas kyang // ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla// rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don// de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang ston// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// bdag la bstan
170b1: par mdzad du gsol/ / rdo rje phreng bas ming ni ci// 'du ba ci na stong pa ci// thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra// gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni sma tsa ma dang // rlung gi de nyid bde na ci// rdo rje pad mo panyam stong dang // sngags kyi de nyid rnal
170b2: 'byer ba/ / dang rnams dang ni khor lo dang // grangs de ci tsam gang duganas// rnal 'byor lus lan gang lags// rnam pas tshogs sogs skad cig/ dga' ba bzhi dardza pa dang // sngags dang drung dang thig pa dang // me ge gsum ga nga nyi sa cu
170b3: de bzhin pa yatsa mo gsus/ / lus kyi yang nyid la shes dang / lha rnams ca na sar gnas// de rnams kyin ma nam/ chang ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon po dag rnams shA n-i// yang skye bags la ba gsungs//
170b4: rnams rtag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus 'ji ltar rgyu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs// rlung rnams ji ltar ldang ba dang // gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdung ba// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag zob/
170b5: nam tog rlung ni rab bcad nas// nam tog med par jig 'chang// carnams ji ltar nub pa dang // stor badrug gis ji ltar nos// dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// gsang bI yang ni 'bras bu ci// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // rigs
170b6: kyi dbye ba ji lta bu/ / phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig/ phung po la sogs skye mched dang // phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci// ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang // stong pa nyid ni gang du ste//
170b7: nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang // A li kA li brda' dang ni// mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu// rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyen pa sogs// cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni// rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu 'ang ci// mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs/
170b8: de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang // lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs// rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa'i// 'di skad bdag sogs ji lta bu// 'di skad ces sogs dang po'i dag/ don rgyas pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// nang gi bdag nyid
171a1: sbyin bsreg ci/ / bdud rtsi lnga na bza' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang // de bzhin gsang ba'i brda' dang ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khod dpas ni ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chom
171a2: dge 'dun gyi/ / ping rnams bshad pa ji lta bu// bra ma ston pa slob dpon dang // rdo rje 'chang ni bshad pa ci// slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur// de yi spyod pa'i dbye ba ru// de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu zhi ba
171a3: rgyas pa dbang dang ni/ / de bzhin gsar dang bskrad pa dang // ris par byed pa nyid dang ni/ ltang bsgrub par myod pa dang / byal ni bdon spyod dang// sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci// dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang // mngon shes lngani
171a4: ji ltar thob/ / rnal 'byor rnams kyi de nyid mthong // skad cig gcig la mngon byar chub// lus bstan pa dang rgas pa med// bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang // gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che// 'gro ba'i
171a5: bla ma ji ltar 'thob/ / lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang// de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu// 'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas// thim dang longs spyod bdag po dang // rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci// de dag 'jigs par ji ltar 'gyur/
171a6: de ltar dri rig rdzogs pa dang // lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// lus kyi phyag byas de nas ni// gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la// legs so bya ba byin nas ni// tshangs dbyangs zab mo snyan pa ya si//
171a7: 'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsol ba gdab pa dang // dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gling bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang
171a8: po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis// lag na rdo rje la bos te// yang dag nges pa nges bshad pa// snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa// dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun// khyod kyis drim
171b1: bar byas pa rnams/ / rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag/ bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang // rnal 'byor rmad ni gang du yang // mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa// rdo rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog/ dris pa'i lan rnams gsal por ni// nges par
171b2: nga yis rab bshad bya/ / skad cig gis ni spyan phye la// mchog tu spad byung ston mdzad la// thugs rjes khyab pas de// dgasungs// de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs brlan cing the tshom thams cad
171b3: gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa btab ste/ mchog tu gsang ba'i tshig gi bshad pa gsungs pa ni// dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste// dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas// de yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis// de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon
171b4: thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe/ / blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// de'i tshe na sdod du 'gyur// yang dag dbang skur gyis dben na// sgrub pos rgyud kyi don shes kyang // slob dpon slob pa tshungs par
171b5: ni/ / mi zad dmyal ba chen por 'gro// de phyir yang dag bla ma ni// rab tu gus pas bsnyen bku ru ba// dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes// blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can// zab cing rgya re dri ba med// gnod dang 'tshe ba rnam par spangs// bskal
171b6: bzangs lus ni rdzogs pa dang / / mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par brgyan// chags pa che la gcig tu dga'// yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs// bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor pa yi mngal nas skyes// rdo rje theg la gcig
171b7: tu mos/ / theg pa smad la rgyab kyis phyogs// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// bla ma slob mas bsnyen bkur ba// yang dag bla ma rnyed nas ni// slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma dmas// ngag dang rtogs dang sma byas nas// ji bzhin ye she
171b8: bzang dang ldan/ / ji ltar rin chen bdar ba dang // gser ni bsregs dang bcad pas brtag/ de bzhin du ni slob ma yang // lo na bcu gnyis rab tu brtag/ de phyir phan tshun de lta bus// dus kun du ni de ltar brtags// gzhan du
172a1: bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur te/ / dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal ste/ dug ni sngags kyis 'jobs pa bzhin// sngags kyis dag byas bcud len byed// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyi// sngags kyi slob matog byas//
172a2: nas/ tha ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis// dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don// de phyir dbang bsur slob ma ni// ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' ba chen la// de la lag na rdo rjes zhus// dbang bskur ji ltar rgyung ngu ni/ gtsos
172a3: dA ri gsungs pa lags/ / rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad ma khyen// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// de kho na nyid mkhyen pas ni// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// don de ji lta ba bzhin du// nga yis yang dag bshad kyis nyon// dbang bskur ba
172a4: dbye ba ni/ dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming can no// gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o// gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor/ bcu
172a5: bzhi pa ni don dam ste/ / dbang bskur re re sa re'o// rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang // bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya// dga' ba la sogs rim pa yis// thams cad la ni nga yis khyab// mang ngo yi ni chos gsum dang // de bzhin tshes bcu
172a6: chos bcu bzhi/ / yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la// bla mas cho ga bzhin dbang bskur// lus phra lon bcu drug lon// gzugs dang bskal pa dag gis brgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang // snying rje'i bsam gtan yang dag mos//
172a7: dge stan dbang skur thob pa dang // rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos// yang na lo na nyi shu lon// nyams dga' bde ba byed pa ste// de las lhag pa bsal med 'gyur// de ni dngos grub ring du byed/ lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la// chungs
172a8: 'am yang na sring mo 'am/ / yang na bu mo'ang dad pa yis// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// gser dang rin chen gos dang ni// mu tig phreng ba sna tshogs pas// mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// slob ma yis ni 'di skad brjod// deng
172b1: nas brtsams te bdag brad du/ / gtse bas bdag ni mchod pa bzhes// de lta'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni// bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod// bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang // de phyir yang dag bla ma mchod// de nas bcom ldan yum bya ba
172b2: rgya/ yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya// bsten pa las ni gang byung ba// ltung ba skal bzang ba la ni// sbom po lta thag sbyor ba yis// yang dag par ni longs spyod bya// de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni// bde ba chen po rang rig pa/
172b3: 'byung rngub pa ni ro gcig cing // rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya// hUM phaT sngags kyi nor bu'i sgor// bkod de rdo rje rab bskyod bya// dga' rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// skad cig de la skyes gyur pa// dga' ba'i sems kyis bde ba la/
172b4: rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod// de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni// gtad nas gsal bar 'di skad brjod// ji ltar pad mchod bya ba ni// byis la a ba mchog gi gdong // gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di yi snying la zhugs/
172b5: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang // bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rab tu 'bad pas bstan par gyis// lhan cig skyes dka'i mtshan nyid ni// dbang
172b6: bskur gang por gyur pas na/ / thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
172b7: de nas de nyid gzhan yang nyon// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i don gsal ba// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya// rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes bya'i ming // de yang sa ni bcu gsum pa// dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi gnas// thams
172b8: cang stong pa dga' ba ste/ / ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// skal babang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'// rnal 'byor ma yi dag gi yul// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // rdo rje phreng ba zhes
173a1: bshad do/ / stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad ma// rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ ye shes mchog tu bde ba che// lhan cig skyes dga' chad byung ba// rdo rje de yang rnam rtog rnams// 'bigs par byed par yongs su gragra/
173a2: phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun// byang chub me gyi rnam pa/ mi byed pa pa na rje gsul/ rnamam kun tu smras pa'i/ gang 'du ba d+mo ma ga/ dod bus su yongs su grags/ phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chad par// dga' ba rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis// nam rtog rlung kun
173a3: 'bigs par byed/ / rlung la 'bigs par mi nus so// nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang // rnam rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni// 'chang ba dag ni 'joms pa dag/ ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yi/
173a4: rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyen cig/ btang bzung dang ni dung phyur dang // myom pa dang ni tho ngan dang // bsil byed dang ni g.yabs dang // ngar snabs dang ni sta re dang // gzigs pa chu srin dza sha dang // rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus//
173a5: 'dod myos chu ba chu srin dang // sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang // snyoms dang rnga dang sgra sgrogs dang // rlung lha dang ni gnang 'bigs dang // me dang dus dang ci bgyi dang // rdo rje mchog sbyin tsu ta dang // sgyu ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od// kam tha
173a6: dza dang ril pa can/ / yungs nag rab bkram dus 'gugs dang // sdig pa dang ni yon can sten// grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang // kun sal mchog ster spro byed dang // nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang // rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi
173a7: blo/ / theg pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes// dri med phrug gu nyi ma dang // gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon// stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus// sdom pa dang ni mchongs nas 'gro// sbrang ma khya dang mtshan ma dang / zod dang sgung po drang po dang //
173a8: sa dang sal 'gro ma dang // bram ze dang ni snang grur gnas// ma mo'i rigs dang rtse bskyod gamis dang ni nga sgra'i sprin// dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang // dri med 'od srung ne tso dang // sna tshogs mchu dang mig mnyam dang // mdzes
173b1: dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang / / 'gro kun snying stobs brtan pa dang // za bo dpung bu snyom las dang // kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse// rtsa bran dbang byed g.yo rgyu can// gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'// klog phreng dang ni dga' byed dang / dbus
173b2: 'byung rag lce dang ni/ / bde mchog u dum 'bar ra rmongs// pad ma'i dra ba pad ma bskor// dag sta rma bya rAng dang ni// rdo rje dbang phyug rlung gi ming // de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin// bcom ldan dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi// gnas rnams/
173b3: kyi ni dbye ba yis// de dag gang las ldang ba dang // mchod pa rnams su bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rlung gi gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i rlung // chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas// srog
173b4: ces bya bas 'gro la khyab/ / rnam rtog med pa mtshan phyed na// nam mkha' mchog las shar nas ni// rlung gi rang bzhini 'joms par byed// rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu// chos kyi 'khor lo'i chen gnas// mtshan phyed dus nas brtsams
173b5: nas ni/ / 'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid// nyi ma phyed kyi mtha' ru ni// rlung rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed// nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid// mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mtha'// rlung rnams gsal bar
173b6: rgyu ba na/ / de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs pa yi rtog par bgro// rnam par rtog pa rnams phye nas// de dag ming rnams bshad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen// phrag dog khro
173b7: dad ser sna dang / / g.yo dang skra la cha lugs ngan// blo rgor brkam chags gnyid dang ni// the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang // dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang // 'cha ba dang srid dang bag chags dang // skyar dang rmongs dang 'dod chen dang // rtsod dang /
173b8: rtse 'jo spyi brtol dang // tshul 'chos dre nas dang kun nas gdungs// rnam 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med// bems po log pa'i nga rgyal dang // 'gyod dang khrel ni med pa dang // gus pa med dang ches pa med// blo dman ngo tsha med dang 'ching // ngo
174a1: shes dang ngo che dang / / mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang // yid gnyis dang ni slob sems med// bsgrims dang the tshom bab pa dang // dbang dang 'khrul pa'i snying stobs dang // rnam sems pa dang rgyal ba dang // thim pa dang ni mi srun dang/
174a2: kya gu snyos dang myos pa dang // rig byed ming dang bag yod dang // gnas ngan len dang nyam chung nyid// yid mi bde dang lhag par tog/ skrag dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni// bskas chags rol pa khung khrung dang // 'tshe ba le lo yod po nyid//
174a3: bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang // kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang / ster dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang // 'jigs dang 'dar dang phra ba dag nyid// gsal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang // 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang // ru sbal ngoms med
174a4: gnod pa dang / mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong // gnas med mang du smra ba dang // bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni// ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo ngan// dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum// 'khor ba la ni chags pa dang // rtag tu brgya dang brgyad
174a5: lhag pa/ / nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni// rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yid/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// rdo rje phreng ba'i tshig gi dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje gsum
174a6: nyi ma/ / gsang ba'i pad mkha' byed pa// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang bzhugs// 'dus pa'i mcho ga don rab gsungs pa// 'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad/ 'dres pa yis khyod la bshad// 'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dang// sngags ni ldan
174a7: cig cho ga bzhin/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba// gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni// yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa// de tshen ma mkha' rnam rgyas nyid// nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i drung // de yis me ni rab tu 'bar// stong phrag bdun
174a8: bcu gnyis/ / rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis// bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// rnam par zhu nas rtsar gnas pa// rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur
174b1: bya/ / khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang // phung po rnams ni yongs zad dang // ngal bsob la rlung rnams ni// dga' ba rnams na yang dag skyedade nas byang chub sems kyang ni// gnas kun nas ni 'u gyur nas// ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang /
174b2: rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni// ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la// 'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs// phung po khams dang dbang po dang // yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams// rnam rtog kun nam zad pa las// bde ba chen po yang dag ste// ro gcig pa ni
174b3: ngal bso ba/ / de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste// de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u ste/
174b4: bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa// stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun// nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid do// de nyid yang dag shes pa ni// de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi rtog/ bdag dang gang zag chos
174b5: rnams ni/ / bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid// stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa// rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs pa ste// stog ge pa'i spyod yul min// chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa/
174b6: 'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod// de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni// rtsa'i 'khor lo legs rgyas pa// de ni nam mkha' khyab cing pra// khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can// dmigs pa med cing rten pa med// gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang //
174b7: rnam par mi rtog mchog tu zhi// rang bzhin med cing dri ma med// gnyis su med cing bya ba med// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// dus dang dpa' las 'das pa ste// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral// chos nyid chos ni thams cad
174b8: kyis/ / ji lta ba bzhin mngon par brjod// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral// dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol// de ni kun nas bsgribs pa med// nam mkha' lta bur mchog tu khyab// chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin skye// de ni de
175a1: bzhin nyid ces brjod/ / gang ras kyang ni ma 'ongs shing // gang du yang ni 'gro ba med// rmongs dang 'khrul pa gcig pu las// de ni rab tu spro bar snang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang sog/
175a2: gos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang bral dri mi med// bdag dang srog dang skye ba bo// skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang // shed las skyes dang shed bu dang // byed pa po dang tshor ba po// shes pa po dang mthong
175a3: bapo/ / sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs// phung po skye mched khams la sogs// rnam shes dang ni bzung ba yis// sgrub pa med cing mchog tu phra// nam mkha' ma rog la yang dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid don / brjod dang /
175a4: brjod bya'i don dang bral// ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang // rang byung mchog tu smad byung ba'o// brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir// de kho na nyid mthong ba med// bdag nyid
175a5: rang gi ngo bo rig/ pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul ma ni// de ni rang rig par bshad do// chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog gi gang // mi shes pa yi rmongs pa rnams// don dam pa ni mi shes shing // kun rdzob
175a6: dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa/ / ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing // rtog gi stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu phra bar spyod// stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che// shes dang shes bya rnam
175a7: par spangs/ / rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral// stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// 'khor lo drug gi phug nang na// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed min gang
175a8: ba med pa dang / / ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin// rlung gi 'khor lo srog du bshad// mtshan byed gad cig mal 'tshar// de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'di na stong nyid bsgom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis//
175b1: mang nga chu 'bras stong ba'i phyir// de ri rang bzhin 'grub par sgom// don dam rang gi dbang do// kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du// bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la ti la mar mi// gnas pa nyid la mthong mi
175b2: 'gyur/ / de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid// gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba med// bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par// yang dag rigs pas kun rdzob spangs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rlung dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
175b3: pa las stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le'i dbye ba bla na med// 'jig rten theg le dbye bas dben// 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzod spu'i dbu sa
175b4: na gnas pa ni/ / thig le rlung du yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed// rnal 'byor mdud pa bkrol nas ni// rlung gi de nyid rig pa de// mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba de yang mi shes par// rlung
175b5: dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ / brjod dang brjod bya'i dpe las 'das// mi gsal log par mthong rnams kyis// bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'// rnal 'byor ma yi drin
175b6: gyis ni/ / zhal nas zhal du rju nas gnas// bcom ldan bde ba chen po la// rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol// thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa// rnal 'byor mchog dgang gis /
175b7: rabs mdud pa 'byed par byed// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di// myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// de skad bus nas rdo rje can// rdo rje dbang phyug la gsungs pa// mchog tu gsang ba 'di nyid ni// gang du'ang gsal bar
175b8: ma gsungs pa/ / thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni// nga yi bshad kyis de nyid nyon// snying gi pad sngags nam mkha' la// ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs// steng dang 'og la brten nas ni// srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas// de yang dbye
176a1: ba/ / dga' ba yi// dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkri// de yis mchog dang bcom byas pas// steng du 'gro ba thob mi byed// des bcom sngar yang nam lnga nu// srog dang thur sel gyed rgyu dang // thub byed dang ni mnyam
176a2: gnas nyid/ / rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni// rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten// rgyags dang rnam par rgyas pa dang // myos dang btung dang mdza' bo ste// de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya// rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab// steng gi srog gi dbus na lnga/
176a3: rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha' dbyings 'gro// srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po// lte ba mdud pa dang phrad pas// bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu// rtse mo rnams la rtsa lngar ni// zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni// snyen bskur rkog shal mchin pa ste// rtsan lnga yi
176a4: ming yin no/ / rtsa ni lngangs rgyu ba'i rgyun// klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal// de ltar rtsa de dang bcas pa// lus kyi thur du 'gro bas na// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// yang dang yang du bskul byas nas// skul
176a5: bas kyang ni rgyas pa na/ / gti mug chen pos dbang du byed// de steng chos kyi 'khor lo na// gnas pa'i rtsa ni skul byas nas// de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed// yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod
176a6: mchog tu ngo mtshar skye/ / rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos dbang byas nas// bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// rnam
176a7: rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing / / sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las// steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro// srog gis rab tu bcom nas ni// de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtser// zhugs nas thur du kha bltas pa'o// de yang thur du mi 'gro ste/
176a8: ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni// rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung // de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang da ba de bzhin ste// lce ste rnam par shes pa bzhi// rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas ni// bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas//
176b1: rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu// don ni rab tu rgyas par byed// slar yang lam de nyid nas ni// ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/ de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes snyan pa'i skad cig la// de yi bag chags bcas kyis 'phel
176b2: 'khrul bcas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las/ / de ltar bag chags kyis bslad pa'i// rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro// de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum pa ni 'khrul pa'o// byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong // gzhan nyid
176b3: du ni 'khor ba med/ / de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du// thig le go 'phang gsal bar dbye// bsgom pa la ni 'bad par bya// ma rig gzhan ni mi shes pa// dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni// de phyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal/
176b4: 'byor grub pa ste// ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang // mchog tu gsal ba thob nas ni// blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin gnas// phreng ba mi dgos bsgom mi dgos// bya ba mi dgos dgag ma dgas// sngags kyi
176b5: de nyid gcig pu yis/ / yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob// las chos dam tshig phyag rgya yi// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsungs so// 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing // de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyis mir// phyag rgya chen po'i go
176b6: 'phang gsal/ / sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang // gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang // rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po// ma rig sgo nga'i sngags 'byed cing // 'jigs chog
176b7: lta ba'i ri bo 'joms/ / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang // rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad// sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas// rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang // bla ma'i zhal las des
176b8: rtogs 'gyur/ / man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed// de yi dka' ba gcig pu dang // chu srubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar// de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags// skyes bus ji srid 'tshe yi bar// bzlas
177a1: kyang de'i 'bras bu yi/ / cha tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho bzhi yi pha mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang // de ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed// de
177a2: bzhin dka' ba cher byed pa'i/ / man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po// 'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang // sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye// khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la// 'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//
177a3: dad pas bla ma brgyad pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab par bya// gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab// brgyud pa'i rim par gnas par byed// de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang // bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni
177a4: bslab par bya/ / sngags kyi man ngag rgyud pa'i lung // de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// phyag byas nas ni zhus pa ni// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan/
177a5: 'das kyis rgyal po ni// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med// gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni// gang du'ang nga yis ma
177a6: bshad pa/ / skal pa med par bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun du sbas byas la// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sngags kyi rgyal ba bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis// gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog
177a7: mA uSh+ma'i tha ma bri/ / dbyangs yig drug pas rnam par rgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas// uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di// dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan// mthar ni tshig drag mchog
177a8: kisgra/ sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yig gnyis kyi ming // sngags kyi brda' ni me dbyung ba// 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// sgra dang thag la'i ming du byas// rlung gnyis kyis ni byed nas ni// ma rig 'dud ba
177b1: 'byed par byed/ / phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu// mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis// man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don// gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na// thig le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos
177b2: dben pa lha yi gnas/ / sgra yi tshe ma rnams dang bral// bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba// skye mod tshal zhi bde ba che// 'dod pa lnga la lo ngas spyod pas// sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gzhan yang bshad
177b3: kyis nyon/ / khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas// gang gi dngos grub mchog du 'gyur// sgrub po bde ba'i stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna rtser gtang byas nas// sna ni lte ba'i tshad du bzhag/ phrag gong snyams la lha rkan sbyar//
177b4: so dang ma rku ni bde bar bzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub klong nas ni// cung zad cung zad rtsol bral nas// ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni// rdo rje dkyil krung legs gnas pas// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yi ge gnyis ni rtag/
177b5: tu bzlas// thig le'i dbye bas bde ba che// zla ba drug gi rnal 'byor mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rtsa ba'i rgyun ni dang po 'di// a ba d+hU tI dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shes ches// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni r+g+ha// ri lu
177b6: ral gri ro langs dang / / rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len// dmag dpung rengs dang rtsig pa 'bigs// rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phangs mchog/ mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba// 'dod rgur sgrar dang gzugs mthong dang // gser
177b7: 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal/ / me yi nang du 'jug pa dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang // ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad gcig cig la ni// byang chub mtshan nyid go 'thang ngo // dga' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni// shes
177b8: rab snying rje yang dag ldan/ / bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster// bsdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min// phreng ba mi dgos bgrang mi dgos// 'di ni skyed rim dbye mi dgos// gsungs pa'i dgra thub segs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal
178a1: 'byor gcig pu yis/ / bla ma'i zhal las rgyud pa dang // zla ba drug tu mngon sbyor bas// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las thig le'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor mchog thob par
178a2: byed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// bla na med pa nA de'i don// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe'ang nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgra yang mi shigs par ni bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med/
178a3: rnam pa kun lam rnam par grol// lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas// sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni// gnyis med ye shes smad byung na// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag de ltar rin po che// skyed pa po'i
178a4: pa dang mas/ / yi ge med cing gong bu med// 'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs// dus dang rtog pa rnam las grol// skye med zad med rmad du byung // 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs// spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang // mchog gi mchog
178a5: ste zhi ba med/ / dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// rnam rtog med cing rten pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// bems po rnams kyis sad par byed// mchog tu gnyis med rnal
178a6: 'byor gyis/ / thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med// gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang // rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni// me yi 'khor lo sad par byed// de lta'i nA nga'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la/
178a7: yang dag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las nA de'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don// bla na med pa bshad kyis nyen//
178a8: gsang ba b+ha ga zhes mu gsungs// b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten// dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid gsal// ye shes chen po spros pa
178b1: med/ / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i mtha' sten mchog tu phra// lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas// dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas// phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tsho ba ste// srang
178b2: mda'a'i khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/ / dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste// stong nyid skye med 'tsho ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang // bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste// chags bral 'gro kun skye ba
178b3: med/ / rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thams cad ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bar// gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags// de nyid gsang ba ya ni mchog/ bla ma'i
178b4: zhal la lhag par gnas/ / phan tshun rgyud pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba chen po'i tshe gram lus par bstan pa zhes bya bI le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
178b5: de nas gzhan gang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang // de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod// rdo rje rtse mor sems 'dzin pa// de ni bsrung ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnam
178b6: 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa/ / de ni bsdom pa bsrung ba dang // dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin// gdul ka tshul 'chos g.yo rgyu can// rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang // dang ming rtog ge ba lhan cig/ rtags kyi
178b7: nye bar 'tsho ba dang / / nyan thos nor la bskam chags can// de kho na nyid sun 'byid cing // don dam bA ni mi shes pa// med par blta dang tshul khrims 'tshal// gtam dang tshig gi kyil ba dang // 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing //
178b8: gol rtogs pa tsam du yang // de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byis pa'i skye bo dang // de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni// mi bya rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// skyed na dam tshig dbus
179a1: zhugs dang / / par snod phyag rgya sogs brten dang // bskam dang 'brel bas 'jug pa dang // dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snod dang cang te'u gri gug dang // glegs ba ma dang ni bgrang phreng dang // dam tshig med pa gzhan
179a2: ngag la/ / gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang // man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya// ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing // gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa
179a3: yang dag spyod/ / bla ma la yang smra min na// gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos// dbang po yul la spyod pa ni// gang nas de ni brdams nas ni// stong nyid gnyis med rgyu ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na// shes rab
179a4: ye shes dbang bskur sogs/ / nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis// dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/ bdag stod gzhan la smod pa dang // ye shes snyoms sogs nges spangs pa// blo ldan rdo rje dpar
179a5: phrug gi/ yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin// de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya// gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can// bgrang phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang // rus pa'i
179a6: rang bzhin phyag rgya dang / / glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang // thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma// thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir// bla ma la yang sba bar bya// sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya// mchu mgul bar yang mi mngon
179a7: zhing / / cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad// snod min nor ni chen po dang // ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs/
179a8: bla mas zla med dngos grub phyir// 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya// bza' ba tu dgos la sogs pa dang // nor ni chen po la chags shing // snod min slob ma man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba smra ba gang // rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di/
179b1: la// de ni dmyal ba du 'bod 'gro// rnal 'bor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshig don ni rna
179b2: med/ / bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang // de ni de yi don bshad bya// bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang // de ni bdud ci lnga ru brjod// rlung gi de nyid ster ba yis// zhu nas ro gcig slar yang ni// rdo rje lam nas steng song ste// gcig
179b3: tu gyur pa bza' ba'o/ / dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang // 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang // bde ba nyams su myong ba gang // de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu spyod pa bza'
179b4: ba'o/ / byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po go 'phang thim// zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o// spyi be thod pa'i slad nas ni// de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu// de la snying rje btung ba/
179b5: ni byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod mchog gsang ba'i pad ma blugs// rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed na// bdud rtsi lha yi ro rjes 'thung // de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang // glang po rta khyib
179b6: glang / / byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i klag/ sres nas skad cig ril babal// de ni bdud ci lnga zhes brjod// ma tog dang ni kun togagis// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i rjong // rdo ldan rdzas / gtu btsal/
179b7: ye shes pa rol 'gro// dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyi rtag tu bza'// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtag rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por/
179b8: rlung gang ny-id shes pas papal// rnam rtog sad pa ga'angang gnas// phyag rgya ga sum dang yang dag rtsod// phyag rgya na par bgad dong du// dal 'byed nyid gis bas bapal/ srog dang rtsol ba'in yang gnas/
180a1: rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// sgom dang sgom min sogs 'khrul pa// srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon sogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye shes chen po'i me yis min// sngags kyi
180a2: de nyid rtogs pas bza'/ / bdud bzhi'i khro bo chen po yi// stobs kyi rigs pas sgrub pa pos// sgrub pos legs par mnyam gzhag nas// rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'// rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi// theg le gsum
180a3: ste bla na med/ / mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni// zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med// snying rje'i snod kyi mchog tu ni// ye shes chen po mnyam bzhag nas// btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o//
180a4: phyag rgya'i dam tshig zhes su bshad// rdo rje pad ma yang dag sbyor// de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang // der ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/ nyon mongs dang bral
180a5: lhan cig skyes/ / phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang du'ang ngas ma bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i
180a6: rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brang ba mngon par rtogs pa las dam tshig gi don gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'phob
180a7: med pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sngags su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni// chags med snang ba med pa dang // gnyis su med cing dri ma med// dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang // gzhi med bla gab med pa dang /
180a8: lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs// rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/ de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'// mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che// gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog/ rten cing
180b1: 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis/ / rkun chad ro yis myos pa ltar// mchog tu nang du song gyur nas// de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas// sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten// rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas// de nas stong pa bla
180b2: med pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa'as zhus pa ni// bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen// sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi
180b3: de nyid bla na med/ / mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang // ye shes chen po mchog chen po// snying po yi yang snying po mchog/ yang dag bshad kyis nyan par gyis// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba
180b4: med/ / lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas// stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // snang ba med cing kun rdzob med// gnyis med
180b5: ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ / sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// de tshe thog mar stong nyid
180b6: sgom/ / snang ba med pa'i go 'phang zhi// rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med// byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni// yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung //
180b7: rnal 'byor shes pa smad byung che// de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don// a ba d+hU tI'i go'o phang gnas// slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub
180b8: sems ni dri ma med/ / sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa// brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba// rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang // byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skye mda'i
181a1: ba'i thig le tsam/ / sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas na// ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sgra tsam gyis don gtan la dbab pa'i
181a2: le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog/ don dam pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yi rlung bsgoms na// mAr du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi thig le ye shes che// phra zhing de nyid go 'phang
181a3: gsal/ / dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba// gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa// skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang // lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang // ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhug/
