181a4: skom dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bo shes// chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas// sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu// bag chags kun las rnam par grol// kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna yi/
181a5: rtse mor de nyid mchog/ 'od zer thig le bsam par bya// srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba// bskal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni// rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i
181a6: gzugs/ / 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos// ngag gi grangs kyi bzlos mtshan nyid// yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhen// sgom pa'i go 'phang mi zad pa// dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang /
181a7: rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang // gnas kyi dbye brtsa rnams kyi// dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang // rlung rnams kyi ni zlog pa dang // rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor sdus rnam drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhes su
181a8: brjod/ / thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams// nyi khri dang ni tshig stong dang // de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/ nyin dang mtshan mongs pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjes su
181b1: sbyor ba yis/ / gradra ni yang dang yang du brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur// thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang // rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni/
181b2: yang dag par ni nges bzung med// yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// 'khor lo bzhi yis dbye ba yis// nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas kyi rtsol ba yis// tha dad du ni rab
181b3: tu ba rtag/ rtsa yi 'khor lo smra ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni// nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las// rtsa yi 'khor lo spyod par bya// de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// de rjes
181b4: gnas kyi spol ba'i sa/ / gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya// gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can// dngos po
181b5: kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// 'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar gnas pa rang ngo bo// rtog dang bcas
181b6: pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ / de nas rnal 'byor logs nas ni// rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu// de thob nas ni log pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas// nges pa la ni don dam pa//
181b7: nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las// de nas dgag pa de dag kyang // yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang stsol ba'i rnam rtog rnams// kun
181b8: rab tu spangs nas ni/ / rlung gi de kho na nyid rgya// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlung gi de kho na nyid rten// 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni// de la
182a1: rtse gcig sems kyi ni/ / rtog med de kho na nyid kyis// rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal// khang bzangs byed pa bzhin du ni// thog maras ni yongs su sbyang // de stengs theg sa
182a2: dang bral byas la/ / gnas ni legs par dag par bya// dang bzangs bskal pa nyams dga' ba// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog/ rlung gi de nyid rnam par bsgom// snga ma bzhin du
182a3: mnyam gzhag nas/ / srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che// rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang // de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zeng mchog
182a4: gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga/ / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin// phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// de ni ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu bar byed// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyid gong zang mchog
182a5: sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo// rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad// yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang // sna rtse yungs dkar de yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni// sna rtser yungs dkar de yang ni/
182a6: srog dang brtsol ba'i brtag pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su bsgom// steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba// g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi
182a7: dus ni yin par bshad/ / lkog ma snying kha lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad mar 'gro 'ong ston// thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// go rims ji bzhin gnas pas bstan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid
182a8: yin te/ / kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o// gnyis ka las ni
182b1: 'byung ba'i khams/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// chu'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rdorje
182b2: mgon po rgyu ba'o/ / lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'dug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor byis pa'i/
182b3: yul min zhing // rtog gi pa yis mi shes so// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyis dngos grub pa// de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsal/
182b4: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra// bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste
182b5: bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// bde ba chen po gsal ba'i tshig/ rdor sems go 'phang mi byed pa// rang rig pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags gis stong pa// bde ba chen po zhes
182b6: 'di brjod/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod//
182b7: rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can// lnga ni rtsanas 'bab pa'i rgyun// stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal// rang bzhin med cing rten med pa// gnyis med dngos po rnam bral zhing // cha med chen rnam
182b8: par spangs/ / rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang // zad med bde ba thams cad gsal// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa// stong pa stong pa chen po dang // shin tu stong pa
183a1: mchog gi mchog/ stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas// nam mkha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid// mchod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid// mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs// sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin
183a2: rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ / snying rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'dres// mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gcig pu ro gcig pa// rjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs// bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor long gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul
183a3: min/ mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob// rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal// stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang // cha bzhi yis ni rnam
183a4: bkag pa/ rdo rje mor ni 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab// nam mkha' lnga yis cha yis gang // 'di ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste// bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab// dpa' bo rdal
183a5: 'byor ma sbyor skyes/ / mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo bo de nyid de// rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang // rang gi blo la yang dag gnas// rang rig
183a6: pa zhes bshad pa'o/ / gzhon nu ma yin rab dga' bzhin// mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong // de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro// mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs// rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog
183a7: dang bde ba che/ / de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid cig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol bar rtogs// gnyis dang gnyis med rnam spyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi
183a8: ba'i bdag nyid can/ / gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes// shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar gyur kun khyab zhi pa mchog
183b1: dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la stsol/ / dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod// bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtog spangs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs// mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por
183b2: myos/ / mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can// gzung ba rnams kyi yul rnams zhes// kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams// mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de dang bral zhing
183b3: mchog tu phra/ / ye shes bde ba kun gyi bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des// de las rnam grol
183b4: 'jigs pa med/ / mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing // thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi gnas// nyan thos ye shes
183b5: zhi ba nyid/ / gnyis med mchog dang gse ru'o// de dag bde ba rtogs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgad phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus// nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do// de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal
183b6: mya ngan 'das pa dang / / de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bde ba yid ni bye brag byas// dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed// rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas//
183b7: de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni// bde ba chen po zhes ni brjod// rdal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni// rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid men// bsnyen nas zlas pa sbyin bsreg man// bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min// byab
183b8: ma yin phreng bas min/ / bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min// cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyis// bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// mchog gi ye shes bde ba che// rnal 'byor
184a1: cher po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rdo rje pad ma mnyam par sbyor// gang
184a2: gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur/ / tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa// mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod// de ni rlung du yang dag grags// yi ge a ni phye ba yis// rnal 'byor shes pas rtog mchog stsol// de rten snying kha'i pad ma yis//
184a3: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo skal pa bzang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa// rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob po// mig la sogs pa yang dag rten// 'gro ba gsu
184a4: du rnam par spyod/ / de dag 'joms pa rlung rdo rje// bgegs mthar brjod pa zhes ni brjod// rnam shes rnams dang gang de la// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su brjod// 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams
184a5: gnas/ / skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis// yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas// de la rlung gis yang dag spor// rdo rje pad mo zhes ni brjod// rdo rje snying rjer shes par bya// pad ma yang ni stong pa nyid// de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu
184a6: shes/ / rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs// 'od zer tshogs kyis bdag nyid can// de rnams kyis ni 'byed pa gang // de ni pad ma zhes su brjod// de'i rnal 'byor mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/
184a7: byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bde chen 'khor lo pad ma'o// de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang // sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung // bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste// slob sa bzang gis thos pa'i snod// pad ma de yi gnas de la// de yi sbyor
184a8: ba'ang mchog tu gsal/ / zhi gnas pad ma zhes gsungs la// de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor ni// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong // rnal 'byor ma zhal pad mar gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na
184b1: med/ / pad ma slob ma bzang gi kha// man ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid// yang dag de nyid don mthong byed// blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling ga zhes ni bshad// rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan
184b2: gyis/ / b+ha ga pad ma zhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma// de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi// rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod// byang
184b3: chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ / pad ma zhes ni yongs su grags// di ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// rang rig rdo rje 'chang pad ma// de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba//
184b4: sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal// dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste// bla ma slob ma snod bzang po// de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor// yang dag de gnyis kyi nI rgyu// e ni pad ma zhes su brjod// yi ge bam ni rdo rje nyid
184b5: thig le de nyid mi shigs pa/ / de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang // bla ma'i dri ni gyis yongs su shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
184b6: dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje pad ma yang dag por sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // sngags kyi de nyid ye shes mchog/ bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyon// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa
184b7: yis/ / dag gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// sngags ni gzungs bzhin bzlas brjod bya// de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pa mthar phyin// rdo rje'i phyag rgya go
184b8: 'phang zhing / / phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don// mchog gi de nyid ye shes che// sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yi ni// dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun
185a1: kyis gsal/ / lus ngag yod kyi sdom pa'o// de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/ de nyid kun gyi don sdus pa// snying kha'i pad ma'i mchog tu gas la// de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni/
185a2: 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags// dmigs med zhes ni gang gsungs pa// de ni don dam par ni brjod// sbrul sogs pa yid bye ba yis// sngags mi zlos
185a3: pa gnyis su med/ / 'on kyang me phyed de gnyis gsum// sngags kyi don dam bsdus pa'o// bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med// yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na// dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// dam dag go
185a4: 'phang bzang po gsal/ / gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni// sngags kyi man ngag kha rgyud pa// sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal ba// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// kun
185a5: mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la/ / rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang // phyag byas nas ni yongs su zhus// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi/
185a6: de nyid man ngag ni// sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid// sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nyid
185a7: bshad kyis nyon/ / snying po'i snying po'i don bsdus pa// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos par bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nyon mongs med cing mi
185a8: gsal ba/ / rang bzhin med pa'i mchog gi mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang // rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// skal bzang bde ba
185b1: 'phel bar byed/ / thams cad shes shing cha dang bral// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes// de nyid de ni don dam yang // de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// khyab
185b2: pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid/ / nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// dri med dri bral dga' ba dang // rang rig pa'i go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha de nyams dga' bzang // cha yi phyogs rnams rgyas par byed// man ngag gnas
185b3: kyi bye brag gis/ / 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya// rtsa dang mgrin pa snying kha rkan// rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// de bzhin du ni las bya ba// zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin// ji bzhin dngos grub ye shes dang // ji bzhin
185b4: nyams su myong mtshan nyid/ / rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bur// rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dag bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim// gzugs rdzogs
185b5: pa la sogs pa yi/ / bla ma rgyad pas yang dag gnas// rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya// gser dang do zhal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog/ bran dang las byed grangs med dang // dad cing gus pa
185b6: la sogs kyis/ / ji lta'i bzhed pa ston pa la// rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis// sngags kyi don ston bla ma ni// dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya// phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag bzung nas
185b7: 'bras bu' don/ / ma'i rus pa'i spu gu dang // sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// rab brdal dngos grub skyer bar byed// thog mar dbang bskur blang byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya/
185b8: bgegs mthar byed la gtor ma ni// chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri// dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan// sde tshan
186a1: thapa mtha' cha ldan/ / sa'i ma bong du brjod// zag par yag nyis 'gyur la// amrag par dang ldan// mtshungs pa meng pa' sngags btu bya// gsungag rngu snang ba mchog/ mu pra ga yi na da baH
186a2: dbyang sa yig drug par yang dag ldan/ / sde tshan mtha'i mtha' char bcas// thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsum thugs kyi dam tshig gsum// 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid
186a3: mchog/ sngags btu ba ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi dor bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa kun yid no// rgyu dang mirgyas nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi ral 'byor mchog
186a4: rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni// ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin sngags bzlos pa// dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis// de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro// tshe 'di nyid
186a5: la sngags shes pas/ / ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kur la longs spyod byed// gang zhig sngags ni 'gul ba ru// rtag
186a6: 'chang de kho na nyid shes/ / rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed// dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang // dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang grub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung dpal
186a7: rdo rje phreng pa'i mngon par rtogs pa las sngags kyi de kho ni nyid gsangs pa'i le'u sa bcwo lnga pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyod// grangs kyi rim pa bla na med// ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi/
186a8: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// gang gis thob pa skal pa bzang // srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gad pa// gang gis yang dag yongs su shes// rab 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa/
186b1: 'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor// goms pa thob pa de yang ni// bla ma rnal 'byor de shes rgyud// rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba// lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni// mdor sdus nas na bshad par bya// sprin gyi dpal
186b2: las gsal ba gang / / mdor sngas nas ni dus ni drag/ lo tshigs su ni yong su grags// sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyin zhag drug bcu'o// nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la// nyin zhag gcig ces yod//
186b3: sa grags// nyi mtshan chu tshod drug bcu ste// de bzhin dbyu gu cha sha'o// 'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la// cha sha zhes ni yongs su grags// skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs// de nyid se gol rtogs pa'i tshad// thang cig
186b4: gsu pa la skad cig gi/ de la yungs dkar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum la ni thang cig go// thang cig de ni yud tsam mo// thang cig gsum la mig btsum sa te// de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi// tsam gsum la ni mig
186b5: btsums te/ / tsamA ni thal mo brdabs pa'o// bde ba 'char ba de gsum tsam// de ni thig le 'pho ba'o// sngags pa ga sum la bde bar gnas/ de ni rab 'gyel 'jigs par brjod// dus gsupa la ni 'jigs par bshad//
186b6: dra ba ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do// 'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs// da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad// de las slar yang //
186b7: skad cig gsum// de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha// de las cha gsum de las ra// de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus
186b8: kye tog pa bral/ / rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang // de yi srog ni shar nam thim// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yi nyon// srog ni tham dang 'char ba yi// gang che skad cig la sogs rtogs// kun nas
187a1: rab tu ma zhi ba/ / de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas// grol ba'i gnas ni mi shrI so// bshang sgrogs dba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes ma chen po// de yang rnam shes dang bral ba/ ye she dus ni bdag med pa/
187a2: der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/ srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ston// thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la// sgro 'degs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed// de tshe rang gi gnas su them// rnam shes las ni skye
187a3: ba rlung / / de las me ni skye bar 'gyur// me las rku ni 'byung bar byed// de las sa ni yang dag skye// de dag rnams las phung por byung // de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni// de las rnam shes rang bzhin med// brgya dang brgyad kyi
187a4: lhag pa'i rim/ / ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas// thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du// rgyags pa skyed pa'i rlung chen po// nyon mongs yid ni 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdad par byed// la
187a5: rgyags pas chu'i rlung / / rgyags pa skyed pa za ba'i phyir// phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid// rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung // rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'byung ba rnams kyis sdud nas kyang
187a6: go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ / de la rlung ni btang bzung 'byung // rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed// de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdad// khyab cing phra la sgrib par byed// de las mi zad btang bzung dang // rnam shes skad cag sgrib par byed// bsgribs
187a7: nas de las rnam shes kyang / / bems por song nas rgyal bar 'gyur// skye mched cha ni sgrib par byed// dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par gyur pa'i sog/ rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan// de nyid mchog ni
187a8: de ltar bshad/ / srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang // ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes// bla ma rgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung // rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis
187b1: 'chi mad lus mchog ni/ / thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten// gang phyir sems can tshe thung bas// 'chi me go 'phang sgrub mi nus// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'chib med par rab 'dus bya/ bcom ldar mgod po la shes
187b2: mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon// rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus// 'chi ba med nyid rigs par ni// ji ltar yang dag thim pa lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun grub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pI
187b3: rnal 'byor che/ / yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa// sems can tshe ni thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa gang yang med// de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tsha ring ba ni dge ba'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog/ blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid
187b4: bsgrub/ / lce ni rkan gyi dbus sbyar ba// byas nas de kho na nyid tshig zla// sems dpa'i dkyil krung bcas nas ni// yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtse dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing / kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya// rkan gyi gnas
187b5: son zla ba ni/ / sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu// zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung // mtshan phyed kyi ni dus tshod mthar// ji srid thun cig ma chad par// de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla// rdo rje
187b6: lus ni byed par 'gyur/ / sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan// yan lag ma nyams rtag tu zla// sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu bstan par bya// de nyid lnga yi rim pas t+ye//
187b7: bzlas pas rdzogs nas rtag tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med// lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni// bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni// 'char kar de nas de la yang // yo Shi ga rag gtam bde ba ni// blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchod/
187b8: bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no// nyal kar yang na de 'thungs na// rdzas kyi tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM// de nas lan bdun pazla bar bya// lag g.yas pa dan gyis mtshan la// snod bzangs de la bka'
188a1: nas su/ yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// lan gsum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bud med gzhon nu ni// rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing btung // de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang // mar la stegs pa'i 'bras dang ni/ ma sha
188a2: dang ni nyi dga' dang / / ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// til rnams cha bsnyams byas nas ni// mos pa yis ni sbyini sreg bya// nyal kar de la bza' ba bya ni// bla na med pa'i bza' ba po// de ltar rig pas chog shes nas// su la'ang
188a3: smra bar mi bya'o/ / thams cad mngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed// zla ba drug du'ang gang sten pa// de ni rdo rje lus su 'gyur// bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs// tshe dgug pa ni bla na med// rab tu 'bad pas
188a4: bsten par bya/ / phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos// rgas pa med cing srin nad med// snyom las med cing lkugs pa med// glo skam rlung mthis nad sogs med// nad dang 'bras dang 'bram bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med//
188a5: mdzend mtshan ma rdol pa med// dung dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te// rnal 'byor/
188a6: ma rnams sems par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag byas pa dang mchod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas stan bI le'u ste bcu
188a7: drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni// grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa nyon// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis// ji bzhin mang du byung ba'i mchog/ 'khor lo drug la rten bcu drug/ lus la lha'i gzhal
188a8: yas khang / / rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod// 'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad// rtsa gsum
188b1: gnas ni rim gyis 'char/ / de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang // rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang // drug bcu rtsa
188b2: bzhir 'char bar bshad/ / bde ba chen po'i 'khor le cher// rtsa ni sum bcu gnyis su bshad// de ltar mdor sdus rim pa yang // brgya dang sum bcu cig lhag par// rtsa rnams su ni yang dag bshad// gzhan dag tu ni rgyas
188b3: par yang / / rtsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du// gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni// nges par brjod par 'bum sder gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po las ni snying por gsungs// smin ma'i dbus nas rlung 'khor lo//
188b4: bye ba 'khyil pa mi zad pa// mi bzangs brtan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa thung drug gi mtshan nyid do// 'dzin pa rtog med gar ba ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum me dkyil 'khor// 'grin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin// dri ma dang bral
188b5: gsal ba dang / / drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang dang bzang por 'gro// stobs chen dang ni mi zad che// mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che// rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags sde
188b6: rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyas spro byed/ / rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang // rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa chad// rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung brlang dang // dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' mkha' 'gro// 'dab chags yan lag
188b7: khwa yi gdong / / za phod mi bzang sgra sgrogs dang // dri lngar rdeg dang rdul ba dang / dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni spu ni// chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar sngo// yud tsam gtso bo yud mi skyes// rgyab tu kha ltas dbyug pa dang // dbyug
188b8: snyoms dang ni rnying pa dang / / rigs kyi lto dang tshigs kyi tshig/ tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang // tshigs kyi gnas dang tshigs kyi gdod// tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud// dul byed dung 'gro gzi brjid dang / dri med
189a1: dul ba'i snyoms pa dang / / chu 'phyang sa/ dang chu 'byang chags// tshun 'byang chun 'byung byad sbyang bu// bru gra zu gas rang ga// ma ma la ma 'thun pa dang / rab mchog ma dang grags pa// da ltar drug bcu
189a2: rtsa bzhir bshad/ / lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang // rin chen chen po pad ma dang // rdo rje chen po stobs po che// mgo bo che dang sgra tshe dang // nyes dga' chen po myos pa che// 'di brgyad chos
189a3: kyi 'khor lo'i dbus/ / snying kha'i pad mar yang dag gnas// longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang // nyi 'gro gas la dang skal ba dang // sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong // bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa dang // bcud len ron snre
189a4: ba dang / / ra 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni// khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod// de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can// 'dod can ma dang srog gi lus// zla thung bla ster mdzod dang ni// 'dod chags
189a5: min sma kun sha dang / / shi bi s+pho dang dag pa dang // mi dad mi ro ne tso dang // gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang // kis ring chad ster bdud rtsi dang // dung can dang ni dung rna dang // dug gi mig dang drug gi sna// rgyags dbang rgyags pa
189a6: bskam pa dang / / rgyags pas rgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags// snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi sten// sum bcu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed// pra dang reg bya
189a7: mchog tu / / bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rang nyid bde can rang bzhin dang // gan dag la yang ster bar byed// ltar yang dag tu yi rim// tha ma'i zhal las shes par bya// tsa yi rim med nges par mo nga
189a8: po la sogs mi 'byung ngo / / phung po me na ye shes che// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni// ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas/
189b1: de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya// ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing // myur du yang ni 'phel nas 'gro// de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa// ster bar 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin phung po shing
189b2: nas bya/ / rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni// 'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed// lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin bsgom par bya// gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis
189b3: gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na/ / de tshe ma ni yang dag 'bar// de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus// 'khor lo'i ming can pad ma rnams// rim gyis rim gyis bye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las// byang chub sems ni bde
189b4: ba che/ / sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob// ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab pa nyi ma zla ba'o// mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas// rgyu gcig tu ma yang shes nas ni// de nya
189b5: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis/ / g.yas pa'i nyi ma'i rnam pa dang // g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung // gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni// de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o// gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal// bde ba kun kyang de lta bu'o/
189b6: de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me// yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas// sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni// rgyalam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na// pa yi mkha' la mtshungs par gnas// de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gas
189b7: gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa/ / mi dang nyi ma 'char ba na// de tshe lhag par chags pa non// chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur// rdo rje pad ma 'dres pa'i gdod// 'jug pa ma yi kha yi rlung // de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur// sa bon
189b8: las ni sems can 'byung / / de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char// 'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye// de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni// 'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o// ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog mchog tu bde ba chad
190a1: byang che/ / ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis// mchog tu bde ba bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
190a2: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin// rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni// rgud pa yi ni rigs kyi skye// gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa// dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa// skye bo skal ba med
190a3: don du/ / gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can myur du dngos grub don// snod du bya bar 'dod pa yi// rang byung ye shes smad byung ba// rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i// 'khor
190a4: lo'i rtsa ni sum bcu gnyis/ / byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i// rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya// de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas// de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa'i sde tshan// ya ra la wa Sha sha sa//
190a5: de dag rim par shes par bya// slar yang de dag bsdus nas ni// sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro// de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog/ byang chub sems can thim nas 'gro// kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni// bde ba
190a6: kun gyi kazhi yi mchog/ shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyi ni// gsum
190a7: phye bdun bcu rtsa gnyis gsal/ / de ni stong nga rab pa ba// so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// ma rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni// khams
190a8: gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/ / stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brangs na// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mcho// lha'i rim
190b1: pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ / rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar// song nas phan tshun kun nas rten// slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro// bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi
190b2: gnas/ / rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las// de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur// 'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtse// brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal// rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces// smad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis
190b3: ni/ / yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob// phung po khams dang don yul nyid// dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid// gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/
190b4: lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang // de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams// khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi// de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhugs// slar
190b5: yang khro bo rgyal sras la/ / nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro/ rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs// lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni// de rnams kyang ni sa sogs 'gro/ de dag de bzhin gshegs lnga la// sku gsung thugs
190b6: kyi rdo rje la/ / de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro// de kho na nyid bde gcig pu// de la yang ni thim nas 'gro/ bzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol// bde ba kun rten pa yi mchog/ de yang nyams myong tsam las slar// de
190b7: yi ge tsam la this/ / oM ga tsam ni thig la thil// thig la yang ni spru la khrim// sgra yang s+thA tsa pa la ni tha~Mg// skran pa 'od gsal ba la'o// 'dags lag 'phang yang dag par// dang smra ba'i mtshan nyid do//
190b8: rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang // don dam pa dang bde ba che// bzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub sems ni dri ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che// gnyis med ye shes smad du byung // dbang bskur bzhi pa
191a1: bde ba dang / bzhi pa'i dga' ba go 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming bye brag gis// go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yid// spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de ltar skyed dang rdzogs pa
191a2: yaM/ ram de dgra ba rgyud las shes// zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa ba bsdus pa'i le'u bcwa brgyad pa'o//
191a3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid de// de na ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'jobs dang mtshan nyid bral//
191a4: skad cig ma re bzhi zhes gsungs// rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod// de yi skad cig dbye bar bya// a ling ga ni dang / tsum pan dang nu ma sha na dang / ku tsa gra ha dang / bul tra tra han dang /
191a5: da shan dang da kha da na dang rol dang pu tsaN dang kur ba la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang // rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go// na li stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na// mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa// rnam smin
191a6: zhes bya skad cag go/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i// rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go/ na li las byung shu kra 'das// rnam pa dang bral skad cig
191a7: go/ shes ba'i dang stong pa ba'o// skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa/
191a8: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid de// lugs 'byung lugs las zlog pa yi// rnga lta ba yi rim pa yi// dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral
191b1: zhes pa gsum pa dang / / bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad// sprul pa'i 'khor lo dga' ba dang // mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// longs spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che// lug
191b2: bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs/ / de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste// bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la// de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas
191b3: sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes/ / dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed// blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brga/ ba la tsum par byed pa yi// dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes// rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// /
191b4: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog tu// de bzhin sku la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad mar gzhag nas ni// nyams myongs ni skad cig mchog/ rnam sman zhes bya skad cig nyid// de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes// rtsa
191b5: dbus na rab bsal gnas/ / gtum mo yang ni rngam rtog 'joms// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed// bral dga'i gnas su myong ba na// rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid do// de la ro gcig
191b6: bzhan ni/ / tsa ni cig gi dz+nyAn la ter// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de la ste// rnal 'byor pa
191b7: yis bsgrub bya ba/ sa su myong ba mchog dga' ste// rna ma smin skad gago mtshan nyid do// longs spyod 'khor lo de las ni// steng du byed pa'i skad cig la// nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rnam 'joms kun
191b8: mtshan nyid skad cig go/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma// lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go// rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byor mtshogs
192a1: yang dag gzugs/ / de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid cig par ro mtshungs pa// rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong // slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro// rab tu sad pa nyams su myong // stong phrag
192a2: bcu drug bdag nyid do/ / bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa// gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba// gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so// ral 'byor ma yi bka' dri gyis// bla ma rgyud pa las
192a3: shes bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le gsum ni bla na med/ ga
192a4: gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ / rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa rnams kun tu 'bad pa dang // byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa// rdo rje'am ni pad ma'i rtsa// rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgugs pa yi sbyor ba dang //
192a5: kI gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba ya si// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ snying kha'i pad ma' lte ba la// dbus su hUM ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i
192a6: mtshan nyid zhi/ / dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de kho na nyid lus skyob pa// phyogs yul dus dang rnam par grol// steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs// sems bral rang gi da bor gnas// ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs//
192a7: rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing // rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral// gnyis pa kun la rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o// rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che// sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnanal
192a8: 'byor gyis/ / kun nas kyang ni bsgom par/ yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga// zhi ba la sogs de bzhin bsgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku
192b1: gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ / rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa// thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/
192b2: thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa// gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do//
192b3: la la nA dang ra sa nA/ a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // de nyid du ni yongs su grags// steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid// so sor lu gu rgyud tshul du// rtsa rnams kun la byab nas ni// yang dag man ngag
192b4: rim pas gnas/ / de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi// rnal 'byor chen po'i smad byung che// gso sbyong gis mini bzlas pas min// phreng bas ma yin 'gog sa
192b5: min/ / grangs min dus ma ni sbyin sreg min// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni// de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/ thig
192b6: le gsum ni rnam sgom pa/ / zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs//
192b7: gnas dang grangs kyi dbye ba yis// bla ma rgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan
192b8: yang de nyid nyon/ / de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni nam phye khyod nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba
193a1: bzhide bshang / / o sku yi rdo rje yi// snying po ru ni yang dag bshad // yi ge a dang yi ge u// yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum// A ni chos 'khor pad ma la// rlung ga 'khor lo la ni khyab// sgrib med pa yi rung na
193a2: go srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus/ / cha med tsha dang bral ba dang / dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas// thig le 'khor lo 'tshal khab/ dam pala'i khams kyi yi ge ma chog/ sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas/
193a3: sngags rnams thams cad rab sar byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed// dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// zad med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas/ byang
193a4: chub sa bor bde ba che/ / gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad// 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa'o// u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa
193a5: gzi brjid kyi ni lus/ / gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes// gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can// bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// yi ge ma ni thig le tsam// gdod tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i
193a6: gtsag tor gnas na gnas/ / zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'i// rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po// mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin// bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o//
193a7: de gar rung ni gnas gsum gyi// gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dug/ yi ge oM gyi brda shes na// khams gsum rnam par sang bar byed// rnam par snang mad 'gro ba'i gzugs// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi d+ha// rnam par
193a8: rtag pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ / sna yi bug nas ni byung // yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis// sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed// me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la// smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung // de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad/ ga6
193b1: la bab ste de nyid gsum/ / zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa// skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring por byas te dbye ba gsum/
193b2: chos kyi dbyings kyi don sdus pa// yi ge AHni lngar bshad za ni// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung // stong nyid ye shes mang can te// srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs// yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o// kun gzhi dang
193b3: nyon mongs yid/ / bzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog/ AHni chos 'khor pad ma las// mgrin par yi ge AHnyid 'gyur// srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang /
193b4: yi ge ha yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gan sa pa bcings// A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod// ro 'bab pa yi khung khrung ni// ro sgyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs// bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed// gzug
193b5: kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o/ / ha dang de bzhin yi ge u// de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar// 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa// ha ni thur sel ming can rlung // bshad sgo'i gsang ba'i dbus na gaR+Sha/
193b6: yi ge u ni khyab byed rlung // mgrin pa pad ma'i dbus na gnas// yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin// dpral rlang gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig g+hur snying kha nas// thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog
193b7: gnag/ gzugs med khams kyi ming can no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab du bshad// lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang //
193b8: gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na// 'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa/
194a1: yi/ sbas pa'i dod ni khyod 'drig// rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste// kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni//
194a2: sgrib dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bug las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam// gang gi stobs kyis khyab pa byed/
194a3: gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par smad byung che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o// rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang // yang dag rigs pa da yis bshad// sgrub pa'i rma
194a4: kyi 'khor lo'i dbus/ / rgud 'di pad ma gnyis su gsungs// drug bcu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis// steng dang 'og tu kha ltas nas// slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas// srog dang thur sel rgyud par byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas
194a5: rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs/ / sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis// la la nA dang ra sa na// a ba d+hU ti mchog gi gnas// de gnyis dbus la mchog gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung // rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la/
194a6: khyab/ rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni// las kun byed cing mkhas par 'gyur// rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya dang brgyad las gang rgyal ba// dus kun du ni 'phel bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig/
194a7: gcig mngor rdzogs byang chub// de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs// de ni gang tshe skad cig thob// de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs// de yang ji ltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ri brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa
194a8: chen po blong zang gis ni zhi gnas bsgom/ / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la// thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa// hUM bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med// mchog tu rgyun
194b1: 'chad bar ni/ / zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na// de rjes skad cig de la thob// gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na// snying pa'i pad pa'ang steng bltas 'gro// de nas gsang ba'i pad ma las// kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang // dam par rto/
194b2: pa'i rlung gnyis ni// de las rnam par bcas nas grol// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// sku gsung rdo rje bcas nas ni// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ster// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob// a ba d+hU tI'i rgyun la gnas//
194b3: sprin dbus rlung ni bcad bye zer byas pa// de thob thob byas dga' ba ni// rgyun du 'chad zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang // rang rig bde ba chen po'o// 'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya// sngags grub pa'i
194b4: rnal 'byor pas/ / 'dar dang rdul dang ba sprulangs// rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang // ma dadra ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong // kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gra lhags tshad pa la sogs dang // 'jig rten rmo dang de bzhinag
194b5: rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni/ / gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyu ro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan
194b6: yang bshad kyi nyon/ / de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan bya// bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun
194b7: gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pu// kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas rab bsal byed// rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang // de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do// phra rags la sogs
194b8: dbye ba yis/ / thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dngos// 'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang // thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal
195a1: mchog tu'o/ / grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog/ gang gis shin tu rig pa ni// de ni tsho ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid// glang
195a2: po bong bu lce spyang dang / rta dang ridags dang ni pag/ pa dang mdad pa yi sman// mdza' bo sreg gi gnyen tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni// de ba'i na gshegs pa 'od
195a3: dpag med/ / de ra spros pa kur nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu// gzhan yang lung du ma bstan man// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can/
195a4: 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtog 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes// maM bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar daphung po yongs shes na// lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye/
195a5: 'dzin 'jig dang rang na d+h+r-ig/ A ro lig dang pradz+nyA dIg/ badz+ra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang // de ni khams gsum yongs su rtag/ sra ba la sogs
195a6: bzhir phye bas/ / sa yi khams su yongs su rtag// gti mug dga' bar mngon par brjod// de yi spyan du yongs su grags// zhu ba tsa mchi khu ba sogs// rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bster// rwa'i khams su rnam
195a7: shes/ / mA ma kI yidag nyid can// dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang // gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad// me'i khams su shes par bya// gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can// 'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel// rlung
195a8: rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang // steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khams su shes// sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang // rnal 'byor mchog
195b1: nyid rnam par shes/ / mo ha ra ti dr-i shar ti// rA ga ra ti badz+ra ra ti de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ri// de dag mngon sumachog yis// gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs// lha mo'i gzugs kyi mar na nyid du//
195b2: rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig bu// sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang // rang dang thung ba'i rnam pa yis// lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma// phyi rol bzung ba'i rang bzhid car// mkhar lnga
195b3: sil skar sbubs rol mo/ / de bzhin rnga snyad pa bang dang // bstod dang slad sogs sgra dag ni// sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya// bzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes pa sad par byed// dring ba dang dri bzangs dang // sku
195b4: 'dri yi mchog rnams ri/ / dri rdo rje mar de shes bya// bzung ba'i rnam par che dmar ba// ro drug mchog du ldan pa ni// lan tsha sbyar la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje ro mar de shes bya// kun kyang bzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang
195b5: po la rten pa/ / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyang ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa'i snying por gsungs// gzugs la sogs
195b6: btsa rigs pa pa/ dngag ba sgo bar byed/ sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas/ bye thanas sa rigs papa/ sgra yin pa par shes pa/ b+h+ya na dong yang dag bshad/ dril bye brag la sang ba/ sa sa nga
195b7: rigs par ro/ / snga yi rnam shes mtshan nyid na// nam mkha' snying por rnam par shes// ro'i bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// lce'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shre/
195b8: reg bya'i bye brag la spong pa// bye brag so so'i go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes// yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhir// yid kyi
196a1: rnam shes zhes gsungs pa/ / 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyas pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// bag zags yul gyi bdag nyid can// byams pa rwa ri rnam pa
196a2: shes/ / rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can// bde ba kun gyi gzhi'i mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad// de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog/ yang dag de nyid bla na
196a3: med/ / mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni// gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rje dang dpung brla thal gong // sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyis// shes pa bcu'i mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su
196a4: yongs su shes/ / gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed// pad ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// dbyig sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur// de ltar
196a5: rnams gnas dbye bas/ / ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// yang dag de kho na nyid rten// gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma rgyud las shes par bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor
196a6: mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skye med zad med mi gsal dang // 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med
196a7: dang / / mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis// oM dang hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'// sprul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// oM la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha'
196a8: med ces bya'i ming can no/ / sA yi mtha' can mo med pa// migo med ces ni bshad pa yin/ thams cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de nyid
196b1: na mad/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di yi rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dbang po thams cad mnyam par spyod// ngos po thams cad gcig pu'i
196b2: lus/ ngag gi rnam rtag kun spangs pa// snang ba thams cad rnam spangs pa// bdag byin rlab pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa slad dubyung // rang dge pa yi rnal 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// dpral
196b3: kun 'gro khyab pa dang / / rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing // kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa// don dam rang gi ngo bo ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang // sngags kyi de nyid rab tu gsal// a ni de nyid mtha' thig leng // yang dag
196b4: thim pa rnam par sgom/ / thig le yi ge a la tha mi// a ni mtha' yi ha tsam la'o// ha yang yi ge hAM la'o// yi ge U ni ha la'o// yi ge haM yang a la thim// yi ge a ni thig le tsam// thig le yang ni sgra la thi ba// sgra yang sgra tsam la
196b5: ni'o/ / sgra tsam mchog ni nam mkha' la'o// de yang 'od gsal ba la thim// 'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni// shin tu na mdag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char// ngag gi spyod pa rnam
196b6: dang bral/ / gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag ste// rnam shes brgyad kyi tshogs dben pa// phyi'i yul drug bsdus pa ri// rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa// de sa
196b7: mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o/ / kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ga rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'jigs byed
196b8: dbang phyug dang / / he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po sangs rgyas thub pa che// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal dang // sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can// sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni/
197a1: rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog pa med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// skyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid bdag/ sgra yi rtse bo brgyad stong
197a2: 'dra/ / shin tu gsal zhing 'odagasal ba// lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis// bla ma rgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid gsum de mchog/ zhal nas brgyung ba'i rim pa skye// gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog/ gzhi pa'i mtshan nyid
197a3: skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// sna
197a4: gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni/ / gsang ba snying kha gdong sna'i ming // gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni// 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom pa'i rim// shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i// sems kyi bde
197a5: bster bar byed/ / rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// rtsa'i 'khor lo sang bar byed// bde ba chen po kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni// dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// ldan skyes
197a6: skad cig mtshan nyid ni/ / rdo rje rtse mor bzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le// yang dag bzung ba'i bdag nyid
197a7: can/ / chags chen sems ni gcig bya yis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// pad mad pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi la// cha yi 'khor lo rarimi bzhin 'char// de yi lte bsnar ni bshad// gsang bar bde ba thams cad ster//
197a8: snying kha'i pad ma 'dab ma brgyad// de yang lte ba snar ni brjod// zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems// yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu// ngag gi rtog pa kun spangs pa// smad byung chen
197b1: ba ye shes pa ga/ rtag tu sngags ni nAd 'byung // nam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man dag thob pas bde brgyal// zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyug cig na/
197b2: zla ba nyis me dang gas pa// la gsum kye no dbas nas khyab// gdong gis ni zhes byar ba shad// rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang / de la gnas pa'i ye shes che// zag le gte mug gas gnon yon// bsam/
197b3: gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal// de kho na nyid lnga rten mchog/ de yi 'od zer thag la tsam// gdong gis cer yang dag pa rte// rnal
197b4: 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya/ / gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal// de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// meng can du ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhwa
197b5: pa rnams kyi ni/ / gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms pa// kun mkhyen rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na// sna rtse bug las byung zhing // rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu// kun rdzob lnga ni rgyu ba yi//
197b6: de las ni rnam par byung // g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyi ga dang // ngal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar po bzang po 'di// pad ma mgon
197b7: po rgyu ba'o/ / g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dris pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams//
197b8: dag pa'i shal ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung // rten dang rten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung
198a1: bar 'gyu/ / dkyil 'khor ba'i po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos// sngags bzlas pa'i grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin// de ltar rlung ni sA rtser ni/ kha dog
198a2: rnam par bsas/ / gnas pa jog gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yis 'i sogs bya ba ni// rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpang 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa
198a3: yin la/ / de mengs zhum// thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni// khyod zhabs snyen bskur gyis 'tshal na// 'di la cung zad the tshom mchis// srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad// rdzas dang sngags dang de
198a4: bzhin dung / / thig le da bsgoms pa na// rnal 'byor pa tsag nyid dam ni// yang rwa rnal 'byor so sor bsgom// de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// yun rings chags chen
198a5: dbang med pas/ / sred pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni// rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song pa// mi gang mi srun pa yi lus// de rnams mA ra du grol don du// sngags kyi
198a6: thig ler gsungs pa yin/ / gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtshe las skyo ba gang // de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu// thob phyir ye shes rgya mtsho ni// rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin// yang dag
198a7: de'id spros pa ni/ / de ltar yang dag thig le gsum// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don pa// sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// ye shes gsum gnas
198a8: nyams dga' ba/ / me tog 'bras bu chu yis brgyar// skye bos dben pa'i ro yi rtser// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par
198b1: rtogs pa las sa/ / sum gtan la bab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa ba'i pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyi nyon// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad bdag
198b2: zag tu ba thams cad snang bar byed/ / mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod// de las ye shes bde ba che// 'od gsal ba de rnam dag pa// gang phyir ab d+hA tIr zhugs// yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dong /
198b3: pagrang ba mchod// kun rtog thams cad gcod par byed// ram rtag rlung gi ngal so ba// de ni stong pa nyid du bshad// gtso bo chen po mi skyong ba'o// 'jig rten khams ni de nyid do// der ni rtag tubashA/
198b4: gas ming can te// gzugs med drag po chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid// de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas// ye shes
198b5: yang byang chub sems/ / de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// bde ba can zhes de la bshad// bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan
198b6: nyid/ gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes brjod// tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na// bde ba kun gyi gzhi'i mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med// de las byung zhing skye ba'i 'od// de phyir 'od dpag med
198b7: shas/ / bde ba kun gyi ga'i yi mchog/ stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ ye shes rdo rje'i dbang phyug dang // de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// shes rab bdam la la r-I// zla mtshan
198b8: ma 'bab pa na/ / de yang stong par rnam par shes// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa rA// zla ba shukra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog
199a1: de gnyis sbyong ba mchog tu shes/ / stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa// zla ba nya dang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor ma yin zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong
199a2: pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le shul pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon// lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas// lus ni gang gis shes pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang smra
199a3: pa dang / / bde ba chen po yin rten// 'khor la yang ni gang bshad pa// rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa// de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs// thi ma dang longs spyod bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su mer// yang dag ngo bo'i go
199a4: 'phang rten/ / ye shes chen pa'i go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten// zhe sdang che dang gti mug che// phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis// khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa//
199a5: sa dang chu dang de bzhin // rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya 'di dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzangs dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang //
199a6: kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid// dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis// dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs ni blan
199a7: med ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes/ / lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbye ba'i rim pa dang // sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis/
199a8: lung gis rnam par ngas byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang // lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin brlabs go 'phang gnas// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing // rab tu 'bad de mchod pa bya// rdo shing
199b1: sa yi rang bzhin gyi/ phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya// bdag la byin brlab rim de nyid// gzhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa
199b2: sogs/ bya yi dngos po mi bgrangs// de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni// 'bad pas byin gyis brlab par 'dod// bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
199b3: rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa ya
199b4: rib pa'i grangs kyis ni/ / las dang rdo rje pad ma dang // 'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang // de kho na nyid nyams
199b5: myong mchog/ tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi// thams cad la ni khyab par gnas// sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma// las sgrol ma dang yid
199b6: btsugs ma/ / 'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang // de bzhin rlung rgya ma dang ni// snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma// rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma// grub ma sprul 'tsho sgra ma dang // gter 'dzin lha'i dbang phyug ma// zhes
199b7: pad ma dri med pa/ / rlung gi lugu rgyud byed pa// zang po dang ni kwa'i gang ga nyid lag ma dang mi 'phel ma// 'phar ma sngo sangs dus mtshan ma// rtse 'jom dang skal bzang 'phel// nar 'dzun khyi gdong ma// chags ma dga' ma rnam
199b8: sgeg ma/ / brtson 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma// dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang // pad ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang // sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang // sbyar dang chang gi dbang
200a1: phyug pa/ mi zad che dang las bskal bzang // me tog bzang mo bdug rmongs pa// steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan// mdzes ma dang ni ljang bskyod ma// rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang // ri dgas
200a2: mig dang chags dga' ma/ / sna tshogs rmongs dang rol ba po// dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo// ro byar dri meng 'gro brtun ma// ral gri rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang brgyad spel grangs/
200a3: 'al gsum phyag drug dri ma med// rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis// mtshon cha rnams kyi yang dag brgyad// de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas// g.yon pa 'gying bas ud pa la// g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang / de
200a4: bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni/ / g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ri 'gyur// sems dpa'i dkyil bkrung gi legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang khu spyar gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan can// zhal rnams gzhang lnga/
200a5: bsgom pa dang // bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed// rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// sngags kyis yang ni yang dag mchod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo
200a6: rtsa brgyad dbus/ / lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang // rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong // rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang // rdo rje rol mor shes pa bya// chos kyi 'khor
200a7: long dgu bdag nyid/ / zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang // sems dpa'i dkyil bkrung gis legs bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri pad ma dang //
200a8: dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med// sku mdog sngon po spyar gsum pa// zhal gyi mtshe ba cung zad gtsigs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel// sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la//
200b1: pad ma'i dbus na lha rnams gzugs// pad ma'i sgrol ma bad dkar mo// pad ma ku mu ta 'phel ma// pad ma'i spyan dang bdagatsug pud// pad ma'i phreng ba pad skyes ma// ba gdan pad ma'i dra ba ma/ de
200b2: bzhin pad ma' 'od dang de/ / pad ma'i spyan dang pad bzangs ma// pad ma'i nang bzhugs pa skyes ma// pad ma'i gos bang ma ma// de ltang 'di ni yang dgu bshad // zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa cad//
200b3: sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gis legs bzhugs// g.yas na pad ma 'khor lo dang // rdo rje ying ni bdebs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang // rin po che yis rnam par bsgrags// sprin gsum rnam pa
200b4: 'char ba dang / / pad ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer gzhugs shing // sems dpa'i dkyil mo bkrung gis bzhugs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na
200b5: meng/ / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// pad mad bsum bcu rtsa gnyis la// rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs// rab tu sang pa 'bad pa can// 'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma par zhugs ma/
200b6: tshogs las ma gti mug dga'// zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chags ma// rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje// sgra yi rdo rje dziH// reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// spur 'od ma dang thong dbyangs pa// sA yi snang ba ro dga'am//
200b7: pU yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma// khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab mo// gshin rje 'jom pa'i blo yin// bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang // pad ma'i ril ba gyen du rjes// gags rnams thams cad 'jom pa mo//
200b8: sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma// shing tu bstan ma stobs chen ma// rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug/ de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shang // slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang // phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba tsam
201a1: gapa'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhags/ / dri med padas dkar mo'i mdog/ zhi bzhal gsum kya gsus pa// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsdams pa ni// 'khod lo logs pa rdo rdo te// de banan
201a2: gsor pa phyag gas sa la/ / pad ma 'gas pa rin po che// 'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad/ pad ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'ong// skye bor rnam par snang mdzada'achang// rang gi mang dang lag gsum med/ 2
201a3: nga sngags ni go bas pa'am/ / de nyid mchog ni rab tu gas la// sku gsung thugs kyi sdos pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tug nyid log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga sa
201a4: longs spyod sten/ / mchod pa nyid kyi yang dag mnyes// rdo rje pad ma'i bad pa'i gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' go 'bang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// de yin sogs pa rnams// jub 'gyur 'ad
201a5: chom med/ / bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lung las yang dag kyis// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon na// 'bad pas dngos
201a6: grub kyis mnyes bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo bzhi rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ba
201a7: 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ / rtsa rnams kyis na rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub tham cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa'i yul rnams las// yid la byed pas ngor mi 'gro// sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa//
201a8: de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal// de yis de na rab tu sad// de rnams rtsal rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sad byas nas// lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las// de yis 'char ba rim par gsungs// nub pa yang na
201b1: bshad par bya/ / yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang na sad mi sad/ rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing // lha rnams yang dag sad par ni// de'i phyi di mi 'dra
201b2: snying ga dbus nas bde ba'i dngos/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'ong // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang // dan 'od zer bcu gnyis te// 'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjod ma// gsal ba 'bar ba 'de 'bar ma/
201b3: la sogs pa la brten nas// phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o// mun sa la 'od ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma gsal// phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o// drug po 'di dga'o// tu 'dod// lha mo rnam
201b4: gang 'char ba/ / ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dag nub pa ni// de yang mchog tu nub pa'o// 'char ba nub pa rnams chud pa// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad// sangs
201b5: rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o/ / 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas// bla ma rgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog/
201b6: pa las 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// dga' bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yas// rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang mchog/ de na rtsa
201b7: 'khor lo la/ sla yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yi// 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang // rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten// bzhi rang bzhi pas rtag tu khyab//
201b8: de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o// chu khams khong du chud pa can// pad ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis khab byos shing // bde ba chen po phan par byed// 'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis// cha bzhi pa yis yi ge ha// shin tu/
202a1: phra ba'i martag tu// khyab pa rten gyi tshul du gnas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'grob// 'dre ba'i bdag nyid spang byung ba'o// rog cig lI ko 'bar 'gro// rim gyis so sor nya
202a2: stong las/ / sna tshogs su yi sbyor ba las// rim gyis rgya ma ro chu bzhin du// sbyor ba bzhi'i 'khor lo'i dris// dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod// rnal 'byor pa rgyud sprod pa las// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'ang
202a3: po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon// rdo rje brtan pa'i lus kyis ri// rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni
202a4: tra/ de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rtsa ni rtag tu smad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel// rtag tu srad du byung ba rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag
202a5: 2 yang ni shes par bya/ / nyis 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu smad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ri// rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu
202a6: bzhir brjod/ / thami dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun bcu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo // thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor pa// gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las// gnas rnams kyi ni grangs
202a7: 'gyur/ / slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba 'ang ni// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang // thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis// rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni// nang du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa
202a8: byang dub zla ba 'bas/ g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus ni rlung rgyu ba yis ni// me sad byed par shes par bya// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming // de rnams ba'i sdod pa yis// re re'i rim gyis thun
202b1: brkyang brtad / / gsum po'i shu rtsa bzhir 'gro// thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir// ris gyis grangs ni bdun bcu gnyis// slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis// re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis// rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur bar//
202b2: stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis so// gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni// sbyor bas gcig pa nyid du 'gro// dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas// pra ba de ni shes par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni// thig len rnam par
202b3: spangs/ / bde ba kun gyi gzhi gas ba// srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang // dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad// rogacig go 'phang bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las shes// rnal 'byor
202b4: chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gor shes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid// rtsarnams sdom
202b5: pa 'chang ba ni/ / gang gis shes ra rtag tu ni// mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba// lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed// lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyong // lha yin la 'byor don nges pa// de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med// de gsum
202b6: gcig car bdag nyid sdos/ / 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing pra// lus kun la ni yang dag brten// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i
202b7: denyid sa byung ba/ / mchog rab mchog dang pra ba dang // rang byung ye shes mi zad pa// byang sems sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'arab// rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// rakun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni/
202b8: de yi dbus su rtsa gdu sa ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla ba nyi ma mi rgyu ba// 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab// ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad cig/ sa la brten par gnas pan// sdong bu ya la ga 'dab phrang bu// sogs
203a1: yis ni kun nas khyab/ / de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas// phung po khams la sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsupa sngos pa// 'dre
203a2: chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsupa// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang // dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni// gsum bye dam tshig mtshan nyid
203a3: dang / stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni// rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do// rgyu dang 'bras pa nye 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni// gsum bye khams ni bsdus pa'o// 'dod khams
203a4: gzugs khams gzugs med khams/ / 'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig/ ra mi bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi rang
203a5: bzhin gyis/ / gang tshe de la de sbyor ba// de ni bzas zin mtshan nyid do// gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na// de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung btsem na// de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin// rtsa yi gtso ba
203a6: nyid rnams ni/ / gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgud las// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi
203a7: gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni// dus kyi glags ni brtsal ba na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can
203a8: gyi yid/ / rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong // don ni shes par mi shes shing // rlung tsam gcig pas rmongs pa'o// kun gzhi nam shes bkug nas ni// bag chags nang du rnam par spyod// bag chags kyis ni rnam shes
203b1: bzung / / bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las// nang gi bag chags bsgos pa yis// de rnams zla mtshan dus su ni// mngal gyi rtsal 'jug pa ni// rdo rje khwa khrag zhu thig le// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang // kur gzhi las ni
203b2: rnam shes skye/ / ji ltar chang ngos myos pa bzhin// kun gzhi rnam shes bag rags las// rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye// nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nyid// skad cag gcig la yang dag 'gro// theg par 'pho ba'i dus
