226a3: pathams cad b+har bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phu tshogs kyang // stobs kyis tha san spyod par 'gyur/ ya/ nal 'byor dbang po gang gAr 'dod// de ni sgrib pa med paraH// mnyam par ma bzha gnal 'byor gyis/
226a4: rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ ba/ rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa// blo la gos dang ma gos pa// der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas/ dz+ra/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos dag kun las
226a5: rnam par rol/ / sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du// gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas/ yo/ rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur// rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma// gang yang rnal
226a6: 'byor de rang nyid/ TI/ dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na// bya dang bya min rnam spangs te/ pad ma la ni 'dam gyi bzhin// ngo bo nyid zhes gos mi 'gyur/ b+ha/ yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas/ sems can thams cad rigs
226a7: 'gyur zhing / / 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis stong/ ge// gtsu ba gang du pyod pa ma// de yi khyim ni nam mkhar nyid// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// de nyid du ni rtag tu ral// 'dal
226a8: snang ba dbye ba la/ / thud pa tshams nyin mo tshan mo yi/ 'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis// ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro// gisna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag/ 'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa// lam gsum gyi ni dbye 'a yis//
226b1: ye shes gsum las byung ba'o// dza/ s+ye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang // srid par bar mar gnas pa ste// ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa// sems kyi drung ni nas 'phrul lo// ha/ rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang // gar gyi nyams
226b2: dgur ldan pa dang / / sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// ra/ bdag byin brlabs chen mo gtogs pa// rin chen gzhan dag 'din med// me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin// rang bzhin 'odags pa
226b3: rnam pa'o/ / 'di skad la sogs dang po'i dag/ mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo// de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes// sgrub po 'de nyid shes pa ni// ye shes
226b4: mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis/ / gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so// rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas// dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa// de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes// sems can kun la phan myed pa'o// rnal
226b5: 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las e baM ma ya zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg
226b6: mchog/ nang du rgyu ba'i dbyung ba rnams// gang gis thim par gyur pa dang // rnam rtog bag chags sa bon ni// phung po lnga yi bud shing dang // rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mis// rtag tu sbyin sreg rmad byung bya// lte dbus
226b7: gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni/ / sgra tsam phyi rol gsar pad ma// de la reng rgyung rlung gis ni// yongs su bskul ba'i me yis ni// dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor// gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar// gang tshe mar gang gsang par
226b8: ma/ de la 'di ni sdod du brjod// tsa ni thugs gzar zhes byar gsungs// rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod// b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni bshad// dbang po lnga'i bsreg rdzas dang // phung po yam shing du ni gyur// sang ni byang chub sems sug//
227a1: gnas stong nas brtsams nyu le bar// dri zing byed pa gshegs su gsol// me thab zig le tsam dugasungs// thugs gzar nam yang mi 'bob// sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs/ gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal
227a2: mas rnams/ / tho ba'i rgyal po bcu la ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa gang // nga yang dgang thugs sa ni brjod// hUM gaH yang dag ldan sngags kyis// cho ga bzhin du bsreg blugs dbul//
227a3: ngayos lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na// lha yi dam tshig blan med// yid 'ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni// sbyin bseg 'dzi na mchog tu gsungs// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// rnal 'byor/
227a4: chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni// dngos grub kun byed de nyid
227a5: mchog ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin/ / rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // don yod grub dang 'od dpag med// rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do// khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang /
227a6: byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med// de bzhin don yod grub pa sha/ mi bapyod de bzhin rdo rje chu// dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad// de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog/ bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben// skra yi tsher ma
227a7: rnam par spangs/ / de la khang pa bya ba ni// khang pa gnyis brtseg sgo dang bcas// sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing // gzhan dag de yi steng du bya// gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes// grub pos de
227a8: nyid kun shes shing / / sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba// brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang // yul la thag dog rnam par spangs// grub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang // de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog/ chags dang chags bral rnam par
227b1: spangs/ / brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang // khre med dang bcas dpa' ba dang // mang du thos shing yod par lta// thog ma gnyi ga yi ni lus// 'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba// gnod mdzes gul byed 'bum phrag gcig
227b2: de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya/ / oM m+b+haH sa b+hap+na hUM u0f7f/ oM D+yan grid+ha hA d+hu phaT// e kr-id+ha pa ya shridz+nyA pa yash+tsadz+nyA phaT+Ta/ oM An ya ho b+ha ga zhan bid+ha rA d+han drA phaT/ de nas tha gcig daglegs pa// chub pos mi smra bzlas
227b3: par bya/ / kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso// de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong // des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni// dkon mchog la ni brten gyis la// sems can don ni mtshungs med byas// ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang // bu mo skal ldan
227b4: mig yangs ma/ / gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// brkam chags med cing chags bcas sems// bsgegs pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas// nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med cing mang du thos/
227b5: slab pos de srid 'dod par bya// ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur// de nas gdong ni pad ma gnyis// gnyis ka 'byung ba thangs nas ni// pad ma'i rjod der bzhag par bya// mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du// glang po rta khyi ba lang mi//
227b6: dpyid zla tha chungs gnyi ga shar// nye gnas gnas ni blangs nas ni// de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin// pad sdod de nyid la ni der// zhag bdun pa ra du bzhag par bya// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya//
227b7: 'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas// tsan dan bzang po b+hags nas ni// dzaHhU ba hoH'i sngags dkod ba'i// pad mo'i snod la bzhag par bya// ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar// mar dang ling kha dkar po dang // cha bskams bskol ba byas
227b8: nas ni/ / de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre// rgya shug tshig gu tshad tsam gyis// blo dang ldan pas ri la bya// grib ma la ni bskam byas nas// rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya// rdo rje ming srid spun dang ni// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig/
228a1: bza'// zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag/ mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am// yang na bcwa bzhi nas brtsams te// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// las kun la ni bla na med// de las
228a2: kyang ni dngos grub ste/ / phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang // dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs// de yis 'bad mi dgos par thob// rlung gi de nyid yang dag rlob// mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
228a3: dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga mchog/ gang gis mchod pa las byung ba// rgyal
228a4: sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog/ rnal 'byor tshe dang lhan cig tu// srub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing // de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug/ de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang // tshogs kyi 'khor
228a5: lo zhes ni brjod/ / kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bla ma la dang dam tshig gnas// gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// thabs zhes bya ba bgegs pang na// tshogs kyi 'khor
228a6: lo la ni 'jug/ gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs// mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas// lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon// lhag pa yongs su spangs
228a7: nas ni/ / thabs dang so sor shes rab dang // kun la gcig ni phan yon med// thog ma yid 'od nyams dga' bar// me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya// de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni/ legs par mnyam par gzhag nas mchod//
228a8: gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod// tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la// dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas// dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni// mnyam pas blta bas/
228b1: bsgoms nas ni// bstan chos nyams myong 'jig rten dang // 'gal ba de ni gzhugs mi bya// gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa// mtshan byed na ni dgug par bya// slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod// ji ltar gdan
228b2: stengs bzhugs gsol nas/ / gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan// rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang // mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs// dkyil 'khor ba ni gzhan rnams dang // de
228b3: bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa gzhan/ / dkyil 'khor ba bzhin shes bya bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam sma dang // rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang // mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang // rkang pa la sogs brkyong ba dang // yang
228b4: dang yang du ldang pa ni/ / de la dus kun du mi bya// phyag rgya brda' yi tshogs rnams kyis// bya zhing bya bar shes par bya// shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya// gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchod// dum bu gcig pa
228b5: mtshan nyid bzang / / de med dum bu gsum pa la// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// lha'i chang la sogs pa gang // legs par mnyam par bzhag ste dbul// tshogs rnams la yang so sor sdod// me tog tshogs kyis
228b6: yongs gang ba/ / thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin// sngon bzhin bzang ba la sogs ldan// gang gis dga' ba rnam nyams pa// de 'dra btud par mi bya'o// yang dang yang du phyag byas nas// phyag rgya gcings nas btung bar bya//
228b7: de nas bza' ba thams cad ni// sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyang // oM dang AHdang hU gis ni// kyang dang sang dang rtogs par bya// gur kum tsan dan dpa' bo dang // gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang // 'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga//
228b8: bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod// sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin// rang gi lce yis mang bar bya// dpa' bo dbus su dus kun du// kha la dpa' bo rnam par dgod// bla na med pa'i mchod par bya//
229a1: pad ma sde ba'idabras lan// dpa' ba rnams pa gang da du brjod// lag te byu' babs shes su// dpa' bdon gyis don rnams// da gyu thams ca rnam pa yos// ma shA mi 'dus nga/
229a2: de lnga'i 'bras pa cung zad gang // phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod// de yis rnam dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster// rnal 'byor mdang lhan cig 'dres// rab tu bshad kyis de nyid nyon// 'dul
229a3: ba'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig/ sems rtog med pa'i phyir 'ong na/ de la de tshe smra ba yang // sgrub pa pos ni mi bya ning // tshig tsam gyis na lan mi gdab// bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgyas bya// de la cung zad pa smra gang //
229a4: slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya// yang na bya ba thams cad ni// las kyi rdo rjes yang dag sbyar// gang phyir rang nyid rdo rje sems// las kyi rdo rje gzhan dga' min// sna tshogs gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ma// yang dang yang
229a5: du dgug par bya/ / de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med// slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod// gang yang skyon gyis spyod pas ni// de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes// bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya// rdo rje
229a6: bcang ba de yang bya/ / lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid// ma 'am sring mo bu mo 'am// gal te mchod par 'dod pa ni// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// tog pa med pas bstan par bya// rab mchog de yis dngos grub ni/
229a7: thob par 'di la the tshom med// lhag ma'i gtor ma blangs nas ni// dgon pa chen por song nas dor// trAM u tsiSh+Ti shwe tra pa// lA yA swA hA sngags brjod bya// gal te de ltar rab byed pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yis slar yang mthong //
229a8: de ltad de ni yongs shes nas// rnal 'byor pa yis mtshan nyid mchog/ gang gis gdod ni 'bang ba'i 'od// zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang // smin ma reng ba de shes bya// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // de las pa
229b1: ma'i phyag rgya bstan/ / rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no// mchu re mig slas ring ba dang // kha dog ser me yid 'phrog ma// 'di yi dpral bar ri mo gsum// ji srid skra mtshams bar du gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi mi/
229b2: gangata mngag la ni rab tu can// 'dri 'dra'i nyan pa ma mthong nas// mdung go phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bsam pa dang // de ni gang byed rab tu ston// g.yon pa yongs su bskor nas ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni bstan par
229b3: sna tshogs pa'i gosal dga'/ / rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung // kha dog gdag cing gis kyang gnag/ sgra ni 'khyil cing dar gyis bcing ga/ dbral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yi/ de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong na ni// rtag tu de
229b4: sems g.yo ba/ / ma me zhes ni rab tu grags// dril ba'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya stan// mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes// mtshan mo 'das nas 'gro ba mchog/ thang du lho srom kha dog dkar//
229b5: byed pa thos zhing shing da mdzes// sa spyod mar ni shes par bya// drang gis phyag d+ha lan yin na// rnam par sdang mdzad rigs las zung // mig yangs rdzam skrag pa dang / yan lag kun la bsdus khyab// sdeb sangs migani nga
229b6: rang / ya dag zan dbang ba ring // ngom mkha' 'gram dgrags// den ying grub pa'i rags las byung // de 'dra ba nir ba mthang na// ya na rtsag phyag kyangadang // g.yen pa'i byag rgyal mayin no// de ltar 'ab pas shes na
229b7: kye+e ya / ra gyur pa pa nga yang rdzurje rnam ga gas 'ang ba da pa sh+tsa
229b8: sa pa'i le sa drug 'drang ga sa 'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bgad kyis can// gsang ba ga na bshad pa na// rdo dza gnas sags gnas rnams sa// rags kun pas byas la 'byangags nam 'a
230a1: dpa tshig de/ / 'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang // de lta ba yi bsang ba ni// bdag gis dang ba yis ni nyor// saM po dang ka chang 'thung ba// bri ri sha ru rnam par brjod// ni la nA pa traM thod pa// gu lang mi yi thod pas
230a2: brgyar/ kAn da du 'dod yang dag spyod// tsha du ro drug bza' ba 'o// ya sa DI dbang gnyis sbyor ba// A lo ka yod pa'i ming // sha rim ga gam skal yod shes// tsakra kra naM skal med brjod// t+ya shA ra ni khu tshur shes// pe ka ma tr-in
230a3: tra badze / 'dra pa bra ga bshang // gin ba shad par yongs su grangs// ldan pashad par yongs su grags// bAn pa chen dran bshad// ni dang ngur ra brjod// byas nani du bshad// bak+Sha yan lag rab tu ba shad// shu paM bzang po zhes ni bdod / na tshig pa'i sa grags
230a4: man lhags pa ni brjod/ / g+h+r-i ta lan du bshad pa dang // bya mgan po rol dpung// ka ma ya na gyis shig brjod// na gar ri bdag las brjod// pa ta ka ni nyes zhes brjod// a dza ya ni me zhes brjod// sha kham za ba'is
230a5: ni brjod/ / rag pa mdor ni cho ge brjod// sha ta ka mi bza' bar brjod// ce 'dra ba na sngags zhes brjod// sha ra khye 'tsheng sha zhes brjod// rab ka ni tha mar bshad// ka ya 'dir ni sbal rigs brjod// ra gaM rje rigs
230a6: zhe bar bshad/ / ber rgya zangs rigs brjod// tsa ba rigs ngan zhes ri brjod// shar swe sha can du brjod// thab tsakra kor lpags mkhar/ khang ga sar sngags ba shad// sa mun tra ni rdul por brjod// sa yodi su /
230a7: u0f7f// ra tag shes rab shad// bis+yA pa ga res brjod par bya// ba la shAni mazhes brjod// dzin par shes pa ni bgang // nag tu rkyen bsreg tu ni bshad// maH ya ni 'dab chags brjod// ra ldan me tog brjod// dz+ra thos ga/
230a8: ral dron dra du bshad// sha kun ga par med brjo// ka shi ka naM gos su bshad// ke sa ra ni gdong du brjod// bai tra dpral bzhes su bshad// ma la smin mar yang dag grags// ko ba la ya~M ni mig tu shes// adar na so ru brjod// bal la bo ni
230b1: macu dra shes/ / bshe mgrin pa rwa ni grags// dI so 'phrag pa ru ni bshad// a 'gu ro ni dpung par brjod// so so ru ni lag par bshad// shri par le ni nA lar brjod// dza ti pa laM rkang par brjod// mda' lan ri lte bar brjod//
230b2: pad ma 'dza' lam gsang ba'i gnas// ka ta pa ka brla gnyis so// be sa rje da du ni bshad// chag na ni rkang par brjod// ba ra ra a ka ke sa ra// sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshad// pad ma gar ni ga ni srang // sha kra ku su la ma la stan/
230b3: shag tu bu zhes bya bar brjod// na la ne nA lam ston med// go bag bla lam thams cad brjod// sa ga raM ni rgas par bshad// a la ro ni zhim por brjod// ak+Sho re rim mi zhim bshad// mI ga mi smra bar ni bshad// ba gol mu
230b4: da gu len/ / mi tra ga ra zhes bya bar brjod// sha ba te tshul 'chos su ni bshad// s+phar sha zhags par rab tu grags// rang sa sgeg mo'i ri 'bebs ma// ru bai ri'i rtse mo'o// ta ne ha ni bsad par bshad// bA rA ba ta 'chi bar brjod// ta ma lA ko
230b5: sem yul/ / pa la grong khyer du ni brjod// pra na grong du bshad pa yin// th+ya n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad// ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad// na ya na ni rnam shes brjod// a bi na ba rgod par bshad// ru ti ra ni 'chad par brjod//
230b6: ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad// ka na nya mtshan mor rab tu grags// des nyi ma byed du bshad// dpe mtshan gyi cha ru grags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste
230b7: drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// su ni mgo bor gnas pa ste// sum bcu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bab// de ni so sor rab phye bas// sku yi 'khor lo ru nyes
230b8: bya/ / yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yis// gsung la gnas par rab tu shes// chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis// thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes// sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni// sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ rdo rje slob dpon
231a1: sku la ni/ / rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas// dang po sku yi rdo rje ni// gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs// des rjes nam mkha' rdo rje ni// tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs// bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni// 'du
231a2: shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ / las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni// 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs// bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni// rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs// yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la// bcom ldan 'das
231a3: yum can bzhugs so/ / khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni// bcom ldan 'das yum ma mA bzhugs// dro ba la sogs me khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs// mi skyod la sogs drung khams la// bcom
231a4: ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/ / de mig dbang po gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pas snying po// de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la// bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o// de yi sna bug gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa nam
231a5: mkha'i mdzod/ / de yi lce yi dbang la bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang // de yi yid kyi dbang po la// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni// lus zhes
231a6: bya bar brtags pa la/ / sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so// lus kyi tshig ni thams cad la// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang // lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la// de bzhin
231a7: gshegs pa byams pa'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed// lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub// kha yi pad mar bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin
231a8: gsheg pa ta mgrin no/ / gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// dpung ba g.yon par bzhugs pa ni//
231b1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal// pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig pa sngo// pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che// rang gi mgo stengs bzhugs
231b2: pa ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo gyur// rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te// lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs// sku yi dkyil 'khor
231b3: zhes brjod pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di// lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku// skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob// khyod
231b4: kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa/ / de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs// mthong na don ni yod pa kye// phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che// de bas sems can thams cad kyi// lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyi/
231b5: rab tu 'bad de bla ma bster// de nas mthong ba don yod bcas// byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che// dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags// gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
231b6: bzhugs/ legs so bya ba byin nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad gsungs// a A i I u A dang // ri rI li lI/ e ai dang // e au aM aHdbyangs zhes bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa sde tshan// ya ra la wa sha Shas// ha dang
231b7: gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes/ / ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan// 'dod chags la sogs bag chags kyang // grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa// dpal mchog las ni shes par bya// de ltar
231b8: 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ / rdo rje gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sugs
232a1: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sangs rgyas ngadam chos dge 'dun dang // bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang // rdo rje 'chang dang slob
232a2: pa yi/ / mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni// dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// tshes ni dag tu yang dag gsungs// sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas// sangs rgyas yi ge hUM du bshad/
232a3: gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod// dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM// kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do// sangs rgyas a bad+hU tIr 'gyur// chos kyang la la nA ru brjod// dge 'dun ra sa rA ru brjod// 'di na gsum po'i mtshan nyid
232a4: do/ / gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni// 'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te// de ltar khams gsus mtshan nyid mchog/ snying por gyur pa rang srog las// khams gsum
232a5: na ni gzhan med de/ / b+hU ma rlung gi khams gsum pa// mi lam rmi lam bzhin du mthong // khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ gcig pur myur bar mthong bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur
232a6: sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ / dam pa'i chos ni chos kyi sku// dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur// de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can// snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// chos ni snang ba thob pa'o// dge 'dun snang ba
232a7: mchod par 'gyur/ / de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid// zhi ba la sogs las la byed// sngags dang rnal 'byor chan mapa shes// cho gnyi shu bya ba bslab// de ni bramar mngon par brjod// dral khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong /
232a8: bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan// nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen// shes rab ldan zhing bzo la mkhas// bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs// dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod// nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dag la
232b1: phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa/ / de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis// slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab// de ni sten par yongs su gsungs// de skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtog pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor tshogs// dam pa'i don/
232b2: gyi bya ba dang // slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan yang slob du 'jug/ de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas// dkyil 'khor las sogs bya ba shes// slob
232b3: sarjes sdad rus pa dang / / gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // shes rab ji snyed yang dag ldan// rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs// zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog/ tshar gcod pan 'dogs
232b4: pa la mkhas/ / de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad// dad cing bla ma la yang gus// rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas// gnyis med sgra yang med pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// lung ni mang du thos pa dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba
232b5: spangs/ / sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos// kun tu brtson dang yang dag ldan// de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan// dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// gang la de nyid nges shes bya// gong ra
232b6: med pa'i spyod rab mchog/ sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa sogs// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang // sangs rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang // chos dang longs spyod
232b7: sprul pa dang / / sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang // bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni// dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang // de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//
232b8: dang po sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/ 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bde gnyis dbus 'byung gnyis la sogs/
233a1: gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung du brjod// yon tan ji lta bu yi chung// thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni// rten dang sdod ces bya bar gsungs// mtshan nams kun gyis brgyan pa dang /
233a2: ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni// sa yi snod du bzhag mi bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud// snod min dag la sbyin mi bya// slob ma skad cig de la 'chi// 'di dang pha rol du ni phung // snod min man ngag rab bshad na// slob dpon
233a3: sa grub nyams par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug bcu lnga pa'o//
233a4: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni// zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang // sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi// lham dang gdugs dang gtsug gtor dang // so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang // snabs kyi gong bu mchil
233a5: ma sogs/ / 'dor zhing rkang pa pyod pa dang // gzhan du lha dang spyi btol smra// nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyan la sogs pa lta ba dang // bag med par ni smra ba dang / bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang / de la sogs pa
233a6: skyon gyi tshogs/ / bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs// 'jigs pas bal mo sbyar nas ni// byi bo phyag rgya bka' lung nod// rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas// ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong sdud pas// slob mas tha pa'i mdun
233a7: gnas bya/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// tha ma'i mdun na slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod zhes bya// dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa// de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o// de yi ni sogs bya ba ni// bla mas bstan
233a8: par bya ba'i rigs/ / de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya// thun mongs cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis// zla ba yar gyi do la bya// dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las// zla ba mar gyi ro la brtsam// byang du kha bltas
233b1: zhi ba la/ de bzhin rgyas pa shar du pa lnga// drag po'i las la lho phyogs su// dbang gi la sa la nub tu blta// gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs// sdang bar bya la bden bral du// gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs// rengs
233b2: pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs/ / shi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste// rgyas po la ni ser po bya// dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar/ kha dog nag po bsod pa la'o// byams pa'i sems kyi zhi ba la// dga' ba'i sems kyis
233b3: rgyas pa la/ / gas pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la/ khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o// zhi la phal cher po rangs bya// de bzhin rgyas pa snga dro bya// dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las// nyi ma gung dang mtshan byed
233b4: la'o/ / de ltar rig par yang dag bshad// sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis// zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad// blo ldan cho ga bzhin du bsgrub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngod
233b5: pa rdzogs pa las slob pa'i byed pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sags pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'aphye drug bcun drug pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyo// khro bo bzlas pa'i ba na cid /
233b6: gang gi san la 'thod dngos ba bcad// theb 'alngar 'dul po tsam med// tshe bo sems kyis bzlas pa na// zla ba'i brnas pa'i sa na brjo/ nga na tho bo'i rgyal po rnams// thugs pa rnam pa sbyir ba mas/
233b7: ##/ tha// 'as pa skyed pa pa ga
233b8: khab tha mtshan dang / / bsreg nas bri bar bya ba ni// de na bgrub bya'i rnam pa dang // gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang // g.yon brgyang pa yis mnan nas ni// zhag bdun par du dus gsum du// gshin rjeg shod
234a1: sngags 'dis ni/ / dngos grub rgyar ni bzlas par bya// na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+ra tA// oM kha kha Sha hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ta da ma ka/ a si mu Sha la ba ra shu bA sha ham+ba/ kha Da ga bA pa ta ra tsa ni u0f7f
234a2: tu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ kaN Na raN/ A gats+tsha a/ gan+d+he/ sarba draShA bA da a pra ba ra// ba hA big+na g+ha ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A nan/ sarba thA ta b+ha ya ka ra/ aT Ta aT Ta ha sa rA nga na/ b+ha grA tsarbaN+Da ri ba sa ra/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba ka dz+wa ra/ dzin
234a3: d+ha rinad+ha/ sarba mAn tran bin d+ha bin d+ha/ ba ra mu dran/ A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sarba D+h+we trar/ mtha ma tha/ nIr ma tha rA ra ma tha/ sarba duSh+TAn/ pra be sha yeng pra be sha ya/ maN Da la pan+d+ha/ bi ba shrata/ dzA ba ta an da kar/
234a4: ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na/ da ta da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ mA bi lem bA mA bi la ma ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra// hUM hUM/ ta dza ya/ b+he ga na/ phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ kA ra kA ra/ sarba a nAn pa ri pu ra ya/ hi tsi b+ha ga bA ra/ ker dza ra yAs/
234a5: na maHsarba a na da k+Sha ta ya hUM phaT swA hA// thog mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di// dbang du bya dang dgu go po'i mchog/ bskrad pa rab tu bshad par bya// khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang // tshi lan tshwa yungs mar dang // bdug dang d+ha du rA khA
234a6: thigs 'jug khrag dang bsres nas su/ dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni// zla ba byed pa la bu mchog/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// log gnyis rdo rje mtshan par bya/ de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming bris la// g.yon brkyang par ni gnas
234a7: nas ni/ / sngags 'di yongs su bzla bar bya// sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas/ mtshan byed kyi ni dus su ni// kun nas zhag bdun sgrub par bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa man ta kA ya bAg
234a8: badzaH/ rnam badz+ra gro tra la/ mahA ma ga Ta ti la/ a sa mus na// bar shub shaha ta sa/ a a mr-i ta kun Na la~M/ kha kha 'a dri khA ti Na9/ 1d+ha // na tan/ dang nga/ gardza gas/ thob srog pa Ta ya
234b1: Ta ya/ sarba bi g+ha na bi nA ya kan/ ma ha gan ba ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra ya hUM phaT swA hA// sngags 'das gdug pa'i sems can ni// bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yid// zhi bi'i las ni bshang bya ba// gzhan gyis mi
234b2: thub ming dang ni/ / khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni// me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis lanyi ma gnyis// de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis// thabs la de la zhugs
234b3: nas ni/ / bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po bsreg par bsam par bya// me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i// 'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya// namaHsa man ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+ra tA/ oM a pa rA dzi
234b4: ring hU~M phaT/ che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig/ d+hI dug sel ba'i sngags kyi sa ni// bzhi pa shad kyis de nyon cig/ khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni// yang dag mi mtshungs pa'i mchog/ bsgrub byase mas/
234b5: dpa' sum rtseg bsgom// snying khar zla gnas ye shes sems// de yi 'od zer gyi sa rab gang // bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam// rab tu 'bar ba de'i dug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni// zla ba ha gis rnam par
234b6: brgyan/ / kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// hUM d+hiHdzi kAM sI d+ha dgod// las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed// bsgrub byi'i mgo bos nas brtsams te// rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du skom// chu rgyun rgyun mi
234b7: 'chang ba ni/ drag na 'og btang rim la yis// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste// rta 'grin du ni mngon par brjod// namangs man ta kA ya bAg tsit+taM badz+ra tra// oM hU~M hA trA/ ta ru la bi ru le/ sarba bi 'ag+hA ta ka ta ka dza li ta bI su lo/
234b8: ga/ at+maThA hA sa na da sa hI ta/ ka sa ri sa ho ba taM a da de ba badz+ra khu g+ha ta na/ tsa ta ba sud+ha ta la ni shA sa mu ru ta/ od k+Shi bi ta d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ bi Sha na a Ta hA sa a ba ra ma ta wa la ba ri kra ma Ar+ya ga b+hi ta/
235a1: bud d+ha bud d+ha/ ha ya gri ba kha kha/ tshin d+ha chen d+ha/ a be sha ya sarba gra he Sha a pra titi to b+ha ba/ badz+ra da She ki tsi rA yA si i da duHgra ho ShaT sarba pa/ dun du na/ sa tha mA thA/ mArad+ha mAr d+ha/ bud d+had+ha rmad d+ha/ bud d+ha d+ham
235a2: saM g+he a ru dz+nyA na ka ra ma ku ru swA hA/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hUM zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te// lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
235a3: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/
235a4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni// sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// mig dang rnga
235a5: ba yid dang lus/ / rtsa'i 'khor lo byin gyis brlab// mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed// bzhi pa yi ni dbang bskur bas// blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur// snang ba mtshan mo'i che ru 'gyur/
235a6: nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o// mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o// de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid// mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min// kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed// de ni skad cig mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid skad
235a7: cig mar ni brjod/ / tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am// dbus mi 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am// mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba 'am// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/
235a8: gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'od med cing // zad med 'phel med dngos dang dngos med min// ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams
235b1: dang bral/ / bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub//
235b2: mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni// 'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byung sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du byed pa ni// rgas pa med par the tshom
235b3: med/ / nA ho rim bzhin shes pa ni// 'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa'i bdud rtsi lnga// 'di ni bcud kyi len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni// rdo rje phyag rgya
235b4: dngos grub che/ / zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// /
235b5: rtogs pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba// zung du 'jug ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral// gang du yang dag 'dres 'gyur ba// de ni zung du
235b6: 'jug par bshad/ / rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin brlabs rim pas kyang // dngos
235b7: grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur/ / snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes/ mngon par byang chub ris pa thob// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom
235b8: med/ / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'di la the tshom med// lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yang dag brtan/
236a1: zur bzhi pa yi mdun rgyab dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbebs so// steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis na// rtababs bzhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba
236a2: chu bar yang dag bshad/ / rgyas par gyur pa dra ba phyed// cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang // bum pa lto bar yang dag shes// rje dang bra dpung lag dang ni// ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad// mig gi rnam shes me long sogs//
236a3: sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang // sna yin pa shes me tog phreng // rin chen pa gu lce rnams shes// lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang // yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang // nab kun nas
236a4: rdo rje rnams/ / sna ni ba dan du ni bshad// lce ni dril bu ru ni gsungs// rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tshogs shes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pad mar gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten// ye shes
236a5: lnga ni rnam dag pa/ / reg bya'i sngar ni yang dag brjod// phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga// rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du bsgom// dang po sbyor bar shes par bya// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// rigs kyi
236a6: dbye ba rang ngo bo/ / de nyid phyir rol gnas par brjod// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na// gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi nam shes
236a7: sa snying po/ / phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// byams partsa rgyas dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni// me long ye shes su ni bshad// rnam par sdud mdzad rnam dag nyid/
236a8: bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu li khams dang ni// phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad// rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// de yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur// sna yi
236b1: ye shes mkha' snying go khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes/ / mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang // dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes// snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po me khams dang // phyi rol dri yi ngo
236b2: dang / lce'i rnam shes 'jig rten mgon// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// don so sor rtog ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // dge dang mi dga' las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni//
236b3: 'du shes phung po rlung gi khams// phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam sel// kun bzang tshig gis mtshams dbus bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya ba nan tan grub ye shes// don yod
236b4: grub pa'i rigs las byung / / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shin
236b5: dran bdag chos kyi dbyings/ / mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung // mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya// sgra rus
236b6: phyis mchil ma snying / / so ni rnam snang bdag nyid do// spu dang gnag dang nye ba'i snying // sen mo chu yi khams su shes// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi// rigs kyi rten du shes par bya// so dang lpags pa sha
236b7: dang snying / / me yi khams zhes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyas pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying // rlung ni don yod grub pa'o// dri ma rgyas pa mkhris pa snying // de ni
236b8: nam mkha'i khams su grags/ / mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// re re la'ang so sor ni// rnam pa lnga ni spro bar shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga// nang gi bdag nyid rdzas phye
237a1: pa/ sham rgyus pa sha khams tshad// glad pa dang ni glad rgyas dang // rus pa rkang dang snyam dang // mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang // glo ba ma cher pa gcin dang ni// bshang ba pho ba long ka dang // zhag dang chu ser gan/
237a2: dang ni/ khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // ngar snabs sgra dang kha bu dang // sen mo spu dang lpags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs// mtshogs pa dpung pa zhes ni brjod// de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal
237a3: yas khang ni rnam dag pas/ / de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// bu rir ni mgo bor shes// spyi gtsug dza lan d+ha ra dang // rna ba g.yas par u rgyan dang // spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbu ta// gong ba rin
237a4: ba g.yon/ ra mi shwa ri srin ma'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang // ma la wa ni dpung pa'i rtse// ma ru pa mtshan khung gnyis// ku lu nu ma gnyis su grags// ko sa la ni lte bar shes// tri sa ku ni snga'i rtse// kha yi par
237a5: ma ka li ka/ mgrin pa lam pa kar ni brjod// snying ni kan cir shes par bya// hi sa la ya mdoms su shes// mtshan ma gri ha de ba dang // pre ta bu ri bshad pa'i lam// brla gnyis su war+ha dI ba// suraShA ni byin pa gnyis
237a6: rkang pa'i bo la ni sin d+ha'i yul/ / sor mo rnams la na ga ra// mtheb mo gnyis ni ma rung shes// ku ru ta ni rkang pa'i mthil// de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// de nyid dang ldan shes par bya// thim dang
237a7: longs spyod bdag po nyid/ / 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas// mi bskyod
237a8: bye brag rigs las skyes/ / mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni// rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes// stong du rgyu ba lkog mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod
237b1: grub pa'i rang bzhan no/ / khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas// rnam thang mdzad kyis byin gyi brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun la sin// srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang // dus kun du ni rmya ba ni// srog ces bya ba yin par bshad/
237b2: srog dang rlung dang phyis dang // de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs// log 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang ldog pa dang // kun tu 'thung dang 'dzag pa dang // gang shig rtag tu ma nyam gnas
237b3: pa mnam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod/ / gyen du 'gro zhing bsdud pa dang // bza' dang med pa la sogs pa// gas nas lhan cig 'byor bdag/ gyen rgya las su shes par bya// khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// nga bzhin 'gro dang ljon
237b4: pasogs/ / tshigs kun tu ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed zhes ni bya bar bshad// rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod// snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed//
237b5: gzhad gzhan la 'tsho ba yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhan kyis// gcig ni gcig la tham par 'gro// ji ltar zla bgazas pazung ba// rlung rnams rim kyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong // rang sa
237b6: bdag nyid la thim par/ / btang gzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar mes bsregs dngos med dang // rgyu med par ni tham par 'gro// slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba// las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes
237b7: dang rma ya 'jig rten gsum du gnas/ / de las las dang do las skyes// de las chags sogs bag chags dang // de las slar yang 'chi dang ste// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sdor bzhi rdo rje bzlas la sogs// rim
237b8: gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur/ / de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ram yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas yang 'ang phyag byas te// mchis bcas mig gis
238a1: bcom ldan la/ / lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// e ma'o kun 'gro kun dbang phyug/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes// e ma'o dam tshig de nyid gsum//
238a2: mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phung po rnams dang khams
238a3: rnams dang / skye mched rnams la mi rten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa med cing gos pa med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
238a4: thugs mnga' ba/ / dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas
238a5: ni/ / 'jig rten gsum nas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur// sa yi cha ni gang na 'di// rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i//
238a6: rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud// dus kun du ni spyod 'gyur zhing // rgyud du de nyid rang nyid kyi// khro bo bcu yis de las ni// rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la// bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor der// rang rang phreng
238a7: sngags kyis ni/ / de rnams la ni gtor ma 'bul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun du// nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen
238a8: po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rdzogs pa las rgyud
238b1: thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / / thugs dam sa'i snying po tholang snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang // sgra skar
238b2: kyi lotsA ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / / rgya gar skad du/ san d+hi bya kar/ nA sa tan tra/ bor skad du/ dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes
238b3: bya ba'i rgyud/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos// shin tu gsal ba'i dus gcig na// gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig mchog
238b4: ni rdo rje gsum/ / de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// yon tan bun tshogs bsam mi khyab// yod med gnyi ga las 'das pa// gnas med pa la gnas shes bya// nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir//
238b5: kun mkhyen ye shes rnams bsgom pa// 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yi// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs// skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor
238b6: ba dang ni sred pa dang / / nyer len srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin// nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga'o snyam nga rgyal mngon nga rgyal// gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal// cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas// /
238b7: 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi lang pa grangs// brjod kyis ma lang nyid du gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran
238b8: grangs mnyam pa/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kyang // nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad//
239a1: su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas// de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang // 'dod dang rigs byed de bzhin zung // tshangs lha de bzhin
239a2: zla ba ste/ / phung po las sogs grangs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang // skya bseng skye ma byed thub pa dang // sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pa nyid// de tshe phyung ba gsol
239a3: ba yi/ / gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid// thub chen byang chub sems tshul du// mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i// phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam
239a4: pa bzhi/ / gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa// bsrung ba'i bslab gzhi rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste// drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi// ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad// gas
239a5: ba'i dbang du gtso bas mdzad/ / phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan// dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur bye yang dag rtog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig ming du byung ba ni// phyag
239a6: rgya gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor/ / bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig pa spyod grub pa// mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang // phreng sngags bla/
239a7: ma ston par mdzad// phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur pa// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o// sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rdul mtshon ldan pa'o// slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag/ chags bral sna
239a8: tshogs nyid gyur pa/ / sna tshogs tshig gis don gyi brda'// sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// so sor bsdud pa rab tu bstan// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// yang dag mthong nas yongasu/
239b1: bsgoms// yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag/ rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya// de nas ma skyes sbyor ba las// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i// ting 'dzin de 'og ston
239b2: par mdzad/ / 'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso ba la/
239b3: rang gi sprul zhugs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de bzhin gshegs bdag
239b4: mnyes bya'i phyir/ / de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur pa// srog dang gye na chu thur sel dang // mnyam nas khyab byed ces bya dang // klu dang ru sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad//
239b5: bud med gzugs su slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du// de sku'i sku las byung bar gyur// de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las// rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom// yan lag kun las des grol zhing // shin du
239b6: phra ba nyid du gyur/ / dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rong nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba
239b7: 'debs/ / bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams// dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes/
239b8: gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig rten pa dang rtsed med cing // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin du 'das de bzhin// gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos// zhi gnas shin du sngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas
240a1: thos na yang / / de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed// de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po rnam snang chen po la// de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bla med byang chub
240a2: ni/ / ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba// rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol// lan gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni// mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs// rdo rje can gyis
240a3: de shes nas/ / de nas slar yang zhus par gyur// gang 'di zhi gnas las sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa// de ni 'di ltar sngags pas sngags// 'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs// bya ba dag bya'i
240a4: rnal 'byor dang / / rnal 'byor shig pa ba de nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa// de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags
240a5: tshul ni ma tog gyur 'di/ / gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che// gsang sngags kun don sngags ster ba'o// der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing // sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu'i bdag
240a6: lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni/ / gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar// rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de ma shes
240a7: pas/ / sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/ de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed/
240a8: bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar// yi ge a ni steng du gnas// phyi ma zhes bya gnas bya la// sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang // a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs
240b1: kyi rnam pa de/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid// bdag gi zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/ zogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so// ston pa po dang
240b2: bstan dang gnas/ / phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med// kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig pa// sngags pa rnams kyi thos de 'gyur// shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams
240b3: kyis dus gcig na/ / skad cig la rdzogs byang chub theb// kun mkhyen kun rigs thugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtag nas
240b4: mkha' ji bzhin te/ / gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong
240b5: bas/ / kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku'i rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'gyur// mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur// nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang /
240b6: bsam mi khyab par spro bdag nyid// de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag byung // sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas// bud med
240b7: chos gcig pu yi gzugs/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa// sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de ni bud med ces bshad de// de bas chos de b+ha ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad// dam tshig chen po gcig tu
240b8: gyur/ / dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru// 'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang // gzugs
241a1: da / gdang ldan la // da pa ma / rnamamams da / nas 'a gas /
241a2: sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi// rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs// mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang
241a3: gdon mi za/ / 'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying pa de bzhin gshegs// dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khebs pa/
241a4: de rnams der ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur// gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang // sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang //
241a5: don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags// zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung // ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni// 'dod chags chen po tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen
241a6: po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi chags/ de na nyid kyi yul bcug/ den de bzhin gshegs ba kun// de ni rnam par snang mdzad che// 'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i
241a7: phyir/ / nyid su bud med nyid du mdzad// de nas mgon po bsam yas las// bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur// de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang // mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang // gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni//
241a8: sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni// de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs/ reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin
241b1: gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs/ / de nas tshul gsum den gcig dang // mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang len gdul don// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byod//
241b2: rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// de ni mi spyod yang dag zi// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor gzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma med par byin brlabs pa// kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i
241b3: gzugs/ / sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab// 'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrugs// gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs
241b4: kun bdag po 'di/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su spangs// rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par 'gyur// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang // don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i/
241b5: thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur// de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems// dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni// mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs// shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi
241b6: gcig pa/ / da ni grib ma ltar thugs chud// rdo rje'i rang bzhin sar mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad// ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pacun/
241b7: byang chub sems kyis sad par byed// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/ de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni// sngags kyis
241b8: byin brlabs bla na med/ / der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis// thugs rje bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni rab bskor la// lan gsum
242a1: ched du brjod pa mdzad/ / bsapa mi khyab cing gnas med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang/ rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin// de nas gsang tshul thos pa
242a2: dang / / de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhes// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams// rten 'brel las skyes yin par
242a3: ni/ / khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khungs// sman pa'i ches rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag ji ltar bder gshegs dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags// byang chub sems dpa'
242a4: sems chen de/ / lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis// 'di dag 'tshal par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// 'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas
242a5: ni/ / gang zhig khyod kyis 'dris pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// smras don ji lta ji lta bar// de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya// ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni// 'jig rten
242a6: rgyang phen mchog gzhol 'gyur/ / log par lta ba la gnas te// ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed// la la glu dang gar la dga'// rgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol// dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin 'khrig
242a7: ba la dgar 'gyur/ / rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang // de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol// la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhe na// shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur// nyi dang sha dang de bzhin chang // bshang gci khu ba
242a8: khrag rnams ni/ / skyes bu glen pa za byed cing // med par smra ba chos su sgrogs// ma dang sring mo la sogs pa// bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang // pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang // de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams
242b1: gsod/ / brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang // khyad par du yang rku ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing // smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam tshes spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs
242b2: sdig pa byas nas kyang / / sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur// gzer nad drug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur// 'dor bar byed pa rmongs
242b3: pa de/ / mi bzad bsdigs pa byas pa dang // log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang zhig yang dag thob pa
242b4: nyid/ / 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis// tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas// don gapal yang dag rnyed pa dang // de yang nga rgyal rtag tu ltung // de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang //
242b5: shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring // rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces// mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'// sgra dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan// mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba// phan tshun dag ni
242b6: sun yang 'byin/ / gsang sngags smra ba la rten nas// gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis// gal te dngos grub phra thob na// des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas// mkhas pa snyam du shes par
242b7: 'gyur/ / tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang // khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur// rang las 'bras las byung ba yi// phan pa la ni gnod pa byed// de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon
242b8: sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi/ / slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bskur med// skad cig gcig gis snang byed cing // de la skad cig gis rjes chags// khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyis// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed// de rnams/
243a1: phan tshun rnams 'tshe bar// mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par// dam tshig las sogs byed par 'gyur// gsang bsrung bar mi byed par// thams cad du ni ston par byed//
243a2: 'jig ten la'i srang byas nas// gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed// bdag nyid rtsab med par ni// dab tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur// sgra bcas spyod ldan gyis bskul ba// rang la rang gi grags rnyed med//
243a3: denyid ye shes 'brang ba yi// ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// mngon stong rab tu byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rab sbyor dmar pa yi// sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyi rol
243a4: bstar bcos la rtag dga'/ / de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas// lcags klu med pa bzhin du spyod// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba slab par 'gyur// gang du da/
243a5: bathob 'gyur bar// dam pa'i' chos ni ston par byed// de rnams yang dag sdad byed pa'o// gsang ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin// dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgug par bya// rang gi
243a6: rjes rig mi shes na/ / de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur// de nas rjes su gzung don du// tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su// de bzhin gshegs kun
243a7: bdag po la/ / rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprir// yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'thus pa/ d+ha
243a8: pa gnyis med nal 'byor pa'i/ / nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di// de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa//
243b1: gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs ni lags// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // the tshom skye bar byed yin na// byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes// de bzhin
243b2: gshegs de rnams la gsungs/ / de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// bdag po la ni 'di skad 'us// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
243b3: kur gyi/ / yor tan kun gyis phul phyung yang // gtso bo 'di na ston mdzad par// ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde las sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob
243b4: pa'i phyir/ / de ni yang dag bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs kur bdag po ni// de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nab su// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags// ting 'dzin zhes sdang rigs 'byung ba// gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni//
243b5: sku gsung thugs ri dpal ldan pas// de nas yang dag byung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyi// zhes sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur// pi bskyod rgya chen
243b6: thabs kyis sbyor/ / zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin// rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// dam tshig
243b7: 'byung rdo rje zhes bya'i/ / ting 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par bzhugs pa nyid du brjod// de nas 'dzin 'jig ces pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // gti mug rigs byung las
243b8: skyes pa/ / rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// dkar dang gnag deng dmar bcas pa'i// zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par 'gyur// de nas rin chen byung ba yi// dpal zhes bya
244a1: ba'i ting 'dzin la/ / snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun// bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rang na d+hig
244a2: ces bya'i/ / snying po dpal ldan de tshe byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi/
244a3: phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang byang du gzigs gyur te// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan pa dag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po'i las byung ba//
244a4: rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung // a rol gi ces bya snying po// rdo rje gsum las de nas byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// de 'og bcom ldan
244a5: gtso bo ni/ / rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal// dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// nub
244a6: phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung // rdo rje de la snyoms bzhugs nas// snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig
244a7: rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs/ / snying po pra dz+nyA d+h+rig ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yis// de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/
244a8: rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni// de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen
244b1: dang / 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o// de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog/
244b2: skugasung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ dam pa dag ni phyung bar gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig za// yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po// gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog/ sku dang gsungs
244b3: thugs las byung ba/ / d+he shwa ra ti zhes byar grags// rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin rnams// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes mnyes rdo
244b4: rje grags/ / sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni// de ni mo ha ra ti ste// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang // rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste// zhal gsumanya
244b5: bu'i rnal 'byor ma/ / gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong gcig/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis// bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes//
244b6: bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba chen po phyung ba ni// 'di ltar ra ga ra ti phyung // zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can te// gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa// de ni rig pa skyes
244b7: bur gyur/ / gos med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste// rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje gsum gyi dam
244b8: tshig can/ / slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog/ zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma// badz+ra ra ti zhes bya ba// rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur// de ni byung ma
245a1: thag tu yang / / gtso bo rig pa skyes bur gyur// bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te// dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan mgon pode// rnam sdang rdo rje las byung ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la stor sa/
245a2: zhugs te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje'i gshed// khro ba chen po phyung ba dang // rlung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs// de nas bdag po bcom
245a3: ldan 'das/ / de bzhin gshegs patha sa cad kyis// mngon byang rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// khro bo chen po byung ba ni// pra dz+nyAn tA krid rdo rje can// de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni// rig pa skyes zur yang dag phyung //
245a4: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las// 'od chen phur bu'i gzugs lta bu// rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa// lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/
245a5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor// rdo rje gsum las khro bo che// pad mAn ta krid 'od po che// bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur// de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir// gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas// de bzhin gshegs
245a6: pa thams cad kyi 'ang / / gsung gis tshul du rnam sprul zhing // gos med ye shes bla med pa// nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur// bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la// kun nas snyoms par
245a7: zhugs nas ni/ / de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur// khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba// kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//
245a8: dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang // mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// de la slar yang zhus gyur pa// mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing // dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis
245b1: dasan/ / ji gar de rnams na bar gyur// 'di dag zag tha' yod pan na// di lags parji skar gyur// phyogs kyi ni rnams bzhag pa la// di ni gang gis rnam par snang sa// gsang babangan sa ces// thegs gas pa bto/
245b2: pa dang // se so'i skye ba'i tshig gis kyang // srang bdag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ri// de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i// zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sags// de bzhin gshegs rnams sten
245b3: mdzad pa/ / rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i// bya ba de dag phyin ci log/ dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs de rnams mdzad pa// tshig gcig la ni dpag med don// gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni// mgon
245b4: po gang shig ma 'ongs pa'i/ / skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni// dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa// dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya// zhe sdang gti mug de
245b5: bzhin chags/ / lus las sogs pa'i phung po lnga// 'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas// pa ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya// ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad// de bzhin nyid shes
245b6: lus su 'gyur/ / zhi ba rnam 'byor pa yis zas// ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi// sku'i gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar// gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku// de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung // thugs kyi rnam pas
245b7: thugs su ni/ / zhi gnas la sogs pa las byur// phung po la sogs chos rnams ni// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong // ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs// zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed// de bas sku gsungs
245b8: thugs rdo rje/ grib ma lta bur byung ba yin// de bzhin phung po khams la sogs// dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas// de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // de bas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong //
246a1: gsang ba'i bdag pa mnyan par bgyis// stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar// la byung pa yis rdorngogs// rnam mkha' mtha' ya nal 'byur na// rang po las gas ma tha / lus dang ngag sems so
246a2: ni khung po sogs byung 'brung las gyur/ / 'di dag dngas med yang dag kyang// de las ting 'dzin skye bar gyur// 'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor// mi phyed rdo rje nyid du gyur// zab dang rgya chen tog byang chub// de rtogs pas ni
246a3: sems dpar gyur/ / 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa// chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o// de la rtog pa mtha' yas pa// rdo rje theg par ston pa yin// ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las// rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin// 'di las 'jig
246a4: rten 'das 'gyur zhing / / de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// dngos don de bzhin nyid gcig pu// gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad// ma skyes pa las byung ba ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin// bdud gyur lha yis bur/
246a5: bshad de// phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas// 'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas// rgyal ba'i rdo rje rnam par bshad// lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang // byang chub sems dpa'
246a6: sems dpa' che/ / 'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang dag gis// phung po lnga po brtags gyur pa// de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// ji ltar me long//
246a7: mtshungs gas pa// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can// der ni bdag gis bdag mthong ba// dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur nal 'byor ba// phung ba de bzhin gshegs grags pa// de bzhin nyid las spros bya ba// chos kyi
246a8: sru can rgyal ba yi/ / mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di ni spos dang bsdus pa dag/ de ni dga' bar yongs su bsgrags// sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig/ de ni gsol 'debs nas bshad do// yang dag shes
246b1: sa gnyis med/ / mkhar dbyang sa dang 'ad bcung gdon pa dang chags chen la 'gyur// rnal 'bya nam na bzhugs pal// dza zag panal 'byor cha// dag dngas par byung bkang / zas pothams dang
246b2: skyed pa'i/ / yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur// zhal gsum rnam thar gsamadu gang // mthong zhing de las phung po sogs// lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba// de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin// dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog/ mya ngan
246b3: 'das par gnyis med 'dzag/ 'on kyang sa por gyur pa des// chos kyi ska las zhe sdang gyur// bcom ldan bdag pa de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung zhing // mya ngan 'angs tshul rdo rje can/ de nyid dbang po kun byed pa'o//
246b4: dam tshig la sogos 'byung ba'i chos// rang gis rig pa ma gyur kyang // der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad// de ni gti mug de bzhin sems// gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis// longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa// de ni yid
246b5: bzhin rin chen 'byung / / rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog
246b6: ltar 'dam gyi pad ma ni/ / de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/ 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// 'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab// de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin// chos dang longs spyad
246b7: sprus pa ste/ / gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'o// zhe sdang gti mug du bzhin chags// rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso// ran 'grogs ma 'don pas bud med// gcig pa yin yang du mar gyur// gsum po yang
246b8: dag 'dug gyur pa/ / gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin// pad ma bgegs gyur khro bo ste// mthar 'byed mtha' yi ming can no// 'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la// phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs// skrag
247a1: bye ga shin rje'i gshed kyis kyang / / thams cad 'thung ba'i dkyil 'khor do// rdo rje dam rig skrag byed pa// de bzhin gshegs rab mthar byed ga tso// pad mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur// 'chi thal rnal 'byung
247a2: grub pa sani/ / bgegs ma par byed kyang thugs kyig tse// rigs pa'i bdag nyid can dag go// 'di ltar rtag spyod nal 'byor // gsang ba'i lus kyirnam par spyod// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas pa pa// gang zhig
247a3: yid ni bzod skar pa/ / des 'di de bzhin bya ba dang // de nas gsang pa yang dag bsrung // su nams kyi khrigs pazhon// srid pa gsum bcom ldan gago// sems can pas ya bang dri bzhin du// chos kyi bdud kyis ma
247a4: mdzad/ chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis// sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las// bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa// bden pa ma yin brdzun pa'ang min// zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang // 'dod chags sna tshogs rig/
247a5: byung ba// dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas// gleng bzhi yin te dang po'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la// slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis/ lhags par mchod pa byas nani/ thub chen de la
247a6: 'di skad gsol/ / dgongs pa rdo rje dam pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis// zhu ba yang dag
247a7: thugs chu cing / / byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtogs pa// thub nyid kyi ni nam mkhyen pa// de nas byang chub sems kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// lus sems pa dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin dag
247a8: ni tshig brjod lta'o/ / byang chub sems ni tha med pa/ khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la// ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// sku dang
247b1: thugs dang de bzhin gsung / / da 'dra'i tshul du gar nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// skragasung thugs rdo rje can la// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// am kun tu bzang za la// rten kyang 'brel gyu
247b2: las skyes pa/ / skye ba med pa'i tshul gyi ni// skyob 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon rdzogs bya
247b3: rdo rje yis/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs// dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na// dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa
247b4: dngos por yod ma yin/ / de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa
247b5: kun gyi mchog/ gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can// byang chub sems ni thams cad nas// de ni yang dag bka' stsal to// dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// phung po khams sogs rnams spangs shing // gzung dang
247b6: 'dzin pa las grol ba/ / chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa// rten cing 'brel 'byung mong can te// thog ma med nas ma skyes brda// rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin// de nas mi
247b7: skyed de bzhin gshegs/ / kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas// phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med
247b8: nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i/ / bdag med byang chub ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal// bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs//
248a1: cagacos dam thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid dam grangs pa// bdag med mos las yang dag 'byung klu chu bcul 'di ldan pa'o// de nas 'ad dpag med mtshan can// ye shes 'bar bsten rdo dze'i/
248a2: nga nge 'dzir la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa 'i chos rnams la/ dngos pa med cing bzlam pa'ang med/ rnam mkha' gnas su sbyor ba'is// dngas pazhes na rab tu bshad/
248a3: de nas de bzhin gdon pa ze// zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yis// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'ad gsungs so// chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsol zhing // gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang
248a4: mtshungs/ / byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub sems ni yin par bshad// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub sems ni thos pa dang // dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par// rnam par snang mdzad
248a5: tshe la gsungs/ / dngos po med cing dmigs med pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs// gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas// dngos po pa yi rtog bskye// lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas// sems ni de rnams
248a6: skyed par byed/ / yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar// 'di la so so skye bo sgra// thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la// rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed// bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du// 'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig/ de nas
248a7: bcom ldan bdag po 'di/ / rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che// legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni// lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// rnam par mi rtog don de nyid// rab tu phye ste bshad par bya// tshig tu brjod dang dmigs
248a8: par bshad/ / brda dang don dam pa yin no// rgyan dang nyan thos rnams kya dang // mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyi// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di / dngos pa'i/
248b1: gsang ba bla na med// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang // pad ma de las sbed par byed// tshig tu brjod pa thur mong ste// sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs cad yin// gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brdal/ de bzhin nyid ni dor dam pa'o//
248b2: dang po gcig ni dgra dbus na// gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa// de ni bcings med shes bya ste// de shes pa ni mchog gis gnas// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings
248b3: phan tshun sbyor ba las/ / gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i tha// gang zhig shes pa nam grol ba// 'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa// de ni de nyid grub 'dod de// gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa// 'byung ba mtha' ni
248b4: yang dag ljin/ / cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas// lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar// yi ge aM bcas ring por bcas// yon tan skyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma lus ngag du 'gyur//
248b5: gcig min dum ma yin no// ya yi don gyi gang yang rung // bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// ra la sogs pa gsum nyid ni// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug/ yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang // gang yang mngon du phyogs
