248b6: pa rnams/ / bud med skyes pa ma ning ste// khams la sogs par rab tu bta// 'og nas steng du bcas par ni// shes rab blos ni nges par sbyar// drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig/ dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung //
248b7: don la sogs don sbyar na// dus gsum shes pa'ang 'thung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin// 'gro ba rnams ni m+b+ha mthar bya// brjod pa yini sngags 'di dag/ dngos med pa po las byung ba// nga ni yongs
248b8: mthur ba'i gzugs/ / lha ru nye bar mtshan pa gang // brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa// deng bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do// ming med brjod du med pa te// byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no// gsum po nyid gcig
249a1: gyur pa/ / 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// 'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste// rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa// dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i// rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan// de nyid kho na don dam ste//
249a2: so so rang rig mtshan nyid do// de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i// sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid// byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'byung yang // rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can// gang 'di byang chub sems bdag nyid//
249a3: rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur// 'di ni na ma tog kun bral yang // rigs kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur// sreg dang skems dang bde can dang // kun zar 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no// 'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar// sems can
249a4: la la rnam par gnas/ / byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de// 'gro ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing // ga shig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa// byams pa chen po de bskyed bya// phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas// byang chub sems
249a5: ni yang dag 'byung / / des ni snying rje cher gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms// sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag/ byang chub sems la ma mthong na// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa// de las dga' ba skye bar
249a6: 'gyur/ / 'khor ba dngos po yod min la/ sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra// byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni// btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing // /
249a7: srang yang de don mtshan nyid ni// rnam par pang mdzad ge la zhus// 'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba// 'di kun byang chub sems yin na// ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni// phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas// bdag nyid
249a8: kyib ni bdag nyid la/ / gnyis su 'gog byed gang yang med// gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung // mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang // dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog/ 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pa// sems cad Sha
249b1: gcig gzir ba dang / / byang chub bde la sbyar bar gyur// de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtogs par// ma 'ongs skye bo ba gyid 'gyur gyi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba// de dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i/
249b2: chos rnams la// byas pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams cad pa me rgya/ dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje can lags ngagongs pa// shin ta rA
249b3: dka' byang chub sems/ / de ni yang dag bka' bral to// phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig/ sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te// sems de mngon du byas na i/ ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin// sems ci de kris pa mthong bas/
249b4: lta ba so sor gyur pa yin// de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru// 'gro ba drug gis ming du gyur// de na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che la kun tu brten// zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi// kun tu sbyor ba de rnams byed// sum bcu
249b5: gsum par bshad dang / / dga' ldan gyis ni gnas ngag dang // de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang // lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro// yi dgas su yang 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba sna tshogs ngag tu 'gro// gang tshem
249b6: rig kun brten pas/ / bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'du shes can dang 'du shes med// sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa// de rnams rlung las byung ba ste// rlung bas slar yang 'gag pa yin// nyin dang mtshan
249b7: ba'i cha yis kyang / / da gi rnam par rtog pa lhung // de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du// sna tshogs 'gro bar de dga'agro// me rtog pa yi sems de ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mchor gnas gyur kyang / don byon ci log gyur pas// khyidang
249b8: lce sbyang glang po dang / / sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin du ni pha nyid dang // ma yi rigs ni smig mkhan dang // sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang // bza' dang mi bza' bya kun du// byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur//
250a1: bram ze las sogs 'jig rten shes// byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// phung sogs dngos po me gyur las// rang ga myong ba shes par 'gyur// da/ 'jig tan gagags pa kang / khanam byod par
250a2: byang chub sems/ / nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas su ru 'di 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid// tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying po'i den gsungs pa//
250a3: 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig bral// phyag 'tshal nas ni bslar gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub sems ni bar gsungs na// ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa// ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rang
250a4: spangs phyir/ / khyed kyis chos rnams ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid// lta ba de ni rab brtan 'gyur// dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams// gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas// gsung ba 'di las gzhan min nyes
250a5: de ni ji bzhin slar 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// khyed gsang dgongs pa ma rtogs pa// dri bar byed pa legs so legs// byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing // nam mkha' la ni napa
250a6: gnas pa/ / sems can kun gyi srog gyur gang // lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa// ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin// ji ltar mi
250a7: mngon phra ba las/ / rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa// 'dir ni de la rten pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams// de nyid gsum gnas la rten nas// de kun byang
250a8: chub sems kyis byed/ / ji srid 'jig rten gdags pa dang // de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems shes pa'i// rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin// bde sdug las sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon
250b1: lta bur bshad pa yin/ / byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di// phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam// shes rab thabs gcig sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur// klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs
250b2: papa padag por rang nyid zlos pa de/ / nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis// dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig bya// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// nam mkha'
250b3: 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ / 'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang // ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba yis// de nyid ming las
250b4: sbyar bar bya/ / e ma'o/ 'gro ba'i bya ba byung // de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda'// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub sems 'di thos pa
250b5: dang / / gtso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub//
250b6: sems ni ma pa'amanyam pa// legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skye bo mcho ga la de bstan gsol// sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig/ shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyi phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni gro
250b7: dpon zhes/ / ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig/ de ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skal med
250b8: chos kun nam spangs la/ / rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas// de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur// de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'brel ba nyid ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur// /
251a1: de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa la// byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyi rol min// gnyi ga ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin/
251a2: rtag pa ma yin skad cig min// de ni so so rang rig yin// me rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du// byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'byung // 'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang //
251a3: de ltar zhes ni bya ba dang // sangs rgyas su yang 'byung 'gyur ba// don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin// rig byed dus dang me yi brda'// nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te// gzhi phyed gsum pa dag las byung // byang chub sems gcig/
251a4: dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang // ha ni so la gnas pa yi// gnas skabs de snyed ji bzhin du// ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur// rdo rje nang du zhu
251a5: gyur pa/ / bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tshe drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no// rang nyid ldog par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin// nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo// de dang ldan pa byed
251a6: rku ba sems/ / bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung // yid med rab tu zhi ba can// dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni// rang rig gcig pu'i yul yin no// de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin//
251a7: de nas gsang ba dgongs pa 'di// chos kyis yi ge mchog thos nas// byams pa zhes las sogs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas// ched du brjod pa ched du brjed//
251a8: e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa// dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa de nyid don dag ster// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo//
251b1: bdasam byas las sa gabyung // byang chub chags 'jug // deb sa du / byung na pasas su la lkugs lag/ gnas / ga ga/
251b2: bang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gyis// byang chub sa pas la phyag
251b3: dgongs pa lung ston la dad par/ / gang gang yid ni bzod gyur pa// dam tshig gsum gyis rdo rnga las// des na de bzhin bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi// rdo rjegasum gyi gsang ba las// rang sa
251b4: byang chub sems bshad pa/ le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// / de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje gsum dang tshul gsum la pa gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag
251b5: de bzhin gshegs pa kun dgod pa/ / 'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje dgod pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang ba nyon// 'di ni de bzhin gzhas
251b6: bkun/ / phra mo rnal 'byor dag la bzhugs// oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// shAn+ya tan gnyis pa ste// dAn zhes ni gsum na yin/ rje bya ba bzhi pa'o// sa b+hA ba Ad ma lnga par grags// a haM zhes pa drug par brjod/
251b7: de ltar bde gshegs drug po na// skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin// oM shUn+ya ta zung dang po// dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin// swa b+hA ba Ad mako ti mgyur// nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o// de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par/
251b8: mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po'o// 'dod yon lnga yis kun tu khyab/
252a1: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog/ de nyid gsum gyi rdo rje mdzan// yang na rdo rje gsum pa'o//
252a2: gyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che// tshogs ni gnyis med sbyar ba dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // de bzhin don yod gzugs can rgyu// sangs rgyas
252a3: dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgos/ / rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can// in dra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs ltas// 'dzam pa'i chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ sangs
252a4: rgyas sprin gyi rab tu 'khrigs/ / de yi phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bskams// sna tshogs rgyan
252a5: gyis rnam par brgyan/ / mar gad ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// 'bar shing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab// di rten de la rnam par bsgoms// 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad mar ga'i mdog
252a6: 'dra zhing / / thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// phyag na pad ma bsnams par bsgom// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za// 'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// phyag na ral gri bsdams par bsgom/
252a7: de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor che dag kyang // de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pas bka'
252a8: stsal na/ / mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur// gcig shos phyi rol du bsgom pa// dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas min can ni// dngos po med pa'i dngos po la// sgom pa po rnams ji ltar
252b1: brtag/ mgon po phra me'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces// gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni// 'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyid 'tshal// lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor de
252b2: byes/ / 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// nam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di// sa 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur pa// chos ni yang dag srung gyur gang // ji lta ltar ston par byed//
252b3: phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// byang chub don gyis rkyen las byung // de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa// de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so// ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni// blo yi dngos grub ston pa po// thog mtha' med pa
252b4: rnal 'byor ni/ / pra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag/ mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor// dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o// gzod ma nyid nas rab grub pa// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes bya
252b5: grags pa ste/ / dngos po thams cad gcig tu 'byung / bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang nag dang de bzhin ser// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang //
252b6: gos dkar las sogs yang dag bri// de nams dbus su lha mor bcas// zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min can// steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og/ ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu/
252b7: so so'i dkyil 'khor la// bcwa brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad// ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni// mar sar gnas par gyur pa yin// de bzhin gos dkar las sogs la// zhi ba nyid ni
252b8: raganas so/ / gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// so bskyod las sogs grangs ji bzhin// rtogs pa dag ni zhi gnas yin// 'di ginyis dngos po med pa'i bdag/ de bzhin nyid rna ni
253a1: mas/ de ba'adanang byed kyis 'khor du// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya// rnal 'byor ba yis dbugs rngub dbyung // sbyong ba nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rabathabs la ga sa das sa sngags
253a2: yan lag mnyams bzlas/ / byab thams cad nyid du yang // rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// mang med brjod du med pa dang // dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bar+tha// gos dkar las sogs bzlas pa sha pa/
253a3: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga// ba'i pa legs par bsgres pa yis// sbyor bzhis bsdus pa brgya phrag dgu// dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa// TI shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis de// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi khri gcig steng
253a4: drug brgya'o/ / de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang po yis// 'gro la phan pa'i gsung
253a5: thos nas/ / de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus// gang zhig bsgoms dam 'ongs 'gro// thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog/ snying po bcom ldan bshad
253a6: du gsol/ / de nyid gsum nyid med sbyor ba// de ni pra me'i rdo rje bsgoms/ myur ba las sogs gsum spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur// de ni bdag rig yid ches zhing // zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// pra po
253a7: ral 'byor gtso spangs te/ / log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu sbyin// sngon pa po yi sbyor sgra ring // pra mo zhes bya de nyid ni// ma 'ongs dus na spong 'gyur ba// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// lung bstan pa
253a8: ni gsan pa dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// chos dbyings ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad// dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags
253b1: 'ad bka' stsal to/ / sku gsung thugs na rdo rje bshad// khyad par dran byin rdzobapa/ ba rje gsum skyer bas// de na yang dag bshad par bya/ ma dang bar shes par bya// sa gas bya gnyis pa la/ sa
253b2: bya gsum par bshad/ / swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o// Ad mako ni lnga pa yin// a haM du gyur drag par 'dod// sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu// bsgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgor// / rin chen kha dog snga lnga pa/
253b3: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// nyams dga' ri rab rtse mo ru// rnal 'byor pa yi rtag par bsgom// rin chen ma g.yor gyur nas sgro// mi g.yor mgyur sdom bya// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// mchog rab sbyin
253b4: rnams sngo bar bya/ / 'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang // pad ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sgo// phra mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor
253b5: bsgob par bya/ / bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las blang ba// rnam pa'
253b6: dkyil du bri bar bya/ / 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ pra mo rdo rje gsum bsrub pa'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// dgongs pa gsang pa zhes pa yi// lung stong dam pa'i
253b7: la ni/ / gang gis sems ni bzod myur ba// de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje phra mo de nyid las// 'di ni rdo rje dkod pa'i mchog/ le'u gsam pa nyid yin no// / de nas bcom
253b8: ldan 'das thams cad/ / gnyis su med par gyur nas ni// slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la// bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/
254a1: chos kun bdag tu bdag med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol// yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyar// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kud ta bzang po sku'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa
254a2: bshad du gsol/ / ye shes spyod pa'i don las zung // zhi ba'i chos ni spyod pa'o// dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag/ sems kun tu bzang po nyid// sems can kun gcig che ba'i btog/
254a3: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog/ 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po// nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs
254a4: pa'i gnas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la// thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to// de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
254a5: kyi/ / dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ legs bsgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni// tshad ma bzang por de bshad do// kun rdzob dang ri do dpa dag/
254a6: gnyis su med pa mdzes pa yin// shes rab 'di ni thig yin te// thabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab
254a7: ste/ / rter 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yid// bsdu ba'i dngos grags sgo yin te// re re'ang bzhi bzhi ming can no// chos kyi de nyid don gyi brdas/
254a8: 'khor lo nang gis dkyil 'khor ro// mi phyed ye shes mtshan pa de// rdo rje in dra nI la rgya// rnam pa lnga yis rab phye ba'i// rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o// shar nas me long ngo bo ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba nyid kyis brgyad//
254b1: lho kun panyam ye shes yin// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub du so sor rtog pad ma// pad ma dga' 'od 'dra ba// byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin// 'gro ba'i rnam tog 'joms byed pa// bya bsgrub par ma
254b2: gri 'gyur/ 'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar sgo byams pa'ang spyan yin te// sbyin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od// lho rub snying rje zhes bya bya// mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje// rub byang ba ma zhes bya ba// dga' ba legs par
254b3: gnas pa bzhin/ / byang shar ud pal ltar sdang ba'i// gtang snyoms bcas pa sngon po'ang// de bzhin shar sgong sbyin pa ni// thob mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// de bzhin stan sgra zhes grags pa// dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bang /
254b4: nub du don spyod ces bya ba// rta mgrin gyi ni pad ma'o// don mthun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje can// phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'di ni legs par bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyibs kyi mchod pa ni/
254b5: rnam gsum bsgom pas 'gyur ba yin// dang por chen po yod pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang // shes nas 'grol phan par 'gyur// rdo rje gsu dang lhan
254b6: cig 'byung / / de tshe zla zer phreng ba yi// skad cig las sogs dus dbye bas// lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming // ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni// bud med ces ni nges par bshad// zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa// mdangs bzangs
254b7: 'od ni yin par gsungs/ / rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te// ye shes la bye me tog go// dngos po med pa rigs ya ni te/ kun sa khyen ye shes dbus nyid do// chos dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes
254b8: bar bya/ / nang na ma yin phyi ma yin// gnyis gang ma yin gzhan nas mid// gdas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// debs mA pa kI bshad do// de yang ba nyid gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// nga ma'
255a1: dang ni gcig tu mtshungs/ / sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bsdu ba dag ni bshad pa yin// ye shes dbang po stong pa gci// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad mabyed
255a2: ba'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste// dngos med pa ni dbul ba yi// des byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas
255a3: btags pa/ / de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid// phyed rdo rje gsus pasgoms pa// sar pa nyid du bkal legs dang // shin tutshad ldan mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pa pacig ga pa so// ldanadakyil 'khong brtag byas/
255a4: khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste// de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyi ni// 'di na 'jig rten pa rnams
255a5: rtog/ gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba// dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dang / yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das// 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spang // len pa
255a6: ma yin gtong ba min/ / med pa ma yin gnas ma yin// blo ldan kun tu 'di shes pa// rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni// nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong //
255a7: la/ gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur na// de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed/ gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
255a8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ rdo rje gsung gtso 'gro ba'i bla// slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don gyi de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa gcig/ khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs//
255b1: pa'i gsung // spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu// gsung ba'i don can bka' stsal to// mi rtog don las yang
255b2: ngag byung / / de sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin// dngos med la gnas gti mug te// 'dod chags 'dod chags la byung / 'dod chags ldan pa'i mang can yod// theg pas chog ni blamed pa// 'dod chags de sdang gti ngag ste//
255b3: 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad/ dngos grub de ni 'di bsgrub po// rigs par myur bar shes par bya// smyig mkhan dag ni dal pa yin// mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste// gsod pa don gnyer sems pa'o// theg pa chen po
255b4: bla med pa'i/ / theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur// sems can sdig chen byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po// gang yang slob dpon smod pa sa sa// bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro// di nyid dad pas myur
255b5: dum/ de sdang lag ra gnas pas gnas// gang gis phung sogs dngos med par// ni gnas las byung sems kyi byas// de ra srog bcod byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas pa yid// dang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/
255b6: bung gnyis su stor ba'i// de brdzur sma ga' ba ste/ gnas med la gnas nal 'byor pa'o// jogs sangs rgyas kyis shes gang / den rjes su shes bya ste// de 'phrog dang tshul gang med pa// gzhan gyi no la chags par 'o/
255b7: gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa// de bzhin nyid la rtogs sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'// bsgrub pa mchog la dam par gyur// de'i stong nyid gti mug la// yul ni bshad pa zhes grags te// dbang po gci ba zhes
255b8: bya kha/ / de dag zhi bza ba yin// theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// de dag bsgrub pa'i don du 'gyur// de dag tshe brdzun 'dod pa dang // gshang gci zas su byed pa po// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab/ chos kyi sku na ma gcag
256a1: la gnyis meng de bzhin nyid stong ba/ / dngos med ces bya 'dod spong ba// longs sod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo lon par 'dod// rang lha rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// gsang sngags lus kyis
256a2: mnyes par bya/ / bshang gci zas su byed pa yis// sprul sna'i gzug cad bu ma de// sgrub pa pas ni bsgom par bya// mdang srong mo bu mo no// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas// theg pa mchog gis chos nyid la/
256a3: dngos grub rgya chen nges thob po// ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni// kun du khyab par gnas gyur pa// 'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de// ting 'dzin bas ma khyab ces bya ba// de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba// rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no//
256a4: sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la// 'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te// rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis// myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsungs ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang
256a5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ / thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur// 'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ci yi srid du tshig ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung /
256a6: 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang // gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i// rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing // gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang // 'tshe ba la sogs yongs
256a7: spangs pa/ / 'dir ni de byed sems can rnams// snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam// de nas mgon po thugs rje can// sems can kun la phan dgyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs
256a8: ga/ 'di nas khams dang mnyam pa dang / sems cad kun 'dzin gcig pu pa// chu khams tog dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po ma yi gzugs can te// thams cad za bar nye bar skyer/ con
256b1: phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs// thams cad snang zhing za ba po// de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par// bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// snying po
256b2: zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi/ / chos nyid dag pa 'di yid zhing // sngags kyi sbed don spyod rnams kyi// byang chub spong 'di mchog 'di yin// de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs
256b3: mnyam re/ / sgrib pa thams cad sel las sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad// gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to// de nas gsang
256b4: dbang rdo rje gsung / / gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru// gzigs nas gcol 'di skad gsol// mgon po sgrib kun sel las sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
256b5: rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar// 'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol// mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa// 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yid// dngos po med
256b6: cing 'khrug pa med/ / yid 'ongs rdo rje tshig gcig pu// 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis// bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyar ba yis// gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te// de yang de
256b7: ba' ra gshegs mchog dang / / byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de las sgo zhing bsdu ba dang // zhi ba nyid las rab skyer las// ye shes lus cad ye shes can// brgyal la zhes ri shes pa ni// yar lag dbye ba gang dadag/
256b8: 'gro ba zhes ni grags sags de/ de rang lha'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa// de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu// 'di na 'jig tshegs lus rtog la// byang chub sems
257a1: dpa' brgyal bar gyur/ / des ni bden 'di sa shes pas// dbyangs bcas rgyal la bskul ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' // brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba rdo rje gdupa
257a2: dgongs pa'i rig gis bshad pa dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas// ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad// gnyis su med mar mnyan rdo rje// 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i// 'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa pa// ting nge 'dzin
257a3: la soms par zhugs/ / mgon po stoms par zhugs pa yi// 'od gang chen por gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas// rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du
257a4: g+hur stan dang / / dgyes shing mgu ba sdus gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings ni 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o chos e ma'ochog e ma'i chos kyis don blang ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo//
257a5: rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don// dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung // rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // rje ni dbyangs
257a6: gcig rdzogs longs spyong / / nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste// sbed pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan// de nyid gsum ston pa sna tshogs// spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo//
257a7: dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang shig spyod mchog 'di ston pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag/ de ni ci dga' bar yang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags
257a8: rnams kun gyi dam pa yaM/ / spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// // de nas dpal chen mi spyod ga/ sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags 'dan
257b1: gsungs pa yin/ / oM zhes bya ba dang por yid/ sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// tsit+ta gsum par yongs su btags// badz+ra lnga pa'i gong mar ldan// swa b+hA Ad ma ko lnga pa// a haM dus kyi ming can yin// drug gsum pa'i ming can no//
257b2: de nas dpal ldan rnam sdang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku de byin gyis brlab pa gsung // ma~M zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// kA ya chags thogs
257b3: dbang phyug ste/ / badz+ra rig byed yin par bsgrags// swa b+hA Ad ma ko 'dod lha// a ha skem byed ces brjod de// dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya// de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i// kun
257b4: du mo gnyis rdo rje can/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni byin gyi rlob pa gsungs// oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// bAg ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+ra dus kyi ming du 'gyur/
257b5: swa b+hA Ad ma ko lnga pa// a ha zhes pa drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams// re re zhing drug gsum du bshad// thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung // rim ni rim pa min pas gsungs// bdag po las ni gcig tu
257b6: las/ / rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung // yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsum// de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bas 'di ni bsgom pa mchog/ g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog
257b7: rdo rje gsum byung bas/ / bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing // sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang // sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas
257b8: gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM ni zung gi dang por ldan// sarba ta thA ga ta zung // de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs// thams cad me long ming can no// a nu rag skye med de// de ni gsungs pa yin par gsungs//
258a1: rkyen dang nyan thos kyis gshig dka'i// badz+ra yang ni bzhi par gyur// dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes// swab+hA ad ma ko zhes bshad// ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming // chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// aH
258a2: so so rdzogs longs spyod/ / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mtshon pa drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can// de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lta'i chags pas
258a3: de bzhin gshegs/ / mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM zhes bya ba dang
258a4: bor ldan/ / sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// bu dza rnams par thar pa'i med// badz+ra sems ni rnam bsgoms pa// swa b+hA ad ma ko zhes bshad// a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya// lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang
258a5: ro/ / reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs shes las yang dag byung // mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes// mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis//
258a6: myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po// thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la// gang tshe
258a7: yid na mag gyur ba/ / de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog des thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing // lus dang ngag kyang rnam par bsgoms// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas bsgob zhing /
258a8: sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya// rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na// shin du phra ba'ang yod ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis// bsgom pa med cing byang chub med// rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor na rnam par
258b1: brtags nas su/ / sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis// bsgob pa'i
258b2: pachog 'di bka' stsal to/ / dam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// yungs dkar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsa//
258b3: sA yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can// rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam// blo ldan ye shes kyis brtag pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste// de nyid gsal ni das
258b4: tshig mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sangs rgyas sku na rnam bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas gzhag go/ dbang phyug chen po skem byed de// bzhi phyed nam mkhas mtshon pa
258b5: dag/ bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang // de ni hA zhes bya bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsgom// spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad mo gnyis bsgom pa'o//
258b6: nam mkha'i dpyid kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgom//
258b7: sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas 'god pa// 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor// ud dpal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che// nas kyi 'bru tsamanan tan gyis// ri rab rtse mong rnam par bsam// tsan ka yi 'bru tsho
258b8: tsam/ / 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya// 'khor lo las sogs bsgom pa ni// de yi khyad par dag tu brtag/ yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyis gnas// byang chub gnas
259a1: mchog bla med pa'o/ / sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs// mdor na de ni spro bar bya// gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa// rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos rnams
259a2: kun gyi mchog/ 'gro kun don du ston pa po// gsung bas mchog ni bka' stsal to// skad cig zang gcig yud tsam dang // zla phyed zla ba lo yi dras// bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni// skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad//
259a3: zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste// dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang sgra dang dor ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas ni zla ba drug bsgom/
259a4: mchod chen don byas nas su// gsang ba'idi nyid rnam par bsgom// yul dang dbang po sems pa ni// bshang gcizas su byed papo// byas nade 'dra'i dngom grub de// gza' ba rnam tog med pa'o// de nyid 'di ri bla da
259a5: pa/ byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'i// rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing // me rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur// ma ri mA ma kIr bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa// sha zhes bya
259a6: bar de bshad do/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// sha chen de na yin par bshad// gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni byung du 'grub// dam tshig chen po glang chen rta// de bzhin khyi las sogs pa'i shwa/
259a7: phung po las sogs rigs dbya bas// gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so// gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bong gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyan ben 'jig rten pa// bza' ba'i rang gi/
259a8: ngo bor gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag pa dang // de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zas su kun du bshad// de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa// bcom ldan 'das las thos pa
259b1: ngang / / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing // mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni// 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs// chu dang
259b2: 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin/ / khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'jig rten 'gal las yang dag pa// ngangad pas 'o ma ji bzhin len// ji ltar slob pas gdungs pa yi// skye bu la la de bsres 'thung // de bzhin 'jig rten
259b3: shin du 'angs/ / chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung // dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// mgor po gsal bar bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin
259b4: gshegs mchog gis/ / grags ldan lag na rdo rje la// bu khyod legs so cher legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang // de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams// 'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams
259b5: te/ bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas// rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas// 'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin// de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang // de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin// gang yang 'jig rten shin du 'das// rnam pa
259b6: me rtog 'jigs med pa/ / de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs// brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing // blo lngar byang chub sems rnams kyis khyang /
259b7: drab s+t+wang du thob par 'gar/ 'ang lams kyi da bang blag dang // la 'byong go' bang 'thob phrag gi lda rdzoms kyis thug pa dang // sadangs pabang mang na dga' ba dang / yang da tsagags 'bral ba yig 'a sa
259b8: dbang du byed/ / gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa/
260a1: gsang ba yang dag srung ba'o// de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i// le'u drug pa ni yin par bshad
260a2: de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang / / ngamachog chen pa de nyid gcig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so// de nyid dmachog bzhi po gang // 'dod pa thams cad ces de bshA
260a3: de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis/ / ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya// de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pazhi ba nyid// dka' thub
260a4: sbyar ba de yin la/ / sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang // gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams
260a5: myur du 'grub/ / tha dad yi ge slong mo yin// de 'don pa ni za ba ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba do// de dge slongs mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing // sdom pa mi zad nyid kyang min// 'dod gsum de nyid
260a6: longs spyod cing / / sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas// rdo rje gsum dbye bde gnas na// sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
260a7: sems dpa' dang / / gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i yon tad lda rnams
260a8: bste/ / byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing // byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya// de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sna tshogs rnam par rdza
260b1: mdzad te/ / sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul
260b2: bar bya/ / de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid don yod rdo rje grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/
260b3: reg la rna ma gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod me long gzugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang // gnyi ga rjes su mi dmigs pa// gzugs las
260b4: sogs gsum de yan te/ / lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// gzugs sgra ro las sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa 'di// snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de// mkhas pas gzugs
260b5: sba las sogs pa/ / lha gnyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// de bzhin rigs su bsgom pa ni// bsgom pas der ni bsgom par bya// nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad // sangs rgyas rjes dran
260b6: sbyor bas kyang / / chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom// rdo rje gsum bsgo ba rnal 'byor pas/ rdo rje rjes dran bsgom pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs spyod sbrul srur byung // rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa/
260b7: de ba na po 'i rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje gsupa nyid med chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de bsgom byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid la
260b8: grangs yin te/ / bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi// bud med la grangs bcu drug pa// gzugs bzang ba dang mchod pa ni// dben pa zhes bya brtsams par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas
261a1: yid 'ong ba/ / khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya de nyid yang dgra sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor
261a2: ba 'di bsgoms na/ / sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang de bzhin ai// phaT kyong der ni bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas
261a3: khyab pa'i/ / rdo rje pad ma 'di mchog ste// gsang dang snying kha snga rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni brtag tu bsgom// gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas// de bas
261a4: nang yid 'ong ba'o/ / gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas// bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor las sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis/
261a5: bsten/ b+ha gzhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung // rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste// b+ha ga ling ga yin par bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste// sangs rgyas gzugs
261a6: sa bsgom pa'o/ / de las blo ldan gyis spo ba// ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad pararang / sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje
261a7: pad ma yang dag sbyor/ / b+ha ga'i ling gar brtag pa'o// de nas ba spu'i bu ga las// 'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i// 'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin// rdo rje rjes su dran pa
261a8: bsgom/ / dngos mod gcig pu la sbyor ba// stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur// b+ha ga ling ga zhes bshad do// de nas ba spu'i bu ga nas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro// rdo rje byang chub sems bsgom nyid// myur du dngos grub thob par
261b1: 'gyur/ / rigs rdzas dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas spyod nyid rdo rnga las// de bzhin rnal 'byor bas smos na/ rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang // stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i
261b2: bu gnas/ / khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la// rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa la ni// thub pa che la slar zhus pa// thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling
261b3: ga'i sbyor ba ni/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs rgyas las sogs spro gyur pa// tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la// phyi dus kun rmongs myed pa ste// bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni// ci phyir gsungs shes de rnams lnga//
261b4: 'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can// rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing // de rnams shin du rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni rtog par byed// mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu// su med srid gsum
261b5: bdag nyid can/ / dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung // khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste//
261b6: ling ka drag po'i ming can nyid// khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtag/ khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung // dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che// dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid// shes dang shes bya rnam par grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro/
261b7: ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de las sogs pa'i tshigags na nas// dam tshig rjes su dran pa sgom pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gis rdo rje pad mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i/
261b8: thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom// dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid// dbang po gnyis nyis sbyor ba las// rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te// rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran po'i sbyor ba yang // sangs
262a1: rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga/ / sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtags pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rigs// gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur//
262a2: bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rje dran pa'i sbyor ba gang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang // sems can rjes
262a3: dran rdo rje nyid/ / spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa bsgom la ni// rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku ni rnam bsgoms pa// de nyid
262a4: gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid/ / rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi// sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni// de bas tshangs pa shin du 'byung // dngos med gcig/
262a5: tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du btung // de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni// dngos med ces bya ba sang ba ste// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsang na// dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshis
262a6: sbyor gyur pa/ / rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do// pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa// yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang nyid dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams med
262a7: 'byung ba'ang med pa'o/ / ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang // der ni ci yang brjod min zhing // ma skyes ming ni gcig pu ba// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba// mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med// rang
262a8: bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing / / gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming // sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing // de ni rigs rjes dran
262b1: zhes bya/ / rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te// bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las// rang gi khubs mchod par bya// dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang // de ni dag par bshad pa/
262b2: yin// de nyid kyi ni mchod par sngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'ad yis lus la mchod pa dang // khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yis sku gsung thugs// sku
262b3: gsung thugs ni yang dag grub/ / tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// gang bshad rigs ni dmar bshad pa// de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// de bzhin so sor rab tu btag/ mi phyed rdo rje'i
262b4: yang / / gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni tsa dgar spyod par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
262b5: cad kyi/ / rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// / de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa
262b6: thams cad kyi/ / bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/
262b7: sems dpa' thub pa che// theg pa chen po rnams snang ba// kun du bzang po brtul zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog/ rig mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/
262b8: mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol// 'dod chags chen po zho sdang che// gti mug chen po blo gros che// theg pa gsum po rab ston cing // rdo rje theg pa ston pa 'o// nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya ma
263a1: bla ma che/ / rdo rje gsum po chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol// rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/ thar lam gcig pu ston pa po// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin du dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad
263a2: dragaso/ / ngas po kun gcig shin du dag/ byang chub sams rgya mchong// oM kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba// na 'brel la shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig pa dag don// snga chagasas sa rgyas byab sa da /
263a3: bdag med chos ni shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bcung kun dbang po// kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa// na chung mig
263a4: yadra btsal na ni/ / gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yis// sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid// zhi bzhi pa'i gnas yid 'ong //
263a5: bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams// rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar
263a6: bshad/ / kun mkhyen ye shes lang 'tsho ste// len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// de nyid na chung yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa// mtha' skyes bzhin du
263a7: brtag pa yin/ / gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te// rnam par dben pa dngos med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs nges byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni myur las sogs// bshang gci yul// /
263a8: dang dbang por grags// chu ni shes rab las sogs drug/ 'di dag gis gang byugs gyur pa// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de rtag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do// mchod pa'i yan
263b1: lag gnyis pa yi/ / bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin du 'das spyi'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying kha ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi
263b2: bkod pa ni/ / rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par bsgom// bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar bsgom// chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni//
263b3: Am kA ri ni yongs su brtag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa// gnas de ru ni bsam
263b4: bya ba/ / blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya// kos dkar pad mar yang dag dgod// rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma// me yi sbyor ba
263b5: bshad pa ni/ / de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas// sgrol mar u pa la nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no// de nyid ldang ba'i ming can no// de nyid rnam pa gsum byas
263b6: pas/ / rdo rje gsum gyis dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba// lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las// me tog dgos pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyis
263b7: thub chen zhus/ / me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru yongs su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum du bshad// bya rgod me tog za ba dang // bum pa sha za zhes zer zhing // me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'o
263b8: skye bos mi shes so/ / ma rtogs pas na de rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid rjod// de ltar bdag nyid smad pas na// sangs rgyas thams can smad par 'gyur//
264a1: sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas// mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyi rol na min gnyis kar min// tshogs pa las kyang ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag lag bzhin
264a2: de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas/ / lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag smod// de rnams rjes su gzug pa'i phyir// dgongs pa de ni bshad du gsol// rang
264a3: gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na/ / mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po las gsungs pa// nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis// me tog don ni bshad par bya// pa da ma ud pal nyi
264a4: mor bshad/ / dza ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad// mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis//
264a5: 'jug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas yongs su brtag pa yin// de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur// de bas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la
264a6: rab brtson bya/ / dgongs pa byin brlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnams kyi ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa// de ni pad ma ud pal ming // de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum// dza ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod// kar ni
264a7: ka dang ma li ka/ yug ti ka ra ba ri ni// go rims bzhin du spyan sogs te// sa la sogs pa 'dir sbyar ro// dngos med go 'phang la dkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni skyer sbyor bas// gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod
264a8: pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ / lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhad// lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu
264b1: dgod par bya/ / pad ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang // de bzhin ud pal rtag tu bsgom// dpag tshad bzhi po skyor gcig pa// dpag tshad brgya khyon de nyid gsum// byams pa la sogs grub bzhir gyur// mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa
264b2: yin/ / grub bzhi de ni rigs su gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni// shes rab can gyis gnas bsgom mo// mngon
264b3: shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams/ / de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal// rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid// gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis
264b4: mchod mchog las/ / lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor gcig de las yang dag byung // rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin// dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yi// dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun
264b5: zhes bya/ / rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung // rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni// des bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni// shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir//
264b6: de nyid re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste// 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang
264b7: dag sbyor ba dbul/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung // yul dang dbang
264b8: po zhes bya ba'i/ / bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyi mchod// bskal bzang zhing ni mdzes pa yi// bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'byung bas// rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la// byas
265a1: nas gnyis med spyor gcig pu/ / rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji// ji lta bar// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas bkod de// mig bzang dag pa'i byab yi// dag byung khu bablangs nas mchod// gang nag
265a2: de ltar rtogs pa te/ / blangs rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur// sa las sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan las sogs par rab brtags pa// de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang // de ni khu bza bar 'gyur// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/
265a3: gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang shig sems ni bzod gyur pa/
265a4: de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsung gis gsang ba las// gshang gi ci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// // de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso/
265a5: thams cad mi 'gyur mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o//
265a6: gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang // bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// 'od 'phro mang po'abar ba dang // 'od
265a7: zer sna lngas rab tu gang / / dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag byung // bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyir brlags med gyur pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na
265a8: myur du thob par 'gyur/ / rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsung ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bapyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen
265b1: de nyid ni/ / zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu// gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ dam tshig de nyid gsung ba yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa//
265b2: khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos su gcig pu las 'khrus
265b3: pa/ ji lta rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni byer ba rtags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag pa zhes bya gyur pa su// dus gsum 'azung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// khyi mar
265b4: brlag par ji ltar nus/ / byer brlag byed pas dngos med pas// phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la// da 'dra bar ni phyir brlag par// sngags pa gzhan gyi mi nus so//
265b5: sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlag pas// 'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes// ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa// min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing // gang shig
265b6: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin/ / rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur// theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba// dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/ de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas// mi bskyod zhing du skye 'gyur ram//
265b7: sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am// snying rjes gsang bar bya'o zhes// sngags pa rnams ni de mi spyod// 'dis chen ston par gyur pa dang // da lta rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams
265b8: sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o/ / mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis// de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi// de nyid sna tshogs don ldan cig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs// gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams// dgongs
266a1: don la rtog pa'i 'gyur/ ma 'ongs skye po 'dod du// de nas bcom ldan pashad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// 'grol phan pa'i tshig gsan nas// de nas gtso bo rje rje 'chang // khyab bdag gis ni glar gsung
266a2: pa/ / legs so bu khyed cher legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod legs so// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni// khyod kyis ngal gang dris pa// gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung sogs yar
266a3: lag gang gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang // dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu bstan// 'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te// de sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba// migs la rdo rje zhes bshad de/
266a4: dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid// des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste// sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du ni// sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi// kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa// 'gro ba rlung gi ming can na//
266a5: mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid// lag du rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de tshe myur las sogs bya ba/ klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid// phung sogs brtag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsungs thugs las yang dag byung // de yi
266a6: yan lag phung por bshad/ / de ni phyer gyur pasang ba yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong // mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid// de zhing skye ba dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po des thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan pade chen po/
266a7: ye shes thar bar rab sgrub po// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa// byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrubs pas// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po// gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sgrub pa'i
266a8: dam tshigs de nyid gsungs/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
266b1: gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ / rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya// shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur// rnam smin dngos po med pa yi// de nyid 'phrog pa'i rdo rje dang // sangs rgya
266b2: thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/ / rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba// rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang // nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid// dam tshig yin par
266b3: yongs su bsgrags/ / rigs kun rgya mtsho shes bya ste// de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags thar bar rab 'jug pa// gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog
266b4: ni bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med tshes ni rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // bud med lta bur sbyor ba yang // ting nge 'dzin
266b5: gyi sbyor ba yis/ / thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin// dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba// gsang sngags kyis sprul
266b6: dbang po gnyis/ / sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor ba'i// snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni// de dag thams cad nye bar sbyor// sku gsum mi byed sngags rnams kyis// 'di ni bsgom pa mchog de yin// de nyid
266b7: dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/ / 'dod chags rigs gcig bsgom pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog te// sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing // rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de nas
266b8: gsang dbang rdo rje gsum/ / rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa po// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyis dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// don yod rdo
267a1: rje rnams bsgoms te/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bskam par bya// darje tshig gi brdzun blag/ rgyal ba thams cad srub ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o// gang zhig brdzun du
267a2: bshad pa/ / brdzu ni de nyid dam pa ste// dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pade
267a3: rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o/ / kun du kun nas 'bad pa yis// ji bzhin don du 'dra byas te// so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni dngos grub rgya chen thob// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// mi phyed rdo rje gsum
267a4: rgyal bdag/ / rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyis dbus gnas par// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'o// dpa rig de na
267a5: yang dag bshad/ dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang // phung po las sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du// rtsub pa'i ngag las sogs pa ni// sa rnams
267a6: dman pa zhes bya ba'i/ / bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag
267a7: tu med par gyur pa yin/ / de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs// chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// dam tshig rdo rje dpal las sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/
267a8: ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni// tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di// de ni de rnams rjod par byed// ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing / 'jig rten thang ra/
267b1: cad las 'das pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam// gtso bos yang dag rdo rje'i tshig/ dgongs
267b2: pas ci slad gang gsungs zhes/ / brjod kyi mi lang ba yi yang // brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyis ni// ri rab rdul phran
267b3: dang mnyam pa'i/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen la// dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs// dman dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni// rgyal ba'i sras
267b4: rnams ma skyed cig/ ci phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin// 'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di// rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu// sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di// gsang ba'i sngags
267b5: don spyod pa nyid/ / 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// nam mkha' kun tu sod pa ste// chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing // rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid// 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing // de ni gzugs kyi khams mi
267b6: gnas/ / de bzhin gzug med khams na'ang min// 'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang // de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas// dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams// de bzhin gshegs rnams
267b7: dgongs nyid kyis/ / chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis// mdor na khong du chud par bya// yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis// nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor/
267b8: byung ba'i// dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// gtsub shing bcu po stan bcas pa dang // skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi// rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi// gtsug//
268a1: shing las sogs re re nas// 'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ me gang na'ang mi gnas so// ga cha dang ni gzugs brnyan dang // sgyu ma dang ni smeg rgyu dang // de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste// chos rnams thams
268a2: cad de dang 'dra/ / mgon po ba bang sgra lta bu// rkyen don las tshig yang dag blang // de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan
268a3: nyid yin/ / des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi// dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces// gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas// rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir// phung po de bzhin gshegs par shes//
268a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ngo mtshar zad du gyur nas ni// dam pa yis ni mig gdangs te// tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to// chos 'di ngo mtshar mang byung ste/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yis// me rtog rnam par
268a5: dag pa yang / / kun rdzob du ni bshad par mdzad// dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas// dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni// gang zhig yid 'od bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin stod pa yin// mchog tu dag pa'i de nyid don// gas
268a6: ba chen po zhes bya ba/ / dam tshig tshul de yang dag bshad// le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das// slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni/
268a7: bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig rdo rjed de nyid gnas// mngon par byang chub ded dpon nyid// mu dang gsung thugs gtsang gcol// btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol// snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pa/
268a8: gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// gsung gcig
268b1: ba'i rnam par rtag/ yang dag ga bzhin gshegs/ nga nas bdag pa bcom ldan 'das// nyan mangs kun gyi rgyam cags// 'bar badrug bsnan las par// gsung na 'dig dpaga'aphrul to// skulas sogs
268b2: pa'i rdo rje gsum/ / su dang gsung thugs bsgom pa ni// mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa// dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs// pha rol
268b3: phyin pa sngags tshul gyi/ / rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la// dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa// gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na//
268b4: mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang // reg pa bye ba khrag khrig de// brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang // sems can don bya la rol dang // mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad// phyogs bcu'i
268b5: 'jig rten khams mchog tu/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang // yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni// sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la// kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rang gtsigs
268b6: sngags stong tshul mchog/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di dag rdzogs par gyur snyam nas// spyan ras kyis ni 'tshe mi mdzad// de ltar rnam par dbyed pa'i don// gsang sngags brdul zhugs spyod rnams la// yang dag par
268b7: debyed brlabs phyir/ / de ni ston par mdzad 'di yid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams// so sa skye bor gyur pa la// dngos po med cing dmigs
268b8: sa med/ / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas// ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad// de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// nges par 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams dang // sems can
269a1: don gyi bya ba kun/ / 'dod pas ston pa mdzad pa yin// mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams// sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung // thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung // pha rol phyin par mnyam bzhag nyid//
269a2: de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'gro ba'i don gyis bya ba yang // 'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad// 'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di// mi bskyod las sogs rgyal ba rnams// rol cing dgyes
269a3: par mdzad pa dang / / 'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur cing // 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams// de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa// dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di// de nams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// phyag byar 'os pa'i
269a4: rig pa ni/ / nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod// yod med las sogs byed pa ni// gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur// phyogs bcwalam du chos gsungs pa// gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga// khams las/
269a5: sogs par mtshon pa gang // gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin// 'di ni yan lag thams cad ni// bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o// de nyid gyen gyi theg pa ste// tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di// gang zhig rdo rje
269a6: theg par gnas/ / de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po// chos sku ngo bo las sogs pa// mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa// gnas med gnas
269a7: pa sbyor ba mis/ / 'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa// zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon// 'khor ba dang ni gcig bshos spangs// sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de// mi bskyod las sogs par btags rnams// dngos med gnas
269a8: la gnas pas na/ / sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di// don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas// rnam rtog du
269b1: ma'i kun rtog las/ / chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur// 'dzi skad gsungs pa mi shes pas// phyi dus skye bo la la swa// 'dzag rten pa rnams dran bya'i phyir// gsang bar gyur pa bstan dra gsol// de nas bcom ldan ma tshogs
269b2: pas/ / lag na rdo rje grags pa che// dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa// bu khyod shes rab chen po legs// gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'o// skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur// tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don// yang
269b3: dag bsdus nas khyod kyi bshad/ / de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das// bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la// spyan ras kyis ni 'tshe bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun/
269b4: gyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas// snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu// mchog las mchog tu
269b5: gsungs gyur pa/ / sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la
269b6: dmigs de bzhin no/ / nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// tshig la nges par brjod pa ni// de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus// sna tshogs gsungs pa gzugs gcig pu// yi ge hU~M ni gcig gsungs la// de nas yi ge oM
269b7: gsungs te/ / de bzhin mgon pos yi ge aH// sA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin// hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga// hUM oM AHsa de bzhin hA// 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas sras /
269b8: bcas pa kun// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i// rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes// de nas bcom ldan 'das
270a1: de yang / / de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis// de yi byin brlab sbyor don du// dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor dgod pa zhes bya ba// re re
270a2: gsum gyis sbyor ba yis/ / bsgom pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang // bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do// zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag/ rdo rje
270a3: 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ / rnam par 'gro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas// dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang
270a4: chen gtso/ / 'di ni kun mchog chen por skyes// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba// sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o// snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags// rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do// rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o// skyes bu'i gzugs su
270a5: bsgom par bya/ / sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus// gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do// kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lta'i// de nyid gsum gcig rnam bsgom zhes// bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni// rdo rje dam tshig gtso
270a6: bos gsungs/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che// gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa// hUM oM AHdang swA hA zhes// de nas 'di ni gsung gyur pas// sangs rgyas sras dang
270a7: bcas pa kun/ / de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing // rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa// bub chen de 'dir ji lta bur// mgon po de ni phyi dus na// ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la// gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang /
270a8: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal gyur ces// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so// lan brgya stong dang bye ba yis// grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing // ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang // nga
270b1: brgyal bar de ma gyur/ / ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba// mi mkhas pa yi nga rgyal can// bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su// rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed// de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi// mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi
270b2: shes papa/ / sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yi// gzhan na bral ni mi snyan sgrogs// 'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na// bzhad gang dag ni byed par 'gyur// reg na drug dang mtshungs pa yi// mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// gang shig
270b3: yid ni rin chen 'dra'i/ / 'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// skad gcig rjes gsung grub don du// sbyor bar dgos
270b4: pa'i bsam pa can/ / bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro pan phyag na rdo rje la// de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor// bsgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa// dbang po nyid thub pa nyid// gang
270b5: shig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams/ / sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur// phung po las sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// lus las skyes te yod pa 'di// stong pa'i byin du skyer ba
270b6: las/ / sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod// sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de// bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// zhing sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsams// bdag nyid rang bzhin gyi sadag ni
270b7: rang bzhin dri ma med byas la/ / dal dang sgyur dang gnas pa yi// sna tshogs de gcig dag la bzhugs// yi dmad rim las sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med gyur pa// gang che zhi ba
270b8: bdagacig pu/ / rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste// de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyir rang ni theg byung ba// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga//
271a1: de che snying las raba'ang shing // dbang po thams cad brgyal bar gyur// gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de// de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rang
271a2: 'dar / / nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni// phung po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te// des ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad
271a3: sras dang bcas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te// de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung // de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba// phra mo'i snying gong dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam
271a4: pa'o/ / de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi// go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya// de hU~M zhes bya'i 'od pa che// de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni// 'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
271a5: gsum ni bsam par bya/ / de yi snying khar bsdams nas ni// lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// 'khor lo pad ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'den
271a6: dam pa ste/ / rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgom nas// rnying kha ru ni bskul bar 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par du byas nas ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // rdo rje gsum po yang dag bsgrub// phung po la sogs
