271a7: sangs rgyas gang / / de ni dngos po sa lta pa/ de nyid mchog gigs sngags kyis// skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la// klag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste// gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung // mthong bas skrag te mchog ster cing // 'di dag 'di nyid brtag
271a8: pa yin/ / zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las// sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur ba'i// dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur// phung po la btags sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems
271b1: dpa' rnams/ / sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don bsgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/ de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o// de nas
271b2: bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ / 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'dis dbaka' stsal to// gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs// de na dpa
271b3: po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ / gcig par bsgom pa rtag tu byed// bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i// sngags kyi dbang po rnam bsgom pa// dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste// dngos po thams cad rnam brtags pa'o// 'di ni
271b4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ / sngags kyang ma tshig mchog bsgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor// rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang bsgom// gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa// lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// gas
271b5: ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/ / de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni// mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa// gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba
271b6: yis/ / phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa// chos kyi dbyings las sogs pa'i rim// bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur// rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba// gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid// de ni gsang bas nye bar
271b7: sto/ / der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sngags rig dam pa smra'o zhes// der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni// ston pa 'dir ni bla ma tsha // 'jig rten pa
271b8: 'dir bshad de/ / 'jig rten 'das pa zlog pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni// 'di yis shin du thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob// dgongs pa lung bstan gsang
272a1: u0f7f/ / ba la// gang zhig sems ni dang kAr ba// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag bsrung // de ni rtag tu 'gas par byed// rdo rje gsum gyis gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang // de cing bskul ba zhes byas/
272a2: le'u ban pa yin par bshad// ngan khyod pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rjegasum mchog ma tshag gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/ haM bcwa lnga ma chag ces bya'i/ ting nge 'dzin la sems zhugs nas//
272a3: bzhin gshegs kar rdo rje yi// sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsgom// rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang //
272a4: tshangs pa las sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste// rdo rje gsu ma sogs bshad gyur pa// klu yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o// ma dang zung ni gsung rda rje// byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o// hrI ni rdo rje gsum
272a5: mtha' nyid/ / sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byang pa'o// de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang // ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad // nyi shu lnga sogs ma can gyi// skye bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas ro re'ang gsum nyid de// rdo rdzags /
272a6: sngags nyid de g+ha ra// brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni nam mkha' las brgyar 'gyur// brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// mgrin bcu zhes bya'i mang can dang // sgra sgrogs
272a7: gsol ba'i dga' byed 'gyur/ / de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste// 'jug pa las sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu// de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang dag
272a8: 'byung / / langs spyang rdzogs skrangs pa'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur// mtshams dang skye mched nor lta'o// zla bzung gcig rig byed de// de las sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams// dan pa/
272b1: pa'i skyes bur gnas// 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsapa// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa// yi ge hA ni ngas
272b2: bas pa mo/ / rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa drug gis// de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par// bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// sngags rnams kur gyi gtsug tor ni// sngags kyi skyes pa
272b3: gsang ba pa/ / gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur// sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa po// chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/ rgyal dang med byung cha gtsug gtor// lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu yang dag
272b4: bshad/ / sbyor dang bya ba gnyis mang bzhin// sbyor ba 'ba' shig nyid la 'di// hU~M ni gtsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan// sngags
272b5: kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// oM zhes bya ba de ru bsgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge aHni rnam par bsgom// chos kyis dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang // yi ge hUM ni
272b6: deru bsgom/ / yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// rdo rje gsum na mnyes byed
272b7: mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'// oM AHhU~M gi grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// thugs kyi ye shes 'jigs su bya// rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni// re re zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags
272b8: kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang / / rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byeng pa'o// sngags kyi rig
273a1: pa zhes bsgrags pa/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin// rdo rje gsum mnyam mi byed pa// rdzogs pa las sogs bsgom pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni// gsum po ye shes rdo rje skyel//
273a2: byin brlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin// rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i// stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi// rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun du brtsam// thabs
273a3: dang shes rab nyi zla byed/ / thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag/ de yi byed nyid zla phyed kyis// rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol
273a4: dngos grub/ / grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus// bskyod pa yi ge oM bsgom bya// sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshig gang //
273a5: snying por yongs su brtag pa yin// sna rtse dang ni rtsi ba nyid// spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba// byed pos gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye rdo rje gsung/
273a6: snga yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can// pA sa kI dang gos dkar mo// sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan// 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de las ni//
273a7: dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa// ye shes lnga po bstan nas ni// rdo rje skal ba gsum du gnas// ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba rdo rje
273a8: gsum/ / de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces bya de nyid do// sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs// zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba// rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de// sku yi
273b1: gsang ba mchog 'di ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yi// ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to// a dang u ni lkog kha'i dbus// zhan gyi steng gi ming cad do// id cani lag pa
273b2: g.yon nyid/ / u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag/ ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod// li ti rkang pa gcig shos la// dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do// dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// ha ni lus skyes gtsug gtor dang // gcod na
273b3: gsum po gcod pa can/ / yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de// lnga po'i lnga bar de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig byed sbyor// de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags// dus can
273b4: bdag nyid sbyor dbang po/ / de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/ a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni// dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa// rang
273b5: sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni/ / a ni ngag gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgom pas// dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya// gsung gi
273b6: dam tshig spros par bshad/ / khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya// chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/
273b7: rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas// gsung gi gsang pa 'di nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags// rnams pa /
273b8: dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang sngags skyes bu dag/ hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya// dam tshig chen po de nyid can// kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes
274a1: rdo rje ngag gis bya/ / ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// lkog margan dang de nas mchu// spyi bos yi ming can te// rdo rje
274a2: gsum thugs gsang ba gcig/ de ni hi la zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba// rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung // ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor
274a3: dbus gnas par/ / rdo rje chen po bsams nas ni// lus kun la ni khams dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur// dngos po med don gsal byed pa// kha nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad// rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las//
274a4: kha du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni
274a5: yang dag gnas/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che// chos rnams de ni mi gzigs so// sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med rang // mi snang 'di mi dam tshig yin// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi
274a6: gzigs so/ / sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung // mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin// de yi 'akod phreng zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ni yang ngag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid// sku dang ldan pa'i 'od pe che// rdo rje
274a7: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ / rang sngags skyes bu gsang bar bya// ha ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa// snying kha ru ni yang mdzes pa// rtag tu sbyor bas bzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya// su gsung thugs kyi longs
274a8: spyod ni/ / 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can/ sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni// dgongs don de tshe kun du byung // ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// snang ba can zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin ni
274b1: yang dag bshad/ / nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// thA na 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje sku dang 'dra bas 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje mtha' 'dra sbyor// dam tshig bkod pa'i
274b2: gnas gyur pa/ / ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i// the ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad// sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa// dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad// mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di// de ni skyes bu
274b3: mchog tu 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog bsgrib pa// 'di ni dam pa yin par bshad// de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i mchog/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas
274b4: par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgom la// yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso// 'di ni mi phyed spor ba yis//
274b5: bsgoms pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur// me bskyed pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs
274b6: rtse gcig 'dzin pa las/ / 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje
274b7: bsgoms te/ / de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom// rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing // dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi// bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing //
274b8: sugasung thugs myong rdo rje yis// ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ga/ rdzob shes 'dzin de 'gyur// longs spyod dam tshig ces pa ba// rin chen po rjeg cig tu 'byung // de nyid
275a1: sa la/ dgan 'gyur/ ma sa gas pa// sa maHsa ba /
275a2: ji rdzogs // rdoH gsadu ba hU~M// bcom ldan dgas du rgyan// ma las/
275a3: theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// ye shos rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan// 'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur// don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa// 'od zer yi
275a4: shes mchog ces bya'o/ / ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//
275a5: de ri rnam snang rdo rjer bshad// 'od zer der ni rab tu bsgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM// 'od chen dar ni rab tu bsgom// de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni bcom ldan mgon
275a6: pos bshad/ / rnam snang rdo rje can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po// sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// de la dmig
275a7: pa'i rdo rje can/ / ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la// de nas gsang ba
275a8: bdag po'o/ / gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba// thub pa cha la slar yang zhus// oM a hUMn gsum las sogs// rdzu sogs thog mar gnas pa yi/ su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi skyes bur der 'gyur ro//
275b1: oM ni rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur// A ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso// hrI ni rdo rje sems dpar bshad// skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur// b+h+rUM ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// ni nges par mi sdang ba// yain 'jam dpal yang
275b2: dag bshad/ / kA~M rdo rje bkod ces bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol// de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad// oM las sogs pa a las skyes// oM a hrI cing gsus/
275b3: rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags// shin tu rnam par nges par bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa// lnga pa bcwa lngar yang dag bshad// khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gas
275b4: sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba/ / gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te// de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni//
275b5: dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung // dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming // de dag ji ltar rtog par 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i ming // pi bang sgra ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin phyag rgya med par ni// gsang sngags
275b6: dngos grub mi 'byung ngo / / brda' gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gis don du rab gsungs pa// lag pa'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub pa'i// phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya gcig pu'i
275b7: sbyor ba dang / / gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'dir ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na// gsang sngags gcig skyes
275b8: dngos grub ni/ / 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar bsgrub// sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur dang // lha rnams kyi yang sbyor las byung // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten
276a1: su/ dag ga / lta ma
276a2: dzad/ gang ga na sa 'phrul/ rnams pa thugs pa/ ba// 'di dag sa 'angs sa// ga nas / sa pa mnag pa gar ba/ mi migs pa dag
276a3: de nas mngon po bcom ldan 'das/ / dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam paste// phyag d+ha'i ngas pa 'jig tan pa la// rdo rje lags gsasu ga tanas ga A
276a4: spong bayis/ da pa chog dag 'gyur// gser 'gyur rje yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byed pa yid// de bzhid sngags kyi de nyid kyis// bin ba der gshegs byed pa yin// des bus sbyor ba'i gsang sdigs ci/
276a5: bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi spos bur 'gyur ba yid// dngos med pa las yang dag smras// sngags kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste// 'di ni phyag rgya chen pa
276a6: ste/ / 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis// myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol// gnas pa yis ni de bsgrub pa'o// yid ston dngos grub dam pa yin// de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya che dang gcig
276a7: bab las/ / myur ba las sogs gsum ldan pa/ ngan phyag rgya yin par bshad/ ba da mas slob ma pas// nab 'dus ga pa bya/ ltung ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // gnas pa'i rjesas byur ba rnams/ sun dang bar nga gshegs
276a8: su gso'o/ / 'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur las sogs// ci rigs pa na nges par sbyar// phung po las sogs chos rnams kun// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba// mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur
276b1: radag nas 'gyur/ / 'ang rigs sngags stong 'gyur med// phyag rgya'ang chos su 'angad cad yin// daltan yang 'gro ba'i do// yid bzhin nong bulta bur byed// 'od ti rje 'dzin gang shig/ skor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi// byung nga
276b2: bdang gshegs pagasal/ / de bzhi dung gnas gyur ba'o// nye ba'i tshig ni srung drang ba/ ring nas lag par rab tu spyod// de bzhin gsung sngags de nyid kyang // gnyig la ni yang dag stong// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis// phyag kyi brang po
276b3: yod par bshad/ / sems sa byed spyod bdag nyid ni// 'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag/ rags na mang yang dag spyod // rigs kyi byeb byor yi/ phyag byas ma gsus la gdapa pa/ kha 'og krasa'i mo yang // ga la zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug/
276b4: dag pa'i rings pa nyid dang ni// nga rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid// dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// gzhan yang gsang ba po yi mchog/ sems kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos pang // dngos med byang chub
276b5: 'thob pa la/ / gsang sngags med cing phyag tu med// 'jig rten nani rtog ci snyed// ngas gsum du ni kun 'thung ba// de ni dngos med sems gcig las// rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtog pa// byang chub kur rdzob sa yin la/
276b6: de las gzhar du'ang reng mi 'gyur// gnyi ga las min gzhan las mini// mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis sngags// gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub dang bslab bya dang /
276b7: rnam par me tog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyi longs spyod de// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben par rab tu brtag/ gsal dang mi gsal ya nga kaM ldan 'ang nga
276b8: 'bab rta las sogs yin/ / mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod las sogs pa yi ming // 'di na sngags rig mchog rnams kyi// bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir 'ji rted
277a1: pa'i brdeg pa'o/ / me bskyod ye shes las sogs pa// rdo rjen pa mkha'i dkyil du bsam// bangon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgoms// rdo rje mngon shes re rje// das gas so/
277a2: tu bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis// mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa brtag/ gtso
277a3: me b+hag mang po 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom bdug rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas// rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// 'khor le rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par
277a4: rab bsgor sa / / sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge e bsams na// sngags la mngon shes bsgom par 'gyur//
277a5: 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems// na ba zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi// dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod rab tu
277a6: bskod/ / dU stong kha'i zla gnas par// bsam la sems ni de ru bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// ma ri sing kha'i thig ler gnas// bsam la rdo rje'i yad dag pan
277a7: 'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par
277a8: su gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ / bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH/ bsams na bskal bdag tu
277b1: gnas/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gdas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par de// lus dang ngag sems yi ge hU~M// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsu pa// dpa ji gtogs pa sa
277b2: gsungs/ / dgu mtha' can gyi la ga'ang // sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing ming med la// shes dang shes byarnams spangs pa'ang // kun rdzob lan legs gnas nas// ngag gi sngags bu 'di brjod /
277b3: rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can// rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cang ni// gang zhig klog gas sems kyang / rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur// ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// dgongs pa lung ston 'dir gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun kyis
277b4: lang bstar/ / khyad par du yang byed kyis rlog/ klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni// bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad bcom nas na//
277b5: byang bar de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing // 'khor los sbyar ba'i bu bzhin du// byang chub myur du des 'thob bo// kham sa gsubasku dang gsung thugs kyi// sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis//
277b6: de ni dngos po med par 'joms// dngos med gcig tu rdzogs longs spyod// phung sogs yan lag don las byung // bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni// sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin// ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan/
277b7: skad cig kyang ri 'dor mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // rigs las skyes pa byin gyis rlob// dge yang lung ston la gnas nas// gsang ba rin chen yang dag bsrung // mig bzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid// spyod pa
277b8: dga' byed par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te// sku dang gsungs thugs gsang ba dang // gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung // de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog/ bcu gcig/
278a1: ga / na na smra// da gas ga / ga tu
278a2: gsung gis bka' stsal to/ / mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la// rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can// dngos med shin du dri med la// dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni// gang dang grwa dang rol po dang // rgod dang sgrog pas ze
278a3: pas/ 'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyis// rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom// gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can ni// ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin// gang sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni// myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur//
278a4: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa// de yi ming ni yid ldan pa// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang // thos shing reg par gyur pa ni// de ni u dum ba
278a5: ra yi khe tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/ / sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// / rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i
278a6: bdag mchog de/ / chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus// mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las// rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang // 'jig rten bde gar byed pa// gsungs te ma
278a7: 'ongs skye bo na/ / chos dbyings de ni gar min na// gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags// mongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyad pan gar// gsang mthon myos pas bsul ba yin// chos dbyings de glu min na// gtso bo ji ltar gla len 'gyur/
278a8: rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyad phan gru// gsang mthong gyos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de ni rol mo min// gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur// 'jig rten rgyad pan mongs rol mo// gsang mthon byas pas bskum
278b1: ba lags/ ngos dbyings de rgod ma lags na// gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyad pan rgong // gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de sgeg ma la ba pa na// gtso bo ji ltar
278b2: sgeg par 'gyur/ / mongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyad pan sgeg/ gsang mthong myos pas bskul ba lags// de ltar rnam pa mang po la// gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing // bza' dang min las sbyor ba yi// rnal 'byor pa ni ba
278b3: yin snyam/ / rdo rje yi ri tshig mchog 'di// yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid// de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag/ yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog/ de nas de nyid yang dag bzung // rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa/ de nyid
278b4: gsum mnyam nyid spor ga/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston// sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas// nor can ming ni nyams las sogs// gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i// gar gyis skye dgu dag par byed// rdzogs
278b5: pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub/ / sna tshogs byed kyis gsungs pa rnams// sems zhi ba yid rnal 'byor pa// de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// mgon po shes rab 'di srid du// thabs kyis mchil par
278b6: bar sbyor/ / sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis// khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin// bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa// dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni// gzhan rnams pa ni ston mdzad pa// ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o// phyi rol
278b7: sngags don dngos grub ni/ / de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi// 'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can// der yang grub par 'gyur ba yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing // sred pa yis ni ston par byed// bcom ldan 'das gsung
278b8: gsang pa ni/ / gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed// khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams// sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten pa rnams sngar 'gyur zhing // de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// sred pa 'am dad pa/
279a1: ngag gis kyang 'khyen dang nge ba'i nanyan thos rnams// gsang ba la ni srog rgyu bzhin// rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur// mgon po de ni deng gnas shing // nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas// de nas/
279a2: tshig min gyung bar 'phyang// reg ga dud rtsi sbyong ba las// chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang // phyi nas 'dzags shing skrag par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur bar// bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub 'gyur
279a3: ba dang / / sngag bsang ba lags// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba// gdod g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa// gsang sngags las sogs chos rnams la//
279a4: dad pa rnams ni snyed mi med // log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni// byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur// a yi dog pa'i ngas 'di ni// sbyor ba shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin// de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam dag kyang ni byed par
279a5: 'gyur/ / sku ni g.yo yi tshul gyis ni// rgyal po rnams ni skye bar byed// steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni// brgyad gnyis pa yi tshul du byed// de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag/ ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni// a yi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i// yang dag
279a6: dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na// de ni longs spyod lam skyed min// de bas skye bo med gcig pu// bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/ der ni mche ba can ming 'gro// de la brtsal ba 'ba' shig yin/
279a7: rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras// bar chad shin tu mang po pa// bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms// sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can// des ni tshig de thos pa dang // rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing / dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog
279a8: las/ / sra zhig bdag ni zlog par byed// ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag/ de la chad pas gcad par bya// 'di la 'jigs pa'i sems 'od la// skye bo med par khyed kyis ni// rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzangs sam// gang shig mi
279b1: sru rigs can rnams/ / dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa// de dag thams cad brlag par bya// de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni// rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid tshe// rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o// 'di yis gang ni
279b2: g.yegs nams/ / rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig/ a yi dogs paras te byin// ji ltar skye bzhin rgyas po byas// don chen rin thang med blangs rnams// 'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas su// de nas de ni mi snang ba// rgyun can gyis nir tshe byas/
279b3: sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig/ rigs skyes pa la de rnams sba// rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang // skrag par byed cing the tshom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// 'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso// phyag na rdo rje
279b4: ge byed pa/ / snyan pa'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs// rdo rje thal mos ston par byed// rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa// de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o// rdo rje thal me de nyid 'di// lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig/ de nyid
279b5: gsum du gyur pa de/ / rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag/ de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste// tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de ru de ni lha gsum 'gyur// oM AHhU~M dad grangs mnyas pa'i// gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni//
279b6: ngogs lus can gcig ming can// zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston// der ni nga yang gnas pa yin// dpal yon de la bzhin mi sdug/ de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming // de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni// mthe ma sogs ji bzhin grangs su
279b7: bshad/ / lag pa g.yon ni drag por gyur// g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste// gnyis pa sbyor bar tshangs pa yin// de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang // rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste// rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad// srid sung ni
279b8: bang yin te/ / mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin// lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni// bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa// byed po'i mtsham gyi hUM mchog ni// rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrogs// nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der// so sor yongs su
280a1: bsgrags pa yin/ / yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur pa// shis pa zhi bskyon med pa// yon tan oM dang yi ge byed// oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin// sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan// gtsug mtha' dang ni
280a2: lag pa gnas/ / nyi ma zla ba'i sbyar ba las// ye shes me ni nges par skye// lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni// sbyor las thar bar de bshad de// a// 'og tu a dang yang dag ldan// de steng yi ge a nyid de// thang ka ru ni ma bshad de/ slong
280a3: yig phyed zhi ba nyid/ / yi ge yon tshangs pa ste// a ni khyab 'jug yin par bshad// hU ni rlung du gyur pa yin// de nyid drag po zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i phyed phyed zhes bya ba// der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin// gnas dang 'pho dang
280a4: ba dang / / gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho// ye shes rang nyid med yin te// khyad par 'dzin pa de bzhin no// ral gri las sogs dngos grub der// byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur// gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi// rnam dag 'di dag
280a5: rab tu brtag/ tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der // ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur// de ni mtho ris sogs 'gag pas/ de bzhin 'byung ba sel ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas// gnyis spang par ni rnam par gnas/
280a6: shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas// 'jug 'gyur ba ni drag po yin// nam mkha' dgag pa'i sbyor ba yang // tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can// mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste// de yi dbus na dbus gzung ba// sA ya
280a7: cha ni stong las gcig/ zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid// thar pa gcig pur de ston bya// thar pa ngo bo nyid ma yin// de lta bas na 'di log bya// zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o// ston pa de rnams phye nas ni// zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur//
280a8: thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag/ 'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas// de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing // sngags ni byed pa mtha' yas pa// 'di nyid du ni nyi zla dang /
280b1: byin shegalas can med de// lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang // rtag tu 'chang dang 'phel 'grib dang // de nyid gsupa'i sbyor skyes 'di// de nyid gcig bu rnam pa gnas// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyong chos la// de yang gcig dang dram spangs// khyod
280b2: dbas de ni 'da' ma bya/ / de bzhin gshegs kun yod 'gyur bas// den spong bar ma byazhing/ 'di dag dngas med la ltos pas// rnal 'byor pa de chog tu 'dod// gzhan du na ma rtog nyid las ni/ ngas grubar ma
280b3: dag pa zal ma sbyar ba 'di/ sems can rjes gzung ngam pa yin// ma gzung ba yi sems can rnams bcub na byed kyis b+has 'on sugs pa dang / de bzhin long bar byung ba da/ sheg ba pa gang brub de dang/
280b4: na zan ltar bya// de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa// de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas// de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur// de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no// de ni nang min phyi ma yin// gnyis min gzhan gyi rgyu las min// phyag rgya tshogs pa las
280b5: skyes man/ / 'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min// rdo rje thal mo bsdoms pas ni// ming ni de rje thal mor gyur// sems can rnams kyi rtogs dga' ba'i// snying po rtogs par bya ba mchog/ phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin// phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no//
280b6: mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de// dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// 'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas// gnyis pos gcig gyur dge 'dun te// de 'di skyabs ni gsum yin te/
280b7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin// phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin// thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur//
280b8: skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum// rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum// zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang // lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang // dus gsum dam tshig mchog gsum dang // tshul gsum dkyil 'khor
281a1: gsum du 'gyur/ / sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste// ji srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams// de ni thal mo'i sbyor 'di yin// 'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog/ rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag/ ma 'ongs skye bos thob par
281a2: 'gyur/ / de nyid du ni der 'gyur na// gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs// chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa// 'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud// 'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig/ gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba// bsdu bar byas/
281a3: par gyur pas kyang // sku gsung don gyi chos nyid do// 'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste// dngos po med cing gnas med pa// mtha' med zad pa med par 'byung // sku gsung dag ni rkyen las ni// rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ de las sangs
281a4: rgyas snying por gyur/ / hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtags// oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste// AHni gnas pa sor 'gyur ro// gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga// gsal dang mi gsal dang sbyor ba ni
281a5: rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te/ / de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o// zlos dang bsam gtan rnam bral bar// de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster// rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te// 'dod pa'i zlas par de bshad do// rnal 'byor pa la de/
281a6: gsal te// byis rnams de la phyin ci log/ rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum// dngos po med par de bshad do// de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni// yid min pa yi bzlas par gyur// yid ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las// rings
281a7: dang ngal dang gnas pa rnams/ / zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste// nam mkha'i dbings dang mnyam par thim// dngos pa med pa 'di nyid 'di/ ten 'thung chos shes bya ba yin/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus de gyur// sprul pa bsam mi
281a8: khyab ces dben/ / sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa// de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming // rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar// sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed// dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje sbyar// sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis/
281b1: de yi chos rnams ston par byed// rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can// sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin// gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas// sems can nams ni der 'jog ste// gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang //
281b2: 'jig rten rnams la gsol bya dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de// khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin// gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur// de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba
281b3: yis/ / thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so// sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin// de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa// chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so// rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di// khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung
281b4: gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i/ / dngos grub des ni thob par 'gyur// a nyid der ni mi gsal ba'i// sgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin// dog par de ni yod bshad de// dngos po med pa ras kyis ming // dpags pa gshin rje
281b5: gshed bsgoms la/ / gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya// dag pa de yi ras don las// mi snang ba la sogs grub cing // yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung / a yi dog ras mtshon pas ni//
281b6: 'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad// 'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod// sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur// byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur// tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig
281b7: pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ / de yang shin du ldan sems can// sems can sogs la rnam par gnas// rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang // 'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/ skye ba med las skyes pas na// gcig dang du marnam
281b8: spangs pa'o/ / shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni// 'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod// de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba// rnam pa mi tog gcig shos nyid// ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te// sngags ni na ri bri bar bya// rang gi sde bcas
282a1: ba/ / gnas dka ri// yaM ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba// so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni// i u dang ni ring bor bcas// a ai au a ya ste mtha'// bzhi po dang bcas thu por bri// bsam gyi mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i// 'gro ba mnyam/
282a2: bzhag bslong pa yid// 'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi/ chume yi ger zhugs par 'gyur// de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang // rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur// cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni/ khamed
282a3: dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / nag yon grangs bzhin du// ung sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa// nyi shu yon sngon ma yang // de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin// smon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum dag ni sa par
282a4: 'dod/ / 'gro ba 'don ni bying gyur pa'ang // mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las// yon tan gas pan par 'byas pa// yon tan med pa'i yon tan meng // gnon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming // ba 'din par skyes// deni mi thegs mam
282a5: yin te/ oM yu nga ni ring por bcas// yi ga gsum bcas thig ler ldan// tshig drag mtha' mi ring sde can// yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang // bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin// nyid ring po ring po'i mthas/ bcu gnyis pas
282a6: grangs su 'phrur/ / de nyid yig ur sbyor las// yig mo zhes brjod pa yin// snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yin// ming ni bcubazhi par 'gyur ro// ci ste a las sngags pas ni// a nyid du ni lta bar bya// de bzhin ma yi sbyor ba las/
282a7: ga man ci 'dod par// ji bzhi grangs kyis yang dag blta// rara'ang sa yi skyo sa s+ho// oM 'i u'i tshigs las kyang // sngags pa ya ral wa'i gzugs// skrag ma mkha' da bar dang ni// rkan dang sgrib ga gas
282a8: gang mas pa'i sngagangs / ma i la li khya ba na gnas// yon tshan phrag pa lag pa dang // tshig rnams la ni de bzhin no// dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang // lag pa g.yon par rab tu rtag/ dpyi nga ba dang byin pa dang //
282b1: pag lags ga no// gzug sa ni grangs mnyam pas// can shin ma grub sted// ma tshan de bzhin thas dang // lag par na sangs sra ba gang// rka sa na tshan// das pa tshu
282b2: bzhugs pa yid/ / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i// sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong // spun gyi grub pas dngos grub pa// me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin// rang chud kyis ni nang nyid du// mchog dag ni bya ba yin/
282b3: dgongs pa lasags rnam pa kun// ny-id las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur// cha ba'i bzhi bzhi sa sbyor bas// mkhas pa yis ni sgoms rnams bya// ka tsaT ta batshan yang // dbus dang shar la sogs thon 'o// grol ngan
282b4: pa'i 'dod ba yang / / maskal bar ni mthong ba yin// thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yag/ mig ha yis mchod par bya// rtswa tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing // 'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos// yig yan lus su bya// gas
282b5: rnam pa dang bcas pa/ / mtshams pang lnga yis sbyor ba las// sngags pa 'grob pan par ston// sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skye// dbang bsrur gsum mo byilas rtse// gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni// sa ga
282b6: gcig gis nges sbyor gyur/ / de tshe dkyil 'khor mer byas pa// 'jig rten pa yi chos dgar 'gyur// a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi//
282b7: gsang sngags bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa// rang gi mtshan ma gcig shos nyid// gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams
282b8: su/ / dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas// dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang // 'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs bsgo bya ba'o// 'gro don gtogs 'dod pa ma
283a1: yon tan g+har bdag la/ / dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod// sdod chad mdzad pa'i skrod la ba rab mchog dgongs nas de// thub pa rdo rje'i tshig bcog rngab par dbye bar gsol// dor bu rin chen dag
283a2: gis ral brgyar sku'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don byed srid mo bdag la sten par mdzad// lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku// bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod// sring mos kyang ni khyad par du/
283a3: de ltar bskul ba tsam gyi ni// de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de// ga pa'i pad ma dpal du mdzad/ shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis me 'dir sdod gyur// bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par
283a4: mchis bzhed na/ / dga' ba las byung chos dga' bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba dang ni 'od dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni// nam yang ltos par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags// kun tu song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dmachog
283a5: ston/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin khrus// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags
283a6: pa mdzad/ / 'dod pa med cing chags la zhi// de yang don dam dag gyur yin// spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni// bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin// bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan// mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang // zung
283a7: dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhag par bya// ha ya~M ste tshan ka sde dang // bcu gnyis byed byed rtag tu sbyar// gshin rjegashed kyi gzugs 'di ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dgal dgod// de nas sngags
283a8: pa mdun 'dug ste/ / dgongs pa'i don gyis brtags par bya// phung po khams la sogs blta ba// brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin// ma byin len pa byang chub sems// kun rdzob bsten pa brdzun smra ba//
283b1: phung po srog chags gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin// mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste// de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni// dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru// sngags pa yis ni da bya'o// bshad pa zhes ni yul la bshad//
283b2: gci bzhes ni dbang po yin// de dag za ba de bshad pa ni// ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o// khrag gi lpags par yang dag bshad// sa bon lus shes bya ba yin// rkang ni sems kyi kun rtag pa// za ba dngos med gyur pa'o// smon
283b3: lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni/ / bi mu ra shu pas 'di// lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang // chos
283b4: nyid de yang mi shes so/ / rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas// chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang ben pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed// yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/ 'gro la gsal bar
283b5: rtog byed pa/ / 'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyi ni de nyid mthong // gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni dngos grub la bzhol ba// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las// dngos po med pa nyid du byung // bdag nyid
283b6: bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/ / kun rdzob don gyi brten por 'byung // sprul pa'i lus las sngags pas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed// gsang ba'i dngos po de nyid 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o// rdo rje gsum gnas
283b7: sbyong ba yis/ / bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// nam mkhar rtags pa'i rnal 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
283b8: dpag bas pa shing / / dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan// sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba// rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya// phung sogs yan lag thams
284a1: cad de/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa// bsdus bsngags ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya// lus la sogs pa rdo rje gas pa// /
284a2: gsum nas spro bar ba// rdo rje gsum dang lags sbyor las// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag tog/ sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yid// lnga bcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa// brgya brgya ba nas
284a3: mdor phyogs la/ / tsaM rigs gcig pa'i yang dag togs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol// dpag tshad brgya yi khyod tsam du// 'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis// sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni// de ni snang ba zhes bshad do// tshangs pa
284a4: dbang po la sogs lha/ / dad pas de la phyag kyang byed// 'di ni mi snang byed pa ste// ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing // ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par//
284a5: mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtags// bshang gci sbyangs las der gyur pa// gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o// dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog/ mi byed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas// dkon mchog gsum ni panyam byas te// bdag
284a6: med pa yang bsgom par bya/ / dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin// bdag med ces bya kha yin te// gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du// bcug pa ri lu yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i// bsgom pa sems
284a7: kyi dam pa'o/ / de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms na// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par gyur// rang gis sngags kyis rnam sgoms nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms na// sangs rgyas 'dra bar
284a8: 'gyur bar bshad/ / sum bcu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o// gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste// sna ni ri rab ces bya'o// bdag nyid chen po sur/
284b1: bcu bdun// nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi khyab/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste// 'di dang 'khor du gyur pa yid// 'jig rten pa yi rang ngo bo// phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin
284b2: ces bya/ / 'khor lo dngos grub rnyed slab// skad cig sbyor bas bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbas su rab bsgobs // rdo rje gur gyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// rab
284b3: supa bcu rtsa drug gis/ / rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de snyed bud med de yini// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drug po yis ri phyag byas 'gyur// rdo rje dpa tshig ces bya ba'i// ting na
284b4: 'di ni yang dag bshad/ / pad ma chen po mdab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed/
284b5: kyi/ sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ri// dkyil 'khor la bdag bdag nyid 'jog/ gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi// rdo rje pad mo grub bcas sbyin// so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// shin tu grangs
284b6: med bskal bar ri/ / grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin// de yi ye shes lnga ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// 'jig rten pan phyir gsungs pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
284b7: mtha' yas pa'i/ / yon tan gsum ni yongs su bsten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i// rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag pa de bzhag ra// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs chung 'di//
284b8: tatsing+ka re khams gsum pa// pad ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher// rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum kun gyi cher mchod cing // tshangs pa lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu// dpag chen po yi
285a1: 6/ rangs par 'gyur/ zugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas// dngas grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// da ni de ma thag tu 'thob// rang ga rnga rje tang 'dzin 'ang // dngas mang gcag zus
285a2: byang grol la yang rim gnas/ / ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur// oM na ra lu tsan ka'o// 'bru tshod tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes
285a3: 'od b.rar/ / rdo lnga dang ma thagar 'gyur// 'dzam pa'i chu bo'i gser mdog gas// nyi pa 'angar ba'i mdog 'dra ba la/ na ka'i 'dra kyal// yi ge 'dam pa A bsam mo// de yi byas su lha yi gzugs// khar bcug nas ni
285a4: rnam bsgoms ra/ / byang chub ye shes 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbus gnas pa yi// tsar ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge dA ni rnam bsam te// dbus su rang gis lha bsams na// khar bcug nas ni rnam
285a5: bsams na/ / rdo rje sems dpa' 'ar pa che// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo gser mdog dang // nyi pa'ar ra ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms
285a6: la/ / lag 'khor lo rnams bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje 'bru mdog sbyor ba yang // 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo chen po rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam bri
285a7: rku ba'i gser mdog gam/ / nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/
285a8: rdo rje sa yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen la ni rin chen bsgom// de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na// rin chen rig pa 'dzid par
285b1: 'gyur/ 'ang ched mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di// rin chen tha ma gyung ba las// ran chen rigs kyu mchog bsgom pa// sa shes rdo rje dag gis bya// rnam pa'ang dbyangs kyad pas gdas pa gas dpag sa dpar ba bskos la// las
285b2: padam pa de/ / bang pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad ma mchog gi bsgrubs pa 'di// pad ma'i sring na skyong ba las// pad ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni// ya shAs rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bu
285b3: gnas pa/ / don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu ral gri rab bskams na// ral gri'i reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog na 'di bsgrub pa// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgobs pa
285b4: ye shes rdo rje ngag gis bya/ / bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis// mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis bsgrub par 'gyur// dam rig chen po 'byung ba yis// ma
285b5: tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i/ / mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug/ snga tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid// 'gog dang lam ni bzhi po ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad// bsgrub pa po na
285b6: gnas ming can/ / shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can// sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no// 'byin dang dub pa nyid dang ni// gnas pa yis ni nyer
285b7: mdzes pa/ / yid rton pa yi mnyam sbyor la// rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das// rdo rje sngags kyu khyad par du// bsgrub pa po ni rtag tu bsgrub// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// sbyor gsupa rdo rje car
285b8: bsam pa/ / sku gsung thugs kyis lcags kyu'o// sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// pi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/
286a1: sangs kyis dpag pa la 'i// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang // lags la byong bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni/
286a2: mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rdo rje bkug nas no// sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya// nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje tsan// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lcags kya de rnams
286a3: 'grub par 'gyur/ / dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/ rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo cha// rdo rje pad ma la sogs bya// me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni
286a4: rnam par bsgom/ / lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// lcags kyu la sogs rab tu bsgom// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur/ sku
286a5: rang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ / mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yos// gsung gi rdo rje mnyas bsgom// brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do// dngos med ngas
286a6: tshig sbyor ba yi/ jiHji ltar rab bsgrub pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// de ni yang dag yin par bshad// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod// bcom ldan dam tshig chen pos//
286a7: rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs// de nas phyag na rdo rje ni// go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs// gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i// mnyam pa mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi// de ni de yis yang dag
286a8: bshad/ / ral 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid// dam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// byas na dam tshig yang dag pa// sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar// dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi// dmachog mchog la gnas nas ni/ dz+ran/
286b1: bdag nyid smos pa ri// rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ste// rdzogs longs spyod yul bshad pa yin// de nyid ye shes dbang po gcig/ dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// longs spyod
286b2: rdzogs phung las byung ba/ / glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag/ dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las// mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste// dngos med de nyid las sbyor las// dam tshig gcig/
286b3: tu legs sbyor na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// dngos med de ni khyi sha yin// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs
286b4: rgyas spyan pa la sha/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las// dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yin// sha chen dang ni bshang gcing pa
286b5: glang po rta khyib lang dag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur// bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni// sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di dang
286b6: ldan par 'gyur/ / nga na sangs rgyas byin pa rab cing // rnam kun rdo rje ca dgas pa dang // snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan lan rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i// 'di na ma tshig spyos pa'o//
286b7: dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog 'di rab tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin to// de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon// gtso bo rnam snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam
286b8: pa/ / rdo rje 'dzin pas slang yang zhus// gang zhig phyir bor brtag pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des// ri rab sum cun drug tu// mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur// nga gi bstan bcos brda' yis ni/ phyi rol pade na ma rtos
287a1: lating 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang / / 'di la rang gi ngo bo med/ tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyu las ni// ri ba gcig dang bcas ba ba gang/ byam pa coMg mo byed pa// gsung ra bye bo spang bar 'byur/ denas
287a2: bcom ldan padag pa 'das/ tha la grang gsangs pa/ legs sa rdo rje legs pate// rje di pa khyod lags pa// rgan pos theg pa dag/ da shing mis gas la bag / sa ng+yas pa da man
287a3: ngag/ theg pa ze mi 'ayod ngo do// tshang yod pa dang yongs chad ba'i// nga gi a la gang ba shad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o// ma mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes// rdo rje theg pa tha med ga/
287a4: mchog sbyin de ni khyed bzhin du// rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje theg brgya mdzoste// de yis ya ga pa mthong bas// rang gi srung ni tshad ma yis// gzhan yod pa min zhes pa// thag pa rtse la gsang ba rnams// mang lag
287a5: bcal te de smra ba/ / de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// nga yi tshig las bltas te smra// de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bsgol ba rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pa
287a6: gsungs pa yin/ / sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub// sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ster// dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni yis yang dag bshad/ dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni// rdo rje can gyi hUM bsams te// rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga// zos na
287a7: rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ AHdang mau gyi gas ba dag/ 'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi yas// phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rje bshad// rdo rje/
287a8: sems dpa' yang dag 'byung // ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur// de nyid sems can thams cad kyi// de bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che// 'jig rten khams
287b1: ni thams cad du/ / sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i//
287b2: reg pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// yi rdo rje bsgom bdag nyid// grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa// mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/ stong khams dag ni snang bar byed// lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas// sangs rgyas ral
287b3: 'byor ma legs sbyor/ / gang gA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun// dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa// lag tu kU ru ra ba zhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis de mthong
287b4: 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa// rna ba la gnas ma nor bar// skad cig gis ni dkun thos// gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na// sku la sogs pa gsum gyi mtshan// sems zhes bshad pa'i
287b5: bsgom pa mchog/ sems can dmas kyis de nyid rig/ bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs// rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro// rang gi rnang sems bcas pa// gang gA'i bye ba'i ming
287b6: can gyis/ / gnas kyis dngos grub bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes gnas// 'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to// mngon shes drug ni don grub pa'i// de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// gang
287b7: gA'i klung gi bye snyed/ / 'khor rnams kyi ni rab mdzes pas// sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spong // yid rton pade gcig bsten pa ste// de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis spyod
287b8: rus/ / bsten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'o// yid nyon mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// sgrub pa yin da ma tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o//
288a1: rkyen dang nyan thos pa do sdig// 'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags// sems la dmigs dang 'dir byor pa// ga cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bstan pa'i bcig sbyong gcig dang / nye bar bsgrub pa dag
288a2: gyur dang / grub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin// 'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur pa// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs// lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes
288a3: par bya/ / rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po// bsten pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par bsgo ba// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog ni rna pa dpyad pa// den
288a4: nye bar sgrub par 'gyur/ / sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul bar sgrub par byed pa yin// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod// bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag/ sngags pas kun
288a5: tu brtag par bya/ / dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu brgyan la ni mchog gang bsam// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung// sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i// sgrub pa
288a6: pos ni dben pa bsten/ / sna tshogs lung gis yang dag rtog/ sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod// sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par
288a7: dben pa chen por bshad/ / ri bor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o// de 'dra 'i dben pa'i mchin pa ru// der ni 'od chen rnam gnas te// gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dngos grub
288a8: thob par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni// chen pos de sad bka' stsal to// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs// 'jig rten pa rnab smrab pasal// bsnyen pa su yi brtul zhugs mchog/ blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis//
288b1: rdo rje gsupa gnyis par sbyor bas// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// me long zhes bya dgon pa che// rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o// chen po zhes bya'od dpag med// don yod dang na ra bar yin// chu dogs dag pa chos bya
288b2: 6/ gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag/ ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis// yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed// de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i byed// yi ge oM gcig
288b3: sdom pa'o/ / gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i// oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab// de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po// gtso bo rang nyid bzlog pa yin// la la glang po spangs nas ni// rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed de bzhin ma 'ongs snga
288b4: pa ni/ oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod// gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dus thub de bzhin nor can dang // phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod pa las// bsapa mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur// bcom ldan gcig kyang dubaste/
288b5: tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs// brda' tsam du ni oM zhes bya// dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// sku gsum du ma yang dag bshad// gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni// de na oM ni sdom pa yin//
288b6: dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod// de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin// brda' ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa// bsam nas sdom pa kun tu bshad// mi byed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis// bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral// rten 'brel
288b7: rig las yang dag 'byung / / rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya// rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes zhig// mig la sogs pa bdun brgyal// g.yas dang gcig shos zla byed rdo// shes rab thabs kyang bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag gzur gyur/
288b8: bste// rdo rje ming can byed dang gnyis// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag ni mi thub zla byed dang // zla gcig zla ba byed gnyis min// 'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas// rgya cher rangs ni bshad pa yin//
289a1: ba// gsang ba mchog las byung bar// zlab byed kyis bsgrub par gsungs// de nyid nye bar 'gyur bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin// gang ye shes sa ma ye she// de ban shing shes las byung gangs sa du
289a2: dpal dang ldan/ / rdo rje mi phyed 'od po che// byang chub skad cig gis sbyor ba// rdo rje su ni byed par 'gyur// srog las sogs dang grangs mnyam pa'i// bdag med phyogs bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje ma byed gsum bsgoms
289a3: sa/ / rdo rje byin brlabs mdzad par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams// chos sku mchog gis rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob// 'das pa rnams ni chos sku
289a4: yis/ / bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs// sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// 'on kyang dngos med las
289a5: byung ba'i/ / sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgom la// sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa// de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad// rig dang ma rig yang dag
289a6: ldan/ / srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad// dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs// de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur// zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas// nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin// khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yin// lam rtsom
289a7: ba ni brtags pa yis/ / de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog/ sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin// sngags dang dngos med de byed pa// 'gal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs// rtog pa las byung de 'di ni// dngos med pa ni sgom pas so// bajos
289a8: pa yi skye bo ni/ / lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed// mig dang de bzhin rna ba sna// lce dang de bzhin lus ngag dang // lpags pa rkang par yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa/ lha dang nyan dang dri dang ro// reg bya rnams ni dngos
289b1: med pa/ / rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi// 'dzam gzugs sangs rgyas su can te// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku// sangs rgyas byin gyi byin rlabs kyis// de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can// dngos med rdo rje'i gnyid yin// shing
289b2: dang sa dang rin chen sogs/ / rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la// rang gi chos ni spangs nas su// tshig gi lam de ston par byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/ cho 'phrul de la galas byung // de nas dang sogs yang dag
289b3: pas/ slar yang de la gsol 'debs kyang // gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur/ gyi chos la gang zhig dga'// lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin// de ltar sku las sku byung ba// dpal ldan chos 'di
289b4: 'ang gsum gyi lam/ / byin brlabs pa dag longs spyod na// gsung gi rdo rje can du byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs btsun ni gang bzhugs pa// byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni// mi byed gsum gyi
289b5: lam du 'gyur/ / yid ton bde bzhi bdag nyid// de bzhin nyid shes lam byung ba// yi ge gcig ni gsum drag 'di// rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can// gang gzhan sangs
289b6: rgyas kyis gsungs dang / / 'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di 'gyur te// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje ma byed gsum rnal 'byor// gsung gi rdo rje mi byed pa// rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob// 'jug pa gnas par
289b7: sbyo ba dang / / ldang ba dang na yang dag ldan// gsung gi rdo rje de med ga/ de ni sangs rgyas byin gyi rdzob// ji ltar 'khor los myur rgyal na// tshig gi lam gyis las byed 'jug/ gsung byin brlabs pas sngags pa ni// de bzhin don
289b8: yod nyid du byed/ / der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di// bsgrub pa chen pa' zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa// sdom pa yul gyi dam pa'o// rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po// de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad// mi byed rdo rje gsung
290a1: sha sa/ / sbyor bas// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas// gang zhig byung 'byung 'byung 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de yi byin gyis 'a pa'i gnas// lam gsum las ni byung ba
290a2: mdzad/ / sku yis ston par mdzad pa mchog/ rang sangs rgyas ni bsgom pa yin// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang // sma bsgrub pa por gyur yin// sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gi/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// 'gro 'ong /
290a3: gnas dang bral ba ni// rdo dang sa ni dbyig byed pa// lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis// 'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur// sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i// de bzhin nyid ni 'gro don can// sku gsungs thugs kyi rdo rje gcig/
290a4: gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos dag gam// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag/ de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid
290a5: can/ / so sor rtog pa 'gas par 'gyur// sku las sogs pa'i grangs mnyam par// sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gyur// stong pa shid du sbyor ba yang // de ni gsal bar the tshom med// sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams//
290a6: ni// gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed// 'das pa dag ni de thams cad// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi// byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa//
290a7: mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos// yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni// de ni 'gas par the tshom med// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gsang ba dam pa
290a8: yang dag bsrung / / lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// skra las sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i// le'u bcu
290b1: nyis gsung ba yin/ / dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI b+hang dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
290b2: @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// ji skad du bcom
290b3: ldan 'das kyi ye shes rdo rje kun las bkrus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o/ / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang /
290b4: sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ma bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag
290b5: par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ / byams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/ 'gas
290b6: pa med pa/ / skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste// ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang snang ba nye bar thob pa dang stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o// 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o// ma rigs pa'i
290b7: rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni snang ba mched pa dang shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te/ de ni snang ba dang stong pa ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa'i
290b8: rang bzhin bdag med pa'o/ / gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung bas rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to// /
291a1: de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi ku mi phyir
291a2: cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'drag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa// e ma'o ston partogs par dka' ba rnam
291a3: pa shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes
291a4: pa de nyid sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag nga gzhan dag tu'o// rnam
291a5: par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo do/ / rlung la me'o// me las chu'o// chu las sa'o// de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam
291a6: par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ / snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo // de la 'od gsal ba gnas pa med pa/ 'gag pa
291a7: med pa/ skye ba med pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' steng las byung ba'i mun pa'i sdang ba ni ma rig pa'o// de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang 'khrul pa dang rnam par g.yeng ba dang brjed ngas pa dang le lo dang mi smra ba
291a8: dang me gsal ba'o/ / ma rig pa la sems las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin du gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang dga' pa mchog sa dga' ba dang drag po la sogs pa dang /
291b1: kur rdzob tu mngon gsum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang lha'i tshogs dang mtshan ma dang rdo rje'i brda'i// sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o// rang bzhin de 'dod cha gradang
291b2: bra ba la sogs pa'o/ / kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyi bud med dang b+ha ga dang pad ma dang lha po'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang pad ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o//
291b3: me las nus te/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang de las mer mer po dang nar nar po dang gor gor po dag go// de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so// de khu ba dang khrag dag gis skye ba'o//
291b4: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so// 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/ de'i phyir lus te// lus las byung ba'i dkyil dkrung bcing ba
291b5: la sogs pa dang / gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa/ a li ka li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las ltar dmigs pa'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni
291b6: dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o/ / rdo rje dang pad ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o// sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde
291b7: chen pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o/ / dbu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshan pa ste// de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam la bu dang chu zla dang mig sed dang sdig tu/
291b8: dang zil pa dang sgra brnyad dang dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang dbang po'i gzhu dang glog dang chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa
292a1: yin no/ / ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / pad mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro//
292a2: ji ltar bo pa dang til ngag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes
292a3: pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so/ / gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do// bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyi
292a4: ni las dang po'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro// gang rdo rje dang pad ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go
292a5: 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ji ltar bsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan
292a6: t hos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos
292a7: gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol/
292a8: pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa'/
292b1: pa dang rdzal gdang ldan pa rnams nya ga/ mtha' na ste/ 'dagasapa pa yang dag pa tshul nas bya ba ma par thug pa la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pasags pa pa// bcom ldan 'das pa
292b2: gang gis pathar thag pa thob pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha'athong pa gsum mo// stong pa gsum gyimatha' 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub sems
292b3: dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mabar ngosar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa bzhin du 'o
292b4: ba shes rab kyi ye shes sun des posornam par spyod ba byed do/ / nga skar ta ma'i los thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes rnam par spyod par byed do// de ltar ras ngal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhir du snang ba ze
292b5: ye shes pachog tu myung bas rnam par sbyor bar byed do/ / de bas na rim pa 'dis shing tali lo ma dang / ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du stong ba dang / shin du stong pa dang stong bachen pa rnams mtha yo gas la bgagyug/
292b6: 'dini thar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dal 'byor gyis rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma 'dug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa sa/
292b7: sa sa bshad pa dang gas pa mas pas ya nga/ tha ma yo pa sa // byams pas gsalag lamaldan das gas
292b8: ban de ga ri ri bshad pa bka' bral du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug par bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'ad laste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags pa
293a1: bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar mnye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang dag pa dang /
293a2: 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga bur dang khrag chen po dang tsan dan dmar po dang rdo rje dang pad ma dang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te/
293a3: gdur khu ba dang khrag chen po raHmtshan gyi khrag dang tsan dan da 'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'o// rdo rjen mtshan ma ste thabs so// pad ma ri b+ha ga ste shes rab dang phyag rgya dang btsun mo zhes bya ba las
293a4: sogs pa rdo rje'i chog rnams ni nges pa'i don to/ / gnyi ga dang spyod pa dang bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor dang mchod sbyin dang gtor ma dang sman dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs
293a5: rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o// ko TA khya/ ko TA ba/ koT+Ta kon+da ba sh+tsa/ ko Ti rA ga/ ko la khya/ ko la wa/ ko la ko la ba shru/
293a6: ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i
293a7: rgyud dang gnyi ga'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud dang bya ba'i rgyud dang rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong pag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par bya na
293a8: grangs med do/ / gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/ spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i
293b1: ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa na/ ka khag kyang / tsatsaHdz+nyAH/ Ta taR+Sha raN/ ta tha da d+han/ pa phab b+ha ma/ ya ral wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' man pas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen pa
293b2: rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang chog dang bslab bya dang sgru gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs
293b3: te/ 'dod chagapa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/
293b4: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal barmad du byung ba'i rdo rje tshig gi mtha' drug gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa
293b5: dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang ya nga sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni gnyi ga'i rgyud la bzhug so// las kyi bya ba sna tshogs rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i b.ran nyid pa/
293b6: tu 'gyod pas bsgrub par bya ba dang bsgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i
293b7: bsnyems pa med pa dang / rmad du zung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang // skyon gyi rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu dpyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so// sngags dang sman dang sbyin bsreg dang bye ma dang mig spar dang
