293b8: rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyod pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar
294a1: lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang rig pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang gang zag rnam pa
294a2: lnga'i slob pa btag pa dang bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so/ / gleng bsrang pa rnam pa ldan 'di lta ste/ ming dang gang gis don du byas pa dang byed pa po dang tshad dang dgongs pa rnams so// mtha' drug tu
294a3: bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgod pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgud dang gleng
294a4: bzhi dang nges tshig dang rgyu rnams so/ / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi ge'i don dang spyi 'don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa rnams so// dbye ba rnam gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang slob ma la bshad pa'o//
294a5: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang tsan dan dang pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang ud pa la rnams so// ded pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam par
294a6: bden pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o// de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o// don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bco brgyad do// de'i mtha' ni gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
294a7: gsol ba/ don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po pas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
294a8: stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyi brlab pa'i rib
294b1: pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do/ / de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgul yid rangs
294b2: te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste/ rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// rdzogs s+ho//
294b3: cha gang gi mkhan po dzi na ka ra 'ashal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo rgyab khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur// slang nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o// / ye shes rdo rje
294b4: kun las btus/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin// ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o// de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste// kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus// de ston pa la der btags
294b5: nas/ / gzhung la'ang ming don mtsham pa yin// / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur de bi ti pa ri prits+tsha/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhes yongs su zhus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
294b6: lha mo ba'i dang mnyam ldan zhing // sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa// shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la// rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs te// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyis
294b7: 'byung gnas la/ / byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su// chos kyi dbyings gnas zhu mdzad do// zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// / lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// chog
294b8: 'di dag ni gsol ba ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni/ gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags// dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin/ de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lag ga yan lag med pa gang de ni// yan lag dang bcas gyur nas/
295a1: sus dngas 'gyur ba rdus lags// bag dang rabasdu dang // de bzhin la dang sras dang yang // dbang ba mang pa 'dang sa rnams dang / khams rnams suni 'jug pa yang / bdag bag tugs da
295a2: yas/ / bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs// rnam par shes pa snasnga tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i gzugs// gzugs sogs spyong yul mtshan nyid rnams/ 4
295a3: bzhin med cing dmigs med la/ / dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags// de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// shes
295a4: rab zab bzang med ni/ / nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med cing shes bya min// de bzhin dbyar mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang chen ni// nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo// mi shes
295a5: mun pas bsgribs pas na/ nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min// spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste// de dag kun gyi kyang mi shes// shes med so so'i skye gnas dang // ma 'ongs pa dang
295a6: 'das pa dadang lta byung ba'i dus gsum la/ / byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba rnams// de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no// snying po shin du snying po'i mchog/
295a7: gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems dag 'od gsal pa// zla ba shes dang mnyam pa'i 'ong // de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos// yungs dkar che ba'i
295a8: tshad tsam mo/ / de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te// phye tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs// rtag tu snying gis dbus gnas pa// 'od zer chen po 'bar ba
295b1: can/ ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni// dpral ba la gnas rkang mthal bar// thig la de kho nar bsdus te/ lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// cha shas lnga pa can yon te// bcu gnyis can tha ma la// cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyad/
295b2: ngaro thog les brgyan byed pa// rdo rje khong nas byung nas su// sa bor skye gnam dbus bzhag ste// chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed// de ni rim par skyed byed na// sgo dgu la ni kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la// mi g.yo la sogs
295b3: g.yo dang bcas/ / tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o// gang las gtso bor skyed byed pa// sa dang nam mkha' de zhes gsungs// ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar// de yis las dang las min byed// dge
295b4: dang mi dge bsam pa yang / / bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te// mchod pa bsgom par gsungs pa yin// gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na// de tshe de yi rang mthu yis// de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te// gang gis g.yo
295b5: dang mig ye khyab/ / nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba// de ni gnas pa shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi don// gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas na// de ni dngos grub rgyas pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur//
295b6: so dang mchu dang rkan dang lce// mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid// de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa med cing the tshom pa// sgra yis rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems
295b7: ni 'dir gsungs so/ / lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de nas lha mo mA ma kIs/ rdo rje can la 'di zhus te/ byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis// kha snying lta
295b8: gsang ba la/ / 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni// rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal// cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs// gnas kyi rnam par bsgyur ba du/ kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'chal// rdo
296a1: can gyis bka' stsal pa/ cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing // pad ma bzhi la yang dag gnas/ snying kha'i pad ma la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad ma la gnas dkar // nga ro lte ba'i pad mar gnas// gsang ba'i bang
296a2: mang ro mtha/ skabs kyi tha' du 'gro byed pas// thig le'i khyong rab tu gnas// bsdom byed pa dang thos byed pa// de che mthong byed pa byed pa// reg par byed kyang de kho nas// bde dang sdug bsngal tshor dbyed pa'o// gang las gzhang byed gas
296a3: byed pa/ / de bzhin mchod de dang du ba// byed pa gcod pa de kho nas// cho ga rnam pa mang po shes// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur// bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs smad pa'i
296a4: rigs rnams dang / / bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba dang // gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang // de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las// 'byung ba thams cad bskyed byed ma// de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul
296a5: gnas/ / mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa// dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang // des ni gsang chen shes pa ste// gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa/ kha dog med cing //
296a6: kha dog dmar/ kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi// thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'di// 'gro dang phyir 'od rnams par bstan// gang de rig pa rdzu 'phral che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs// snyed dang bsdus dang 'jig
296a7: pa la/ / thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so// gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos// stong phrag bcu ru shes na yang // de yis de nyid mi shes te// de dag kun kyang 'bras med do// bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang // brgyad kyi mtha'
296a8: ru 'byung ba 'dus/ / sgra yos dang po yi ga ya// lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan// snying rje chen po las byung ba// ba mar bltas pa'i drug pas btags// gdod ma mar ma med pa'i lha// den spyi bor bstan pa yin// de dag gsang chen
296b1: dam pa yin/ / lha mo bdag gis rab bstan to// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo pA ma kA si zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha mo gos dkar mos// yan lag kun gyis bzlas nas su/
296b2: thal me snyim par sbyar byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang // mu gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rang bzhin nyid ni dzi Sha lags// lha yi dbang phyug khyod la'u// gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu/
296b3: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags// gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags// chu khams dang ni me yi kha las// ji ltar de ni mnyam por 'gyur// ma las skye ba gsum cam dang / de bzhi/
296b4: pa las skye ba gsum// de dag drug sogs gong bu las// ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal// thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba
296b5: shin du gsang gyur pa/ / nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yod du byang chub sems shes bya// g.yas su de bzhin rag ta'o// de gnyis phrad nas gcig
296b6: 'gyur ba/ / chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin// mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul ni rag ta byang chub sems// mun pa de bzhin skyed pa yin// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyar nas/
296b7: rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro// dri chen chu dang shel me tog/ de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems// bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus// de las rdo rjer 'dir gsungs so// cha shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin
296b8: dgu pa yang yin no/ / ga gsus pa de la na/ yum bcu dang ni bcu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te// cha shas gnyis pa lnga yas ni// drug gis btags pa nges 'byung ba// de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yig
297a1: pra zla/ / skye gnas pad ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon swA hA mtha'// 'dus pa la ni shes par bya/ chu khams pa las byes shes bya// me yis khams ni ma las kyis// shadang khrag dang lpags pa yang // ma las
297a2: skyes pa zhes bshad pa/ / tshal dang rkang dang khu ba ni// pa las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// gong bu yang dag 'dus pa ni// de dag tsam du bshad pa yin// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// /
297a3: sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs// phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mon bza' dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas bzhad pa'i zhal gyur te// lha mo sgrol ma
297a4: bcom ldan mas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyis dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal// de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni
297a5: btags pa dang / / sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang // de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang // khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal// de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni//
297a6: nyon cig lha mo po shang bar bya// gzugs dang skra dang dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs// khams bcwo brgyad po de dag kyang // chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o// de dag nyid las blang ba ni// byang chub sems zhes shes par bya/
297a7: byang chub sems las gong bu ste// gong bu las kyang yid skyed do// yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams// de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste// bsdu ba de ni brtan
297a8: byas pa/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi grub pa yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sgrub pa yang dag spyang par bya// ji ltar gal po zhes dngos kyis// bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag/ chos dbyings bsgrub pa bshad nas su// rdzas brgyad
297b1: lan lag bsgrub pa bshad / / ngi lu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang // nam mkha' 'bur dang mig sman dang // 'chi ba med dang nad 'joms dang // ma dang glang po che dang u0f7f// glang dang khwa dang /
297b2: bong bu dang // rnga mo ma he spyang ki rnams// cha ni mnyam par bya ba'o// mthe bong tshogs tshad tsam du ni// shin du mnyam por bzhag nas sbyar// dri chen chu dang rag ta dang // byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas
297b3: nas ni sbyar byas te/ / byin gyis rlabs kyang bya ba'o// phyag 'tshal dang na yi ge A// dbus su de bzhin hUM/ byas te// 'bar ba'i hUM yig 'bar byed pa// dgu pa de ni rab tu bsgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags bzlas nas
297b4: ni phye mar btag/ yungs dkar lnga yo tshad tsam du// lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// ri lu rnams ni byas nas su// pad ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stong phrag brgyar ni bkra bar bya// mtshan
297b5: bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas/ / nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar bya// de ni bskal ba'i mtha' mar yang // dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste// gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'grus// lnga pa la ni smon lam yang // mngon par
297b6: shes pa lnga thob pa/ / ril chen po zos phyir ro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas// rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol// yi ge a dang baM yig dang / laM yig dbus su yang dag gnas// dang po'i mdog ni dmar
297b7: ste/ / gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba// gsum pa kha dog sor po rnams// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni// nyin byed dang ni mtshan phyed la// rig pa de ni rab 'byor na// de ni skad cig kho nar
297b8: 'grub/ / lha mo lha min bu mo dang / mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi// sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis bkrag nas sdud par bya// bsgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags// bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams
298a1: ni bshad par bya/ / dga' ba sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// dkyil 'khor las shes gsungs pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyil 'khor gsum du btag
298a2: pa yin/ tags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste// gang du gtso bo skyed par byed// phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar btags pa'o// chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste// zhags pa pad mar chung byed pa// kha phrad
298a3: pa ni sgrog yi par/ / sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad// spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te// me tog rag ta zhes 'dod do// par me sha rna pas kho na yin// dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgeg mo ling gar bstan pa ste//
298a4: phreng ba tha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang // gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni bskal bzangs yin// rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs/
298a5: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin// sbyin bsregs las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin pasreg rnam pa bzhi// sbyin bsreg phyi dang nang gsungs te// phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin//
298a6: nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// pad pa bzhi rnams 'byor pa ni// lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni dbang chen dang ni chu de bzhin// rlung gis me la 'bar byas te na yis yongs su smin par byed// dbang
298a7: chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ / gang du pe ni bskyod pa'o// yig mngon grong yi ge se// ya yig dbang gisilas khyo na// la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste// ba yi ga'i bzhes gsung so// gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni// de dag/
298a8: thams cad tshul ste// pad mar kA yig khamar lta// snying gi pad mar btsud par bya// lte ba'i pad mar 'gro phyir ro// kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i pad mar 'gro ma thag/ thal bar mtha' ru rnam par
298b1: bstan/ de ltar sbyin bsreg bdag bshad pa// nyin dang nyin du bya ba ste// rtag par rgyun tu zas zos na// tshe 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur// rgas pa med cing nad kyang med/ 'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med// de ni glo
298b2: bur 'chi ba med/ / 'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po bskal par gson pa ste// sebs can thams cad dga' bar smra// mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do// sbyin bsreg las rnams
298b3: bshad byas nas/ / lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya// dri dang phreng sog ma gos rnams dang // spros me zas dang lha bshos kyis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya// bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas
298b4: nyid/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig dga' yang bya ba'i las// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bsgom// zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos//
298b5: de bzhin dri dang phreng khong nas// rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// bdag ni lha nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rdo rje de// cang mi gsungs par dngos por bzhugs// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// phyag gis
298b6: thal mo sbyar gyur te/ / rab tu zhal ni rnam bzhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyi ni// rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste// mi gsung bar gzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
298b7: thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal// u rgyan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen me'i de kho na nyid rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi bakhan po s+thi ti
298b8: na kIr ti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra hri da ya a laM kA ra tad tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje
299a1: sems dpa' la paga'atshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po bud med bcu'i dkyilan
299a2: shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ / brjed du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'khor rdo rje dang pad mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ dam tshig yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ye shes kyi lus
299a3: yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sba ba dan lta bu'i rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gre dang / gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang/ rtse gcig tu 'dris pa zhes bya
299a4: pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
299a5: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / bskyod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par byed zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang // ha ra nu bur la sogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gi ta mgrin la sogs
299a6: pa'i glu mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gre dang / sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / tshod ma sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis
299a7: 'khrung mkhan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po
299a8: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dub zhes/
299b1: bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa nam
299b2: mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo / / de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nam mkha' 'gro chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la mchod pa'i sprin
299b3: spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / de bzhir gshegs rnams thams cad kyi// gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog
299b4: rdo rje snying po'i rgyun gyi rgyu/ / 'dren pa mcheg gis bshad du gsol/ de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nam mkha' 'gro thams cad la rnam par bltas te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas byang chu
299b5: sems dpa'i rdo rje mkha'i 'gro de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa'i
299b6: 'khor du 'chad du mi bzhed pa de bdag cag la mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas de tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/
299b7: sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs// sa 'og ma yisangs rgyas kyang // 'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na// sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir/
299b8: byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad pa ni// ston pa rnams kyis chos nyid do// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
300a1: 'das legs so legs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma
300a2: yin pa bstan cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje mkha' 'grod de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas
300a3: sems dpa' thams cad byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po rang rang gizugs las
300a4: byung ngo / / oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/ de nas phyung ma thag tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying khar btsud nas bud med kyi dkyilan thams cad brgyal ba ltar gnas so// de nas
300a5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi de bslang ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta ba bzhin
300a6: du gnas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi 'khor lo rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rang rang
300a7: gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar gyur to//
300a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyugis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/
300b1: dbugs rngub par mi mdzad/ 'byung bar mi mdzad/ lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ lus gnas par yang mi mdzad// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs mi dgongs nye bar mi 'jig go//
300b2: thabs dang shes rab stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'dzud par mi mdzad/ mtho ris la yang mi 'jog/ ma dang pa rnams dang par yang mi mdzad// pa dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar
300b3: 'tshe bzhi par yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad// ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad// ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa
300b4: sel bar yangs ma dang / dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mi dga' rnams dga' bar yang mi med/ ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/ drag po ma rungs pa chen
300b5: bo dang gdum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang log 'dren dang gdug pa chen po dang yi dgas dang sha za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang tsha ba'i gdon dang nang dang sbrul dang sems can
300b6: thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad do/ / rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te brjod pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal mdzum pa dang 'dod
300b7: pa dang bskub pa dang 'gyed pa dang spyan mdzes pas prin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi bring ba'i tshul gyim sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen ning byu dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang 'jog cing 'dogs
300b8: pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de la khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad de// de nas chu'i
301a1: khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad/ / de nas sa'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad do// de yang kun tu khyab nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyis sems la kun du khyab par mdzad do// ridang sems
301a2: can thams cad dang / / sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang // bud med gzhon nu rgan po dang // skyes pa dang ni mnang dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang // chu bdag brgya byin la sogs dang // 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur
301a3: thams cad la/ / bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen po// kun du bzang po rdo rje 'dzin kun du khyab pas byas te gnas// dpal rdo rje snying po'i rkyen gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
301a4: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las kyi mchog rnams 'grub byed pa'i// gsang sngags rnams ni bshad par bya// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya'o// oM a ka ro mu kha~M sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ha nung ba nan twA ta/ gtor ma'i sngags so//
301a5: a A/ i I/ u A/ a ai/ o au/ aM aHbud med do// ri rI/ li lI/ ma ning ngo // ka kha ga g+ha ra/ tsa tsha dza dzA/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ skyes pa'i'o// ya ra la wa/ 'byung ba'i 'o/ sha Sha sa ha/ 'jigs pa
301a6: la sogs pa'o/ / chos kyi dbyings kyis bon no// badz+ra d+h+rika hUM/ dzin dza~M kaD+D+h+ya/ radan d+h+r-i ka aM/ a ro li ka rI khA dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka kha~M/ mkha' 'gro chen po lnga'a'o// ThA ti mA~M/ mo ha ti lI/ rA ga ra te bAM badz+ra rA ta~M k+Sha~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gratan/
301a7: par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'o// k+Shi ti gar+b+hak+Shi/ badz+ra pA Ni dzI/ ga ga na gar+b+ha khaM/ lo ka shwa rA ya gaM/ nI ba ra Na beSh+kastI ni kaM/ sa man ta b+ha dra saM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dam tshig spyod pa'i la sogs pa'i 'o// rU pa badz+ra dzaH/ shap+ta badz+ra hAM/
301a8: gan d+he badz+ra gaM nga sa badz+ra hoH/ s+phar sha badz+ra khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra raM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ngas par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o// ya mAn ta kri ta badza pra dz+nyAn ta kr-i ti/ pad mAn ta krite/ bi g+h+nAn ta krita/ Ta ki rA dza/ nI la daN Da/ ma hA ba la/
301b1: atsa le kan hU~M/ su~MT+TahUM/ tsakA btin du T+Ti/ rdo rje mkha' 'grog shin drug shed la sogs pa'i'o// la dzin b+h+rU~M/ te dze stan du b+h+rUM/ man d+he tsaka TI/ bar d+ha na b+h+rUM/ bi sar na g+h+nAM bar dzin b+h+rUM/ kar b+ha bab+hUM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro
301b2: gtsug tor rgyal ba la sogs pa'i'o/ / hU~M hrIHkha rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o'o// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra b+ha ba na na da hU~M/ sa'i'o// oM badz+ra pra ka ra ta hUM ba skye ba'i'o/ oM badz+ra bany+tsa hU~M la b+h+rUM/ drang ba'i'o// oM badz+ra bi dAn dA
301b3: gur kyi'o/ / oM badz+ra sha ra ta satwA~M/ satwAM/ mda'i 'o// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na lArga hUM hUM hUM/ 'od kyi'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko haM/ stong pa nyid kyi sngags so// oM d+harmad+hA t+ya swa b+ha ba a ta ma ko ha// chos kyi dbyings
301b4: sngags so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ga tsi ta ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ka ha~M// sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i'o// badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM ma ti kra ma hUM/ thig gdab pa'o// badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ mtshon dgye ba'i'o// hUM ha a dz+nye/
301b5: dbab pa'i 'o// badz+ra kI la ya mud ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ phur bus brdung ba'i'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags kyi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa// de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru/
301b6: gsang ba dang ni 'jigs byed dang // bde mchog sogs la de yis ni// las dang bcas par rab bshad pa// rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
301b7: de nas mkha' 'gro grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// las kyi cho ga shes pa yis// ci rigs par ni las rnams bya// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srad bu ni// sems med las byung byas nas su// byin brlabs mi bskod rtag
301b8: pa ru/ / byas ste thig ni gdab pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ta ran bzhis brgyan pa ste// dar dang me tog phreng bas krugs// srad bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa// zur gyi cha ni thams cad du// zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod// las kyis bye
302a1: zag shes pa yis/ / blo dang ldan pas phyag rgyang gong // in dra nI la la bu la// 'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bri/ bab brgyad 'khor lo dgapa/ lho dro na chen zung dag lngang // ngadang rab btung bdag
302a2: das pa/ khya ral gyi sngon po ze// pe yi 'tshams su 'khor lo sngon// bden bral uHpa la dmar po dang // rlung gi 'tshams su pa ya mar// dbang ldan uta pa la ser po ste// rdo rje thob shar gyi s+ho// lho yas ru rdo rje dadrug/
302a3: pad ma'i rdzing bus kyi'o// byang rkordo rje khabye ba/ sbyong ba ldard pas dgod par bya// dam pa nyi shu rtsa ldar ni// chen ci dag kyang bsgos bya ste// rdul tshar lnga la sogs pa rnams// ris pa bzhin du gang dbab dag donas
302a4: bus pa gzung bya ba/ / rtsabadag nog med pa'i// zhabs brtan mgrin ring ma chu 'phyang ba// lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas// mgul par ras kyi yang dag dkris// ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa// rin can ldan 'bras lda /
302a5: spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi// sgo yis phyogs kyi bum pa ni// las kun byed pas
302a6: bzlas byas te/ / ku sha'i chun pos sems can che// 'jug pa kun la gtor bar bya// yon dang gtor ma mchod phul nas// de dag phyi gang rab dkod de// g.yas su rgyal ba stan drang ngo // de nas lha rnams rab gnas
302a7: pa'i/ / bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste// phyag rgya bral ba'i sbyor ba ni// lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas// bu mo gzugs bzang lang chos brgyan// dbang thob lus nus tho pa mo// g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// de sa
302a8: 'khor lo sprul par bya/ / de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i/ chod paM phul nas bstod bya ste// gagadag ci bu ba khrag rnams ni// dung chen po ru bzhag byas te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas mkha' 'gro grong mchog tu//
302b1: slobs rnams ni bzhugs bya ste// rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas slob ma de yis kyang // me tog sngag
302b2: 'dis gtor ba'o/ aH badz+ra hoHzhes bya ba// de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol// de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs su khyod skyes so// sngags dang phyag d+has
302b3: khyod byin brlab/ / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed// rdo rje pad mo rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya// ba sha badz+ra/ gang dag me tog gsang ba ste// de de de
302b4: yi lha yang dag/ de yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te/ de yinan tan du bsgrub po// dung chen bdud ci wa thud de// dmyal ba'i chu 'dis khyod la ni// dam tshig 'das nas sreg par byed / dang tshig bsrungs nadangos grub pa'i// 'thung shig rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// badz+ra ud/
302b5: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dam tshig dang ni sdom pa rnams// bla mas slob ma sdig bral la// ci lta ba bzhin bsgrag par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
302b6: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur bI tshe ka'i mcho// gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// de nyid bcu
302b7: la sogs pa yi/ / gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos// bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung // bla ma la gus dang ba'o// dge bsgom lha rnams mchod byed pa// gtong phod yon tan ldan pa'o// de nas slob ma de yis kyang // langs
302b8: tezhabs la mgos btugs nas/ / rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// gos dang brgyan gyi legs par bgos// steng du ther bri bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdung
303a1: bu dag dang rke rags dang / / bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur ro// dang po rnam rgyal bum pa dang / denas/ lo bzhi rnams dang // lba rnams kun gyi bzhi pa
303a2: sa/ / bkra shes tshigs bcad gru sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu bsil ba yis// skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du// til gyi gang ba bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/ dkyil 'khord
303a3: nyid rig par bsam/ / de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni// legs par goms pa dbang thob pa// rgyan gyis rab brgyan rab mdzes pa// btsal te bla ma la phul nas//
303a4: de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa btus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad mo las drang ba// sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar nas// rkang du rdo rje bzhag par bya// kye ma'o
303a5: bde ba bde ba che/ / kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ba'i// de dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go// yang na shin tu dad ldan pa// gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang // sbyar
303a6: go bas bla ma la ni dbul/ / bla mas byin brlabs lha mo dang // bsgrub pa de la sbyin par bya// de yis blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs// ci skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas// rang gi lha dang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i
303a7: tshogs rnams kun/ / mnyes byed tshogs sems brtag te// mngon sum bde bar rang 'byung ba// gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus// go ba'i yul de bde ba che// bla ma de la dbul bar bya// bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du// ci dga'
303a8: bar ni yon yang dbul/ / slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa// yid las bsams pa dbul bar bya// dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir// bsgrims te de bzhin dpral bar bya/ slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par/
303b1: gyis ni lnga/ bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis// yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi ma dang seng ge gdan// yon gyi mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs// gser dang glang po rin chen dang // sring mo bla ma la dpral ba//
303b2: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon de yon gyi mchog yin no// shing rta rta ni shin du brgyan// rang gi chung ma dpral bya ste// rin chen sna tshogs rnam dag pa// yon de rin po che yi rigs// mu tig phreng ba shin du mdzes// du mo rin chen
303b3: 'dra ba yis/ / brgyan te zla ma la dpral ba// yodan de pad ma'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs// glang po rten shin du brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi // nan tan bram
303b4: dpral bya ba/ / sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag gis// gsum du shes bya bla pa la// blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis// ci ste bde ba kun 'dod na// dad mos sems kyi dbul bar bya//
303b5: yid la gang bas pa ma bral lam// khas blangs de ni ma phul na// yi dgas dmyal ba rnams gnyis su// nges par skyes te brlab par 'gyur// de bas de nam rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gad ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor
303b6: chen po yi/ / dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yis// dkyil 'khor du ni bdagazhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor bdag gis da ring mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
303b7: po yi/ / dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma de yis kyang // de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// bsgrims te yang dag rtag par bya// dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang // gnyis pa la zhigs
303b8: ba'i dbang / / gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yis ye shes te// bla ma las ni thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
304a1: gang gi thabs kyis rigs lnga'i don// rang gi don gyur kun du bzang // 'di dag gzhan la rab bda' phyir// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad// yid 'od dben pa'i sa phyogs su// ci bder gnas la rab mkha'
304a2: kurasems kyis khyab par byas rapas/ / dal btag e ma'o 'jig rten kun// sdug bsngal chos kyis kun nas gtses// byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams// kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i// lpags pa skye ma
304a3: bzhag pa ni/ AHsems kyi rdul phran cha drug rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu phye nas su// chos kyi don rnams de gsal nas// shin du dri med sems dag pa// 'ongs dang ma 'ongs pa yi sems// da lta yang ni dmigs su med//
304a4: gnyis med de la gnyis med med// nam mkha' zhes pa'ang gnas pa med// de ltar kun du brtags nas su// 'gro ba thams cad shin du stong // dri med rna la 'byor nyid kyi yin// dngos po med par rang sems bsam// 'gro ba 'di ni
304a5: de lta bu'i/ / dngos po gang dag yod min na// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags// sems nyams sems can 'byung bar bsgoms// 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs// dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya// rin chen sems ni
304a6: rmugs pa la/ / bde gshegs rnams kyis bskul bar pra// shU n+ya tA ti yo ga bdaM swA hA/ pra b+ha bI A kA sha tA ma ba ga ta sa ma ya// u pa ta pa yan ti sug ta su ga teg ti shrI badz+ra swA hA// pra pustaM haM// rnam rtog gun srangs dri med pa'i
304a7: rnam par mi rtog sgom pa'i sems/ / sngags kyi de nyid bskyod byas la// trAM zhes pa yi gzugs su brtag/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na// gang phyir de ni bsgom pas thob// dam pa nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// byang chub sems tshegs
304a8: deng bcas la/ / la byor yid kyis kun mas mas nas// rgyas par rnam par brtag par bya// yi ge r+b+hu kyis lha yi gnas// rdo rje rin chen gyis ni brgyan// sgo da ta babs ka bdag/ dang gyi phreng bas rnam par klubs// gra bzhi pa
304b1: bzhi pa/ dril bu'i dra ba dag gis bcan// rtag par do shal me long dang // me tog phreng bas brgyan rnams zes// de yi dbus su seng ge'i gang na// seng ge brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// blon lam dbang gis de dag kun / khyang chug/
304b2: sems dpa' mabu be che// shar phyogs pa glang shan du rgyas// lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzangs te// nub phyogs su ni mi bya bshad// de bzhin byang phyogs nam mkha' lding // pibaskyong khro ba bsam pa ni// mthing ka dkar po
304b3: dmar po'o zhal/ / rdo rje phyag rgya thugs kha dang // mthing ka kha dog gsal la bzang // g.yas na rin chen 'khor lo ste// ral gri pad ma g.yon pa na// 'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal
304b4: gsu bsam/ / dang po yi ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med// gsum pa smon pa med pa yi// zhal du mkhas par rig par bya// phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bar bsgoms// patso nar sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// pad ma la
304b5: mnyam bzhag nas/ / ye shes phyag rgya snying kha nang // dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung du gnas// shar gyi gnas su bsam pa ni// sngags pa rnam snang thub pa ste// dkar dang mthing ka dmar ba'i zhal// 2'a
304b6: phyag rgya snying kha na/ / rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na// ral gri pad ma g.yon pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag par bsam// thong tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rin chen mgon po lnga phyogs na// sa
304b7: dang mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal/ / rin chen phyag rgya snying kha nas// margad lta bur snang ba'o// g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste// rdo rje pad ma g.yona'o// rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa/ na chen yang du 'bebs pa'o//
304b8: nub phyogs gnas su dgod bya ba// snang ba mtha' yas bsam pa ni// dmar dang mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal// pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu// pad ma'i phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa na// 'khor lo ral gri g.yon
305a1: pa na/ pad ma la ni mnyam bzhag pasam// byang phyogs gnas su don grub ni// ljang khu mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal// ral gri phyag rgya snying kha na// 'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam pa 'od// pad ma rdo rje g.yas pa na/
305a2: 'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// byang gi gnas su bsam par bya// sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa ni// spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin/
305a3: de yi don du rnam par bsgom// bA ma kI yang bsam pa ni// ud dpal dang ni mthing 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o// chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags//
305a4: gsum phyag drug dge ba ste// sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam// pad ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma kha dog ser mo ste// 'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rab tu bsam// thogs med rgyal
305a5: po'i phyag rgya'o/ / sgo ba'i sgo srungs dgod bya ba// sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin te// thub par dka' ba rta mgrin dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam// de dag
305a6: kun kyang zhal gsum pa/ / drag cing drag por gnon pa'o// mthing ka ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dag ni kha dog tu'o// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng thogs de bzhin no// gdon rnams thams cad
305a7: skrag byed pa/ / gdon sbyin srin po 'phra men ma// ma he seng ge stag rnams dang // ba lang zhon pa rnam bzhi'o// rnam par 'gyur ba'i khre nyer can// khro bo spyan ni kun nas bsdus// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsam pa ni// gshin
305a8: rje gshed la sogs pa'o/ / sngags kyi de nyid rjes 'thun par// sngags pas dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su// sa yi snying po la sogs pa// sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam// lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid/
305b1: hA zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sems ni de ru zhugs par bsam// mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che// dbang po'i lam du byung nas su// dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan// bdag nyid gcig cing gcig 'gyur ba// skad
305b2: cig gis ni brtag par bya/ / khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya// de la sogs pas bstod par byed// de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs// rang gi snying khar rab tu bzung // gzangs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du// rnam par snang mdzad thub
305b3: ba bzhugs/ / tshe rab rin chen mgon po yin// mtha' yas 'od ni 'du shes su'o// 'du byed kun tu gdon miza// mi bskyod pa ni phung po lnga// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni// sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs par
305b4: bsapa/ / sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// de nas spyan ni bzhugs bya ste// rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam pa ni// de yang spro bar gnas par bsam// mA ma kI yang chu yi khams// brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i phyir// rnal
305b5: 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam/ / de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur// me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// gos dkar mo yang bzhugs par bya// kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi// 'od rnams su ni der 'gyur ro// sgrol ma rlung gi rang
305b6: bzhin du/ / zhugs par de ni bsam par bya// rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// de bzhin yid mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha' rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/ de lus khong stong nyid lan
305b7: rang sems yon tan bsgom pa'i sems/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su// dag pa'i bdag nyid ci 'dod par// de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro// sa yi snying po bdag nyid
305b8: sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de/ / mig gi phyogs su zhugs nas ni// 'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas na// sgra rnams thams cad shes pa de//
306a1: rna ba'i rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur// nam mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che// sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na// sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes// de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i rim chags/
306a2: pa// rdo rje lce yi sbyor bas su// ro yi dngos po myong ba des// skad cig gcig la de ru 'gyur// blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni// rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sel// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa
306a3: yang 'jigs/ / me long gis ni rnam pa ltar// rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni// gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyor bas su// skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// rnam pa bcu dang drug tu yang // sbyor ba
306a4: de ni byin brlabs nas/ / sngags pas de ni sems la bzhugs// khro bo lcags kyu dpung pa yis// zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o// lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum// rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par bzhag/ de ltar don
306a5: rnams rab tu zhugs/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag/ rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa// g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brten// rdo rje sems dpa' de gnas 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po dkar po'i gzugs//
306a6: dkar dang mthing kha dmar po'i dbu/ stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su smra// rdo rje phyag rgya rjes su chags pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba A da ma ko haM/
306a7: sangs rgyas mchod pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba a ma ko ha// rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// mdun du bsam nas nam mkha' la// khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te// dkyil 'khor snga ma
306a8: bzhin bsams bzlas/ / bcom ldan mi mnyes gzhug cing bzhugs// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs khang bsdams// g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che// pad ma ral gri g.yon pa'o// de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni// ci
306b1: nus par bzlas par bya/ / skyon yid kyis drangs na ni// de dag thams cad snying khar bzhugs// mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na// lus kyi ji tsam bskyod pa dang // tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams// de dag sngags dang
306b2: phyag rgyar 'gyur/ / rtag tu bsgom pa'i sbyor bas ni// de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la// lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin// dbang po lam du gang gyur pa// de dang de yi ngo bo dag/ shin tu mnyam
306b3: bzhag sbyor bas su/ / bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs
306b4: rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces/
306b5: pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa'
306b6: rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la/ lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin
306b7: gshegs pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / kye ma kun tu bzang po 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med cing
306b8: gnas pa med/ / rtog pa'i drim spangs pa yid// bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrug pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsung spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhugs/
307a1: nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das
307a2: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
307a3: snyoms par bzhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo / / dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// zhes
307a4: bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di
307a5: gsungs so/ / dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes// dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
307a6: de bzhiran gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang bzhin 'dogs pa/
307a7: ba/ gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub kyis
307a8: gsungs so/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa
307b1: bob nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag/ kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams// bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal la/
307b2: byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa yi// mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing // rmil ma la sogs ma skyes pa// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems pa'i dkyil mo bkrung bcas napa// dang por
307b3: rang bzhin dag ga'os/ / dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems pas byin gyis brnabs// rin chen lus mu nga rgyal bya// lag pa bstod de bskor ba na// lcags kyu yis ni spyad yang dang //
307b4: byor nas drang por phyogs bcing ste// dam tshig mchog kyang dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya//
307b5: rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis bdag/ rnal 'byor nam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ rnal 'byor yin zhes
307b6: sangs rgyas gsungs/ / sngags kyi byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che// phyag rgya tshogs su brtag pa yi// rim gyis
307b7: gzugs kyis rdzogs bya ba/ / de ni brtag pas brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar bya ba las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang // skad cig ye shes kyi rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes
307b8: brjod do/ / dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par// rnal 'byor rig pa dag gis brtag/ rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor tshe gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste/
308a1: de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nas blo yas ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi ro la rang bzhin stong par bya/
308a2: sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyis bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ri bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par btag/ dag pa'i bdam la gnas pa// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi// yan lag kun
308a3: gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ / rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba'i spros med gsungs// sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus// snying la gnas pa zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge na/
308a4: mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod// rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes
308a5: sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te// cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi//
308a6: sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma 'phro// yan lag bzhi pa dpung ldan pa'i// phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyems ma dang ni tog ldan ma// mtshon cham dang rtsed mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa
308a7: byin gyis brlab/ / kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang sde// ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la//
308a8: 'os par byed pa'i sngags pa yi// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun la pad ma yi// ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phro ba las// mdog ldan bdag nyid
308b1: gzugs su bya/ / mdzes pa'i brgyan rnams kur ldan pa'i// nyid kyi ga dan la bzhugs par lta// sgeg dang gla dang gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang // sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams/
308b2: kyis mchod par bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi na las bsgoms nas// sbar ches bya ba bral ba dang // mogs la gug skyed nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// de nas gsang sngags bzlas
308b3: brjor bya/ bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims nas rdo rjegs nas su// g.yon pas dril bu la gsil zhing // de dze klu tshul sna tshogs dang // bdan tshul du byas pas mchod// bzlas pa yis ni 'dug brtul nas/
308b4: gshegs su gsol dang rang nyid 'grub// las dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci ba der 'gro bar bya khar mang du na gyur na yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlas// de ltar bsgom pas skom byed pa// rdo rje thegs
308b5: rab rdzogs pa'i/ / byang chub des ni myur thob nas// zla nyi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rgyal byed pad ma'i gdung rgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang
308b6: phyag 'gyur/ / dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' cher 'dod dgur lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhi pa kun shes shing // drag pa 'jom byed khro bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi
308b7: sems bsgom pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / sbyin bsreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me ni lha yi zha la yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin bsreg las ni rab tu bshad//
308b8: byin bsreg gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur na dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin pasreg dag gis bskongs// de phyir sku gsum chos mchog gis// sbyin bsreg rab tu bsngags
309a1: yang nga / chub shing las ni byung ba'i sa// dge ba'i rnaM las rnams byed// gdol pa ma dur khrod byung ba yi/ ma ni lus rnams rab tu bzlag/ tha khung zlum po na ni dang // zags dang ni chung gsu dang /
309a2: dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khyor la// rdo rjem tshan bdag gis brgyan/ byin bsreg de ny-id tshul rig pas// tha 'ang rnams kyi bras su ni// pad ma'i steng gdas gtsug nga // rdo rje dzin chen padam pazhag/ ka dmigs pas
309a3: bdugs nas su/ / lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang bzang bar gyis bkang nas ni// zug gzar bkang ste de bzhin bsreg/ sbyin bsreg la dgos g.yas su bzhag/ g.yon du chu yi sbed dgod do// las kun byed
309a4: pas bzlas nas/ / gsang gtor dang ni thor 'thung bya// ku sha rtse mo non po yis// thab khur khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pa mi 'jigs tho ba spyod cing // gsang sngags 'dis ni tshig bzhin//
309a5: me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ bsreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol// oM a ga~M ne ye A dI bya yA bI she ba A bi sha ma hA shrI ye hA
309a6: ThakaH3/ nA ya swA hA// phyag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga phul// me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni// gsum po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhir ldan// mdog dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs
309a7: can/ / me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan// lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng // g.yon pa ril pa spyi thugs te// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// mdog dmar/
309a8: rgyan ni med pa la// drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin bsreg la dgos pas// kun la lan gsum bsreg blugs dbul/
309b1: de nas thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yis tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gang ga// khub
309b2: brgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs/ / pad ma'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang // me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil ba'i mtshan mas mkha' las brtag/ de ni myu ru 'byung 'gyur ba// bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang
309b3: dbang la ni/ / mi zhes pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyud ni bsring ba ni// bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi bal// 'byor bas rgyas pa mngon par spel// dregs pade ba tshul bcas pa dang / dbang du
309b4: gyur pas dbang du bya'o/ / drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pa// hUM zhes pa dang baT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi
309b5: rim par sbyor/ / sngags grub chog shes pa yis// sbyin pasreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa yi// yang dag yin pa mchod par bya// sbyin bsreg de nyid la bskul zhing // dang por dgang thugs pa sreg cing dbul//
309b6: byis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin pasreg bya// bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha tshon dag kyang sbyin bsreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang
309b7: pa yis bkang nago/ / ci ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes pas rmongs pa// thabs dang shes rab nam thas shing// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtogs drabs blugs
309b8: byas gang / / de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas med kyang // sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thabs su bsten//
310a1: ngas pa'i don du dge spangs nas// bsod nams min pa ci zhig smos// dper na mi gang chu klung gis// pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtsa dang shing las sogs bsdus nas// chu la rgal ba'i bzings byas te/
310a2: las 'jug te legs brgal nas/ bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyi sa lam ni bskyes byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnams spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa ni// de phyir rnam
310a3: tog rnam spangs la/ / zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltub byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur
310a4: dri med pa'i rnam par pi rtog ting 'dzin gnas/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas// nga'o snyam pas gzi bskyed lus// rnam pa kun gyi rnam brgyan na// ral 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la//
310a5: ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// las las byung bar bstan pa yi// skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la// mnyes pa nyid du mi bya 'di/ rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan tog bzang tog dra ba yi// sems kyis sems
310a6: can rnams la ni/ / sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi 'byung // rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed nub phra ma yi// tshig dag rnam par mi zla zhing // mnyan na bde ba byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam
310a7: par snang mdzad chen 'khrug mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyas pa ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyis rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtswa
310a8: tshogs rnams rnam 'brel la/ / thub pa skyes mchog don yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni// rtag tu brten cing bsgom par bya// 'dod chags de bzhin gti rus
310b1: rmongs/ sred dang 'du byed rnam sal ba'i// chos ni rngam pa lnga po 'di// thub skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshad ga ci khu chu mchil ma khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa// bsgom pa'i blo gros rtogs pa
310b2: yis/ dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sbyin pa sreg gis le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'grob mi shes du
310b3: bsal phyir/ / ye shes nyi ma shar ba las// dgeg bu mun pa bsal tshul gsungs// gshin rje gshed las sogs pa yi// mdog dang phyag mtshan las sogs pa// de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru// bye brag gis ni rgyas par
310b4: bsan/ de ri las kyis khyad par gyi// dbang du byas pa khro ba chags// gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin pa// de dag 'di ru bshad par bya// br-i gyi ye shes las byung ba// gtsug gtor gzi brjid pung po ste// zhal gsum ser bya/
310b5: mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug nyi ma las sogs pa// 'dzin cing dkyil mo bkrung bcas pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan cing // 'jig rten khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i// gzugs kyi 'bros pas nam mkha'i
310b6: gar/ / rig mas sA la rab mkhyud pas// chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bgegs kyi gnod pa yod mi dgos// skyon med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni bum gyi ye shes las
310b7: byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can/ / zhal gsum gser 'dra mdangs po che// phyag drug 'khor lo las sogs pa// rol pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// 'dzin cing stag gis smad g.yogs te// thod pa'i phreng bas
310b8: sku la brgyan/ / rig ma dang ldan chags pa'o// 'jol sgeg nyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad// 'di bsgom spro bar byed pa la// nyin dang mtshan du rdo rje sems// 'khor bcas gnas su byon nas su rtag tu srung ba nyid dbyes
311a1: bka' bzhin byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de bzhin bruM kyi ye shes las// byung ba'i khro bo gtsug tor rgyal// zhal gsum ser po mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug lcag pa kyu la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sbrul
311a2: gyis yang dag brgyan/ / 'og tu bgegs kyi gcom nan nas// gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs par byed// ral pa'i gtsug gtor gyis brgyan pa// khro bo 'di 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor gang la sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa'i bogags
311a3: kyang rlag byed na/ / gzhan ma rnams ni spos ci dgos// snying 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM las yang ni byung ba yi// gtsug tor dam tshig cod pan can// zhal gsum gser rkun mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug ka
311a4: pA las sogs pa/ / 'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// zhabs rnam sbyar zhing rnam par 'phen// spro dang bsdu ba'i blo gros can// 'di 'dra gang zhig bsgom pa la// bi na ya ka pA la sogs pa'i
311a5: bgegs kyis skabs ni mi rnyed phyir/ / ji bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// zla gi yi ge las kyang byung // ming gi gtsug tor rnam par mthor// zhal gsum gser ni gtsem 'dra//
311a6: phyag drug tri shu las sogs pa// 'dzin cing srog song steng na gnas// rol pa'i stobs kyis bgegs mchu bcings// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni spro ba'o// gang zhig de 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor/
311a7: de yis go cha bgos// phra ba'i dang tshul can yin pas// bgegs lus gang gis mi g.yo'o// bgegs las rgyal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// bruM gyi ye shes mthu las byung // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa'i
311a8: mchog/ zhal gsum gser 'dra'i nyi 'od mtshungs// phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa// 'dzin mdzad tshems kyis sbom mnan te// chags ldan rig mas 'khyud pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// khrag can ljags kyang
311b1: 'dril ba ste/ / bla med byang chub thob 'dod pa// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du yang // bgegs kyi gnod pa yang mi 'ong // bgegs kyi stong pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni dri
311b2: ye shes las/ / yang dag byung ba'i skabs dkar go// zhal gsum gser zhun lta bur gnas// phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing // skyabs med 'phongs pa'i skyabs mdzad cing // ma ning rnams dang za ma la// bu ni sbyin par byed pa go//
311b3: ral pa'i gtsug tor gyi brgyan pa// reg ma dang ldan pa chen 'di// rnal 'byor gang gis sgom byed cing // bzlas brtse gcig tu byed na// bgegs kyi gnod pas dmi rdzi// rin chen gyi skyabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnal
311b4: 'byor khyad par can gyis ni/ / 'di rnams byang chub bsrung ba'i phyir// 'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgoms na// nang gi bgegs kyis yong mi tshugs// byang chub snying po don gnyer bas// 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na// bsgrims
311b5: nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ / ring po ma thogs 'dod pa 'thob// dpal rdo rje snying po brgyad gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi snying po brgyan gtsug tor 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
311b6: thams cad 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'di yi dpal ni gang zhig lags// rdo rje dang ni snying po dang // de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni
311b7: kye he mchog de bstan du gsol/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ni thun mongs ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i rgyud du rab smras pa// ji bzhin
311b8: gnas pa'i de kho ra/ / yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon// lus ngag yid gsum bde dam pas// lha mo las ni bskyod bya ste// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya// bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste/
312a1: sI'i sa sa cig skad cig du// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yin// de nyid du nyid brtser ba ru// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thige le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul bas bstod par bya// de bzhin
312a2: bskor bas bskabs par bya/ / de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba// rgyud kyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// steng dang mdun du rgya gnyis las// ban drug gnas su yang dag gnas// de las snying dbus rab zhugs te// rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas
312a3: pas/ steng dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku// bdag gi dpal du shes par bya// de las byung ba'i dngos grub che// nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba// thig le yig med bsdus pa'i sku// lhan cig skyes par shes par bya// de la de yi gzug
312a4: kyi sku/ / nam mkha'i khams kun gdab yi// bral ba'i shes pas don byed pa// gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya// de rnams rgyu las byung ba yi// ye shes shes rab shin du gsang // gsang ba rnam par 'grub pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i
312a5: rgyan zhes bya/ / lha mo las byung ba de dang ldar// 'ja' tshon ltar gsal rgyud dag pa// snang ba'i pu de mi shigs pa// rdo rje de yis yang dag bsgrags// sdang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// bsdus phyir brtsegs pa'i budas pa/ ga jir /
312a6: twA da dus mi gnas pa// 'byung phyir snying po zhes su bsgrags// dag dang ma dag thams cad la// 'khor ba ji srid par snang ba// gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na// rgyan du yang dag bsgrags pa yi// dpal dang rdo rje snying po dang /
312a7: rgyan zhes bya ba bzhi po ni// 'brel cing grub par byed pa'i phyir// rgyud ces bya bar bshad pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi// mtshan gyi don ni 'di don du// yang dag 'dus par ngas bshad do// gzhan
312a8: du don nim bsgrags pa/ / bla ma la ni gus pa yi// slob ma la nam rtogs pa'i// rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa'o// don 'di yang dag pa shes na// je snyed don ni bsam yas pa// shes kyang de yi 'bras bu med// de 'dod satas
312b1: byas yang dag blang / / dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ye shes gsum gyi mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang // bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni yongs
312b2: bskal bya/ / de yi sha khrag grang pa nams// drangs te tshogs kyi ston mo bya// de ltar ma byas sdug bsngal tshogs// gti mug can des thob par 'gyur// nad thams cad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs dang nye bar 'tsho ba yi// brka
312b3: pa grangs med byed pa ru/ / sdug bsngal chen por rab snyed cing // 'o dod 'bod pas sbrul gyi brgyan// bstir med chen por rtag par 'gro// de bas las 'dis rgyas gdab bo// gdag nyid rdor rje mkha' 'gro yi// khro bo gzugs
312b4: zhing gyur nas/ / ud dpal mthing kha 'dra ba yi// zhal gsum bal phyag drug pa// rdo rje tri shul phur bu dang // thod pagri gug 'khor lo 'dzin// mi sdug khros ba lce lnga pa// bsams nas de 'og nam mkha' la// bsgrub bya
312b5: rgyas par dmigs nas su/ / rdo rje phur pa las sogs pa// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa las// sgrub pos de yi nyes pa bsgo// de nas phyag mtshan tri shul dang // pur bu drag po mchog dag gis// mgo dang snying khaM lte
312b6: ngag/ / rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa yi// gnas lnga rab tu phug bya ste// lce lnga'i 'od zer lnga po yis// srin bu 'dza' lu ka bzhin du// khrag kun sngags kyis drangs nas su// thod par phab nas btung bar bya// de bzhin sha rnams
312b7: yang bsdus nas/ / bza' ba ru ni rab tu rtag// rus pa rnams kyang 'tshos byas nas// shes pa rdo rje pad mar sbyar// 'di ni don bsgrub rab byed pas// zla ba phyed ni tshun tshad kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar
312b8: gdon mi za/ / rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// bsgrub bya legs par bsgrub byas nas// las ngan dag gis de mi 'khol// sangs rgyas su ni skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor de yang de yise mthus// khro bo mkhas 'gro zhes 'gyur te// kham
313a1: gsum gsang dang gso ba dang / / sems kyi rdo rje brtan byas nas// skad cig tsam du byed par 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa gdon miza// dpal rdo rje snying po brgyan dri las rdo rje mkha' 'gro khra ba'i sbyor bas dgra
313a2: bsang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'dod chags thabs chen po yi rgyud// gang gis legs par shes na ni// tshe 'dis dngos drub sbyin par bshad// gsang ba 'dus pa stong phrag
313a3: gcig/ rdo rje 'phreng ba 'bum phrag gsum// dgongs pa lung ston stong phrag bzhi// lha mo bzhis zhus brgya bdun bcu// u dar tan ta nyis brgya brgyad// de yi nye bar bshad pa'i rgyud// dam tshig chen po lnga bcu lnga// rdo rje lnga 'dus
313a4: stong phrag gcig/ kun las btus pa 'bum phrag gcig/ mnyam nyid rnam rgyal nas brgya bcu// bla gsang thig le stong bdun pa rgya/ rdo rjes 'og brgya nyi shu// cod pan rdo rje bdun rgya lnga// khro Ta thig le 'bum phrag lnga// rdo rje rnam rgyal
313a5: brgya dgu brgya/ / mnyam nyid gsang ba stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gas rgyan stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gsang mdzod stong phrag bdun// nor bu gsang thig 'bum phrag cig/ snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul stong dang brgya// rdo rje gsang brgyan stong phrag/
313a6: gcig/ rdo rje thod pa nyis brgya brgya// de nyid brgya stong brgya stong bdun// dam tshig mngon brgyan stong phrag 'bum// 'jam dpal dpa' bo 'bum phrag gcig/ gsang chen bsdus pa brgya lnga bcu// rin chen sdong po dgu brgya bdun//
313a7: bas kyi thig le brgya brgyad bcu// lha mo bstan chos lnga brgya bdun// 'di rnams dgos pa'i bye brag gis// nga yis yang dag bstan par bya// 'di ni gnyis po mkhyud pa yis// rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o// de bzhin du ni yan lag
313a8: bcangs dang / / rgod dang bltas pas shes par bya// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug gis// rgyud rnams kun kyang shes par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun yang // 'di yi rim pas shes par bya// phyi nang dbye ba shes pa yis// rgyud kyi
313b1: dbye ba shes par bya/ / nang du bstan pa bla ma'i las// yang dag blangs te bslab par bya// tsa bzhin gnas pa la dgongs te// bde bar gshegs pas rgyud kun bstar// rdo rje snying po brgyan gyi rgyung // mkha' 'gro ma dang mkhar/
313b2: 'gro ba// rgyud rnams kun gyi phyi mo ste// gzhan du ma bsgrags don gang zhig/ 'di ru yang dag bstan pa ste// rnal 'byor gang zhig len pa'am// sgom par byed dam 'chang ba'am// klog par byed pa rnal 'byor che// de yang
313b3: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rgyud thams cad kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud rnams kyis// sdom pa
313b4: yang dag shes 'gyur na/ / mkha' 'gro chen por 'gyur bar bshad// gang gis nyan thos rab 'byin pa// spong ba ltung ba'i bye brag bshad// bslab pa dang ni rdzas grags kyis// 'di ru shes kyang yongs rdzogs byed// tshul
313b5: khrims kyi ni bslab pa gsum/ / dge ba'i chos ni bsdud pa dang // sdom pa nyi shu las sogs dang // sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims// byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byin pa// lus ngag yid gsum rab byung ba'i sdom
313b6: bdes kyang mkha' 'gro yi/ / rgyu rnams yang dag sbyor bar byed// zla ba srung dang gtsang sbra bsdam// grong dang gnag lhas thang la yang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// gnod pa dag ni yong mi byed// de bzhin gsheg
313b7: pa'i sdom pa mchog/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// 'gro ba'i don byed byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni rab tu gzung // rdo rje mi bskyed rigs chen po// de rje tshe dang dril bu dang // slob dpon yang ni
313b8: bzung byas la/ / de yi yon tan thob par byed// rin chen tog gi rigs mthon po// nyin mo mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// byin pas de yi yon tan 'thob// pad mo snang ba'i rigs dag
314a1: la/ byi dang nang dang gas pa la// dam tshig rab tug da ba pan// bla med byang chub thob par byed// dza ska las kyi rigs mang po// dam chag dang ni sdom par ldan// bsnyed bkur ma dzad pa sems cad dor/ sa
314a2: de yis yon tan thob/ / srog pa cing g.yeng mi bya// ma byin mi blang brdzun mi smra// pra dang kyal 'tshig rtsub po dang // smra bar mi bya ma dang sems dang // gnod sems log pad lta ba rnams// ram yang byab pa yi'o//
314a3: dkon mchog gsu pa yang ba spang // lha dang bra ma de bzhin no// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir// chang yang rnam par spang bar bya// phyag brgya bzhon pa mtshon cha sogs// mtshan ma'am ni lha yi 'gri// 'gos dang bza' bar
314a4: mi bye ba/ / de las sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// sdom pa gang de gsungs pa rnams// 'di ru dang po'i las can la// de yis yang dag 'jug par byed// thun mong ma yin phas phas pa// bcu bzhir grags pa gang 'di ni//
314a5: sngags pas don kun 'grub byed pas// spang zhing dod par mi bya'o// slob dpon snying nas smod pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las 'da' byed dang // zhes sdang gis ni mched sun 'byin// byams sems med par sems can
314a6: spangs khyang chubs pas chen 'dor ba dang / / bdag gzhan grub pa'i mtha' spong byed// gasdod mi rung la gsang ba bstan// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po spod// dag pa'i chos la som nyid byed// gsum ldan khrol byams ldan
314a7: stong pa thal sbyar byung la rtog pa/ / dad ldan sems ni kun 'byin byed// dam tshig dang ldan rtse mi byed// shes ldan bud med smod par byed// sngags pas de dag yongs spangs nas// nges par dngos grub thob par byed// de la sngags
314a8: pa yongs 'dasan/ / / nges par bdud dang phrad par 'gyur// nad dang sdug bsngal 'phel 'gyur te// bstir med spyi'u tshugs dmyal bar 'gro// sbom po ltung byed nyes dmigs kyang // de dang 'dra bar shes par bya// dam cig mi ldan rig
314b1: par bstan/ / tshogs kyi 'khor lor cod par byed// gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // dad ldan rnams la gzhan du ston// nyan thos nang du yun rings gnas// snod ma rung lagasang ba bstan// kha na mtho sbom 'gyur te// sngags pade
314b2: yi ma sdom zad/ / zad pas 'grub par yod mi 'gyur// de bas nyin rel na gsum du// kha ton gyis kyang klag par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong dang zhugs pa dang // dbang bskur ba las sogs tshul gyi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thobs pa'i
314b3: byang chub sems dang nyan thos dang / / bya dang gnyi ga rnal 'byor rgyud/ dgongs gsungs rnams kyis de lta man// de ltar bas sdom pa'i mchog/ nga yis yang dag bstan par bya// dri ched dri chu rag ta dang // shes dang byang chub sa
314b4: dpas ni/ / bza' ba'i skor pas yang dag bza'// lce yi ye shes mes sbyangs phyir// phyi rol zas las khyad par 'gyur// de bzhin glang chen ta sha dang / la kyi gshanan rnams/ ye shes lnga pi bo'i phyir/ ga' sa makyis
314b5: gsad pa / mthon yang dang par bya'o// bud med thams cad 'dod par spyod// brdzun tshig dag kyang smra bar bya// de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang tshil zhing dgal
314b6: de bzhin rnal 'byor snying po yis/ / sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rang 'dren nyan thos sku gzugs sogs// rang nyid dag pa gsum sbyor bas// phyag byas na ni ri rung 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// lus ngag yid
314b7: dkyil 'khor las/ / nyid bsam gtad gsum sbyor bas// dbyer med blo yim mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bri'o// glegs bam dag kyang mi klag go/ mchod rten las kyang yong mi bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rnams
314b8: kyang spang / / nyin re zhing ni dus bzhi ru// bu mo legs par goms pa las// ga pur tsan dan khas blangs te// cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor mchod// rol mo'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// nga yi rgyud las rab bstan pas// bcu drug thig
315a1: me la so las/ / sngags kyi snying po bdag par bya// bla ma dam pa zugs rnaches// yang dag bstan pa la dmigs pa// byin ci log khung yongs 'dor te// rdo rje 'dzin pade 'drar 'gyur// dpal dang sbyang brgyan
315a2: rgyud las dam ngag dang sdom pa dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas ro langs chen me ye// sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya// sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na// dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o// nag po yin
315a3: chos brgyad dang / / yang na bcu bzhi gang yang rung shing gcig dur khrod ma mo 'am// yang na mi med grod par du// sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can// las kun 'grub par byed pa bsgrubs// mda' maH/ ma dang sl-i sha can// gdol pa
315a4: po dang gar mkhad sogs/ / bdun gyi sol lhag yod pa// / byang dang mdangs ldan rma med ma// lo ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis bsngags// yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// yang na chu dang dang por skyes// sbyangs nas shi ba ma sbags pa/ yang
315a5: dag blangs te la bang steng / / gzhan yang bu mo sgra bzung ste// lha gzhad dang ni dbang po lag/ dkar po dang ni ri sgra dang // gru gnon chu yis bkru bar bya// de nas tsadan dan kar po yis// bu mo lus blugs rgyan dang gos//
315a6: yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bya ste// rtsa sogs gsang sngags rab tu bzla// 'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te// shan nag po mdangs dang ldan// myos byed bsregs pa rol khar// mtshan
315a7: gcig thog thag sbyin bsreg bya/ / de nas tho ras dus su yang // khrag chen phyogs bzhir gtor byas nas// mar khu chen po rol bsku// de nas ro de langs gyur te// khro dang ldan pa'i a gtsar gyis// sa gsum mo yi sgras 'grengs byed//
315a8: nan ma ta// da ma ma myong sogs/ bsrang ba'i 'khor lam bsrung ba // phrag de ma pag tugasod/ ma srung bzung byas nas// bdag nyid la satad la mgod// ya? mad/ bya na 'jog pa
315b1: bya/ / de nas de ni bebs gyur te// sgrub pa po yi mdun gnas nas// bka' nod 'di skad smra bar byed// sems can chen po khyod ci 'dod// bdag la yang dag bka' stsol cig/ ral gri mig sman sa 'og gam// rkang 'gyog
315b2: de bzhin brkyang kyi le de/ / pi rdzing 'gugs pa las gang dag/ bdag gis gcig cig sbyar bar bya// de nas sgrub po de yis kyang // gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdang // de nas ro langs kha de nas// dra ba 'phrul
315b3: 'bar ba/ / de nas sbrul nag lta bu ru// ro yi kha nas 'byung bar byed// de de sgrub pas kha yis blangs// zung stog ser gyi ral grir 'gyur// de thogs tshangs pa'i 'jig rten khams// steng du nges par
315b4: bar byed/ / de bzhin kun du 'gro bar byed// de bzhin rdzas kun gang la bstan// thams cad gser 'gyur rtsi lta bu// de bzhin thabs grub de bya nas// ro ni snga kho bzhin 'gyur te// de yis sbyin bsreg rab byas nas// dkyil
315b5: 'khor yang dag tshim par bya/ / de bas 'di ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ don kun yang dag 'grub byed pa// las thams cad kyi gtso bo ste// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan
315b6: gyi rjud la pha rol sa chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // de ni nga yis sgrub po yi// dngos grub slob dpon las byung phyir// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi// slob
315b7: dpon bskur ba'i cho ga bshad/ / slob dpon med par gyur na ni// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas// slob dpon grangs dang mtshan nyid ni// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// dam sdom gyi ni sdod
315b8: gtsang la/ / slob dpon mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs par// byed cing dang po las 'jug par// byed pa rgyu yi slob dpon no// ri bong 'dzin pa skul byed cing // de yis sgrub po zhing dag cing // ye shes
316a1: sna pa'i sdod rung byed/ / rkyen gyi slob dpon chen po'o// lhan cig nyan par gang gyur pa// de las dga' ba yang dag thob// thob pas yang dag ba mthar phyin// lhan cig byed pa'i
316a2: slob dpon ni/ / mi 'gyur bya bas ldan shes rab can// sngags rgyud sbyor shes dkyil 'khor mkhas// de nyid bcu shes theg chen dga'// gsang bzungs thub slob dpon yin// mig bzangs la so
