316a3: bcu drug pa/ / khu 'khrig rtog pa yang dag spangs// bla ma dga' ba dang mos can// shin tu rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa// dad ldan sbyor ba la goms pa// gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis myos byed//
316a4: shin tu dul ba khyad par can// bsrung ba'i gnas su yang dag blangs// dge dang bsgos pa la dga' ba// rtag tu bla ma la gus pa'i// slob pas bla ma 'di ltar blta// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//
316a5: de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung // de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin// de yi yon tan thams cad gzungs// skyon kun sems kyis kyang mi
316a6: bsams/ / yon tan bzung na dngos grub thob// skyon gyis dngos grub nyams par byed// mchod rten bshig dang sdig 'dra'i phyir// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// stan dang lham dang bzhon pa dang //
316a7: 'gom par bya ba smos ci dgos// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// mchog kun de yis spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa des// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// nged bgegs dang log 'dren 'dzin/
316a8: rims dang smug dang gshin rjes 'dzin// 'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste// ngan pa gtum po blud chen te// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur yang // blo ldan rnams kyis mi srung bar // mdung la sogs pa'i
316b1: mtshan cha yis/ / kha na mtho byed pa bsang // mdo sogs bstan pa'i dmyal ba ru// slob dpon spod par byed pade// gnas par 'byung ba dang yis bstan// de bas ma ma' zhabs drung du// bags ba dang /
316b2: du ngo tsha ba srung // blo dang rgo dang lung ba sogs// kha ba lag pas bkab nas su// shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya// mgo thod bcing dang mtshon byug pa// bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o// bro brdungs pa dang brkam
316b3: tshig dag/ thos pa'i yul nas mi bya'o// bdud 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang // yang dag nyid du ma bya'o// las ni gang dag byed pa'am// mnyan pa las sogs 'dod pa la// bzung phyir thal mo ma bshig par//
316b4: gnas nas langs te mthong yul du// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste// mtshan mo dang ni chu rgal dang // cod rong dag tu gnas gyur na// bka' lung gnyer du dgum pa'i phyir// mdun du 'gro ba nyes mi 'gyur/
316b5: debs thabs ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog/ rje su 'thun pas mnyes par bya// de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad mnyas// gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad// de yis rgyud kun bsgrub pa'i mchog/
316b6: gnyid dang 'du 'dzi rnams spangs te// bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang // dmyal sogs sgrub par byed pa'o// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// bsabs pa 'bras bu smin byed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod
316b7: nga yis/ / sems can dad dang ldan pas mchod// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las bla ma bkur ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // rdo rje pad mo sbyor ba las// yang dag ye shwam+me 'gyur bas// sgyu ma'i mchog ni bud med de/
316b8: dpe mang dang mtshan nyid bstan// tasti ni dang shang ki ni// ka ma la dang ci dran// thams cad rigs ni bzhir 'gyur te// tasti rig ta ri che ba// spos mo 'dod chags yang dag ce// bde yangs kha nas sha rul gro// dkar
317a1: 'chang mtha' phra go skom byed/ / shang gi rag ti ri sbyor ba// rkang pra sA legs cung zad khro// kha nas dung bro 'gros dal legs// dkar 'chang dpal gyi 'bras bu 'dra// ka ma' ngag ta'i rod dmar zhing // sha
317a2: gi rag ta ro sbyar ba/ / phra sbom ran ba dmar po ste// 'dod chags mig ni mi 'dzums lta// dkar 'chang a ri sha 'dra ba// tsi ta rag ti ro mngar zhing // thun dun khro bag dang bcas pa// chags min lta byed ngo ga nag pa//
317a3: dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon dbye ba ste// 'di rnams yang dag phrad gyur na// sgrub pa pol tshe 'di ru// dngos grub yang dag ster ba ste// bde bas 'di rnams 'bad pas btsal// yang dag rnyed nas gang rung du// ba lang
317a4: bza' ni mnga' yi nang / / btung bas shel khams rnam par 'phel// de ni thabs kyis ster ba yis// yang dag tu ni rang bzhin rtag/ rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu ste// dngos po thams cad zad pa ste// rnam par rtog pa thams cad
317a5: dang / / bral ba'i dga' ba yang dag zab// sam med zad med phra mo ste// dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa// 'chi med rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod// gang gi dbus su 'dab brgyad pa// snying po lnga yis yang dag brgyan// de dbus de gnas cha nas lnga//
317a6: cha gnyis pa ni brgyad mthar dbyung // sum bcu bcu pa lnga yi na// cha gnyis lnga pa drug pa yi// thig le du ni gzhug pa ste// skyes bu gang gis de la ni// mig gi 'od zer gyis lta ba// de la ci bzhin gnas pa yi// ye shes skye bar ze
317a7: tshom med/ / nam zhig 'gog pa'i sems gyur na// sangs rgyas kun gyis mchog 'dzin pa// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro 'dra bar 'gyur// de ring phan chad bu khyod ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag 'bri ba dang // sgrub po rgyud la sbyor ba yis
317a8: slob dpon chen po nyid du 'gyur/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // dbang bskur bar ni rab sngags te// thams cad sngags ni sgrub 'gyur te// las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub// bu mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun//
317b1: sems can khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis// yid du 'ong ba'i rig ma 'di// bde gshegs kun gyis khyod spyod gnas// stong pa la ni sems sbyor na// khyod ni yang dag dam par 'gyur// 'di ni bde gshegs bde mdzad pa//
317b2: khyod ni 'di las rang byung ngo // dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyis mtshan nyid brtog pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dngos kun chog
317b3: shes med na/ / sgrub po dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni brtul zhugs bstan// sbyor ba'i rtsol ba thams cad ni// de nyid rig pas spang bar bya// rdo rje sems dang nges 'dug pa// spangs nas gzhan du mi
317b4: bya'o/ / dag pa de nyid la gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste// bdag med gnas pa'i spyod pa yis// ci srid bar du so sor rtag/ dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang // zabs bzangs dag dang ldan pa yis// rnyed
317b5: las gang ci 'byung ba rnams/ / ma rtogs pas ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni// dngos grub mtshan nyid gang yang rung // de kun skad cig tsam la ni// rang nyid gnas par gyur pa yin// de bas
317b6: dge slong dngos gnas dang / / de bzhin rtog dge' rgan po dang // rang gi bu dang rgyal po la// de nyid yang dag bshad mi bya// ji ltar mar me bum nang nas// pha rol du ni 'od mi gsal// bum pa de ni chag par gyur//
317b7: de 'og mar me gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin dang lus bum pa nyid// de nyid mar me nyid lta bu// bla ma'i kha yis legs bcag nas// sbyor ba'i de nyid ston pa yin// sbyor ba de nyid la gnas na// gang tshe brtan
317b8: ba mi btag la/ / gnas shing 'jig rten pa spangs te// sbyong pa thams cad byas nas ni// de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs// kun tu the tshomacod pa yis// rig pas byis pa bzhin du sbyang // gang tshe chags med rnal 'byed/
318a1: ga/ tshe phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur// sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang // gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa// smyon pa'i rnal 'byor skyor ba yis// zla drug gi ni don yod grub// rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing /
318a2: 'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs// zad med gzhom du med pa dang // dang pa'i sku tshe 'byung bar 'gyur// bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog/ 'bad pa med par yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa kun gyi dga' mos rnams// dbang bral//
318a3: bas ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na// mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag/ 'od gsal ye shes lam mkhan pa// mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis/
318a4: ni/ sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab zhugs pa// byin gyis brlab pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de ltar gyur pas zhus nas kyang // ji srid sems ni mi skyo bar// mnyam bzhag yid ni bzang po
318a5: yis/ de las 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de 'og la ni ci dga' ba'i// spyad pa yis ni gcig byas na// cung zad spyan phye ba yi mtshan// byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// rgod dam smra 'am 'dug pa 'am// la lar
318a6: rab tu gar byed par/ / ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar// bsgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya// de lta'i dam tshig ldan gyur cing // rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis// dus kyi nges pas yongs spangs nas// bla med byang chub
318a7: thob par 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las shes byed kun du spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la tshigs su
318a8: bcad pas bstod pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis rang bzhin las// byung ba'i lto ste khyod mchog pas// sems dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che// mkha' 'gro chen po phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug thams cad 'od gsal pa/
318b1: mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas chen po ste// gzugs snang chos ni rnam dag pa// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// nga rgyal thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro re 'dod skong pa ste/ sim sogs
318b2: chos ni rnam dag pa/ / rin chen mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags thams cad 'od gsal ba// skyon gyi gos med mkha' 'gro che// mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam dag pa// pad mo mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal//
318b3: phrag dog chos ni 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro sna tshogs las byed pa// mngon par 'du byed chos kun dag/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// mtshan mchog 'di yis khyod bstod pas// gang zag de yang
318b4: bsod nams tshogs/ / ye shes tshogs chen yongs rdzogs nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tshom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings
318b5: thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po mi bshigs pa'i zla ba skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ / rang gi thugs kha'i mi shigs pa'i
318b6: thig le las shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te// nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
318b7: du yang snang bar byas nas steng 'og tu yang bzhugs te/ / ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i ri dang // sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te slar log nas bcom
318b8: ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po'i snying po'i mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog/
319a1: tu bde bar gyur pa'i snying po nges bskul ba na gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su gsang ba'i dgyes pa chen
319a2: po'i bde bar gcig tu bsdus par gyur te/ / rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la na la pa gra gyu // de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas ca co'i sgra
319a3: yang dag par 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rjod par gyur to/ / kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin du dgyes chen po// kye ma'o sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma'o kun du bzang po yis//
319a4: dge ba'i ye shes bde byed che// gang bde'i phyir ni rig ma yin// pad mo la ni gnas par mdzod// kye ma'o reg pa shin tu zag// shes rab pha rol phyin ma 'di// sems can kun la shes rab kyi// mun pa'i thibs po sel
319a5: bar mdzad/ / kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro 'dra bar gar mdzad cing // rnam par snang mdzad myang ba dang // mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa mchog/ kye ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal spyod pa dang ni//
319a6: sna tshogs skal pas bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te 'di
319a7: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / A li dang ni kA lI dang // de byung zla ba rnam pa gnyis/ me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ gcig tu gyur pa mnyam nyid do// sa bon mtshan mar gyur pa ni// so sor rtog par ngas bshad do//
319a8: de byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'gro don byed pa bya nan tan// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa chos dbyings te// lha yi dbang po sangs rgyas bskyed// de la bar mas khu bas bskyed// bskur bas rang gi lhar bskyed nas/
319b1: byin gyis brlabs pa bya ba ni// rgyud rnams kyi ni thun mong ngo // gsang dang gsang chen shin du gsang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po dang // rjes su rnal 'byor zhes bya dang // stong pa dang ni shin du stong // chen po stong pa
319b2: zhes bya dang / / dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang // dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba rnams// rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi bo'o// phyir bzlog gnyis kyi cho ga dang // gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang // kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga dang //
319b3: gtor ma rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang // drag shul bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang // rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgrub// gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin no// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // stang stabs 'dug stangs bzlas brjod dang /
319b4: spyir bsreg mchod pa las sbyor dang // slar sdud pa yi rnam pa ni// phyi yi de nyid bcu yin no// yang dag de nyid dngos po mi shes par// gsang sngags smra ba pa yin zhes brjod pa// de dag mngon pa'i rgyal gsang sngags chog 'chang /
319b5: de ni nga pa nyams 'di dang pha rol brlag/ nyams pas bdud kyis bzung nas shi nas dmyal bar 'gro// sems can rnams la rab rten te// byang chub dam pa thob 'gyur ba// sems can slu bar mi bya ste// bde gshegs las la
319b6: sems can sbyar/ / gang zhig sbyor 'di mi brtson pas// rkang lag mig sogs sbyin pa dang // dka' thub ci 'dra spyad byas kyang // bdud rtsi ro thob mi nus so// rnal 'byor gcig gcig shes byas nas// dben par song ste rab 'bad na//
319b7: sdug dag tshe 'dir sangs rgyas 'grub// chos bdag med par rab bsgoms pas// thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud// thabs shes gnyis kyi 'jo sgeg gis// gsang ba lnga yi bdag nyid mchod// dngos po thams cad dngos med par/
319b8: bani bcu don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad ma dbang bskur ba// dud rtsi yis ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang bas// gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni// nal 'byor sems pas sbyang byanas/
320a1: de bzhin bza' dang btung byas nas// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// 'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med de mchod phyi'i thogs pa'ang med// dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg med de dus dang gza'/
320a2: tshes med// gtor ma las sogs bya bar bya ba med de mchog dang po// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa yang dag pa 'di nyid yin de btson par bya// de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan
320a3: 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la legs so zhes gsol te/ legs so legs so bde byed che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so sna tshogs che/
320a4: legs so legs so dgyes pa che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos thugs rjes chen po'i thugs rang gis thugs yang dag pa la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// dpal rdo rje
320a5: snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po 'di kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba dpal ur+ya ni gsang ba'i dgon pa nas byung ba rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyis mkhan po ka ma la kuT ta dang / 'od kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po mda'
320a6: bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te btan la bab ba/ ye d+hamA he ta pra b+ha wa he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te tsu yon d+ha e ba pA dI ma hA pra ma Na//
